TEXT_CHA_PA_5_36_DESC.text: One day, a pungmul party - a band of traditional musicians from Han - passes by the Forest of Spirits on their wanderings through the Eastern Kingdoms. The lively, rousing songs sung by the pungmul musicians are like nothing that Neulsolgil and the other spirits have heard before, and an excited Neulsolgil opens the entrance to her forest. Unbeknownst to the Deer Spirit, the pungmul party are hunters in disguise, intent on hunting down the Guardian Spirits. Once they gain entrance to the sacred forest, the hunters use their advantage of surprise to immediately ensnare Neulsolgil and her friends in their traps. Neulsolgil sees her friends, unaccustomed to war, cry out in fear and helplessness. She will not forgive herself if anyone is hurt for her mistake. Enraged, Neulsolgil shatters the ground, causing a great earthquake and scaring away the hunters. Shattered too are her trust in humans and her love of music. Neulsolgil lays down her hammer and walks back into her forest.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_22_DESC.text: Mengqi fights at the vanguard of his army for five long years, achieving one victory after another until the war is won. His glorious return home is met by a heartfelt reunion and acknowledgement from his father. Mengqi, renewed by his father's approval, goes on to perform greater feats and victories, winning for himself the title of the Five Tiger General of Chen.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_23_DESC.text: ...Until one day, after hundreds of years, when a break in the seal of the sanctuary finally awakens Heim. Heim accepts the curse of the Guardian and, his determination renewed, begins searching for the disturbance. Through his yet hazy mind memories of a clown flash by now and then, and Heim closes his eyes in confusion.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_24_DESC.text: One day, a villain who requested to remain unnamed talks to media that Yuna's magic is fabricated and she is in fact so violent and such a bully that even the worst villains do not want to get into a fight with her. The potential publicity nightmare, however, does not effect her popularity, yet she becomes even more famous for being the bad girl. And rumor has it that nobody has heard of or seen the villain who leaked the truth about her.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_24_NAME.text: Yuna, the Rookie of the Year

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_25_DESC.text: Caeneus does not falter, however, and continues his onward march at the front of battle lines, boosting his allies' spirits and striking fear into the hearts of his enemies. To the rest of the Cobalt Knights, the valiant and loyal Caeneus is the best Captain a knight could ask for. Only Caeneus fully feels the emptiness left by Victoria's departure, and he wonders if he can ever fill her shoes...

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_26_DESC.text: Odin's disatisfaction towards his brother only grows when Thor rejects his proposal. Thinking that he could lead Nosgard to its second golden age, Odin furtively gathers forces under his flag. There have been odious rumors that he has been spotted conjuring dark plans with the Einherjar, the Nosgardian elite army.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_28_DESC.text: With her new epiphany, Fireaxe decides to collect scraps from the Junkyard to design her own armor and weapon. Although she is still far from becoming the greatest Colosseum Champion, her creative and original style of fighting has come to gather many fans.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_29_DESC.text: I had been aiming for greatness my whole life. Now what was the point to my years of training? That's what I thought as I traveled the country after leaving the Palace, but I remembered ol' Drunken Fist's words and continued to train as often as I saw fit along the road. Then one day I had what some people call an enlightenment. Felt like a bright light suddenly going pop! in my head, and suddenly I saw answers to problems that had troubled me all these years, up to just the day before. The world seemed clear and simple. We humans only live once, but why were we fighting all the time? Weren't we happy enough just living in peace? Not just on the battlefield, but even among our countrymen we were hating each other and fighting until it seemed the world was gonna end. And the king! I have the greatest respect for His Majesty but during my time at the palace he showed his face just once, spending most of his time cooped up in his chambers like a sick rooster. Why should he worry his royal self to death when everything was so simple? So with my newfound wisdom I went back to the Palace, intent on telling His Majesty that he needn't worry all the time and could just stop the war if he put his mind to it. People along the way kept recognizing me and asked me where I had gone all this time. Said they'd thought I was dead or had gone mad somewhere. Well, I was impatient to see His Majesty and walked straight up to the Palace Doors without really answering - where a new face stopped my way. Turned out that my absence had been a little long and they had picked a new Tiger General to replace me, and this was the man. His name was Mengqi and he was young enough to be my son, if I had ever thought to get married! Master Hansheng on the other hand was still there, his blind eyes seeing everything as always. I explained the whole situation to young Mengqi, who first refused to budge, but I reckon my words had some truth to them for he relented in time and let me in. Before the Palace Doors I thought it would be polite to knock, since I'm no longer a Tiger General and I had left without a word. So I knocked - and the doors suddenly toppled over as if they were made of paper! I was so flabbergasted and embarrassed that I just mumbled a few words and left. I admit, I was scared for a few days that I would be deemed a traitor for insulting the king or some reason of that sort. And why had the Palace Doors been so weak? Don't they build palaces to be sturdier than that? I came out after a few days, telling myself that a man's gotta do what a man's gotta do. Imagine my surprise when people began calling me the 'Fist King' and celebrating my strength! And that's the story of how I began to be called 'Fist King.' It's an embarrassing story, but you know it now. But now I 'spose I gotta tell you about my friend - remember that sole descendant of the famous clan I told you about? Well now, I remember our first meeting as clear as yesterday...

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_30_DESC.text: Achilles, drinking in the frenzied cheer of the crowd around him, triumphantly rips away the subdued Lion Mask’s disguise—to come face-to-face with the aged face of the former Beast King, who had abdicated his position to Agrius and disappeared into oblivion some years ago. Achilles numbly stares at Lion Mask’s face reddening with embarrassment and rage. Coming to his senses, he submissively returns the mask to the greatest warrior and soldier Roman has ever known, mumbling a word of apology… when the Beast King, or rather Lion Mask, suddenly executes a chair shot against the champion. After a moment of utter silence, Lion Mask fixes his mask back on once more, and raises his arms in victory. The audience haltingly claps in bewilderment. A new Champion is born… Or that’s what Lion Mask insists, anyway.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_31_DESC.text: Cecilia, aware that she can no longer follow an order she knows has grown corrupt, decides to leave the Order once and for all... That very night, however, she receives a prophecy from the Goddess in her dreams. The Goddess whispers that true peace will only come by eradicating the false beliefs that are terrorizing Hasla - that she, Cecilia, devote herself to the Kalard, the true Goddesses, and the way of the light and punish the deceptive Elard and their followers in their stead. After waking up, Cecilia feels a new passion coursing through her soul. Her hammer is prepared to answer the true Goddess's calling as her defender!

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_32_DESC.text: Even after she is rescued by Demona, Luci remains wary of the Devil. It is only after she reaches Hell Island and sees the peaceful lives led by the Devilish race that she comes to realize the error of her ways. Unlike the evil Demons, Devils were people who had overcome temptation with strong will and the pure goodness of their hearts. Enlightened by the truth, Luci swears to protect Hell and its residents until the day she dies, hoping that she can repent for her sins of sending innocent people to burn at the stake.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_33_DESC.text: After many years pass and around the time that Otis comes to learn that the bottles used to contain black tea, made durable to prevent breaking during their journeys in the harsh environment, can be used as a good bludgeon in battle, the gang is dismissed due to financial difficulties. Otis, who had been irritated by the constant flow of unwanted visitors, takes the opportunity to feign his own death. Aiming now for a peaceful and quiet life in which he can spend his old age, Otis sets up a small tea house in a secluded corner of the desert. Yet fate does not allow him the peace he desires: rumors of the store that sells contraband tea spread throughout the wildlands, and outlaws and thieves flock to Otis's home in hopes of striking gold. Of course, the moment any bold outlaw steps into his beloved tea house, Otis makes sure that the last thing they see is his bottle of treasured black tea… Save for the few brash newcomers now and then, 'Hideout' thus becomes the most peaceful area in the desert, where even the most infamous outlaws dare not start even the smallest squabble under the tea master’s keen gaze.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_35_DESC.text: His eyes now filled with the light of his old life, Snorri grieves over the ruins of his lost kingdom. Despair and guilt flood his soul as he recalls his failure to save his people from a devastating snowstorm hundreds of years ago. When Snorri offers his strength in rebuilding the Elder Edda, Wolfgang gladly takes him to Odin, the overseer of the restoration. Odin, a radical fundamentalist who vies for revival of the old ways, almost faints in ecstasy when he meets the soul of the first king of Nosgard. Upon waking, he resumes his work to restore Elder Edda with even more enthusiasm. Snorri, grateful that he can at the very least alleviate the long burden on his heart, heads to the Sanctuary to finally meet the being who gifted him his second life.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_35_NAME.text: Snorri the Spirit of the Sanctuary

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_36_DESC.text: What is life without singing and dancing? Having lost her love of music, Neulsolgil becomes a shadow of her former self. The other Guardian Spirits too come to fear or despise the human race, and the once joyful Forest of Spirits withers away in silence and solitude. Years pass, until a cheerful melody resounds from beyond the forest. Neulsolgil and the other Guardian Spirits initially try to ignore the music, believing that it could be another attempt at invasion. Yet the power of music proves too strong after such a long period of silence, and the spirits find themselves unable to resist their curiosity. They run out of the forest to find the pungmul party that had once deceived them, as well as other humans from the local villages. The humans were asking the spirits for their forgiveness; they regretfully recount how the darkness that had overclouded the entire kingdom had also driven them to greed and violence. Neulsolgil gazes at them quietly. She steps forward... and begins to dance. The humans and the spirits smile, first among themselves, then at each other. Time may pass and history may take its course, but human and spirit alike will always remember the ensuing celebration of forgiveness and friendship that did not stop for ten days.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_APFOOL_4_NARI_DESC.text: Nari is an ordinary high school student like any other in the country of ‘Korea’ – that is, until she is hit by a speeding truck on the first day of the new school year! Shocked by the painful moment of her own death, she becomes even more startled when she finds herself standing unharmed before a beautiful Goddess. The clearly uninterested Goddess, however, only glances at the stunned girl before snapping her fingers. Before her last echoes of pain ebb away, Nari is once more flung into the air and across the dimensions—straight into the middle of a battlefield of a strange new world. She has arrived in the dimension of ‘Wulin’: a world of martial artists engaged in an ongoing war between the orthodox sects and the ‘Mo Jiao,’ a demonic cult.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_APFOOL_5_NARI_DESC.text: On the harsh battlefield where even the most experienced warriors easily lose their lives to the enemy, Nari crosses paths with 'Jin Zhonghua,' master of the 'Forsythia Berry Technique.' Jin Zhonghua, due to Nari's strange appearance and even stranger mode of arrival, comes to believe the girl a genius "sent by the heavens" and takes her under her wing, even transferring to her the secret of the 'Forsythia Berry Technique." For better or for worse, Nari turns out to have true talent at martial arts: decades of training turns a formerly ordinary high school girl into an invincible master. In the last battle with 'Mo Jiao,' Nari defeats the Cult Master 'Demonic Sky Dragon King Sula.' The emperor of 'Wulin' praises her achievement of bringing peace to the world and appoints her as a Great General, rewarding her the title 'Dragon Slaying Fists' in acknowledgement of her mastery over the art.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_APFOOL_6_NARI_DESC.text: After sixty years as a warrior in 'Wulin,' Nari comes to forget much of her time as a high school student of Korea. At her deathbed, she looks back at her past and smiles in the satisfying knowledge that she has led a full and eventful life. At the very moment of her death, however, Nari once more finds herself before the Goddess who had sent her to the dimension of 'Wulin' many years ago. Any confusion dissipates as Nari recognizes the Goddess and throws a punch in her direction, mustering all the enraged energy she has built up through decades of her training. The powerful blow destroys the Goddess - who vanishes without a trace - and simultaneously warps the dimensional field. Nari's internal force of 'ki,' coursing through her physical body at utmost power, rejuvenates it before dissolving. Having recovered her youthful self, Nari suddenly feels nostalgia for her old home that she had forgotten for many years. Maybe regaining mastery over her strength and 'ki' may help her return to Korea - who knows? Taking Haruki who has somehow resurrected after the crash, Nari jumps headlong into the only exit: the crack created by the dimensional warp. Whatever world awaits her, she knows she will do well.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_4_02_DESC.text: Hols is the second member of the Eto Rangers, defenders of the Novel Worlds. The kind hearted Hols is usually very gentle, but has a tendency to go berserk when seeing red objects. Upon hearing of the Jyarei Monsters' invasion of a new world, he readily joins the other rangers to warp to the world of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_4_03_DESC.text: The third Eto Ranger Gao, unlike his intimidating outer appearance, has a warm heart that cares deeply about his comrades. He isn't the official leader of the Eto Rangers, but is the leader in spirit with his strength and loyalty.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_4_09_DESC.text: The ninth member of the Eto Rangers. Monk likes to kid and play a lot, and will pull pranks on other members whenever he sees the opportunity. Often banters with Pochiro but deep inside really cares about his friend.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_4_10_DESC.text: The tenth member of the Eto Rangers. May act tough and rough on the outside most of the time, but is really one of the most caring in the group. Rushes in to help after hearing the news that the Jyarei Monsters invaded Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_4_12_DESC.text: The twelfth member of the Eto Rangers. As the youngest member of the Eto Rangers, the other members dote on him often. However, due to also being the biggest coward as well as a crybaby, his explosive crying keeps the other members on edge.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_5_02_DESC.text: Hols is the second member of the Eto Rangers, defenders of the Novel Worlds. The kind hearted Hols is usually very gentle, but has a tendency to go berserk when seeing red objects. Upon hearing of the Jyarei Monsters' invasion of a new world, he readily joins the other rangers to warp to the world of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_5_09_DESC.text: The ninth member of the Eto Rangers. Monk likes to kid and play a lot, and will pull pranks on other members whenever he sees the opportunity. Often banters with Pochiro but deep inside really cares about his friend.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_5_10_DESC.text: The tenth member of the Eto Rangers. May act tough and rough on the outside most of the time, but is really one of the most caring in the group. Rushes in to help after hearing the news that the Jyarei Monsters invaded Hasla.

Upon hearing of the Jyarei Monsters' invasion of a new world, he readily joins the other rangers to warp to the world of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_6_09_DESC.text: The ninth member of the Eto Rangers. Monk likes to kid and play a lot, and will pull pranks on other members whenever he sees the opportunity. Often banters with Pochiro but deep inside really cares about his friend.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_6_10_DESC.text: The tenth member of the Eto Rangers. May act tough and rough on the outside most of the time, but is really one of the most caring in the group. Rushes in to help after hearing the news that the Jyarei Monsters invaded Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_ER_6_12_DESC.text: The twelfth member of the Eto Rangers. As the youngest member of the Eto Rangers, the other members dote on him often. However, due to also being the biggest coward as well as a crybaby, his explosive crying keeps the other members on edge.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_GG4_4_01_DESC.text: A doctor from a dimension different from Hasla's. Once a highly renowned surgeon, a mishap that caused the loss of a young patient's life during an operation sent him into a downward spiral of madness, turning him into a murderous psychopath. In hope of atoning for the people he killed, he puts on a paper bag and tries to save people suffering from diseases, under the name of 'Faust,' while trying to uncover the truth of the mishap from his past.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_GG4_5_01_DESC.text: Faust finds out that the young patient's death back then was not due to his mishap but a ruse led by the Assassin's Guild. However, it turns out the Assassin's Guild is also just a puppet of the Conclave. Faust confronts the Conclave to prevent future victims a similar fate as his, and then learns the truth of the accident from the revived 'Zato-1'.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_GG4_6_01_DESC.text: Faust moves to stop the Conclave's plans. Meanwhile, he receives a request from 'Johnny' and investigates the mystery surrounding the Japanese, and as a result, he accompanies the 'Jellyfish Pirates'. After everything is over, he interrogates 'Chronus', a member of the Conclave, about the Japanese, but learns of a conspiracy that even the Conclave is unaware of. Then, while seeking the truth about the Japanese Colony, he gets caught up in a mysterious dimensional shift and falls into Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_GS_4_02_DESC.text: A legendary Gold Rank adventurer who defeated the Demon Lord years ago. Sword Maiden now serves as Archbishop of the Temple of Law in Water Town. When she attempts to contact Goblin Slayer for a new quest, she discovers that he has gone missing. Upon hearing that the warrior and his party teleported to a world called Hasla to chase after a Goblin Lord, Sword Maiden throws herself into the magical mirror out of concern and affection for him.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_GS_5_02_DESC.text: A legendary Gold Rank adventurer who defeated the Demon Lord years ago. Sword Maiden now serves as Archbishop of the Temple of Law in Water Town. When she attempts to contact Goblin Slayer for a new quest, she discovers that he has gone missing. Upon hearing that the warrior and his party teleported to a world called Hasla to chase after a Goblin Lord, Sword Maiden throws herself into the magical mirror out of concern and affection for him.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_GS_6_02_DESC.text: A legendary Gold Rank adventurer who defeated the Demon Lord years ago. Sword Maiden now serves as Archbishop of the Temple of Law in Water Town. When she attempts to contact Goblin Slayer for a new quest, she discovers that he has gone missing. Upon hearing that the warrior and his party teleported to a world called Hasla to chase after a Goblin Lord, Sword Maiden throws herself into the magical mirror out of concern and affection for him.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_LASTSOUL_4_PUMPKING_.text: A pumpkin that has come to life through the magic of Pumpqueen the Pumpkin Witch. Pumpking wishes to explore the wide world, but the magic marker embedded in his head begins to fill him with uncontrollable fury against the Four Great Witches.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_LASTSOUL_5_PUMPKING_.text: Pumpking grows grouchier as the days pass, his once amiable personality distorted by the angry energy radiating from his magic marker. He stalks the streets of Pumpkin City, refusing to listen to the orders of his creator and scaring young witches instead. Eventually, the Night Witches decide that they cannot let the scarecrow roam free any longer, but Pumpking easily eludes them with the powerful magic of his magic marker.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_LASTSOUL_6_PUMPKING_.text: When even the Night Witches fail to capture Pumpking, the Four Great Witches set out to hunt him down themselves. What meets their eyes is an abomination feeding on the terror of witches, but the Four Great Witches – with proficiency befitting their position – manage to chase him to the edge of Pumpkin City. Pushed to the very brink, Pumpking and the Four Witches face each other. The Four Witches attempt to land the final attack when Pumpqueen the Pumpkin Witch, who had been waiting at that very spot, helps Pumpking escape. After that day, a rumor is born of a terrifying pumpkin monster that devours any foolish witch who dares to treat pumpkins with less respect than they deserve.
Pumpking and the Pumpkins of Wrath

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_OT_4_06_DESC.text: Age 21, male. An apothecary treating the wounded and sick in a small village in the Riverlands.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_OT_5_06_DESC.text: Stricken ill as a child, he was saved by a traveler who asked for nothing in return.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_OT_6_06_DESC.text: 「I want to save everyone, just like that person...! 」 Then, one day, hesitant to leave the only home he's known, his best friend convinces him to follow his dream.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_RZ_4_03_DESC.text: The younger sister of the twin maids working at the Roswaal Mansion. While she has achieved perfection at everything she does, her respect for her older sister has gone unchanged. She is currently suspicious of Subaru, who has come to Roswaal Mansion under strange circumstances.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_RZ_5_03_DESC.text: The younger sister of the twin maids working at the Roswaal Mansion. While she has achieved perfection at everything she does, her respect for her older sister has gone unchanged. She is currently suspicious of Subaru, who has come to Roswaal Mansion under strange circumstances.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_RZ_6_03_DESC.text: The younger sister of the twin maids working at the Roswaal Mansion. While she has achieved perfection at everything she does, her respect for her older sister has gone unchanged. She is currently suspicious of Subaru, who has come to Roswaal Mansion under strange circumstances.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_SH_4_02_DESC.text: Naofumi, the Shield Hero and one of the four Legendary Heroes, arrives at the Cal Mira Islands to prepare for the oncoming Waves of Destruction. Yet when the dimension unexpectedly starts cracking before him and his companions to reveal the Rift of Dimensions, Naofumi finds himself separated from his comrades, everything around him sucked into the vortex and into a strange new world...

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_SH_4_03_DESC.text: Shield Hero Naofumi's Filolial comrade. While waiting for the Waves of Destruction with Naofumi in the Cal Mira Islands, the adventurers unexpectedly came face-to-face with a great crack in the dimension that began to suck in everything around it. Filo too was swallowed by the vortex into the Rift of Dimensions, separated from the rest of the company...

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_SH_5_02_DESC.text: Naofumi, the Shield Hero and one of the four Legendary Heroes, arrives at the Cal Mira Islands to prepare for the oncoming Waves of Destruction. Yet when the dimension unexpectedly starts cracking before him and his companions to reveal the Rift of Dimensions, Naofumi finds himself separated from his comrades, everything around him sucked into the vortex and into a strange new world...

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_SH_5_03_DESC.text: Shield Hero Naofumi's Filolial comrade. While waiting for the Waves of Destruction with Naofumi in the Cal Mira Islands, the adventurers unexpectedly came face-to-face with a great crack in the dimension that began to suck in everything around it. Filo too was swallowed by the vortex into the Rift of Dimensions, separated from the rest of the company...

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_SH_6_02_DESC.text: Naofumi, the Shield Hero and one of the four Legendary Heroes, arrives at the Cal Mira Islands to prepare for the oncoming Waves of Destruction. Yet when the dimension unexpectedly starts cracking before him and his companions to reveal the Rift of Dimensions, Naofumi finds himself separated from his comrades, everything around him sucked into the vortex and into a strange new world...

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_SH_6_03_DESC.text: Shield Hero Naofumi's Filolial comrade. While waiting for the Waves of Destruction with Naofumi in the Cal Mira Islands, the adventurers unexpectedly came face-to-face with a great crack in the dimension that began to suck in everything around it. Filo too was swallowed by the vortex into the Rift of Dimensions, separated from the rest of the company...

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_4_SAHAD_DESC.text: A fisherman from the Greek area. A dynamic and free-spirited man of middle age and great physique, Sahad is well-liked for his lively disposition and amiable personality.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_5_SAHAD_DESC.text: On Sahad's return voyage home, the Lombardia is attacked by a mysterious monster of the sea, stranding the passengers on the Isle of Seiren. It is while being chased by a 'Variant Beast' that Sahad meets Adol and company, and after receving their help to drive the Beast away, Sahad decides to joins them.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_6_SAHAD_DESC.text: Sahad, with his great store of knowledge and experience of the sea, helps the Castaway Village by giving survival advice and fishing lessons. While exploring the northern shore of the island, he comes to meet Dana - the girl of Adol's dreams. Joining the company to help recover Dana's memories, Sahad too is transported by the power of the Energy Crystal to Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_4_DESC.text: A girl of the wilderness who had been living on the Isle of Seiren long before the passengers of the Lombardia washed ashore. Due to her long life in the wild, she possesses the ability to talk to animals. Innocent yet always hungering after knowledge, Ricotta uses books drifted ashore to study about the outside world.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_5_DESC.text: Ricotta meets and helps Adol and company in their battle against the 'Variant Beast.' Giving them clues on how to defeat the 'Ancient Species,' she then joins the group to find 'Father,' who has not returned after leaving for the mountain one month ago.

TEXT_CHA_PA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_6_DESC.text: After finally reuniting with 'Father' on the northern side of the island, Ricotta decides to help out Adol and the people of Castaway Village. On their mission to help Dana recover her memories, a mysterious power flows out of the Energy Crystal to teleport them all to the dimension of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_PA_UNIQUE_4_UMRAT_DESC.text: The darkness without a name has roamed the deep waters of the mystical seas, in the utmost darkness that the sun has never graced since the beginning of time. For eons they wander through the deep trenches, not knowing why they have come to be there, or by what name they can call themselves. Hundreds of years float on by silently… until they feel the dream of ‘Habaek,’ a white dragon slumbering at the entering of the deep sea, and gain full consciousness. Through Habaek’s dream, the darkness becomes aware of the continent of Hasla and feels the first tinges of desire to live together with its residents.

TEXT_CHA_PA_UNIQUE_5_UMRAT_DESC.text: The darkness without a name uses parts of their body to shape objects in imitation of the things they saw in Habaek's dream. Having created two sentient demonic swords and two magic tomes written in a forgotten script that even they cannot remember, the darkness uses them to lure and possess countless followers and gather strength. The followers of the darkness, as they do not know the darkness's true name from the other dimension, dedicate them the name of 'Umrat' and worship them as the true master of the abyss. Umrat remains unsatisfied even with their new name and knowledge, however, and comes to covet the power of White Dragon Habaek, the one who first showed them the glimmer of light.

TEXT_CHA_PA_UNIQUE_6_UMRAT_DESC.text: Umrat seeks for a chance to steal Habaek’s body, but they abandon their plans when they discover the ‘Oracle of Water’ protecting the slumbering Habaek by channeling his powers. However, when the Oracle of Water disappears by a mysterious course of events one hundred years ago, Umrat seizes the opportunity and hatches a plan to absorb Habaek’s strength. Through the demonic swords and books of magic they created, they call their followers and find an acceptable husk by which they can hide their real body from the searing light. Having made all their preparations, Umrat steps forth from the darkness of the deep sea.

TEXT_CHA_PR_1_11_DESC.text: A beekeeper who collects honey from the forest to sell at the market. It's rather unclear whether his bee costume really does drive away monsters, but recently some people have been talking of a "beeman monster" that they saw in the forest.

TEXT_CHA_PR_1_12_DESC.text: With the fall of the Desert Kingdom, a great art was also lost to the people of Hasla - the art of mummy-making. At least this one embalmer remembers his family trade, and will risk his life to travel to the Temple of Illusions to recover the lost art.

TEXT_CHA_PR_1_13_DESC.text: A merchant of Nosgard who can be easily spotted for her thick fur coat. She needs to keep warmer than most other Nosgardians as she sells ice crystals, the local product of her homeland. To trade her wares the Nosgardian Merchant often travels to the very hot regions of Hasla, where ice crystals are a luxury and cost a fortune.

TEXT_CHA_PR_1_14_DESC.text: A PhD candidate studying at Road Industry University for his degree. He visited Road Industry Headquarters in order to gather some research data for his thesis paper, as ordered by his strict professor... but now it seems that he won’t be able to leave so easily. However, he seems to be more concerned about the future of his studies than his own safety.

TEXT_CHA_PR_1_15_DESC.text: A prospective strategist of the imperial family. Studying in itself is hard, but the competition is also fierce.

TEXT_CHA_PR_2_15_DESC.text: A priest who tragically fell in love with an agent of the Shadow Roses and attempted to elope, but was captured before they could succeed. Afterwards, he became the subject of a mysterious experiment - but even while succumbing to the darkness, he still thinks of her.

TEXT_CHA_PR_2_16_DESC.text: Lei Ling's favorite top-quality AA Grade pork... Er, pig of the finest character one could ask for. Noticing that his friends do not return once they leave their herd, Piggy escapes the evil clutches of Lei Ling, the bane of pigs. He flees 2019km until he reaches the Temple of Illusions. However, Lei Ling is not a chef to give up her best ingredient so easily, and chases him into the Temple. When he discovers himself trapped between a boiling golden lake and Lei Ling's malicious cleaver, Piggy closes his eyes and jumps into the lake, choosing to bet on his fortune.

TEXT_CHA_PR_2_17_DESC.text: The most skilled ice appraisers of Nosgard can determine the value and hardness of ice at a single glance, and the Ice Appraiser is one of the very best. He usually works with ice crystals from the northern lands, but will survey ordinary jewels when he has the time.

TEXT_CHA_PR_2_18_DESC.text: A developer working in Road Industry. He is treated as an outsider by the other employees due to his unkempt appearance, 'inappropriate' for the pristine image of the company.

TEXT_CHA_PR_2_19_DESC.text: Shimmani of the Taebaek Mountains looks for wild radish rather than wild ginseng. The shouts of "Radish! Yahoo!" can be heard throughout the mountains.

TEXT_CHA_PR_3_17_DESC.text: A former priest of the Order of the Goddess who has been conducting research in the Palace under the Cardinal's orders. While he has a brilliant mind, he is opportunistic and tends to be rather lazy most of the time. Needless to say, he receives many looks of reproach in the laboratory.

TEXT_CHA_PR_3_18_DESC.text: A scientist who claims that everything in the world evolves. He has traveled to the Temple of Illusions in hopes of proving his theory.

TEXT_CHA_PR_3_19_DESC.text: The Woopa tribesman awoke from his long slumber from within a solitary iceberg. No one, including himself, knows how or why he got there. You do not understand anything he says, but his hands enclasped in yours are warm and friendly.

TEXT_CHA_PR_3_20_DESC.text: A senior researcher at Road Industry and a key figure in the 'R Project.' Even after the successful launch of 'R,' he is still working at Road Industry in an attempt to develop a more advanced model.

TEXT_CHA_PR_3_21_DESC.text: An acupuncturist that supposedly heals patients with needles. He has the knowledge, but he is afraid of needles, so he can't use them.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_22_DESC.text: An exchange student from Chen who has recently arrived at Neth Empire Private Academy. An exceptionally gifted student, Cronette is the target of both admiration and jealousy of her peers. Yet there are rumors that she is no ordinary goody two-shoes…

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_23_DESC.text: Vernil may not think much of Heim's story about the treasure allegedly buried in the Sacred Ground of Nosgard, but her affections for the mercenary drives her to accompany him on his quest.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_24_DESC.text: Growing up, Ricky never chased luck. Luck chased Ricky. This led him to mass fortune. However, the money never could fill the void inside him. After hearing about Super Fighting Cards Competition being held in Chen, something draws him into listing himself up for the challenge. Perhaps this is what he needed to fill the void.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_25_DESC.text: A demon of Valencia. Although Sfera's only dream is to lead an ordinary life with her younger sister Echidna, the two sisters become a target of the villagers' fear and prejudice of demons. The discrimination exacerbates year by year until Sfera decides that their home is no longer safe for neither herself nor the young Echidna. The two sisters flee to a deserted castle on the outskirts of the country where they make their new home, Shpera sighing with relief that their safety will no longer be threatened by anyone for the rest of their lives.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_26_DESC.text: For Shub, a young bibliophile, there is nothing better than a good book borrowed from the local library. One day, she comes across a mysterious, torn book that strangely draws her in...

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_27_DESC.text: To Basquiat, the back alleys of the Neth Empire are both his home and the canvas for his spray paintings. Yet life forces him to turn his back on both his friends and his artistic talents in an attempt to make ends meet in the city factories. One day, Basquiat hears a rumor that spray paint that can paint on air has been released in the black market. As if in a trance, Basquiat obtains the spray paint and begins to paint once more.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_29_DESC.text: Meri, the new girl at Magic Academy, was one of those who witnessed the birth of a new star at the school talent show. While others rave over their discovery of Cano's beauty, only Meri remains immersed in the melodious voice that continues to occupy her mind. Afterwards, Meri becomes one of Cano's most devoted fans and gives an inner squeal whenever she crosses paths with the 'idol witch,' who continues to attend school even after starting her new career. Meri, however, treats Cano coldly on purpose to hide her embarrassment.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_30_DESC.text: Linné’s love for plants is renowned even among the nature-loving Elves. In the process of collecting and researching rare plants, the botanist succeeds in using magic to breed a new species of the mandragora plant, its healing properties maximized. Linné reveals the mandragora’s cultivation methods to the public for free, receiving much praise and attention for her efforts.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_31_DESC.text: A tiger patron saint who guards the deep mountain valleys of the borderlands between the three Eastern Kingdoms. Born unnaturally small for a tiger, Halla receives both the ridicule and sympathy of fellow saints, but the tiger saint takes no heed to the whispers that he is "the runt of the litter." Instead, Halla concentrates on protecting his mountain with his unique knowledge and skill with herbal medicine, the result of endless efforts to compensate for his deficiency of magic.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_32_DESC.text: A resident of the slums who rarely eats a meal a day. Lazie unexpectedly stumbles across an old book in an abandoned, dilapidated house, and discovers page after page of old alchemy recipes. After the day, Lazie devotes herself to learning the arts of alchemy.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_33_DESC.text: The son of a Roman nobleman who was born with the extraordinary power of lightning as well as natural charisma and amicability. Zeus’s parents, thinking that their son is surely marked out for greatness, send him off to the Military Academy as soon as he comes of age. However, the free-spirited boy refuses to enroll and instead gathers his own band of followers, claiming that everyone should pave the way to their own future. Zeus’s formidable power of lightning bestows strength to his followers and causes distress on his adversaries, winning the boy battle after battle. As his fame escalates, Senator Hera takes an interest in Zeus and seeks him out.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_35_DESC.text: The true power of ‘Hera,’ a Senator of the Olympian Council, lies not in the actual title but in the transmission of the predecessor’s memories and strength. After deciding upon a heir, ‘Hera’ trains the successor over a long period of time through storytelling and recollection before she hands over her position. When this generation’s Hera falls terminally ill without a successor, the Olympian Council is forced to bring an orphan and hasten the inheritance process before her death. They coerce the child into accepting the flood of Hera’s memories, and as a result, a very young Hera,  robbed of her own life and personality, rises to a seat at the Council.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_9_DESC.text: The sole granddaughter of a legendary chef, who now resides in a quiet village in the countryside after his retirement. Chai, however, disapproves of her grandfather's decision to retire - after all, his noodles are too good to stop cooking! One fateful night, Chai steals her grandfather's secret recipe and starts on an adventure to prove her point.

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_GUERONICA_DESC.text: A security android of the P-00 model line, made-to-order for a powerful family of the Neth Empire. P-00 is put in charge of protecting a cheerful young girl who dreams of becoming a painter one day. While P-00 only acts according to the command input by his owners, the girl treats him like any other human being and gives him the name 'Gueronica.'

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_22_DESC.text: The rumors are only too true: student by day and hacker by night, Cronette is in fact a renowned underground hacker, infamous for her perfectedly honed skills and indomitable curiosity. Chance leads the genius hacker one day to a highly protected piece of data placed under a complicated security system. Curiosity piqued, Cronette decides to break into the system.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_23_DESC.text: Vernil helps Heim fight the Guardian of the Sacred Ground to victory, but soon realizes that the sanctuary is guarding something far greater than any treasure. Before they can escape, however, the pair falls under the curse of the Sacred Ground, doomed to slumber forever as the new Guardians.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_24_DESC.text: Thanks to his luck, Ricky easily takes victories against many talented card players and finally faces the champion, Spade Queen. However, his luck runs dry against her and he finds himself completely defeated for the first time by someone of tireless practice and self-discipline. On his way back home, Ricky is more motivated than ever and determined to work harder in order to challenge the reigning champion once again.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_25_DESC.text: Many years later, a mysterious man in a mask comes to visit Sfera and Echidna. He introduces himself as 'Elf Mask,' a member of the Minor Tribes' Confederation. He offers them a position in the Confederation, proposing that they venture out into the wide world and join a harmonious, progressive community free of any inequality.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_26_DESC.text: The torn book seems to contain strange knowledge that Shub has never known before. Fascinated, Shub continues to read the volume, unaware of her mind slipping into the shadows. She starts to flaunt the dark powers she received from her reading to other people, her eyes grown dark with madness.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_27_DESC.text: With his new spray paint in one hand, Basquiat covers the streets with colorful graffiti. His expressive artwork soon captures the eye of many, and Basquiat finds both fame and new friends as his reputation increases. It is not long before he becomes one of the most popular street artists in the Neth Empire.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_29_DESC.text: Even though her cold attitude causes her to be misunderstood by her classmates, Meri continues to hide her devotion to Cano. One day, a producer from Cano's agency visits Magic Academy but loses his way in the convoluted hallways - and happens to come across Meri, humming along the idol witch's newest hit album. The producer, seeing great potential in Meri, offers her a place on Cano's stage as one of her backup singers. Meri carefully conceals her elation and accepts.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_30_DESC.text: After breeding the mandragora, Linné searches for a new research subject. She becomes interested in the “Royal Bean,” a rare species exclusively enjoyed by Elf nobles due to the difficulty of its cultivation. The genius botanist soon succeeds in mass producing the species, lowering its prices to be enjoyed by everyone. However, merchants, angry that their lucrative wares have suddenly plummeted in value, protest against her research and threaten her safety. Linné becomes greatly disappointed and loses her passion in botany.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_31_DESC.text: One day, Halla comes across 'Sansami,' a wild ginseng sprout that has become sentient after living for one thousand years. Halla attempts to devour the magical ginseng on the spot, but when Sansami begs him for mercy, the soft-hearted tiger saint lets it go. After that day, Sansami - now a devout follower of Halla - dedicates all the valuable medicinal herbs it can find in the forest to the tiger saint, who consumes them earnestly day after day. Time passes, and Halla finds himself now a gigantic tiger, his formerly weak constitution quite ameliorated.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_32_DESC.text: After some time, Lazie begins to earn money by concocting and selling alchemy potions. Her lack of experience, however, results in potions with bizarre side effects, such as the user suddenly increasing or decreasing in size. Lazie only regards such issues as an opportunity to advertise her potions as having “special properties” and continues to sell off her “random” concoctions. After all, what is failure and success but “success” and “great success”?

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_33_DESC.text: The moment she comes face to face with Zeus, Hera recognizes his true potential and bestows on him a glowing sapphire ring. Now even prouder of himself for having been singled out by an influential senator, Zeus crafts copies of his new ring and hands them out to his subordinates. Zeus’s followers, who now call themselves the ‘Thunder Worshippers,’ gain better access to Zeus’s mastery over lightning and proceed to accomplish an even greater variety of feats in hunts, battles, and raids. It isn’t long before Zeus is promoted as a senator of the Olympian Council amidst cheers of the people.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_35_DESC.text: Having received no proper education save that to inherit Hera’s position, the new Hera develops a twisted morality. She cannot comprehend the concept of evil or discern enemies from allies, and she only seeks to ‘spread her mercy and love throughout the whole world.’ Many begin to criticize her as they discover Hera’s tendency to heal everyone and anyone she meets – including enemy soldiers on the battlefield. Only Hera’s personal followers, the ‘Rainbow of Benevolence,’ quietly protect her from public disapproval.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_9_DESC.text: Chai enters Mr. Paik's Cooking Competition, a prestigious contest where skilled chefs all throughout Hasla compete. Armed with her grandfather's recipe - the legendary 'Red Dragon Beard' noodle dish - Chai emerges victorious from the final round. Along with the title of Master Chef, she earns a state-of-the-art food wagon made with Neth technology and a special Golden Dragon Ladle.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_GUERONICA_DESC.text: The sudden outbreak of war forces the girl and Gueronica to hastily flee the city with only each other. But the pair only succeeds in running a few steps before the girl turns on her feet to retrieve her painting-in-progress that she left behind. Gueronica immediately reacts to his charge's unpredictable move, but his protection shields fail to keep the young girl from the merciless hail of bullets.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_22_DESC.text: Cronette succeeds in deactivating the data's security system. To her disappointment, however, she discovers nothing save for several boring files concerning members of an unknown organization. The enraged hacker maliciously begins to overwrite the contents of the first file that catches her eye: that of a person named 'Zahard.' Vaguely satisfied, Cronette exits the database - unaware of the consequences her actions will bring about.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_23_DESC.text: Hundreds of years pass by in cold silence - until one fateful day when Vernil, sensing a disturbance in the sanctuary, awakens from her long sleep. She immediately starts off to find her beloved Heim, but falls back unconscious when something - or someone - attacks her from the behind...

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_24_DESC.text: After tireless practice, Ricky is back in the competition, more prepared than ever. This time, the final match is a tight game and the audience is captivated by the skills of the two great players. Ricky makes an aggressive move towards the end, but fails to see the queen's next, which delivers the victory to her once again. Nonetheless, Ricky leaves the game feeling like a different man, as if he has finally found that one missing piece to his soul.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_25_DESC.text: Sfera declines Elf Mask's offer, stating that she would rather not be seen by other people. Echidna, however, reacts violently to Sfera's decision and claims that she will depart alone if necessary. Sfera attempts to persuade her sister that any attempt to return to the outside world shall prove futile, and that it is much wiser to remain in the castle and quietly spend out their lives. After all, who will ever accept them when they're demons, the most feared and hated race in Hasla?

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_26_DESC.text: Shub becomes completely consumed by the abyss that is the book. She begins to force her devotion to the 'Master' of the volume onto others, punishing those who will not listen. Dark whispers from the beyond continue to guide her outside her village out into the world, where she, a true disciple to the ever-watchful Master, shall continue to look for the other half of the book...

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_26_NAME.text: Shub the Disciple of the Abyss

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_27_DESC.text: Yet friendship is more valuable to Basquiat than fame: when he hears rumors of Road Industry soldiers secretly kidnapping street artists, Basquiat immediately grabs his spray paint and starts out to save his friends from danger.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_29_DESC.text: Meri's weeks of hard practice and anxiety pay off: she leads her debut stage to grand success. Amidst the standing ovation, however, Cano suddenly takes hold of Meri's hand and introduces the trembling backup singer as her classmate and friend. Meri, taken aback at Cano's warm smile, retorts with a frosty comment, forgetting that they are on stage. Cano's enraged fans boo Meri as standoffish and rude, but some begin to see her in a new light. Meri soon makes her debut as an idol: Starlit Voice Meri, cool, reserved, and beautiful like an ice queen.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_30_DESC.text: Then one day, Linné hears rumors of a gigantic plant that has suddenly popped up somewhere in Hasla. She feels her scholarly passions rekindling in her heart, and sets out to study the legendary plant.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_31_DESC.text: Giddy with his newfound strength, Halla goes and beats up the other tiger mountain saints - all now smaller than him - and becomes the new lord of the borderland mountains. More arrogant than ever, he begins to neglect his original duties of protecting his valleys. Therefore it comes as no surprise that Halla is nowhere to be seen when the great armies of Chen come invading the mountains, burning down and pillaging the forests. After belatedly hearing the news, Halla hurries back and tries to stop the soldiers - but it is too late. The desecrated mountain falls into a deep, deathlike slumber, and Halla too loses his powers as patron saint. The tiger saint, his heart full of regret and repentance, decides to train and seek true wisdom in the world until the power of the land is recovered. Halla so steps into the world of humans - followed, of course, by Sansami. It is time to face his grief and shame with dignity.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_32_DESC.text: Lazie’s potions soon go viral, leaving the alchemist well-off. However, when one of her potions result in a huge and complicated web of love affairs and duels among the nobles, Lazie finds herself a wanted criminal: “the unqualified and potentially dangerous quack.” Lazie hastily packs her fortune and departs her hometown—but soon realizes that she has nowhere to go. She roams the countryside until she becomes curious of the original owner of the book and decides to track them down, gleefully anticipating more riches to come her way.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_33_DESC.text: Despite the widespread recognition of his countless achievements and his new status as senator, Zeus soon discovers more hardships lie in wait. When the Thunder Worshippers begin to disobey his orders and desert their posts even more frequently than what the free-spirited Zeus can tolerate, he sets out to investigate. Only by a confidential document belonging to the Council does Zeus come to understand the true intentions of Senator Hera, who has passed away since their last meeting and bequeathed her title to her successor. Having learnt the truth behind his rings, Zeus declares that he cannot allow "something so trivial" manipulate his soldiers. He gathers all the lightning he can muster and burns away the evil energy within the rings. Now truly the epitome of radiance, Zeus and his reformed Thunderstorm Troops return to the Republic with greater majesty than before.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_35_DESC.text: Unbeknownst to the public, all ‘Heras’ die of terminal illness at a young age due to the most important duty of their position: controlling the evil strength of Manacar that flows through the rings of the Olympian Council. A harsh fate imposed by the first ‘Hera’ of Roman in her desperation to fight back against the threat of Manacar, all successors have sacrificed their lives to protect the other Senators from further harm. The new ‘Hera’ is no different: her frail, young body cannot fully withstand the power that flows down from her predecessors, and she often spends her time on the sickbed. For some reason, however, Zeus – usually famous for his arrogance and lack of concern for any other human being – can always be found by Hera’s side, helping with her heavy burden.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_9_DESC.text: Chai proudly returns home and suggests to her grandfather a national food tour on their new food wagon. Chai's grandfather gives up the premise of a peaceful retirement to finally grab his ladle once more for his beloved granddaughter.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_GUERONICA_DESC.text: The war comes to an end, but Gueronica cannot escape his memory of the moment when he failed to protect his owner and only friend. He continuously upgrades himself according to the results of the countless simulations he executes in his mind, but no experiment yields him the one thing he desires: the life of the young girl. Without a purpose to his existence, Gueronica turns his head in defeat - and sees the girl's sketchbook lying on the floor across from him. At that moment, all the memories that he spent together with the girl simultaneously replay in his memory circuit. Gueronica finds himself changed, and his protection shields engraved with the girl's unfinished painting.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_APFOOL_4_HARUKI_DESC.text: Haruki is an ordinary middle school student like any other in the country of ‘Japan’ – that is, until he is hit by a speeding truck on the first day of the new school year! Haruki closes his eyes in fear of the certain death that awaits him. Yet fate spares him: when Haruki opens his eyes again, he is stunned to see a beautiful Goddess standing before him. The Goddess, apologetic almost as if she was the one who accidentally sent the truck in Haruki’s direction and killed him, offers him “reincarnation into another world.” Haruki realizes that the Goddess’s proposal sounds very much like the ‘isekai’ novels that he enjoys reading and gladly accepts.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_APFOOL_5_HARUKI_DESC.text: The Goddess gifts Haruki with numerous special ‘reincarnation abilities’: the ability to stop time, the ability to kill a person with a mere thought, the ability to ‘level up’ his own ‘stats’… Armed with such divine gifts, Haruki literally becomes an unstoppable human weapon. While the Goddess ponders which dimension she will send Haruki to, an old woman suddenly falls between them. Haruki steps forward to help the woman up – when she suddenly roars with rage and throws a punch at the Goddess. Haruki, who had been standing between them, is caught in the resulting blow… and dies his second death.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_APFOOL_6_HARUKI_DESC.text: When he finally gains consciousness and opens his eyes (again), Haruki finds himself tightly bound and being carried by a group of soldiers. On a closer look, he discovers that the initially intimidating warriors are wearing a type of Japanese armor, but that which is historically inaccurate as if the soldiers are a part of the childish fantasy TV shows he used to watch. Haruki snickers in amusement and calls forth his abilities to free himself. He quickly finds out that all but one of his gifts have disappeared for some reason; he can now only summon and view his 'status screen.' Haruki gulps in fear. Can he really survive alone in a fantasy world with no special abilities whatsoever?... But such worries disappear the moment he arrives at a castle and lays his eyes on a pink-haired priestess. Vowing to do anything and everything for her, Haruki willingly becomes a vassal to the shogun Susanoo of the Eastern Kingdom 'Ryu.'

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTO_4_KRAMPUS_DESC.text: Everyone in Hasla may love Santa and ‘Christmas,’ the multinational volunteer organization that generously gives out free presents to poor orphans – but not Krampus, a young demon boy devoted to justice! After accidentally witnessing a crime committed by none other than Santa himself, Krampus spends years in relentless pursuit of the truth. He finally discovers irrefutable evidence that ‘Christmas’ is, behind its cover of a too-good-to-be-true charity, an evil corporation that deals with human trafficking, assassinations, junk food lobbying, and many more heinous crimes. Justice must be restored!

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTO_5_KRAMPUS_DESC.text: Krampus succeeds in chasing the assassins of Christmas to a dead end in a remote village of Nosgard. At the crucial moment, however, the locals stumble across the understandably confusing scene: the seemingly amiable employees of Christmas being threatened by a “vicious monster.” Krampus is chased out of the village to his consternation. Realizing that appearances are more important than he previously thought, Krampus decides to do what must be done for the sake of justice: get a makeover.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTO_6_KRAMPUS_DESC.text: Biting back his discomfort, Krampus brushes back his fur and puts on human clothes, even preparing presents to ingratiate himself with the villagers. When the demon returns to the village, the locals – seeing Krampus’s adorable appearance and charming gifts – welcomes him with fervor, oblivious of the fact that he is the very monster that they chased out some time ago. Krampus distributes the presents to the smiling villagers who have gathered around him, his eyes peeled for the Christmas assassins and his hands toying with the ‘naughty children’s gifts’ he has prepared for them…

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTUMN_4_KAEDE_DESC.text: Deep in the valleys of Ryu can be found the Forest of Eternal Autumn, where no human feet dare to tread. Only a light-footed raccoon without a name has been walking among the trees for long years. One day, the raccoon turns her gaze outside and sees the world of humans: chaotic, noisy, but ever so curious and seemingly much more fun. The raccoon trains herself to transform into a close likeness of a human, and even gives herself a name after the maple trees of her forest: "Kaede." Yet her curiosity engulfs her, and the raccoon decides to leave the forest for the bigger world. But before she can go any further, Kaede discovers a deeply wounded girl lying among the fallen leaves of the forest.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTUMN_5_KAEDE_DESC.text: After days of devoted nursing, the girl finally opens her eyes. Kaede introduces herself as a simple ninja passing by. The girl's presence in the life of the raccoon, who for all these years has been wandering freely as the wind, quickly grows bigger until it roots itself as firmly as a maple tree. For hours on end the girl and the raccoon talk, and Kaede teaches the girl the names of all the trees and flowers of the forests, and shows her tricks that can be performed by any respectable raccoon. The girl gradually opens her heart to Kaede until she whispers her name: "Anzu." Kaede, for the very first time in her life, feels an endearing warmth enveloping her heart.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTUMN_6_KAEDE_DESC.text: The Forest of Autumn embraces Kaede and Anzu with generosity and kindness: the two friends, without a care in their heart, spend their days as they wish, playing and training away the time. Yet one day, Kaede catches a glimpse of Anzu, now fully healed, gazing at the mountains beyond the forest, the leaves that rustle against the far-traveling wind. After some deliberation, Kaede reveals the carefully hidden truth: that she is not a human ninja, but actually a raccoon transformed into the likeness of one. Anzu laughs, saying that she has known all along. Kaede holds out her hand and clasps Anzu's in her own. The world, as long as they are together, will be beautiful and merry. The two friends step out of the forest.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_EAST_4_FRANCESCA_DES.text: Francesca was abandoned with her twin brother Fredrick at the orphanage of the Order of the Goddess. But that orphanage was being operated by a faction known as the 'Follower of Arart', and the twins were transferred to the Grand Cathedral of Elandia. In the underground of the cathedral, the followers of Arart conducted inhumane experiments to create an artificial Goddess. The twins were separated and Francesca was locked up alone, away from Fredrick.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_EAST_5_FRANCESCA_DES.text: One day, the followers of Arart came to her room and proposed an experiment. It was to engrave a stigmata to two humans linked by blood, and to give the traces of darkness to one of them and make the other one into the container of pure light. The followers of Arart wanted to sacrifice Fredrick to make Francesca the container of light, but Francesca insisted in sacrificing herself to protect her little brother. The followers of Arart gave in to her persistence and began the experiment of engraving a stigmata on her.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_EAST_6_FRANCESCA_DES.text: Francesca began receiving the traces of darkness from Fredrick through the stigmata. The traces of darkness transformed her body and caused unimaginable pain, but she withstood the pain for her little brother. Three years passed, and after the final experiment in the Room of Blessing, Francesca became the container for pure darkness, and became a being that corrupt everything around her. The followers of Arart tried to get rid of her, but they were taken aback when they realized they couldn't get rid of her since she was linked to Fredrick through the stigmata. Francesca took the opportunity to get rid of some of them. She wanted to find Fredrick and run away, but she realized that as the container of darkness, she couldn't even touch Fredrick, who was the container of pure light. In the end, Francesca escaped alone. She embarked on a journey to find someone who could help her save her little brother from the clutches of the Order of the Goddess.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_4_04_DESC.text: The fourth Eto Ranger Cream is not a combat operative but is the group's cheerleader and support with her bright personality and gentleness. She seems to have some romantic interest in the leader of the Eto Rangers, Bakumaru.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_4_06_DESC.text: The sixth Eto Ranger Nyorori is the intelligent and analytical brain of the group. He is the tactician of the Eto Rangers that studies the traps and weaknesses of the Jyarei Monsters. Per usual, Nyorori prepares to support the team as they travel to this new world of Hasla to stop the Jyarei Monsters.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_4_08_DESC.text: The eighth member of the Eto Rangers. The kind-hearted Souffle supports the other members of the Eto Rangers, and has a special sense for finding Jyarei Monsters. After hearing about Jyarei Monsters appearing in Hasla, she joins the expedition.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_5_04_DESC.text: The fourth Eto Ranger Cream is not a combat operative but is the group's cheerleader and support with her bright personality and gentleness. She seems to have some romantic interest in the leader of the Eto Rangers, Bakumaru.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_5_06_DESC.text: The sixth Eto Ranger Nyorori is the intelligent and analytical brain of the group. He is the tactician of the Eto Rangers that studies the traps and weaknesses of the Jyarei Monsters. Per usual, Nyorori prepares to support the team as they travel to this new world of Hasla to stop the Jyarei Monsters.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_5_08_DESC.text: The eighth member of the Eto Rangers. The kind-hearted Souffle supports the other members of the Eto Rangers, and has a special sense for finding Jyarei Monsters. After hearing about Jyarei Monsters appearing in Hasla, she joins the expedition.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_6_04_DESC.text: The fourth Eto Ranger Cream is not a combat operative but is the group's cheerleader and support with her bright personality and gentleness. She seems to have some romantic interest in the leader of the Eto Rangers, Bakumaru.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_6_06_DESC.text: The sixth Eto Ranger Nyorori is the intelligent and analytical brain of the group. He is the tactician of the Eto Rangers that studies the traps and weaknesses of the Jyarei Monsters. Per usual, Nyorori prepares to support the team as they travel to this new world of Hasla to stop the Jyarei Monsters.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_ER_6_08_DESC.text: The eighth member of the Eto Rangers. The kind-hearted Souffle supports the other members of the Eto Rangers, and has a special sense for finding Jyarei Monsters. After hearing about Jyarei Monsters appearing in Hasla, she joins the expedition.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_GS_4_03_DESC.text: Priestess started her journey to help other adventurers. However, on her very first adventure her party is ambushed and wiped out by the Goblins. Priestess is luckily saved by Goblin Slayer and has accompanied him ever since. While fighting Goblins with Goblin Slayer as usual, the group discovers a Goblin Lord and his horde of Goblins teleporting through a magical mirror to another dimension. Goblin Slayer chases after the Goblins without hesitation, and Priestess has no choice but to follow him through the mirror.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_GS_4_04_DESC.text: Lizardman Priest met Goblin Slayer while on his journey to slay all heretic monsters and become a Dragon. He has accompanied Goblin Slayer ever since to teach him the joys of adventuring. While slaying Goblins with Goblin Slayer as usual, the party discovers Goblin Lord and his group of Goblins teleporting through a magical mirror to another dimension. Goblin Slayer chases after the Goblins without hesitation, and Lizardman Priest has no choice but to follow him through the mirror.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_GS_5_03_DESC.text: Priestess started her journey to help other adventurers. However, on her very first adventure her party is ambushed and wiped out by the Goblins. Priestess is luckily saved by Goblin Slayer and has accompanied him ever since. While fighting Goblins with Goblin Slayer as usual, the group discovers a Goblin Lord and his horde of Goblins teleporting through a magical mirror to another dimension. Goblin Slayer chases after the Goblins without hesitation, and Priestess has no choice but to follow him through the mirror.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_GS_5_04_DESC.text: Lizardman Priest met Goblin Slayer while on his journey to slay all heretic monsters and become a Dragon. He has accompanied Goblin Slayer ever since to teach him the joys of adventuring. While slaying Goblins with Goblin Slayer as usual, the party discovers Goblin Lord and his group of Goblins teleporting through a magical mirror to another dimension. Goblin Slayer chases after the Goblins without hesitation, and Lizardman Priest has no choice but to follow him through the mirror.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_GS_6_03_DESC.text: Priestess started her journey to help other adventurers. However, on her very first adventure her party is ambushed and wiped out by the Goblins. Priestess is luckily saved by Goblin Slayer and has accompanied him ever since. While fighting Goblins with Goblin Slayer as usual, the group discovers a Goblin Lord and his horde of Goblins teleporting through a magical mirror to another dimension. Goblin Slayer chases after the Goblins without hesitation, and Priestess has no choice but to follow him through the mirror.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_GS_6_04_DESC.text: Lizardman Priest met Goblin Slayer while on his journey to slay all heretic monsters and become a Dragon. He has accompanied Goblin Slayer ever since to teach him the joys of adventuring. While slaying Goblins with Goblin Slayer as usual, the party discovers Goblin Lord and his group of Goblins teleporting through a magical mirror to another dimension. Goblin Slayer chases after the Goblins without hesitation, and Lizardman Priest has no choice but to follow him through the mirror.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_OT_4_01_DESC.text: Age 20, female. A cleric from the snowswept Frostlands serving the Order of the Flame.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_OT_5_01_DESC.text: As her adoptive sister - and best friend - prepares to embark on a perilous pilgrimage, she stood by her side.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_OT_6_01_DESC.text: 「May the Sacred Flame light your path...」 Then, one day, events take a tragic turn.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_RZ_4_07_DESC.text: The knight of Crusch Karsten - a candidate to become the next King of Lugnica - and a member of the Royal Guards. After being rescued by Crusch in the past, Ferris has loyally followed her ever since, always wearing the blue and white ribbons he received from her. He is a Demi Human with the ears and tail of a cat, and enjoys teasing people who mistakes his cute looks for a girl's.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_RZ_5_07_DESC.text: The knight of Crusch Karsten - a candidate to become the next King of Lugnica - and a member of the Royal Guards. After being rescued by Crusch in the past, Ferris has loyally followed her ever since, always wearing the blue and white ribbons he received from her. He is a Demi Human with the ears and tail of a cat, and enjoys teasing people who mistakes his cute looks for a girl's.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_RZ_6_07_DESC.text: The knight of Crusch Karsten - a candidate to become the next King of Lugnica - and a member of the Royal Guards. After being rescued by Crusch in the past, Ferris has loyally followed her ever since, always wearing the blue and white ribbons he received from her. He is a Demi Human with the ears and tail of a cat, and enjoys teasing people who mistakes his cute looks for a girl's.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_SEVENTH_4_CHOCOLA_DE.text: Like her father the Champion of the Colosseum, Choocolat loves everything about the Colosseum: the scorching heat of battle, proud and mighty gladiators brandishing their bloodied weapons, the roar of the spectators cheering on the fight… But more than anything, she loves the figure of her father emerging victorious battle after battle, each victory fairly won with astounding prowess. She’d give anything to walk in her father’s shoes someday! On the other hand, the gladiator secretly worries over his increasingly aggressive daughter, who spends all her time imitating battle moves and showing them off to her friends. After much thought, Chocolat’s father announces his retirement in hopes that he’ll be able to raise his daughter in a safer environment.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_SEVENTH_5_CHOCOLA_DE.text: Chocolat and her father move to the quiet countryside village of Hero Town and start a small bakery. While Hero Town is a peaceful place, Chocolat fails to make any new friends her age and finds it difficult to abandon her dreams of becoming the next gladiator champion. His daughter’s enthusiasm uncurbed, the former champion continues to worry. One ordinary day, Chocolat’s father unexpectedly disappears, leaving only a letter explaining that he must see to urgent business in their previous hometown. Chocolat thus finds herself running the bakery on her own. To her surprise, her new recipes become even more popular than her father’s, and ‘Chocolat’s Bakery’ becomes one of the busiest and most beloved shops for miles around. As Chocolat familiarizes herself with the busy schedule and gradually grows into a formidable baker, her former dreams of the Colosseum go all but forgotten.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_SEVENTH_6_CHOCOLA_DE.text: Chocolat’s Bakery continues to be successful… until it does not. Sales start to plummet, but Chocolat is ready to reclaim her success with a new idea: the great ‘Bakery Bang’! At the news of the event, which quickly spreads throughout the continent by word of mouth, prior customers and other Heroes from distant lands come flocking to the bakery. Not only does the event end in great success and fill the deficit, Chocolat also makes a breakthrough and awakens a new spectrum of her powers through the two weeks of hard labor. Now reborn as the possessor of raw strength and astonishing stamina, Chocolat joins the Heroes of Hero Town so that she can continue to bake bread worthy of her newfound abilities.

TEXT_CHA_PR_UNIQUE_4_ELLIE_DESC.text: A girl discovered in Hyro Forest with no memories. Ellie is willingly accepted by the Captain and Prestina, however, and when they depart for the Kingdom of Trista, she follows them without question. At the end of the journey, Ellie is stunned to discover that she is one of the many 'failures' of the Cardinal's schemes to create an artificial Goddess. Despite her initial shock, she vows to find the meaning of her existence through her relationship with her loved ones.

TEXT_CHA_PR_UNIQUE_5_ELLIE_DESC.text: On her adventure with the Captain to the Temple of Illusions, Ellie learns about the forgotten history of the Desert Tribe. She becomes overwhelmed with distrust and hatred of humans, who seem to be capable of only repeating their terrible mistakes. Yet at the last moment, Ellie sacrifices herself to protect the people she loves, destroying the Temple of Illusions with her powers. Surrounded by blinding white light and a deafening roar, Ellie watches as her body begins to shatter - she notices a woman with an eyepatch approaching her amidst the chaos. Before she can ask who she is, Ellie loses consciousness.

TEXT_CHA_PR_UNIQUE_6_ELLIE_DESC.text: In her dreams, Ellie becomes a majestic, giant bird that reigns over the skies of Hasla. From a distant past that unfolds before her eyes, she watches Hasla for many years, feeling endless love and compassion for the many living beings that bloom then fade away. Waking up before long, Ellie realizes that she has become one with Galatea, the Sacred Being of Wind. Galatea has given her life and memories to Ellie, who had been destined to die. Embracing each other's memories and souls, Eli-Galatea set out to meet the Captain.

TEXT_CHA_WA_1_11_DESC.text: A member of the Adventurer's Guild. She and her husband had been traveling around the continent when he went missing in the forest. Further travels have been postponed until she finds her no good of a husband, hrrmph.

TEXT_CHA_WA_1_12_DESC.text: A soldier whose loyalty was acknowledged by the Three Kings and stationed as a protector of the Temple of Illusions. Yet when a series of events unveils the sinister truth behind the Temple, the Sentinel is left despairing over the treachery of the Three Kings until he turns mad with grief.

TEXT_CHA_WA_1_13_DESC.text: A soldier of Snorri Edda, the capital of Nosgard. Armed with the belief that only strong bodies can contain strong minds, these soldiers put themselves through rigorous training day and night, becoming resistant to the cold of the northern lands.

TEXT_CHA_WA_1_14_DESC.text: A resident of the bustling streets of Edenberg, the capital of Neth Empire. She has long witnessed the change of the city from its destruction in the war to its reconstruction, but she has finally decided to leave her beloved home in the wake of the recent turmoil.

TEXT_CHA_WA_1_15_DESC.text: A guard of the Chen palace. He is not as skilled as the elite imperial soldiers, but he is good with CPR, so he's working by the emperor's side in case of an emergency.

TEXT_CHA_WA_2_15_DESC.text: An agent of the Order of the Shadow Rose. After falling in love with a priest who treated her wounds, she confessed the secret of her Order and attempted to elope together. Unfortunately, they were captured before they could succeed, and were forced to undergo several... mysterious experiments.

TEXT_CHA_WA_2_16_DESC.text: A man who volunteered for an experiment for eternal youth in order to live forever with his lover. Unfortunately, the experiment was only a partial success. Now the laboratory will forever be guarded by its immortal sentry, whose eyes will continue to look upon his decaying lover...

TEXT_CHA_WA_2_17_DESC.text: This directionally challenged soldier left his troop and lost his way during a round of outdoor training. He's cold and alone, but the greatest problem is that he still has not realized the fact that he is lost.

TEXT_CHA_WA_2_18_DESC.text: The second most popular model of the "Home Android" line, one of the many famous series of androids made in Neth Empire. The product information reads, "Who needs a real boyfriend when you have Mecha Boy?! Now equipped with new personality chips - try out the 'cold but secretly dedicated and warm-hearted boyfriend mode'!"

TEXT_CHA_WA_2_19_DESC.text: A merchant that goes all throughout Hasla for business. His silk from Chen is one of the most popular products in Hasla. Popo's greatest rival.

TEXT_CHA_WA_3_17_DESC.text: A Ratman enthusiast who ventured into the underground sewers. No news was heard of her until one day, when rumors spread of a strange figure in the shadows attacking people.

TEXT_CHA_WA_3_18_DESC.text: A mysterious warrior who roams the Desert. Always covering his face under a white hood, he makes his living by hunting wild animals. If you ask him about his missing left ring finger, he falls into a quiet reverie and does not speak.

TEXT_CHA_WA_3_19_DESC.text: Who knew that snowmen could look so rugged, weary, and lonesome? His wool-padded military jacket adds to the effect. Unlike the other creatures and beings of snow, the Ancient Snowman seems too tired even to start moving.

TEXT_CHA_WA_3_20_DESC.text: The clone leader selected among the clones designed from Galatea's genes. He attempts to keep the other clones in line, armed with the firm belief that everyone should have the same appearance and personality. However, there recently has been more and more anomalies who rebel against his control.

TEXT_CHA_WA_3_21_DESC.text: The Moon Bear that has attracted many members to the Bear Lovers Club. Unlike its cute appearance, it is the top predator of the Taebaek Mountains.

TEXT_CHA_WA_4_22_DESC.text: A warrior of legendary lineage and exceptional swordsmanship, Izuna is regarded by both herself and others as the obvious heir to the current Master of the clan. When, to everyone's surprise, the Master declares a commoner as his successor, Izuna protests in outrage and asks him about his decision. The Master only answers that she is simply "not meant to lead," to which the young warrior storms out in indignation.

TEXT_CHA_WA_4_23_DESC.text: A Valkyrie of Nosgard who lives for the thrill of the battlefield and the bloodrush that comes from dueling strong opponents. A fierce warrior herself, Randgrid thinks 'weaklings' a complete waste of her time and tends to cruelly dispose of anyone who dares to challenge her and loses.

TEXT_CHA_WA_4_24_DESC.text: Enviously called the witch of her era in old Pumpkin City, Cassia and her abilities of learning a spell on sight win the envy of every witch and wizard in town. After learning every spell discovered by the witches of Pumpkin City, the young Cassia wanders the city in search for new knowledge that will satiate her hungry mind. She comes to discover a sealed chamber deep within the labyrinthine alleyways of Pumpkin City.
