TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SIXTH_3_BRIDGET_DESC.text: The owner of a small general store. Bridget is actually the successor to the House of Pellencia, a famous merchant family of Grancia, but she has come to Hero Town for some hands-on experience during her training. Like her miserly grandfather, Bridget never misses an opportunity to turn a profit. Rumor has it that she possesses an immense fortune worth any good estate in the kingdom, but who knows if it's true?

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SIXTH_4_BANOUB_DESC.text: Long ago, Camilla was but another ordinary girl living in the Desert Kingdom. Her father, a laborer at the nearby construction site, is proud of his contributions to the Temple of Illusions, even if it meant giving up his dreams of becoming a professional dancer. Camilla, on the other hand, only shudders at the ominous aura that radiates from the Temple.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SIXTH_5_BANOUB_DESC.text: One day, a high priest to Anubisis, one of the Three Great Kings of the kingdom, summons Camilla and her father. The two follow the high priest to the underground laboratory within the Temple of Illusions, where they have an audience with Anubisis. The king, his eyes devoid of human emotion, orders his priest to prepare the rituals. Unbeknownst to them, Camilla and her father had been chosen as the next test subjects for Anubisis's forbidden magic. The two are secured to an altar and subjected to excruciating torture.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SIXTH_6_BANOUB_DESC.text: Upon opening her eyes, Camilla feels an unfamiliar, immense power within herself. Controlled by restraining devices installed into her body, she is moved to her new position at the top floor of the Temple, where she is given the name 'Banoub' by Anubisis. When the Three Kings, cursed by the enraged Goddess to a restless death, are buried under the sands of time along with the Temple of Illusions, Camilla too falls into a deep sleep without promise of waking. Many years pass, and Camilla Banoub finally opens her eyes to face a girl and a Hero Captain in battle. The Guardian of the Ruins looks at the girl - and sees a helpless victim of evil humans and their forbidden magic, as she once was. She swings her scythe to save whom she feels must truly be her kin.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_4_ANNA_DESC.text: The ruler of Gotruvin, a small but proud marcher state. Ana leads her troops to the War of the Spring Garden, seeking to justify the Marquis of Hiosbruke's right of succession.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_5_ANNA_DESC.text: It is in the midst of the petals of a great tulip field that the War of the Spring Garden comes to a clash: Ana, with her soldiers, is unfaltering in facing the generals of the House of Tasitte. In order to compensate the great difference in their number of troops, Ana uses her powers of telekinesis to single-handedly shoot many muskets at once. She marches forward to the center of the field, uncompromising and unafraid, the power of a single woman surmounting that of a single army.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_6_ANNA_DESC.text: Yet Ana's victory is stolen away from her as Twillie of Tasitte, wielding her illustrious greatsword, stops her path. It is on the day of the last cold spell that Ana, the golden iris heraldry on her chest gleaming in the chilly sunlight, and Twillie, her eternal adversary, meet once more in the great tulip field. Yet with the raising of each of their weapons a sudden blizzard engulfs the two figures - leaving behind only the spring breeze in their trace.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMTED_FIFTH_4_ANESIDORA_DES.text: When Anesidora gains consciousness for the very first time, the sight of Pandora fighting to hold back the rift of dimensions meets her eyes. Yet her newborn amazement is soon engulfed by an inexplicable madness.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMTED_FIFTH_5_ANESIDORA_DES.text: Anesidora comes to realize her true identity: the embodiment of Pandora's darkest feelings, hidden under a mask of indifference. A sinister desire overcomes her - in order to become a true entity and not mere residue of another's emotions, she will become the absolute being who rules over the dimension of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMTED_FIFTH_6_ANESIDORA_DES.text: The Captain of Hero Town restores peace to Hasla, quenching Anesidora's ambitions in the process. Contrary to others' expectations, Pandora heals the fragment of madness and bestows the name 'Anesidora.' Anesidora, now a being of her own, sets out after the Hero Captain to learn about the life that now spreads before her.

TEXT_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_4_LOVIATAR_DESC.text: The daughter of a duke of the Neth Empire, Loviatar becomes known as a child prodigy for her diverse talents. But when she starts displaying signs of magical talent - an anomaly in the Empire - her parents confine her to a laboratory, intent on using their own daughter as a test subject. Loviatar barely manages to escape from her home and hopelessly roams around the country, until she is fatefully discovered by the witch Wolfram and is taken to Pumpkin City to properly learn magic.

TEXT_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_5_LOVIATAR_DESC.text: Loviatar soon discovers that unlike other humans, her innate magical powers keep her from aging or falling asleep. She decides to join Wolfram's band of Night Witches and take charge of protecting Pumpkin City, and her two unsleeping eyes soon become feared by all criminals who dare to go against the witches' city. Decades pass, and Loviatar becomes the first human in Hasla to master Earth Magic - one of the four Elementals - and is officially appointed the first Witch of the Forest.

TEXT_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_LOVIATAR_DESC.text: One day, Loviatar receives a letter from a noble household of the Neth Empire. The letter's correspondents explain that their daughter was born with inherent magical abilities, and that the House of Nobles have been eyeing her for that reason. Loviatar comes to realize that the human experiments from which she escaped long ago are still being held covertly in the Empire, taking innocent children as their victims. Unable to turn a blind eye to the couple's plea to help them hide away their daughter, and to the girl with whom she shares a similar fate, Loviatar decides to return to the Empire. After her departure, however, the Witch of the Forest disappears from the face of the earth, seen no more by her fellow witches for years and years...

TEXT_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_LOVIATAR_NAME.text: Loviatar, First Witch of the Forest

TEXT_CHOICE_CHA_HASLA_ALL_4_DESC.text: Able to select ★4 Promotion, Contract, Hidden Heroes

TEXT_CHOICE_CHA_HASLA_ALL_4_HELP.text: You can select a ★4 Promotion, Contract, or Hidden Hero. Combination Heroes from the Alchemy Lab cannot be obtained.

TEXT_CLT_DET_P_SKILL_DESC_1.text: Only a Hero of grade 3 or higher can possess a special skill.

TEXT_CLT_DET_P_SKILL_DESC_2.text: Only a Hero of grade 5 or higher can possess an Adv. special skill.

TEXT_CLT_DET_P_SKILL_DESC_3.text: Only a Hero of grade 3 or higher can possess a special skill.

TEXT_COMMON_ACCURACY_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Accuracy of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_ALICIA_STONE_1_DESC.text: An emblem symbolizing the alliance between the Frost Elves and the Wolf Tribe. Or so it was meant to be.

TEXT_COMMON_ALICIA_STONE_2_DESC.text: An arrowhead of Frost Elvish craftsmanship found lodged in Alisha's heart. Even after all this time, the deep hostility of its owner still lingers.

TEXT_COMMON_ALICIA_STONE_3_DESC.text: A rusty locket crafted in the shape of a heart. It does not appear too valuable. Inside are engraved the letters "U & A".

TEXT_COMMON_ATK_POWER_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Attack Power of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_BETA_STONE_1_DESC.text: A parchment that contains illegible writing. Its author must have written it in great haste.

TEXT_COMMON_BETA_STONE_2_DESC.text: A slimy blob of mana that could prove fatal to those without immunity.

TEXT_COMMON_BLOODHOUND_STONE_1_DESC.text: A high-performance visor that Blood Hound upgraded with his own money. It was very expensive, but better to be safe than sorry.

TEXT_COMMON_BOUILLABAISSE_STONE_1_DESC.text: A stone that possesses mana, used by Bouillabaisse to control additional weapons.

TEXT_COMMON_BOUILLABAISSE_STONE_2_DESC.text: A pendant engraved with the picture of a poor family of fishermen drawing their nets.

TEXT_COMMON_CHANGGWI_STONE_1_DESC.text: Changgwi's dog tag. It says he's a Tiger Soldier Administrative Clerk and his military number is engraved. His men don't know about this.

TEXT_COMMON_COBRA_STONE_1_DESC.text: The venom of a cobra that has grown poisonous after decades of isolation.

TEXT_COMMON_COBRA_STONE_2_DESC.text: These fangs contain extremely toxic poison that can melt stone upon contact.

TEXT_COMMON_CODED_STONE_1_DESC.text: A laser shooter found attached to a drone. It can be used without any particular restriction inside Heaven's Ark, but it requires too much energy to be used efficiently outside.

TEXT_COMMON_CODED_STONE_2_DESC.text: An almost new Floating Stone. Steady and comfortable.

TEXT_COMMON_CODED_STONE_3_DESC.text: A hologram tablet that belonged to Code D. It is connected to Heaven’s Intranet. Upon examining the messenger records, you notice that he is on bad terms with Code M.

TEXT_COMMON_CRIT_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_CRIT_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Chance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_DALGI_STONE_1_DESC.text: The body of the wire that Da Ji always carries around. It's very sharp.

TEXT_COMMON_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Evasion of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_DOMPERIGNON_STONE_1_DESC.text: A darkly tarnished emblem of the Order of the Goddess.

TEXT_COMMON_DOMPERIGNON_STONE_2_DESC.text: A broken recordstone. It seems to have belonged to the monk Dom Perignon.

TEXT_COMMON_ENBYEONG_STONE_1_DESC.text: A doll made of cotton that looks like an elegant red horse. It looks like it was someone's stuffed animal.

TEXT_COMMON_GAMMA_STONE_1_DESC.text: Test Subject Gamma's artificial knee. It is designed to withstand bursts of high acceleration.

TEXT_COMMON_GAMMA_STONE_2_DESC.text: A contaminated piece of flesh scrapped from the body of Test Subject Gamma. Seemingly still alive, it convulses as if it remembers its original body.

TEXT_COMMON_GAPGWI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A bundle of hay that Guard Captain Gapgwi carries around for the sensitive Ochu.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINCHIEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: A strange stone that the Goblin Chief always held near his heart. It is said to bestow power to its beholder, and has been passed down generations of Goblin captains.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINCHIEF_STONE_2_DESC.text: A statue made of an undefined mineral, seemingly resembling a Goblin warrior. It once belonged to the Goblin Chief.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINCHIEF_STONE_3_DESC.text: A finely polished stone that belonged to the Goblin Chief. Unidentified runes flicker on its surface.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINMASTER_STONE_1_DESC.text: A medal that belonged to Crouching Ox. Similar medals were found from the bodies of several amateur Goblin Champions.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINMASTER_STONE_2_DESC.text: A piece of cloth that had been bound to the grip of Crouching Ox's blade. On it are written several words in the Goblin language, probably the names of people or places.

TEXT_COMMON_GOBLINMASTER_STONE_3_DESC.text: A pocketful of pebbles that Crouching Ox had been carrying. It holds quite a few colorful pebbles, stained by children's hands.

TEXT_COMMON_GULLVEIG_STONE_1_DESC.text: A piece of Gullveig's brilliant golden armor. Yet when you touch it, it turns an ugly purple.

TEXT_COMMON_JANGPO_STONE_1_DESC.text: A book of secret arts containing some sort of martial arts. The previous Five Tiger General Zhang Fei made as a hobby, but Zhang Bu trained with it wholeheartedly.

TEXT_COMMON_JANGSANBEOUM_STONE_1_DESC.text: White powder containing the essence of Jang San Beom. Even beasts that cannot speak can transform to look like humans when they put this powder on their face.

TEXT_COMMON_KINGTIGER_STONE_1_DESC.text: A badge belonging to the captain of the Catapult Goblins. On its back are drawn, in a crude, childish hand, what seems to be a young Goblin and hearts.

TEXT_COMMON_KINGTIGER_STONE_2_DESC.text: An engine part of a driving system revamped by the Goblins. Words in the human Common Language are written on it: "Property of the Heaven's Cavalry. Anyone seen possessing it will receive immediate punishment."

TEXT_COMMON_KINGTIGER_STONE_3_DESC.text: An insignia etched with crude drawings: eleven shield symbols, five hammer symbols, 33 sword symbols, and one tiger symbol.

TEXT_COMMON_LEVINLUDVICCO_STONE_1_DESC.text: Goggles that calculate the combat power of enemies by measuring their physical and magical abilities. It's useless without Levine's Intranet ID, but at least it looks cool.

TEXT_COMMON_MATAHARI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A crimson jewel that is also the symbol of the greatest dancer in Trista. It seems to burn from its own ashes.

TEXT_COMMON_MATAHARI_STONE_2_DESC.text: A jewel of a unique hue and texture, protected by government officials within the kingdom of Valencia.

TEXT_COMMON_MAX_HP_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Maximum HP of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_MHORUS_STONE_1_DESC.text: A viscous liquid revealed to be the black blood of a mutated Horus.

TEXT_COMMON_MHORUS_STONE_2_DESC.text: Earrings that prove the status of a Priest of Horus. Even years of hardship have not robbed it from its owner.

TEXT_COMMON_NATI_STONE_1_DESC.text: Bride mask worn by Maegu. It's cute.

TEXT_COMMON_PENETRATE_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_PENETRATE_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_PMK20A_STONE_1_DESC.text: A doll found in the damaged cockpit of PMK20A. Even its clothes have been delicately sewn on, a faithful reproduction of its original motif... You can feel the obsession of its maker.

TEXT_COMMON_QIONGQI_STONE_1_DESC.text: An eye of Qiongqi, one of the four evils. It always tries to capture the steps of an evil being, so it's pretty good for finding criminals.

TEXT_COMMON_RAVENASSASSIN_STONE_1_DESC.text: Huginn's feather that was found in the boiler room of the training grounds. The very sight of it erases all thoughts of loafing around.

TEXT_COMMON_RAVENASSASSIN_STONE_2_DESC.text: Muninn's feather that was found in the academy of the training grounds. You're reminded of the good old days when you were a newcomer freshly arrived to the army.

TEXT_COMMON_RAVENASSASSIN_STONE_3_DESC.text: A matte ebony cloak that can hardly been seen in the shadows of the night, but doesn't do much good in the dazzling white snow of the tundra at daytime.

TEXT_COMMON_RECEIVE_DMG_RATE_STONE_1_DES.text: Increases the Damage Reduction rate of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_REGINLEIF_STONE_1_DESC.text: No matter how much you gnaw away, this serving of pork never seems to decrease in size. Judging from its taste, it's sirloin.

TEXT_COMMON_RI_DELTASQUAD_STONE_1_DESC.text: A holographic site purchased by one of the Delta Squad when they joined Road Industry. Turns out they didn't need the device so much: they soon discovered they had been placed in a troop that did not use guns.

TEXT_COMMON_RI_DELTASQUAD_STONE_2_DESC.text: Delta Squad's uniform equipment. Its vibrating wheels allow the wearer to travel at fast speeds by reducing friction. For some reason, they are immensely popular among the scientists of Road Industry.

TEXT_COMMON_RSFLAMETANK_STONE_1_DESC.text: A synthetic flame spirit created by the scientists of Rapture Science, who claim that the spirit is sentient and will recognize its owner if trained.

TEXT_COMMON_RSFLAMETANK_STONE_2_DESC.text: A glass tube with drastically improved heat resistance... Or so they claim. It's actually the same tube used in Neth flame tanks, with only the top eliminated.

TEXT_COMMON_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_COMMON_SCARAB_STONE_1_DESC.text: A majestically curved horn that is unfortunately cracked in the center.

TEXT_COMMON_SCARAB_STONE_2_DESC.text: An elegant shell. Its golden patterns are naturally formed.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Golden and still very much alive.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_2_DESC.text: It focuses light to a single brilliant point, powerful enough to melt even stone.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: A part of Logi's armor. It moves on its own, as if trying to return to its owner.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: An icicle that used to form Hugi's body. It is surprisingly light due to its insides being hollow.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_3_DESC.text: A flexible steel plate that once supported Logi's icy body.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_4_DESC.text: The horn that decorated Bjorn's helmet. It is said to have come from an animal long extinct.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_HEAL_STONE_1_DESC.text: A bolt retrieved from Djer's body, weathered by time.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_HEAL_STONE_2_DESC.text: The yellow beak of an eagle. It is customarily used as a talisman among the people of the desert.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAGIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: Jackal's claw. Be careful - it's very sharp.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAGIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: A bullet shot by Djer. Be careful - it may explode if you're not careful.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_AIR_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A state-of-the-art particle accelerator, miniaturized through Rapture Science technology. There is a rumor, however, that an ancient relic with similar properties has been recently discovered.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_ATK_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A mushroom native to the metal coverings of Battleloids. Unlike ordinary mushrooms, it is composed of the very metal from which it grows.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_ATK_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A species of coral found in the deep waters of the mythical sea. It grows on the thermal energy of submarine volcanoes.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_ATK_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: The teacup of an obscure ancient civilization. It holds a strange liquid that mutates the drinker's body into that of an alien race.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_DEF_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: The magnum opus of quite a few Rapture Science engineers: a durable gear made of special alloy, produced through bafflingly advanced technology.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_DEF_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A script used by people of ancient Hasla to record the 'Deepest Abyss' they observed in their darkest dreams.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: A snowflake from the highest peak of the Utgard Mountains. Even the passing of the ages has failed to taint its original purity.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: Legends of old say these chains cannot be broken. Yet, they have been broken.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_SP_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: The remaining waste of crystallized mana. It has lost all properties of the wizard from which it originated, and thus is more suitable for experimentation.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_SP_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A type of deep-sea coral that resembles arthropod antennae. It seems there are some real antannae hiding here and there.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: This rock-solid molar crushes even - well, rock.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: Narmer's broken claw. It seems to be made out of an unknown material.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_AIR_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A shield generator that runs on the mana flowing through Battleloids. Depending on how you use it, it can even knock enemies into the air!

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_ATK_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: While this magazine may seem like the Neth Army standard, it is actually loaded with mana bullets.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_ATK_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A part of a tentacle of the 'Deepest Abyss.' Once it grabs ahold of its target, it won't let go. It does not suction - rather, it integrates itself with its prey.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_ATK_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: A tooth found piercing the skin of the 'Deepest Abyss.' It belongs to the otherworldly being 'Dhole,' whose sharp bite is said to pierce the hardest metal.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_DEF_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A carnation carefully folded from a sheet of metal. Judging by the depth of the fingerprints, whoever made it must have great grip strength!

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_DEF_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A type of sea snail found in the deep waters of the mythical sea. It can be easily recognized by the metal shell on its back.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: An axe head that proves the status of the Royal Guards of Nosgard. On it are inscribed the words "Third Generation of the Royal Guards.'

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: These gigantic shackles are engraved with a single word of a language lost in time: 'Utgard.'

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_SP_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A small doll found hidden within Nemesis's core. It seems to resemble a certain someone... Hugging it warms your heart.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_SP_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: The luminescent lure of an anglerfish found in the deep waters of the mythical sea.

TEXT_COMMON_SKIRIMIROFWRATH_STONE_1_DESC.text: A molar formed out of compressed cold air. It crushes everything it bites, aiding the Incarnate's digestion.

TEXT_COMMON_SONOFGEB_STONE_2_DESC.text: Judging from its size, this shinbone couldn't have possibly belonged to a human being.

TEXT_COMMON_SVENJA_STONE_1_DESC.text: The baton used by Svenja to command her troops. It may look ordinary, but it is made out of special carbon and will hit to hurt.

TEXT_COMMON_SWORDEN_STONE_1_DESC.text: A jade ring of Police Chief B. Sworden. It's rough, but it's made of good-quality jade.

TEXT_COMMON_TAOIST_STONE_1_DESC.text: An amulet with a curse that the imperial Taoist wrote for his disciples. It has the order to stop the enemies of the imperial family until their death.

TEXT_COMMON_TRUEGULLVEIG_STONE_1_DESC.text: A potion of oblivion that helps you forget the pain and regrets of the previous night.

TEXT_COMMON_VAJRAPANI_STONE_1_DESC.text: Clothing of Deva King. It bends softly, but it breaks like stone when hit.

TEXT_COMMON_VESSELOFGALATEA_STONE_1_DESC.text: Galatea's strong talons. As it could not be carved with any tool known to humans, it was sculpted with her bone.

TEXT_COMMON_WAITINGMAN_STONE_1_DESC.text: A stick of blue snow that had been attached to the face of the Waiting One. You are strangely drawn to lick it and discover that it tastes like... blueberry soda!

TEXT_COMMON_WAITINGMAN_STONE_2_DESC.text: Whose hat can it be? The snowman waits and waits, but the owner does not return. After a long time, it begins to move on its own in order to return the hat to its owner.

TEXT_COMMON_WAITINGMAN_STONE_3_DESC.text: A glove made of snow. It looks soft and fluffy as a cloud, but it turns out quite heavy when you hold it.

TEXT_COMMON_WINDWALKER_STONE_1_DESC.text: The relic of a goblin tribe of the ancient desert, long extinct. On the base of a crimson rock found commonly in the desert, there seem to be engraved the remains of a sharp thorn, the tooth of a hound, etchings resembling a 'V,' and a dragon scale.

TEXT_COMMON_WINDWALKER_STONE_2_DESC.text: An arrowhead sharpened by lost spells. It induces sulfur poisoning - the same that is often contracted around the Oasis.

TEXT_COMMON_WINDWALKER_STONE_3_DESC.text: The root of a tree engraved with mythical symbols…and also the scribblings of what seems to be a very young Goblin, resembling macarons and donuts.

TEXT_EPIC_3G_STONE_1_DESC.text: Flintstones that Grease carried around everywhere with him. A fine product of the Eastern Kingdoms, they are decorated with a drawing of a white axe.

TEXT_EPIC_ACCURACY_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Accuracy of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_AMMUT_STONE_1_DESC.text: A red fragment taken from the Ammut's eye. It is unclear whether it is a teardrop or blood-drop.

TEXT_EPIC_ANCIENREGIME_STONE_1_DESC.text: A fragment of evil found floating in the depths of Trista.

TEXT_EPIC_ANCIENREGIME_STONE_2_DESC.text: An exotic ore that illuminates a path to the secret of the world.

TEXT_EPIC_ANCIENREGIME_STONE_3_DESC.text: A possessed item that bestows power to its beholder, whoever it may be…

TEXT_EPIC_ANUBISIS_H_STONE_1_DESC.text: A blade allegedly forged from material bestowed by the heavens. Enemies cut by this blade become hostages in death.

TEXT_EPIC_ANUBISIS_H_STONE_2_DESC.text: A decoration depicting the golden Uraeus of three heads. It symbolizes the majesty of the Three Kings.

TEXT_EPIC_ANUBISIS_STONE_1_DESC.text: White blood gathered from Anubisis's wound. Its properties seem to change in accordance to the surrounding ambiance.

TEXT_EPIC_ATK_POWER_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Attack Power of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_AVENIR_STONE_1_DESC.text: The manastone Avenir uses to control her flow of mana.

TEXT_EPIC_AVENIR_STONE_2_DESC.text: A crudely wrought ring. It seems to be a gift from someone.

TEXT_EPIC_AVENIR_STONE_3_DESC.text: The source of the Artificial God's powers.

TEXT_EPIC_AZATHOTH_STONE_1_DESC.text: A fragment darker than the darkest of nights. It's shaped like a grain of rice.

TEXT_EPIC_AZATHOTH_STONE_2_DESC.text: A gently pulsating fragment shaped like a human heart.

TEXT_EPIC_AZATHOTH_STONE_3_DESC.text: A stone with faintly engraved letters, of which only the following are legible: "Ma…j…s"

TEXT_EPIC_BLOODHOUND_STONE_1_DESC.text: An optical camouflage device developed by remodeling the Blood Hound's old machine with Road Industry technology. If you can't be seen, you can't be targeted.

TEXT_EPIC_CHANGGWI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A necklace that is said to have been made by Changgwi with the fangs of the legendary 'Taekbaek' he gained after fighting him. No one knows the truth behind, but the extraordinary energy from the necklace gives some weight to the story.

TEXT_EPIC_CHOSSEO_STONE_1_DESC.text: Hello Captains,  At the end of seven good years of service, I regret to say that this is my last present to you as the PD of Crusaders Quest. Crusaders Quest means more than a game to me, and I will remember my time here with fondness for the rest of my life. I hope that you continue to find the fun and comfort that the developers strive to create in this game. I will continue to cheer on Crusaders Quest, no longer as its Director but as another Hero Captain of Hasla. As a game developer, I have learned a lot from you, dear Captains. I hope to see you again one day, and I wish everyone happiness and good health in these confusing times.  Sincerely, Sungmin Cho

TEXT_EPIC_CODEVV_STONE_1_DESC.text: VV's power source, made out of magic engineering technology. To prevent overheating, it has been wrapped with a defensive magic circle of many layers that cancels out interception of other magic.

TEXT_EPIC_CRIT_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_CRIT_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Chance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_DALGI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A melody of a country's ruination composed by a nameless composer of Chen a long time ago. It breaks the spirits of those who listen to it and makes them incapable of doing anything.

TEXT_EPIC_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Evasion of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_ENBYEONG_STONE_1_DESC.text: It is said that a blue dragon appeared in front of the emperor a long time ago and offered the orb. It clears the mind of the holder.

TEXT_EPIC_EVE606_STONE_1_DESC.text: Some supporting equipment that further enhances the sensory nervous systems of sensitive test subjects. It is not recommended for the average human being, as they will not be able to endure the heightened sensations and faint.

TEXT_EPIC_FREYJA_STONE_1_DESC.text: An orb of ice inscribed with Freyja's magic runes. It is said that you must be of the Vana bloodline to use it properly, but even the mere act of holding it bestows energy and strength.

TEXT_EPIC_GAPGWI_STONE_1_DESC.text: Bell to control Guard Captain Gapgwi's cow, 'Ochu'. Ochu's movements are unpredictable as it moves according to the sound of the bell.

TEXT_EPIC_GENERALWINTER_STONE_1_DESC.text: General Winter's source of energy. Take a bite and you'll see a clown teasing you before your eyes... Can it be that you're hallucinating?

TEXT_EPIC_GG_STONE_1_DESC.text: A necklace that provides some protection from contamination. The right side of its triangular shape is folded towards the center.

TEXT_EPIC_GULLVEIG_STONE_1_DESC.text: How strange, this jewel from Gullveig's tiara seems to be one color and shape at a certain angle of light... And yet another color and shape at another... You find it difficult to discern its true form.

TEXT_EPIC_GULLVEIG_STONE_2_DESC.text: The fragment of a curse summoned forth from another dimension. It emits a different aura from the darkness of the Apostles.

TEXT_EPIC_JANGPO_STONE_1_DESC.text: It is said that a red dragon appeared in front of the emperor a long time ago and offered the legendary decorative art. But it is said that a bellflower of the same name is more well-known.

TEXT_EPIC_JANGSANBEOUM_STONE_1_DESC.text: Part of Jang San Beom, a monster that appeared in the border between this world and the otherworld. It looks like a person, so amongst Shimmanis, they say to not follow a red-faced person that asks for help from the mountains.

TEXT_EPIC_JERAPHIM_H_STONE_1_DESC.text: These letters may be written in an unknown language, but oddly enough, you understand their meaning. Gazing upon them fills you with a strange power.

TEXT_EPIC_JERAPHIM_H_STONE_2_DESC.text: A luminescent stone. Its light is brilliant, but does not hurt your eyes.

TEXT_EPIC_JERAPHIM_STONE_1_DESC.text: The wings of the Kalard Jeraphim. Its white glow remains untarnished.

TEXT_EPIC_LEESIN_STONE_1_DESC.text: A broken blade belonging to Ratoichi. You can feel steely determination resonating from it.

TEXT_EPIC_LEVINLUDVICCO_STONE_1_DESC.text: A particle invented by Levine’s younger brother, the former Chief Engineer of A.M.K. It is said to collapse atomic structure and can soften even the most durable of substances. Levine has been attempting to mass-produce the particle to no avail.

TEXT_EPIC_LEVINLUDVICCO_STONE_2_DESC.text: A magic-particle focused beam launching device invented by Levine herself. It is tremendously efficient—but must run on the lifeblood and mana of living wizards.

TEXT_EPIC_MAX_HP_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Maximum HP of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_NATI_STONE_1_DESC.text: Part of the gallbladder of the bear patron saint 'Nati' that lives in the border. It's like any bear gallbladder so it doesn't have any special healing effects.

TEXT_EPIC_OMEGA_STONE_1_DESC.text: Machinery taken from Test Subject Omega's chest. It continues to beat in an eerie, familiar rhythm...

TEXT_EPIC_PANDEMONIUM_STONE_1_DESC.text: A metal frame surrounding the Pandemonium's head of surprising durability. On the inside, there is a mysterious engraving in small letters that praises the machine's "demonic performance."

TEXT_EPIC_PENETRATE_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_PENETRATE_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_PMK20A_STONE_1_DESC.text: PMK20A's flight control system. In low flying mode, it also acts as an intercept avoidance and fire control system. Before the development of this equipment, wizards captured by the Empire were forced to calculate the control tactics instead.

TEXT_EPIC_PMK20A_STONE_2_DESC.text: The armor plate of PMK20A. It is filled with a new material invented in the developing process. In an emergency, it can also be disassembled, cooked, and eaten.

TEXT_EPIC_QIONGQI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A condensed orb containing the power of Qiongqi, one of the four evils. The energy is ominous, but appealing. It is said that when it goes into the hands of an evil being, it has the power to make those evil thoughts come true.

TEXT_EPIC_RAVENLEADERRAN_STONE_1_DESC.text: A flag passed down from the time of King Snorri, the first sovereign of Nosgard. The embroidered sign of the raven is the symbol of the Night Raven assassins.

TEXT_EPIC_REBOUILLABAISSE_STONE_1_DESC.text: The identification tag of a soldier of the Heaven's Cavalry. There is an indecipherable code written on it.

TEXT_EPIC_REBOUILLABAISSE_STONE_2_DESC.text: The identification tag of a sergeant of the Heaven's Cavalry. The lieutenants and other upper rank officers seem to have been purged from the order.

TEXT_EPIC_REBOUILLABAISSE_STONE_3_DESC.text: An unidentifiable manastone used by Bouillabaisse to control his additional weapons.

TEXT_EPIC_RECEIVE_DMG_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Damage Reduction rate of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_REDOMPERIGNON_STONE_1_DESC.text: A shard of teardrop that fell on Dom Perignon's cheeks. If you hold it in your hand, an image is played of a Shadowdemon demolishing the slums and its people.

TEXT_EPIC_REDOMPERIGNON_STONE_2_DESC.text: It seems to be a token of gratitude from the citizens: "To Dom Perignon, friend of the poor and ill."

TEXT_EPIC_REDOMPERIGNON_STONE_3_DESC.text: Used to make beer and other alcohol. It still smells sweet.

TEXT_EPIC_REGINLEIF_STONE_1_DESC.text: The shield of a goddess that can be worn only by the truest warriors who know the glory of war... Or its replica.

TEXT_EPIC_REGINLEIF_STONE_2_DESC.text: Throughout Nosgard can be discovered stones naturally charged with lightening. Some people, few and far between, are innately born with this magic flowing through their veins.

TEXT_EPIC_RESIDUALLION_STONE_1_DESC.text: The insignia of a knight who made his way into legends. On it are written the words, "Meister des langen Schwertes: Master of the Longsword."

TEXT_EPIC_RESIDUALLION_STONE_1_TITLE.text: Badge of the Order of the Lion Maistre

TEXT_EPIC_RESIDUALLION_STONE_2_DESC.text: Only the immortal words of faith to the Order of the Goddess gleam within this empty armor of a long dead knight.

TEXT_EPIC_RESIDUALLION_STONE_3_DESC.text: A jewel inlaid in the pommel of the longsword. It has lost its original radiance and is now covered in a black, viscous liquid.

TEXT_EPIC_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_EPIC_RUDERAT_STONE_1_DESC.text: One of Rudrat's bounties he plundered from the human world when he worked in a band of thieves. Its original form is unclear.

TEXT_EPIC_SEKHMET_H_STONE_1_DESC.text: An essence of flame created by Sekhmet with magic. It shall continue to burn until everything before it turns to ash.

TEXT_EPIC_SEKHMET_H_STONE_2_DESC.text: The symbol of Queen Sekhmet. Made of glowing hot gold, it cannot be worn by anyone other than the Queen.

TEXT_EPIC_SEKHMET_STONE_1_DESC.text: A papyrus containing a warning to enemies of the Kingdom. One of Sekhmet's favorite objects used to make a point, thank you.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_1_DESC.text: "No physical blow could break through Narmer's surface." - 'Set'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_2_DESC.text: "Her brilliant necklace seemed to dazzle not only one's eyes, but also one's mind and heart..." - 'Isis'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: Only this metal sphere was found where Logi's heart should have been. On it are inscribed the old Haslan words of a magical contract with an elemental spirit.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: A 'megingjord,' a part of the uniform once worn by the Royal Guards of Ancient Nosgard. Its technology has been lost to time, and only Thor's 'megingjord' remains intact to this day. It greatly increases the strength of the wearer.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_3_DESC.text: A circular disc that fell from Bjorn's broken shield. It appears to have been crafted out of 'Svalinn,' a magical substance that freezes everything upon contact.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_4_DESC.text: A fragment of the Seal of the Sanctuary that materialized after being frozen by the Incarnate's powers. It may have weakened with time, but its powers are still a force to be reckoned with.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_HEAL_STONE_1_DESC.text: "It was only in the reflection of Banoub's blank eyes that we could detect any trace of emotion - that of our own, of fear and despair." - 'Isis'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_HEAL_STONE_2_DESC.text: "We had barely defeated Djer when we came to a stark realization: that we had not, in fact, defeated it." - 'Osiris'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAGIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: "And the light from Djer's thorn pierced the earth, cleansing it completely." - 'Lorelei'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAGIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: "Khasekhemwy's rage was pure terror, torn from the very realm of nightmares." - 'Set'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_AIR_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A magically engineered weapon designed after a mysterious labyrinth located somewhere in Hasla. It generates small gravity fields to decrease pressure from the limbs of Battleloids, allowing actions previously deemed physically impossible.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_ATK_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A black cube that glitters as if containing all the stars of the night sky. It is said to have mysteriously appeared behind the Battleloid's mask one day.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_ATK_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A piece of tentacle that fell from the 'Deepest Abyss.' It is said that an ordinary human being only has to look at it to lose their composure and quiver in inexplicable fear. However, when the right one falls asleep with it in their hand, they will catch a glimpse of the dreams of the 'Deepest Abyss,' filled with the forgotten past.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_ATK_EP4_STONE_1_TITLE.text: Caress of the Forgotten Old God

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_ATK_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: A piece of the body of the 'Deepest Abyss.' The fragment itself does not seem to contain any will of its own, but it will occasionally form eyes and peer at its surroundings. It is rumored that those caught in its eerie gaze suffer misfortunes, big and small.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_DEF_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: Mana essence of the first Witch of the Forest, gradually accumulated and condensed over several decades. It dyes everything green on contact.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_DEF_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A tome of magic known to have been cited by the Lunatic Delet in his books. The ominous stain on the cover seems to resemble a human face... However, it was recently discovered to be an ordinary cooking book, and the stain spilled coffee.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: The cold winds of Nosgard that have materialized into the shape of a fang. It freezes and demolishes its victims with biting fury.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: A particle of the first snow to ever envelop the northern lands, long before the memory of the Great Cold and all that would come with it.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_SP_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A module assembled in the likeness of wizards' internal mana circuits. Among its many versions, the SP Charge Module is special for its ability to generate protective magical barriers.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_SP_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A sculpture carved in the form of an unknown yet sinister ancient god. While it is made out of ordinary stone, the shape itself seems to contain an undefinable curse - simply looking at it unnerves one's soul.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: "From Narmer's livid tail rained down the storm of despair." - 'Osiris'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: "A pure, primitive power it was, Khasekhemwy's fist: an intense and fatal force that could not be resisted." - 'Osiris'

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_AIR_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A magically engineered weapon designed after a mysterious labyrinth located somewhere in Hasla. It changes the direction of forces, applying increased pressure to the limbs of Battleloids and so maximizing their physical strength.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_ATK_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: Nemesis's core unit, constructed from an alloy that is not naturally found in Hasla. Scientists think it draws energy from another unknown dimension.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_ATK_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A device once used in rituals to summon Great Old Beings. It now lies broken and devoid of its true strength, but if you look at it closely in the dark, you can see emanating from its center an ominous red aura.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_ATK_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: An unidentified particle found by archeologist Doctor Shaver in the deep sea. Surprisingly, it is said to possess similar qualities to the IC particle created by Neth's latest technology. Rumor has it that the Shaver Particle gained its particular hue when Doctor Shaver, turned mad from researching the material too long and too far, committed suicide by chopping himself up in a grinder.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_DEF_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: The materialized dream of a witch who has been asleep for many long years. Gazing at it brings to your mind dusty memories of a golden-haired girl - and her tears.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_DEF_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A talisman engraved with information on the lost island 'Lemuria,' discovered in the deep waters of the mystical sea. It is made out of unidentified metal not found in Hasla - perhaps it has been carried from another dimension along with the 'Deepest Abyss'...

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: The gauntlet 'Jarngreipr' contains within it the essence of the cold of the northern lands. Upon gripping its victim, it freezes them into helplessness.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: The essence of an ever-raging storm. It reacts to the surrounding air currents by changing in size.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_SP_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A module assembled in the likeness of wizards' internal mana circuits. Ever since a scientist accidentally dropped it, it tends to become durable whenever it stores enough mana. How curious!

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_SP_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: The eye of the 'Deepest Abyss.' When the dimension whence they were born perished, they engraved its final moments into their retina to remain there for all eternity. Even now, when they have lost all memory of their past, the familiar landscape still evokes within them a deep and mournful longing.

TEXT_EPIC_SKIRIMIROFWRATH_STONE_1_DESC.text: A petal that was found nestled away amidst Skrymir's mane, fresh and undamaged even before the frigid winds.

TEXT_EPIC_SKIRIMIROFWRATH_STONE_2_DESC.text: A rune letter that appeared after the patterns of Skrymir's fur changed shape. The people of Ancient Nosgard believed that power dwelled in language itself. There are not much left today who can decipher the meanings of these runes.

TEXT_EPIC_SKIRIMIR_STONE_1_DESC.text: A prism that incidentally formed where Skrymir tread. Light that passes through this prism seems to take on magical properties.

TEXT_EPIC_SVENJA_STONE_1_DESC.text: The main armament of Svenja’s commander tank. It is a cannonball that contains multiple stacks of lightning magic within a mana shield. Three wizards must work all day to make just one Mana Bomb.

TEXT_EPIC_SWORDEN_STONE_1_DESC.text: A bead containing the essence of the Black Shade-Tiger Blade that B. Sworden obtained after grueling training. Hold it in your hand and close your eyes to hear B. Sworden's voice reciting a decree. It's probably good for insomnia.

TEXT_EPIC_TAOIST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Chen's top-quality makeup in red. It has a spell that makes the user appear even more beautiful.

TEXT_EPIC_THIALFI_STONE_1_DESC.text: You can hardly make out the childish, shaky letters of this worn letter, most of them erased beyond recognition, but these words still clearly remain: "brother" and "thank you."

TEXT_EPIC_TOMBKING_STONE_1_DESC.text: A whip woven with tendons of a lion. It is saturated in the blood and sweat of the Temple laborers.

TEXT_EPIC_TRUEGULLVEIG_STONE_1_DESC.text: Truthful Kalard Gullveig, a crystal of that power. It has the power to twist the fate of the holder and take them closer to the 'truth' that they want subconsciously.

TEXT_EPIC_TYRANT_STONE_1_DESC.text: Unfortunately, there only was enough of the newly discovered substance to make one of these. It will not burn in fire or tear before bullets.

TEXT_EPIC_VAJRAPANI_STONE_1_DESC.text: An ornament that represents one of the letters that symbolize the beginning and end of Hasla.

TEXT_EPIC_VALKYRIESTONESTATUS_STONE_1_DE.text: Anyone pierced by the Svefnthorn falls into eternal slumber. Its form can be found engraved here and there on the ancient stone statues of Nosgard.

TEXT_EPIC_VESSELOFGALATEA_STONE_1_DESC.text: A beautiful feather from the Sacred Being’s wings, glittering in a multitude of different colors depending on the viewer’s angle. Each barb is comprised of molecular wire that can cut anything on contact.

TEXT_EPIC_VESSELOFGALATEA_STONE_2_DESC.text: An artificial spinal cord modeled after Galatea's powerful body. It heightens the user's physical abilities and bestows them supernatural insight.

TEXT_ERROR_TITLE_MAX_CARVE_STONE_DESC.text: You have reached the maximum limit of your Sigil Inventory. Increase slots or sell Sigils?

TEXT_ERROR_UNABLE_TO_MESSAGE_MAX_CARVE_S.text: You have exceeded the number of Sigils you can hold. Manage in menu?

TEXT_ERROR_UNABLE_TO_START_MAX_CARVE_STO.text: You cannot start your adventure as you have reached the maximum capacity of your Sigil Inventory. Will you use or sell some?

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_11.text: (Passive Enhanced) Burn damage increased by 5 times.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_12.text: Lunar Mark' lasts 5 seconds, and deals damage to all enemies.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_14.text: (Passive Enhanced) Poisoned enemy's resistance decreases by 270 every poison stack (Maximum 5 stacks)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_15.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) Every second hit of 'Wind Dance' or 'Dance of Blossoming Fans' stuns the enemy for 1 second and additionally deals neutral damage equal to 350% of Lee's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_16.text: (Passive Enhanced) When Queen Hawk is activated, Rahima's resistance penetration increases by 150 and decreases accuracy of all enemies hit by 15 for 3 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_4.text: (Passive Enhanced) If 'Final Shot' deals a critical hit, the hit enemy is stunned for 1.5 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_4_7.text: (Passive Enhanced) The number of auto attacks required to activate Hikari's passive is decreased by 1.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_1.text: (Upon Activating Passive) Gon summons 'Tiga,' dealing physical damage equal to 1500% of attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) After summoning 'Tiga,' Gon immediately uses 'Hunt Start!'

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_11.text: (Passive Enhanced) Burn damage increased by 5 times. (Passive Added) When Hellfire Arrow is activated, the Power of Demon is unleashed for 5 seconds. Power of Demon: Increases attack power by 100%, and resistance penetration by 30%. Armor and resistance are decreased by 20%. Gains immunity to stun, and cannot be canceled by buff cancels. When using a block skill while Power of Demon is active, explodes Hellfire, dealing magical damage equal to 1000% of attack power and neutral damage equal to 1000% of attack power. Hellfire burns the hit enemy, and stacks [1/2/3] flames based on chain number. When 3 flames are stacked while Power of Demon is active, its duration will be refreshed.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_12.text: The duration of 'Lunar Mark' is increased to 9 seconds. 'Lunar Mark' further deals damage to all enemies and decreases hit enemies' resistance by 15%. The damage dealt and debuff cast by 'Lunar Mark' can be stacked up to 3 times. When 'Lunar Mark' is renewed, the duration of the mark is reset.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_14.text: (Passive Enhanced) Poisoned enemy's resistance decreases by 270 every poison stack (Maximum 5 stacks) (Passive Added) Places a deadly poison trap in front of Mamba that lasts for 5 seconds when Mamba uses 3 blocks. The deadly poison trap inflicts magical damage equal to 1000% of Mamba's attack power, and the poisoned enemy will be immobilized.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_15.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) Every second hit of 'Wind Dance' or 'Dance of Blossoming Fans' stuns the enemy for 1 second and additionally deals neutral damage equal to 450% of Lee's attack power. (Passive Enhanced) Immediately before using 'Dance of Blossoming Fans,' Lee throws 2 fans that each deal physical damage equal to 750% of Lee's attack power. (Passive Added) After throwing her fan, Lee additionally casts 'Windforce' to deal physical damage equal to 1500% of her attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_16.text: (Passive Enhanced) When Queen Hawk is activated, Rahima's resistance penetration increases by 900 and decreases accuracy of all enemies hit by 30 for 3 seconds. All allies' HP is healed at 100% of Rahima's attack power. (Passive Altered) When Queen Hawk is activated, The King and Queen of Hawks are summoned to deal magical damage equal to 2300% of attack power each.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_3.text: (Passive Altered) Upon using a 3-chain, Sigruna shoots a 'Verdure Arrow' that deals magical damage equal to 1500% of her attack power. The 'Verdure Arrow' ignores enemy resistance by 5% of Sigruna's maximum HP, and is dealt with 30% higher critical chance. If the 'Verdure Arrow' accurately hits, Sigruna uses 'Embrace of Verdure' to deal magical damage equal to 1000% of her attack power and reel in enemies. 'Embrace of Verdure' binds hit enemies for 4 seconds. If the enemy hit by 'Embrace of Verdure' has an active buff, Sigruna immediately re-activates a 3-chain skill once.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_4.text: (Passive Altered) 'Final Shot' is changed to 'Justice's Aim' that deals magical damage equal to 1800% of the Hero's attack power to a single enemy and ignores enemy evasion. 'Justice's Aim' is shot with critical damage increased by 60% and stuns hit enemies for 1.5 seconds. (Passive Altered) The 'Critical Arrow' immediately shot upon using another ally's 3-chain is changed to 'Justice's Aim.'

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_6.text: (Passive Added) Generates 1 block for self when using 3-chains. Also, the next 3-chain deals magical damage equal to 1170% of attack power. (Passive Enhanced) The next skill ignores enemies' resistance by 50% of attack power; passive effect is applied +1 more time.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_6_7.text: (Passive Enhanced) The number of auto attacks required to activate the Hero's passive is reduced by 3. (Passive Added) The range of the Hero's auto attacks is greatly increased. (Passive Added) Upon shooting 2 'Tempest Arrows,' the Hero summons a 'Fox Spirit' that decreases hit enemies' resistance by 50% for 5 seconds and deals magical damage equal to 3000% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_LIMITED_6_1.text: (Passive Enhanced) Hong-Ran's debuff can be activated by her other block chains. Her 'Fountain Fireworks' deal additional damage equal to 800% of her attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_LIMITED_GG_4_1.text: 'Y Blade' and 'Throwing Daggers' damage increased by 50%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_AR_LIMITED_GG_6_1.text: 'Y Blade' and 'Throwing Daggers" damage increased by 50%. Using a block skill after using 'Throwing Daggers' activates 'Spiral Dagger,' dealing magical damage equal to (450/500/550)% of attack power per dagger).

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_BO_4_21.text: (Passive enhanced) Set sacrifices only 25% of all heals he receives in summoning the dead.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_BO_5_21.text: (Passive enhanced) Set sacrifices only 25% of all heals he receives in summoning the dead.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_BO_6_18.text: (Passive Enhanced) The 'Cherry Blossom Tree' requires 1 less 'Petal' to summon and receives 15% life steal for all damage. Its duration is increased by 2 seconds. (Passive Altered) 'Sakura Blossoms' are changed to 'Passing of Spring' that deals magical damage equal to 720% of the Hero's attack power per hit for 5 seconds and knocks enemies into the air.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_BO_6_20.text: (Passive Altered) Hansheng's passive is changed to 'Heaven's Shout,' which deals magical damage equal to 2000% of his attack power. (Passive Enhanced) If an ally block is used while Hansheng is drawing his bow, Hansheng shoots 2 additional arrows of 'Heaven's Shout' that each deals magical damage equal to 2400% of his attack power. (Passive Added) Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Hansheng generates 2 blocks for himself and increases his own resistance penetration by 2500 for 7 seconds. 'Heaven's Shout' additionally knocks back the hit enemy and dispels all buffs.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_BO_6_21.text: (Passive Enhanced) The Hero sacrifices only 25% of all heals they receive to control the dead. (Passive Added) 'Land of the Dead' is enhanced to 'Lore of the Bygone.' 'Lore of the Bygone': The Hero deals physical damage equal to 300% of their attack power every 0.5 seconds to enemies within range and decreases their SP by 4 per second. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) If enemies receive 6 hits from 'Lore of the Bygone,' the Hero additionally summons 'Royal Hounds' behind the enemy to deal 3 hits of physical damage each equal to 1000% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_4_21.text: (Block skill enhanced) Upon using a block skill, Athos receives 25% less damage from enemies for 1 second.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_5_21.text: (Block skill enhanced) Upon using a block skill, Athos receives 25% less damage from enemies for 1 second.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_6_18.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Frost Grenade' stacks 10 more 'Frost Bites.' (Passive Altered) 'Frost Grenade' is changed to 'Icy Explosion,' which deals magical damage equal to 2400% of Raven's attack power and increases her critical chance by 20% and accuracy by 20 for 7 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_6_20.text: (Passive Enhanced) Every time the Hero activates 'A Tinge of Madness' to attack the enemy, the skill's cooltime decreases by 0.1 seconds. After 'A Tinge of Madness,' the Hero maintains 'madness' for 9 seconds; upon using their block skill, the Hero shoots 10 bullets that each deal physical damage equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power, and additional neutral damage equal to 40% of the Hero's attack power to enemies with less than 50% HP.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_6_21.text: (Block skill enhanced) Upon using a block skill, Athos receives 35% less damage from enemies for 1 second. (Passive enhanced) Upon firing his additional shot, Athos stuns the enemy for 0.5 seconds, his accuracy increased to 20 for the attack.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_ARMOR_4_1.text: (Passive Enhanced) Neo's block skill deals 35% more damage.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_ARMOR_4_3.text: (Passive Enhanced) The Hero's armor penetration is increased by 50% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_ARMOR_6_1.text: (Passive Enhanced) For 7 seconds after using her passive, Neo's critical chance and armor penetration increase by 25%, and Neo's block skill deals 35% more damage. Additionally, Neo summons 6 laser-shooting gliders that each deal physical damage equal to 500% of Neo's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_ARMOR_6_2.text: (Passive Activated) Layla's critical chance increases by an additional 25% and her attack power by an additional 60%. Additionally, Layla uses a sniper rifle to deal magical damage equal to 2000% of her attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_ARMOR_6_3.text: (Passive Enhanced) The Hero's armor penetration is increased by 50% for 3 seconds. (Passive Added) Upon activating their passive, the Hero shoots an 'energy ball' that explodes upon contact to deal physical damage equal to 2000% of their attack power and knock back the hit enemy.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_LIMITED_RB_RUBY_6.text: (Passive Added) For 3 seconds after charging, the Hero's armor penetration is increased by 50% of the Hero's attack power. (Passive Enhanced) Upon using an ally's block in the air, the Hero shoots a 'Red Dust Bullet' that deals physical damage equal to 500% of their attack power and is recognized as a 3-chain.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_LIMITED_YS8_HUMMEL_4.text: (Passive enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10%

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_GU_LIMITED_YS8_HUMMEL_6.text: (Passive enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10% (Upon using block) Instead of 'Bust Shot,' Hummel activates 'Guilty Raid' to deal physical damage equal to 1500% of his attack power to the enemy at front. This attack is acknowledged as a 3-chain. (Cooltime: 6 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_1.text: (Passive Added) If the enemy hit by Thor's lightning bolt is receiving a buff, Thor uses one additional lightning bolt.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_10.text: (Passive Enhanced) In 'Fury Mode,' V's life steal increases by 40%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_12.text: (Passive enhanced) 'Mark of the Sun' additionally deals physical damage equal to 500% of Rebecca's armor and resistance, respectively.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_13.text: (Passive Added) Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Hector uses 'Might of Legions' to deal 10 hits of physical damage equal to 300% of his resistance over 2 seconds. Reusing the skill will increase its duration by 2 seconds. (Passive Added) For 3 seconds after using 'Might of Legions,' Hector's knockback resistance increases by 50%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_15.text: (Passive Altered) The number of binds required to activate 'Cry of the Dragon' is decreased to 2.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_16.text: (Passive Enhanced) The Hero deals additional physical damage equal to 500% of their resistance.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_21.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon using 'Salvage,' Schula receives all damage targeted at the entire team for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_5.text: (Passive Added) The Hero's attack speed is increased by 40%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_8.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon counterattacking the enemy, Stanya deals additional physical damage equal to 100% of the enemy's armor.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_9.text: (Upon Activating Passive) All allies except self receive 25% less damage for 5 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_5_21.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon using 'Salvage,' Schula receives all damage targeted at the entire team for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_5_5.text: (Passive Added) The Hero's attack speed is increased by 40%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_1.text: (Passive Added) If the enemy hit by Thor's lightning bolt is receiving a buff, Thor uses two additional lightning bolts. (Passive Added) The additional lightning bolts generate electric discharge for 3 seconds to deal 5 hits of neutral damage equal to 10% of Thor's maximum HP.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_10.text: (Passive Enhanced) In 'Fury Mode,' the Hero's life steal increases by 40%. (Passive Altered) In 'Fury Mode,' the Hero's every second block skill will be enhanced. (Passive Added) Upon using an enhanced block skill in 'Fury Mode,' the Hero will instead use 'V-Slash' to deal physical damage equal to 3000% of their attack power, increase the duration of 'Fury Mode' by 3 seconds, and decrease the hit enemy's SP by 50.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_12.text: (Passive enhanced) 'Mark of the Sun' additionally deals physical damage equal to 1000% of Rebecca's armor and resistance, respectively. (Passive added) Upon dealing additional damage through the 'Mark of the Sun,' Rebecca swings her mace to deal physical damage equal to 2000% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 1 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_13.text: (Passive Added) Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Hector uses 'Might of Legions' to deal 10 hits of physical damage equal to 500% of his resistance over 2 seconds. Reusing the skill will increase its duration by 2 seconds. (Passive Added) For 3 seconds after using 'Might of Legions,' Hector's knockback resistance increases by 50% and armor penetration increases by 2000.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_15.text: (Passive Altered) The number of binds required to activate 'Cry of the Dragon' is decreased to 2. (Passive Enhanced) 'Cry of the Dragon' is enhanced to 'Paramount Lance,' which deals physical damage equal to 3500% of the Hero's attack power per hit. If hit enemies are already bound by 'Chains of Confinement,' the Hero further binds the same enemy for 8 seconds and decreases their armor by 1% of the Hero's maximum HP.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_16.text: (Passive Altered) 'Cruel Punishment' is changed to 'Guillotine of the Apocalypse,' which deals physical damage equal to 5000% of the Hero's attack power and 500% of the Hero's resistance per hit. If the Hero fails to hit the enemy and trips, the Hero's head falls off and surprises the enemy, stunning them for 2 seconds. The Hero then heals themselves by 60% of their maximum HP.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_21.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon using 'Salvage,' Schula receives all damage targeted at the entire team for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds) The duration of the attack power debuff cast by 'Salvage' is increased to 10 seconds. The attack power buff cast by 'Mastery' is increased to 25%, and is changed to stack a maximum of 2 times. (Passive Added) With every 5 hits she receives, Schula uses 'Artisan's Rage.' 'Artisan's Rage' deals physical damage equal to 5000 and cancels all enemy buffs. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_5.text: (Passive Added) The Hero's attack speed is increased by 40%. (Passive Enhanced) Upon activating 'Ultimate Firesprout,' the Hero's movement speed is increased by 40%, knockback resistance by 100%, and attack power by 200% for 5 seconds. (Passive Added) If 'Ultimate Firesprout' deals an accurate hit, the Hero activates 'True Ultimate Firesprout' to deal physical damage equal to 3000% of their attack power and stun the enemy. 'True Ultimate Firesprout' ignores enemy effects that take damage in the place of their allies.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_7.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon attacking an enemy under a debuff with his block skill, Cain deals additional physical damage equal to 1500% of his attack power. (Passive Enhanced) The last hit of 'Whirlwind of Pain' has a 100% chance of activating Cain's 3-chain. Cain's thus reactivated 3-chain skill deals additional physical damage equal to 1000% of Cain's resistance.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_9.text: (Upon Activating Passive) All allies except self receive 25% less damage for 7 seconds. Upon using 'Hero's Charge,' Mundeok's movement speed increases by 20%. Upon using another ally's 3-chain 3 times, Mundeok deals physical damage equal to 50% of his attack power and 250% of his resistance, then immediately dismounts his steed.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_GG_6_1.text: (Upon Activating Passive) Receives damage for the entire party for 3 seconds. (Activates once every 5 seconds). Additionally, enemies hit by the killer whale lose all their buffs. May spins her arms to deal physical damage equal to 1000% of her maximum HP + 5000% of attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_4.text: (Upon Activating Passive) Damage Reduction +20%, Motion Speed +10% (Passive Enhanced) Number of hits needed to activate passive decreased by 1

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_YS8_RICOTTA_6.text: (Upon Activating Passive) Damage Reduction +20%, Motion Speed +10% (Passive Enhanced) Number of hits needed to activate passive decreased by 2 (Passive Added) If Ricotta activates her passive during 'Flash Move,' her next block skill is changed to 'Dinosaur Throw.' ('Dinosaur Throw') Upon using any block regardless of its chain number, Ricotta throws a bone of the 'Ancient Species' to deal physical damage equal to 2000% of her attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_LIMITED_YS8_SAHAD_4.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Flash Guard': Damage Reduction +20%, Critical Chance +10%

(Upon activating 'Seine Toss') Sahad's next block skill is activated as 'Magnus Wave' that deals magical damage equal to 400% of his attack power and magical damage of 5000. Hit enemies receive 50% more damage for 5 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_1.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Consecutive Shot' triggered by the Hero's passive deals 35% more damage.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_10.text: (Upon activating passive) Increases critical chance by 25%, and duration of 'Focus Mode' by 2 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_11.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Artillery of Light' deals magical damage equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_14.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Blast Shot' is changed to 'Blast Shot 2.0.' Each 'Blast Shot 2.0' deals 5 hits of physical damage equal to 400% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_17.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon activating 'Barrel Bomb,' the Hero increases their own motion speed by 50% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot be dispelled.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_3.text: (Passive Added) The Hero's block skill is changed to 'CBR-18' once every 10 seconds. Upon using 'CBR-18,' the Hero deals 2 hits of physical damage equal to 800% of their attack power and enters 'Concentrated Bombing' mode.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_4.text: (Passive Enhanced) The chance of causing a chain explosion is increased by 15%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_4_5.text: (Passive Enhanced) Activating 'the Hunt' will only decrease Crow's movement speed by 15%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_6_1.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Consecutive Shot' triggered by the Hero's passive deals additional damage equal to 450% of her attack power per hit and knocks back the enemy.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_6_10.text: (Upon activating passive) Increases critical chance by 25%, and the duration of 'Focus Mode' by 2 seconds. (Passive altered) The lightning beams of battle drone 'Tesla' changes to 'Lightning Burst' that deals physical damage equal to 700% of attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_6_11.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Artillery of Light' deals magical damage equal to 2000% of the Hero's attack power. (Passive Added) After activating 'Artillery of Light,' the Hero uses 'Bombard of Light' to deal magical damage equal to 3000% of their attack power per hit and decrease the hit enemy's SP by 100.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_6_14.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon dealing 2 critical hits with their block skill, the Hero's auto attacks and block skills are changed to 'Blast Shot 2.0' for 8 seconds. Upon using 'Blast Shot 2.0,' the Hero dashes forward and deals 5 hits of physical damage equal to 400% of their attack power. (Passive Added) Upon dealing 2 critical hits with their block skill or 'Blast Shot 2.0,' the Hero additionally uses 'Full Blast!' to stun the enemy for 1 second and deal 17 hits of physical damage each equal to 600% of the Hero's attack power. Additionally, 'Full Blast!' increases the Hero's critical damage by 80% for 4 seconds. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_6_15.text: (Passive Enhanced) Dox's 'culprit' mark deals additional damage equal to 400% of Dox's attack power.  (Passive Added) Upon pressing 2 of his blocks, Dox randomly summons a [beagle/welsh corgi/samoyed], which respectively [knocks back and marks as 'culprit' / deals additional damage equal to 2800% of Dox's attack power / decreases armor by 200% of Dox's armor for 5 seconds] to all enemies before him. (Cooltime: 0.2 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_6_16.text: (Upon Activating Passive) Upon activating their passive, the Hero increases their armor penetration by 2500 for all attacks for 9 seconds. 'Drill Gun'' is enhanced to decrease enemy heals by 40%.  (Passive Altered) 'Support Equipment Protocol' is enhanced to 'Giga Rocket Break' to deal 15 hits of physical damage each equal to 330% of the Hero's attack power. All effects of the Hero's block skill are applied to 'Giga Rocket Break' but are enhanced to deal neutral damage equal to 600% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HU_6_17.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon activating 'Barrel Bomb,' the Hero increases their motion speed by 50% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot be dispelled. (Passive Added) Immediately after using 'Barrel Bomb,' the Hero activates 'Valencian Bomber' at the rearmost enemy. Valencian Bomber: The Hero deals 4 hits of physical damage equal to 700% of their attack power and decreases hit enemies' healing by 100% for 3 seconds. TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_15.text: (Passive Added) When Lupeow's evasion is over 80, her critical chance is increased by 40%. (Passive Added) Every time an ally succeeds in evading an attack after Lupeow uses 'Trick Hat,' Lupeow uses 'Card Storm' to deal magical damage equal to 1000% of her attack power every 0.2 seconds for a maximum of 3 times.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_16.text: (Upon Activating Passive) Creates a barrier that absorbs up to 3000 damage. (Passive added) Upon activating her passive, Vesper summons a 'Water Spirit.' The Water Spirit shoots 4 water drops, each dealing magical damage equal to 300~350% of attack power.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_2.text: Upon using another ally's block after the Hero's 3-chain, the Hero summons 4 'Giant Illusion-Capturing Bujeoks' that each deal neutral damage equal to 1300% of the Hero's attack power and increases the entire team's accuracy by 44 for 4 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_3.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating 'Ultra-Magic Beam," every auto attack and block skill the Hero uses for 5 seconds afterwards will deal magical damage equal to 500% of their attack power and shoot an extra beam that dispels enemy buffs.  (Passive Enhanced) Upon activating 'Ultimate Magic Beam,' the Hero's attack speed is increased by 50% and resistance penetration by 100% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_6.text: (Passive Added) Upon receiving a heal or using their block, the Hero enhances their next block to 'Deadly Kiss' that deals magical damage equal to 1500% of the Hero's attack power per hit and heals the entire team by 10% of their maximum HP.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_7.text: (Passive Altered) The Hero summons 'Heart King' that deals magical damage equal to 800% of the Hero's attack power per hit. 'Heart King' decreases the hit enemy's attack power by 40% for 6 seconds and knocks them back.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_8.text: (Passive activated) Summons the Griffon that casts additional debuffs to enemies of decreasing accuracy by 15, critical chance by 10% and resistance by 15%, which doubles the debuffs.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_6_9.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Enhanced Illusion' decreases hit enemies' resistance by 50% for 5 seconds. Additionally, the Hero summons 'Jangseungs' instead of clones to deal magical damage equal to [600/900/1500]% of the Hero's attack power per hit, according to the chain number used, and knock hit enemies into the air.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_LIMITED_GG_4_2.text: (Passive Enhanced) The attack power of Jack-O's Servants is increased by 40%. Jack-O's explosion damage is increased by 40%.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_WI_LIMITED_GG_6_2.text: (Passive Enhanced) The attack power of Jack-O's Servants is increased by 50%. Jack-O's explosion damage is increased by 50%. Upon using a block after summoning 3 Servants, Jack-O summons all Servants at once and uses "I Want Out" to deal magical damage equal to 3000% of her attack power.

TEXT_FOOLSDAY_ANCIENREGIME_SKILL_DESC.text: Ancient Regime attacks to defend his beloved city, according to the color used. Red: Ancient Regime tackles Heroes, according to the chain number used. Blue: Ancient Regime summons powerful thorns, according to the chain number used. Yellow: Upon using a 3-chain, Ancient Regime heals himself.

TEXT_FOOLSDAY_ANUBISIS_SKILL_DESC.text: Anubisis gives off a certain energy to Heroes, according to the color used. Red: Anubisis runs towards Heroes with open paws, according to the chain number used. Blue: Anubisis expresses even more affection towards Heroes, according to the chain number used. Yellow: Anubisis affectionately licks Heroes, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_FOOLSDAY_MATAHARI_SKILL_DESC.text: Matahari shows off her moves to Heroes, according to the color used. Red: Matahari summons and shows off her adorable pets, according to the chain number used. Blue: Matahari uses her whip as a ribbon to show off impressive rhythmic gymnastics moves, according to the chain number used. Yellow: Upon using a 3-chain, Matahari dances to show off the Soleil Dance.

TEXT_FOOLSDAY_OMEGA_SKILL_DESC.text: Omega blocks Heroes from raiding the Temple, according to the color used. Red: Omega attacks Heroes with an elegant kick, according to the chain number used. Blue: Omega shoots a heartfelt beam from his chest, according to the chain number used. Yellow: Upon using a 3-chain, Omega heals himself and and grants himself a buff.

TEXT_FOOLSDAY_RESIDULLION_SKILL_DESC.text: The Abandoned Lion warmly greets Heroes, according to the color used. Don't move, and you'll be safe! Red: The Lion dashes forth to warmly greet Heroes, according to the chain number used. Blue: The Lion leaps up to give Heroes a hearty embrace.  Yellow: Upon using a 3-chain, the Lion courteously performs a ritual of the Order to express his deepest respect and admiration.

TEXT_FOOLSDAY_WINDWALKER_SKILL_DESC.text: Windstrider shoots a powerful arrow to protect his tribe, according to the color used. Red: Windstrider shoots an arrow imbued with the power of wind to knock back the enemy, according to the chain number used. Blue: Windstrider shoots an arrow imbued with the power of wind to knock back the enemy, according to the chain number used. Windstrider then evades attacks from Greedy Heroes. Yellow: Windstrider shoots a powerful flurry of arrows according to the chain number used.

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_AR_REPEAT10_DESC.text: 3-6 Star Archer Contracts Contract Hero Guaranteed on 10th Pull

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_GRADE_4_CLASS_DESC2.text: Immediately recruit a ★4 Contract Hero of the chosen class.

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_GRADE_4_GACHA_ONLY_DESC.text: 100% Chance of Recruiting a Contract Only Hero

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_HU_REPEAT10_DESC.text: 3-6 Star Hunter Contracts Contract Hero Guaranteed on 10th Pull

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_NEWBIE_REPEAT10_DESC.text: 48-Hour Limited Offer! 3~6-Star Heroes  1 Contract Hero Guaranteed

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_PA_REPEAT10_DESC.text: 3-6 Star Paladin Contracts Contract Hero Guaranteed on 10th Pull

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_PICKUP10_DESC.text: ★3~6 Heroes Higher chance to contract selected Heroes ★4 Hero Guaranteed

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_PICKUP1_DESC.text: ★3~6 Heroes Higher chance to contract selected Heroes

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_PICKUP_DESC.text: A magical Contract with a higher chance of recruiting the Hero of your choice.

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_PR_REPEAT10_DESC.text: 3-6 Star Priest Contracts Contract Hero Guaranteed on 10th Pull

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_WA_REPEAT10_DESC.text: 3-6 Star Warrior Contracts Contract Hero Guaranteed on 10th Pull

TEXT_GACHA_CHA_WI_REPEAT10_DESC.text: 3-6 Star Wizard Contracts Contract Hero Guaranteed on 10th Pull

TEXT_GACHA_CHOICE_CHA_HASLA_LIMIT_4_DESC.text: You can recruit a Secret Hero of Hasla of your choice.

TEXT_GACHA_CHOICE_HERO_SKILL_DESC.text: Recruit a Hero who can unlock a Special Skill at the Skill Lab! Skill Unlock Heroes: Joan of Arc, Kaori, Vivian, Abel, Alexander, Achilles, Vane, Robin Hood, Gon, Giparang, Spyro, D'Artagnan, Viper, Dorothy, Sasquatch, Korin, Lilith, Mew, Nightingale, Himiko, Arona, Tia

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_1_11.text: It hurts...! Please, someone... End this pain...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_1_3.text: Blegh. Tree bark isn't tasty at all.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_2_11.text: I will never forget you - the first Saintess of Hasla.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_2_3.text: Once I'm accepted into the king's guard, I won't have to go without dinner ever again!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_3_11.text: There's no returning to my former life. The devils need... a king to lead them.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_3_3.text: We Elves have all the time in the world! I'll get in someday!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_1.text: Foxy, where are you?! Gon is here!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_10.text: You there! Human! I will bestow you with the honor to personally greet the noble captain of the Golden Archers!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_11.text: We refuse to be victims any longer. Rise, Devils!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_12.text: It is a noble's duty to fight for his country. I will bring honor for our family, Father.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_13.text: Here comes Atalante, master hunter! I'll make sure that you have meat on your table every night!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_15.text: I don't care if Mom doesn't approve! I'll become the best dancer in Chen!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_16.text: Mom, Dad... Wherever you are, please be safe.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_18.text: Why does everybody want to fight when there's so much more to do? How should I spend my day today~?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_19.text: Master... I vow to fight for your honor.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_2.text: Subscribe to Hanzo's Delivery Service for the quickest deliveries right to your door!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_20.text: My two eyes may have lost their light, but I will continue walking the way of the warrior.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_21.text: I should get paid for keeping those idiots from dying.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_22.text: Ugh... I shouldn't be wasting my time at a country church like this...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_23.text: Oh, Elizabeth. Why aren't you eating? Bamboo shoots are your favorite!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_24.text: This power of mine is convenient, to say the least. But others don't appreciate my... changed appearance.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_25.text: Trista is pretty much conservative when it comes to class issues, but I'll show you some of us are pretty cool!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_26.text: Who am I? I seem to have... lost all my memories.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_28.text: Mamba... that idiot. When he comes back, I'll make him sorry that he ever left!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_29.text: (True strength comes from survival, not brute force. What matters is staying alive.)

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_30.text: I wonder what my patron is like... I'm certain he or she is a wonderful person. When I grow up, I'll make sure to pay them back.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_31.text: Don't you know who I am? I'm the son of Ares, THE Senator of the Olympian Council! Get out of my way, commoner girl!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_32.text: I wonder if the other guys managed to reach safety. Fireaxe... Where did you go?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_33.text: ... No matter how hard I try, I don't seem to be getting any better. I need to think of some other way...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_4.text: I will judge the evil of the world with my bow!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_6.text: Can she be simply a dream? A spirit whose ghostly smile still haunts my mind?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_7.text: I'm a little nervous... But as long as my sister is with me, I'll try not to worry too much.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_8.text: Those vile wolves will be dead before they know it.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_4_9.text: Take me to my liege and lord.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_1.text: Foxy, come back! I promise not to eat you!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_10.text: Sigh... How much lack of self-respect must you have in order to unceremoniously munch on those foul things called 'wood chips'?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_11.text: Let's leave... and find our own paradise.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_12.text: Rebecca... Does your heart truly belong to me...?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_13.text: Who knew lions made such expensive pets...?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_14.text: Commander Viper... gave me good things to eat. He must be a good person-woopa...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_15.text: Do you see me now, Mom? I've been accepted as an Imperial Dancer! I'll be dancing before the Emperor himself tomorrow!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_16.text: I can never forget the archery of my people, my only inheritance.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_17.text: I only wish other people... could hear ghosts talk...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_18.text: Don't underestimate me just because I come from the countryside. I'm still a princess!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_19.text: Master is not bald! He simply suffers from male-pattern alopecia!
