TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_2.text: Receive a free gift of a shuriken set with all new subscriptions!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_20.text: There are some things you can only see by opening the eyes of the mind.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_21.text: Don't flatter yourself. I've only come all this way  so that I can get my hands on that book of magic.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_22.text: Hahaha! Did you brats just see that? I don't have such terrible aim!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_23.text: I'll do anything if I can help my son get better!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_24.text: It's better to keep to yourself. Without family, without friends... I have no one who will accept me for what I am.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_25.text: This country is rotten to the core. Dad, I guess I was wrong.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_26.text: A gentle blue light... A kindness I've felt before... I know this voice.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_28.text: I'm the new warchief? I didn't ask for this!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_29.text: (I can't trust anyone. I will be alone, forever...)

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_3.text: What most people don't know is that arrows can be EXPENSIVE. That's why you need to have good aim and waste as few as possible.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_30.text: Captain Magnus... He was much kinder than the rumors described him.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_31.text: Salamander? Hmm... This thing doesn't bite, right?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_32.text: Huh, who ever thought I would be a 'valuable asset' to the revolutionary army? I'm glad I watched all that TV.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_33.text: Rainbow Delivery, the quickest delivery witch service in Pumpkin City! ... This is how I can be of help to other people!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_4.text: ... The arrows of the Green Apple will never forgive corrupt nobles!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_5.text: Code : R-1. Test data analysis complete. Processing upgrade.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_6.text: 'Half Moon'? I have no interest in petty titles.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_7.text: Without my sister, I don't think I'm worth anything... Am I?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_9.text: The enemy of my lord... I will never forgive him.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_1.text: Foxy is friend, not food. Foxy is friend, not food...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_10.text: I have chosen to grace your Heroes with my honorable presence. You would do well to bring me some wood chips of the highest quality!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_11.text: To fight against the Order for my people, I must grow stronger.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_12.text: I wish to see her once more.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_13.text: The moonlight shall guide our way!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_14.text: I am a warrior of the Woopa tribe. But... it is also my destiny to follow Commander Viper.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_15.text: ... This isn't at all what I dreamed of when I said I wanted to become the empire's best dancer...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_16.text: Let's go, Yumir! I'll introduce you to my family this time!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_17.text: Shh... Don't be scared... They're very nice, once you get to know them...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_18.text: I want to meet someone and fall in love - a pretty, dreamy, cherry-blossom kind of romance!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_19.text: Train as you would fight on the battlefield! Welcome to the Zodiac Army.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_2.text: Hanzo's Delivery Service!! Like a fast and furious ninja, you won't know what hit you!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_20.text: I have fought countless battles to become who I am now. And I have lain my eyes on the battlefield of only the first.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_21.text: Necromancy... The lost art of the forgotten kingdom.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_22.text: Haha... A hero? I'm not what you think I am - Oh, darnit.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_23.text: The rabbit princess of Han... A formidable foe. But I will succeed in hunting her yet!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_24.text: Lady Athena told me... With great power comes great responsibility. What? What do you mean by, 'parody'?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_25.text: Justice is achieved by persisting against those who try to silence your voice. I'll be keeping order around here from now on!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_26.text: I am Haerang, the Oracle of Water. Long have I failed to carry out my duties. From now on, I shall protect all of you.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_28.text: So you've forgotten me? Huhu... Huhuhuhu.... I won't forgive you until the day I die!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_29.text: (I will become the white raven of death, delivering death throughout this kingdom of Nosgard.)

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_3.text: Demons, devils - none shall dodge my arrow!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_30.text: Oh, Captain Magnus! Have you been visiting the Silver Archers again?!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_31.text: Father... I'm sorry to let you down.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_32.text: A bounty on my head? I'll be remembering you, tank commander.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_4.text: Everything shall be as King Alexander wills it. My bow for his glory!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_6.text: What use is glory and fame to a man when he fails to protect the one love of his life?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_7.text: I'll love and trust myself like my sister loves and trusts me. I can be my own person. I know I can!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_8.text: The cold rage of the snowy mountains shall cover all in deadly frost...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_9.text: If I use his own son against him... Yes... There's nothing else to be done.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_LIMITED_4_1.text: I'm going to become the queen of fireworks!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_LIMITED_5_1.text: Chin up, Jin-Kyung! We'll each do our best to reach our goals.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_LIMITED_GG_4_1.text: Hire me? No, I'll be the one hiring you.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_LIMITED_GOGI_4_.text: No fairy can resist a good laugh. Hmm, teasing Princess Delrien could be fun.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_LIMITED_GOGI_5_.text: Your Majesty! Cough... Your knight follows your command... Pfft!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_LIMITED_GOGI_6_.text: O-oh no. What have I gotten myself into? I need to stop that delusional princess!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_1_1.text: My dream is to become a sheriff and protect the people!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_1_11.text: The man whom I once called 'Father,' and who abandoned me here... I don't want to see him ever again.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_2_1.text: One shot, one kill! You won't find a sharpshooter better than me in the wildlands.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_2_11.text: I was just hungry. I didn't mean to kill him...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_3_1.text: I was aiming to become a sheriff, but I suppose a musketeer isn't too far off the mark.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_3_11.text: Even if I die out here in the wild, I'll never give up.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_1.text: I refuse to leave behind my comrades on the battlefield, especially if they are injured!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_10.text: Thisi raid shouldn't be too dangerous, right? Well... I need the money, so I guess I can't go around asking questions.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_11.text: If it wasn't for Mel, by now I would be...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_12.text: Sigh... Don't wanna move... Don't wanna do anything... Everything is meaningless...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_13.text: Assassinate who?! This is supposed to be my very first mission!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_15.text: What's that, you say? A special potion that will turn me into a skilled sleuth?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_16.text: At this rate, I won't be able to afford my next meal,  let alone the next excavation. Perhaps I should publish something...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_17.text: There is nothing more detrimental to the world than pirates. I'll arrest every last one of them!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_18.text: So this is a gun? Looks neat. How does it work?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_19.text: I'll ask for nothing more if I can live in peace with my animal friends.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_2.text: At this rate, we'll be needing more prison cells. Guess there is such a thing as being TOO competent!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_20.text: The heathens who killed my family... Who killed them...?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_21.text: This lunchbox... It's simply divine! Even the best chefs back in the capital could learn from this!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_22.text: My first mission, at last! I'll carry it out perfectly. I've got it all planned out...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_23.text: A dragon hunt? Time for me to become a legend, like the heroes of old!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_24.text: Bounty hunting? Sounds like there's some money to be made.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_25.text: I'll become the best soldier in Heaven's Cavalry!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_26.text: The name of the target... Sasquatch. The mission itself doesn't seem particularly difficult.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_28.text: You annoy me, but... Jarvis specially asked me to behave, so I will. For his sake!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_29.text: That blasted tiger sure eats a lot. I'll have to take care of him - in a different way.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_3.text: Ksssh... I will follow you... Ksssh... Commander Viper.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_31.text: My dear sister! I'm so proud of you! I'll always cheer you on!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_32.text: To continue dreaming or make compromises, that is the question!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_33.text: One day... I will become a better chief than that Woomparoom Woopa!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_34.text: Support for the family of all enlisted soldiers... Neth ROTC? This is it!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_36.text: Hey! You wanna piece of me? We're ending things here and now! Huh? Don't run away! I'm not done yet!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_4.text: If it is for the sake of the Empire, it's a necessary evil.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_6.text: I will never forgive the demons... who murdered my family.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_7.text: For the strength to avenge my comrades... I will make a pact with the devil!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_8.text: Activating healthcare robot - code : Sentinel. Activating health che-.... ... EXTERMINATION.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_9.text: I'll become a superhero and save people, just like in comic books! ... If only I can get registered in the Superheroes of Hasla Association.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_1.text: Oh, a fan letter from the Eastern Kingdom 'Han'... What does this word mean? 'Waifu'?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_10.text: Argh! My eyes...! I-I... I can't see!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_11.text: No! It's a lie! Mel isn't dead! She can't be!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_12.text: Oda, your friendship makes life bearable.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_13.text: When in doubt, always disguise yourself as a maid!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_14.text: I can't remember anything from the past, but I don't mind as long as I'm with you, sir!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_15.text: Woof?! I've turned into a dog-human, woof!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_16.text: Farewell to cheap equipment and going without dinners! Now I can spend all my time and money on my research!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_17.text: What? Drake, a duke? I can't allow it! Once a pirate, always a dirty scum of a pirate.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_18.text: Fine, fine, you won! Geez... I'll leave you to your boring old ways!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_2.text: Hear me out. We can arrest tons of criminals at once with this strategy - which I'm calling 'Cattle Drive.'

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_20.text: I must become an inquisitor if I want to avenge the deaths of my family.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_21.text: The taste of that lunchbox still lingers on my tongue... I'll become a Musketeer if it means I can eat it every day!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_22.text: Me, a double agent working for Chen? No! I've been set up!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_23.text: An entire village demolished, and it's my fault...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_24.text: Once you're marked, you're dead meat.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_25.text: Me... In second place? This is a nightmare!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_26.text: You know that I was going to hunt down and kill you, like an animal. How can you look at me with such innocent eyes?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_28.text: You banished Jarvis...? How could you, Mom?! I'm going to blow up the mansion, Daddy. You'll see!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_29.text: Those weren't meant to be edible! Let's see who wins in the end!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_3.text: Ksshhh... The casualties at the borders... Ksssh.... are my fault.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_30.text: I might have become a monster, but I'll use these powers for justice!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_31.text: The assassin... was my own sister Matahari? It can't be...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_32.text: This isn't it! This isn't the music I hear in my soul!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_33.text: This voice...! Is it you, o mighty Quaxolotl?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_34.text: How can I be a wanted criminal, when all I did was fight for my family's sake?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_36.text: This is it, the moment of revolution... Nothing can stop me, not even weak constitution I'll show you what I'm made of, gonna keep my resolution!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_4.text: That bomb was meant to kill me. Has the Empire... abandoned me?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_6.text: I can't let my sworn enemy kill me, too. I must become stronger.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_7.text: Samiel... Your prey appears before you once more.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_8.text: Warning: critical. Unable to process... Energy levels critically high.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_9.text: Two years waiting to be registered, three training as an apprentice... I've had enough! I need action, NOW!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_1.text: As a noble Muskeeteer of the Kingdom of Trista, I must set an example for others.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_10.text: Only his death will lessen the pain in my left eye.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_11.text: The Order of the Goddess... I'll find my own freedom from now on.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_12.text: Demon Lord of the Sixth Heaven? Oda, you've got to be kidding me.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_13.text: I did it! I've been promoted to Lady Victoria's lady's maid within just five years! I finally completed my... What was my mission again?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_14.text: I love you, Commander Spyro, sir!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_15.text: Sniff, sniff... So, smells like you need a private detective, woof. How did I know, you ask? Elementary!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_16.text: This book is only the beginning. I will find out the truth behind this continent's forgotten history!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_17.text: Pirate scum, I'll be seeing you in hell.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_18.text: I need a change of scene where I can test out my newest babies!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_19.text: I'm rich! Look at all this gold - I can finally buy my animal friends better snacks!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_2.text: Ooh. This horse head is a bit heavy, but it's so... vintage. It could be 'my thing.'

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_21.text: A man can't be satisfied eating the same thing day after day. I need a taste of something new.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_22.text: If the Empire insists on making me a traitor, I'll become one.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_23.text: I will become a dragon hunter not to achieve glory, but to right my wrongs.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_24.text: I can't stop now. It's your bad luck that you got noticed by me.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_25.text: Our match isn't over yet! I'm supposed to be the best!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_26.text: To atone for the sins of my past... Sasquatch, I will protect you from now on.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_28.text: Jarvis, where are you? Hey, stop getting in my way - or I'll shoot you!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_3.text: Ksssh... Viper, you betrayed the Empire... You betrayed me. Ksssh... I will not forgive you...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_30.text: Me... The sixth Gacha Ranger? Are you sure?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_31.text: Don't touch her... I'll do anything in my sister's place if it means I can save her.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_32.text: Did you hear me? My soul and heart! My ultimate spirit of rock!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_33.text: No, I must lead my people out of the jungle...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_34.text: I'll show you how it feels to be a wanted criminal. Just you wait, Miel!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_36.text: YO, XO-CREW-TESS is on the floor! Clean out your ears 'cuz we goin' hardcore and your gal Tess gonna raise the roof for sure!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_4.text: I realize only now that the peace I fought for was but an impossible dream.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_6.text: I will slay all demons of Hasla. Only their deaths will fill this hole in my heart.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_7.text: Another nightmare. ... It is time to return to the battlefield.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_8.text: Confirming new module. Activating personality module - code : R.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_9.text: It's a dog-eat-dog - no, hero-eat-hero world! If you can't stay in the game, don't you think it's about time you retire?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_BEARS_4.text: Uwuh... Huh? Can it be that I have finally acquired the intellectual capability that has long been limited to the race of humans? I am finally awake, uwuh!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_BEARS_5.text: Better to remain dull and ignorant than enlightened for a single season of bittersweet autumn.  How to preserve my hard-won intelligence...?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_BEARS_6.text: What fools they are, the human race. You shall all sacrifice to me offerings of the freshest and juiciest salmon!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_COUPLE_.text: What a stupid expression! THIS is the first thing I see on my arrival to the mundane world? Poor me!
Oh, what adorable little fairies! They won't even make a single morsel!
I dreamt a dream of yesterday... Walking the sea of stars that fade away...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_FOURWEE.text: Monsters in the deep? They're made-up stories. I'd like to see one if it exists.
Huhuhu... This power is intoxicating. Is this how the 'Elder Sister of the Sea' feels all the time?
I-I can't move my hands or my fins. Something is... in my head... Get... out...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_GG_4_1.text: Look, I brought the marriage certificate! Huh? This is supposed to be a Hero contract?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_GOGI_4_.text: I can't understand why Daddy and the other fairies refuse to see the outside world!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_GOGI_5_.text: Go, my brave knight Almael! Fly forward and fight!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_LIMITED_GOGI_6_.text: Hrrmph! Yes, bow before your mighty Queen of Fairies as you rightfully should!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_1_11.text: The Order can't teach me anything. I want to go outside!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_1_5.text: Siegfried is the only one in this wide world to whom I can entrust my life.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_2_11.text: That will teach those morons to think before messing with the holy church ever again.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_3_11.text: Saintess Maria... If this means I can stand by your side...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_1.text: It's... freezing... The cold strangely seems to strike the top of my head.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_10.text: R-0's replacement? I'm a better model than her!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_11.text: If you turn a blind eye to injustice, what kind of justice are you fighting for?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_13.text: Athena... You were the first person in my life to treat me with kindness.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_14.text: My friends! We only have one life. So why not live it to the fullest?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_18.text: Those blasted poachers. I'll make them sorry that they ever ventured into these woods!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_19.text: The full moon scares me... Daddy, what do I do?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_2.text: The 'mythical seas' that lie to the east! One day, I will expand my kingdom to its borders and see it with my very own eyes!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_20.text: Ugh! I'm busy enough as it is! Take your complaining elsewhere!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_21.text: Hmm... I followed my teacher's advice, but I don't think it was necessary for me to become a knight.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_22.text: Father! I don't want to become a minister! I hate reading!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_23.text: Oho. All that treasure will go wasted if it remains buried in the Sanctuary.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_24.text: Number one idol Yuna enters the stage! (You there! Production crew! Hurry up and move it!)

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_25.text: Lady Victoria... Allow me to fight by your side!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_26.text: Is that all you can do, Thor? Did I yield the throne... for this?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_28.text: Ever since the day I saw that Colosseum tournament on TV, I've wanted to become a gladiator!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_29.text: Hello there! Call me Shuwen. So you’re the Hero Captain who hired me, eh? That calls for introductions, especially if we’re to fight side-by-side for a long time! I personally believe that it’s important to know what kind of person your comrade is if you want to have a good workplace relationship. You agree with me, don’t you? I told you my name, now what else… At four stars I am fifteen years old. Oh, did I just say ‘four stars’? Please forget I ever said anything of the sort! Must have been out of my mind just now. I was specifically asked not to make any ‘meta-statements’ but I forgot for a moment back there. You know, breaking the fourth wall kind of thing? Anyway… Uh, and… My hobby is running, my favorite food is grilled chicken, and I don’t particularly dislike anything. I’m a simple kind of man, doesn’t take a lot to satisfy me. Favorite color blue, haven’t taken the MBTI test, and my motto is to be clear and concise and say only what needs to be said! There are some people who tell me I talk too much, but that can’t be true. I’m careful to say only what I need to. Never gossiped in my entire life. Sincerity is the most important thing to a man if he wishes to make a place for himself in the world and find friends who will last a lifetime. Sincere is how I treat my challengers when they come searching for a fight, too. Oh, I should have told you earlier that my specialty is martial arts. I don’t want to be vain but I’ve been known for my strength ever since I was a teeny lad in a countryside village, and I was in charge of dealing with the invading monsters which I did without much trouble. That led to me meeting ol’ Drunken Fist and training under him – Drunken Fist was the local drunkard but he was also a great fighter… And well as you’ve already signed my contract, I’ll see you soon in my ‘story menu’! Ah, was this another one of those ‘meta-statements’?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_3.text: Hahaha! No weapon in the world can leave a scratch on me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_30.text: Young man, the only weapon befitting a man is his own two fists.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_31.text: A new religion worshipping 'El Thalnos'? That is heresy.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_32.text: No, no, no... This tail... These horns... I'm turning into one of those dirty demons!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_33.text: Nothing puts a bad taste in one's mouth like a tall-tale kid who lives off his daddy's name!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_35.text: Where am I... Who am I...? I cannot remember anything save my own name...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_36.text: If you can feel the beat, you're welcome to join me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_4.text: I may be a pirate, but I am a pirate who serves the kingdom of Valencia! I don't attack vessels that belong to our kingdom!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_5.text: You shall not lay a finger on Siegfried.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_6.text: Hasla... What a strange dimension. How can the weak dominate the strong?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_7.text: This demonic power... could be the key.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_8.text: Good, the complete Sentinel should be able to treat all formerly incurable diseases! That should win me an award or two, right? Heehee.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_9.text: What greater tragedy is there than the fate of a small kingdom endlessly ravaged by war?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_1.text: This helm... Sob... Thank you, my dear people of Nosgard.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_10.text: That arrogant android... I received two updates, too! I'll show her how good I've become!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_11.text: I became a knight for Saintess Maria!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_12.text: You're the first boy who hit me with an arrow! That means something special, right?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_13.text: Lady Athena, I will protect you until the end of my days.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_14.text: The laws of war are dictated not only by victory, but by our code of honor.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_18.text: A summon from the Royal Guards? Now that's an honor! I'll have to hurry to the capital!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_19.text: That monster in the dark... She feels familiar, for some reason.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_2.text: Now that I've entrusted my kingdom to reliable vassals, it's time for me to fulfill an old dream of mine.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_20.text: Huh? A monster broke in and stole all the food? That's it! I'm giving it a taste of my cleaver!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_21.text: Thanks to that child of an emperor, I've reached the eastern end of the world. I want to retire now but... I'm not sure he'll let me.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_22.text: I'll single-handedly win a battle... And then maybe Father will finally approve of me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_23.text: There's no treasure here, only weird ice ghosts. ... Huh?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_24.text: Surrender, or else! What do I mean by 'else,' you ask? Well... Do you want to find out?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_25.text: Lady Victoria's gaze was the only reason I could bear my flag on the battlefield without fear.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_26.text: Nosgard must stand alone. Only then can we achieve true greatness.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_28.text: Sigh... I succeeded in becoming a gladiator, but I sometimes wonder whether it's my true calling.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_29.text: Hello there! Call me Shuwen. So you’re the Hero Captain who hired me, eh? That calls for introductions, especially if we’re to fight side-by-side for a long time! I personally believe that it’s important to know what kind of person your comrade is if you want to have a good workplace relationship. You agree with me, don’t you? I told you my name, now what else… At five stars I am thirty years old. Oh, did I just say ‘five stars’? Please forget I ever said anything of the sort! Must have been out of my mind just now. I was specifically asked not to make any ‘meta-statements’ but I forgot for a moment back there. You know, breaking the fourth wall kind of thing? Anyway… Uh, and… My hobby is running, my favorite food is grilled chicken, and I don’t particularly dislike anything. I’m a simple kind of man, doesn’t take a lot to satisfy me. Favorite color blue, haven’t taken the MBTI test, and my motto is to be clear and concise and say only what needs to be said! There are some people who tell me I talk too much, but that can’t be true. I’m careful to say only what I need to. Never gossiped in my entire life. Sincerity is the most important thing to a man if he wishes to make a place for himself in the world and find friends who will last a lifetime. Sincere is how I treat my challengers when they come searching for a fight, too. Oh, I should have told you earlier that my specialty is martial arts. I don’t want to be vain but I’ve been known for my strength ever since I was a teeny lad in a countryside village, and I was in charge of dealing with the invading monsters which I did without much trouble. That led to me meeting ol’ Drunken Fist and training under him – Drunken Fist was the local drunkard but he was also a great fighter… And well as you’ve already signed my contract, I’ll see you soon in my ‘story menu’! Ah, was this another one of those ‘meta-statements’?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_3.text: Victory is mine! Soldiers, follow my lead!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_30.text: Hmm. Let's see how far you've come from that sniveling little boy, Achilles.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_31.text: T-they may have strayed from the light, but they're still the sisters I've prayed with for years.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_32.text: It's a lie! I haven't lost my divine powers! I... I can't be a demon!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_33.text: Gotta say, Boss, you're a man who knows his deal. I can't find a reason to refuse your offer of becoming sworn brothers.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_35.text: That emblem... That face... He bears a strong resemblance to my friend and trusty vassal. They even smell similar.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_36.text: Welcome to the Forest of Spirits, where one can dance and sing with joy for all eternity!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_4.text: Hmm... A duchy title? For someone who spends all his time on his ship, it seems quite a useless offer.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_6.text: Your gilded pride doesn't interest me. I only seek a good fight with the strong!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_7.text: My kingdom of Trista. Your rightful prince has returned!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_8.text: You stupid, smelly old man! What did you turn MY Sentinel into? I won't forgive you!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_5_9.text: Your Majesty, I shall repay your kindness with victory on the battlefield.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_1.text: To protect my proud and noble people, I will gladly bear this shining stigma.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_10.text: R-0...! The more I think about you, the harder it becomes to control... my... anger!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_11.text: The path of light is the only way - Wait! Saintess Maria! Where are you wandering off to?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_12.text: Mister Crow, please take me to my boyfriend!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_13.text: The seal of Manacar has been broken. If we don't stop it in time, Roman will fall in grave danger...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_14.text: The Saintess of the Battlefield? An excessive epithet. Please call me Athena.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_15.text: It seems I woke up during chaotic times. I sleep no more. It is time to raise my spear and return to the battlefield.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_18.text: Another poacher? Didn't they learn their lesson? Wolfgang shall teach them again and again that they're not welcome here!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_19.text: These shackles helped me to overcome my fear. Is it too late to thank that alchemist...?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_2.text: The one who rules over the mythical seas of the East refuses to let me look upon its waters. Then I shall return to my life as the emperor of this land.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_20.text: Whether you're a human or a monster, you'll have to think twice if you don't want to end up deep fried!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_21.text: Welcome to the Iron Hand Workshop. I'll make you a companion that will fight with you for the rest of your lives.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_22.text: Father! Did you see me? Did you see what I did?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_23.text: Centuries have already passed...? B-but... What about my family? My friends?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_24.text: I should have thrown away my act a LONG time ago. It feels good to say what's on my mind! Hey, you! Get lost before I beat you up, loser!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_25.text: Lady Victoria, I will be guarding the Cobalt Knights until your return.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_26.text: Thor... Renounce the throne, you coward. If you cannot do it, I, Odin of Nosgard, shall restore glory to our snow-laden kingdom.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_28.text: Never mind, winning is the best! As expected of Achilles. He knows something!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_29.text: Hello there! Call me Shuwen. So you’re the Hero Captain who hired me, eh? That calls for introductions, especially if we’re to fight side-by-side for a long time! I personally believe that it’s important to know what kind of person your comrade is if you want to have a good workplace relationship. You agree with me, don’t you? I told you my name, now what else… At six stars I am sixty years old. Oh, did I just say ‘six stars’? Please forget I ever said anything of the sort! Must have been out of my mind just now. I was specifically asked not to make any ‘meta-statements’ but I forgot for a moment back there. You know, breaking the fourth wall kind of thing? Anyway… Uh, and… My hobby is running, my favorite food is grilled chicken, and I don’t particularly dislike anything. I’m a simple kind of man, doesn’t take a lot to satisfy me. Favorite color blue, haven’t taken the MBTI test, and my motto is to be clear and concise and say only what needs to be said! There are some people who tell me I talk too much, but that can’t be true. I’m careful to say only what I need to. Never gossiped in my entire life. Sincerity is the most important thing to a man if he wishes to make a place for himself in the world and find friends who will last a lifetime. Sincere is how I treat my challengers when they come searching for a fight, too. Oh, I should have told you earlier that my specialty is martial arts. I don’t want to be vain but I’ve been known for my strength ever since I was a teeny lad in a countryside village, and I was in charge of dealing with the invading monsters which I did without much trouble. That led to me meeting ol’ Drunken Fist and training under him – Drunken Fist was the local drunkard but he was also a great fighter… And well as you’ve already signed my contract, I’ll see you soon in my ‘story menu’! Ah, was this another one of those ‘meta-statements’?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_3.text: So I'm not invincible after all. Huh. I've had a few close calls that could have ended VERY badly...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_30.text: Ugh... My back is acting up again...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_31.text: The current Order has been corrupted. The true path of light lies elsewhere.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_32.text: How many people have I sacrificed due to my blindness...? I must repent - until the day I die...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_33.text: I've been doing this for far too long. Maybe it's time to reconsider that retirement plan.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_35.text: Ah... Elder Edda. I will finally rebuild the city I have so long been dreaming of.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_4.text: Hrrmph. I've had my share of life on land. I won't set another foot on firm ground until the day death takes me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_6.text: Hasla is a good place. Many come begging to be beaten up!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_7.text: Abel... So you still dwell among the living.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_8.text: I'm receiving Sentinel's signals from 'this timeline'...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_9.text: The Five Tiger Generals will be back, someday. Until then, I shall postpone our match.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_LIMITED_4_1.text: Hmm, I may be better with my spear than I thought.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_LIMITED_5_1.text: Day after day... I will strive to become a general worthy of being recorded in history.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_LIMITED_6_1.text: Hong-Ran... Finally, I found a companion with similar aspirations.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_LIMITED_APFOOL_.text: What world have I arrived at this time? I only hope they won't bother an old lady like me too much.
Hmm. This reminds me of when I defeated that evil what's-his-name in the other dimension.
I can sense that 'goddess' around here somewhere... Did she not die?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_LIMITED_GG_4_2.text: Okay, I'm still confused about a few things, but... I won't hold back!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_LIMITED_LASTSOU.text: Wah... What's 'revenge'? Gimme fertilizer! Me hungry!
Kekeke... Tremble in fear, witches of Pumpkin City!
The wrath of the pumpkin patch... gives me endless power...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_UNIQUE_5_UMRAT.text: Name... Knowledge... All things that I lost... I desire more. I desire them again...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_UNIQUE_6_UMRAT.text: The strength of Habaek... It is finally mine.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_1_11.text: Why won't adults believe me when I tell them about the black ghost?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_1_2.text: Isn't it only natural to help your neighbors? Don't thank me; I only did what I should!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_2_11.text: I can't let anyone know about my true powers. I... I can't trust anyone.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_2_2.text: If you ever need help, come visit me at my chapel!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_3_11.text: Can my powers... save those in need?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_3_2.text: I can reach out to more people this way!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_11.text: Demona... and my 'evil powers.' The Order of the Goddess... Is it only what it claims to be?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_13.text: If looks could kill, I'd been executed a long time ago.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_14.text: Lionel... You're not a kid anymore. Do I really have to scold you for running away from home?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_16.text: ... I'm not a child anymore, Sien. I can take care of myself.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_17.text: Woah, there are so many interesting things on 'land'! I wish I could go and take a look.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_18.text: I'll be the knight to bring some life to this dull city of Elandia!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_19.text: I wonder what the Flower Fields of the Heavens will be like?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_2.text: I don't know much about being a Saintess, but I'll do my best!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_20.text: ... I'm only a small squirrel shikigami. The human world is too complicated for me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_21.text: Hasla will soon fall in danger... We have to... Zzz...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_22.text: I ONLY came on this student exchange program because Neth produces the highest quality computers. So would you please leave me alone?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_23.text: Heim... I'm not sure it's a good idea to be treasure hunting in the Sanctuary...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_24.text: Being TOO lucky takes out the fun out of most things. Is there nothing that will give me some challenge?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_25.text: The judging eyes of other people frighten me much more than the attacks of monsters.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_26.text: An old book... Why is it so alluring?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_27.text: My artistic soul that I once gave up is burning brightly again!!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_29.text: Cano, you shouldn't be so full of yourself just because you can sing a little.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_3.text: This new life that has been given to me by Saintess Maria... I will dedicate it to others.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_30.text: If only I could further develop the potency of the mandragora plant...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_31.text: Sob... Everyone is so mean. I'm not being weak on purpose!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_32.text: 'The Complete Tome of Alchemy'? The author sure seems proud of themselves. I like it!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_33.text: I'm way too cool for school. I'm already the perfect hero!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_35.text: I'm Hera, the new Senator of Olympian Council! I'll do my best to fulfill my duties!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_4.text: I can't let anyone know my true identity before I become a real human.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_5.text: Oh, I'm not a suspicious person at all! Just your average, run-of-the-mill nurse here.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_7.text: The prophecy of the gods? I refuse. I want to become a general!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_8.text: Those idiots don't understand the greatness of my work! But that other man... He will see the genius in me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_9.text: Grandpa's noodle recipe is too delicious for me to let it disappear like this!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_1.text: Nya?! Can it be true? I've turned into a cat-human, nya!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_10.text: Not dancing and keeping still while closing your eyes and saying 'ohm' is interesting, too!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_11.text: The Order is the one walking the path of evil. I must leave to find my own justice.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_12.text: To banish all demons from this continent of Hasla...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_13.text: Athena... You're the first person in my life to resist my charming good looks!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_14.text: Sigh... There's no stopping you, Lionel. I'll help you. Let's go together.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_15.text: I can no longer watch the fall of my own savior.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_16.text: ... I can't let the sole meaning of my life fade into the darkness like that.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_17.text: Help! I'm thirsty... hungry... Please, someone give me something to eat... ... Blegh...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_18.text: Hnn... It's much more fun watching other people train than actually training...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_19.text: I can't let a flower wilt before my eyes simply because I'm searching for a field of my dreams.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_2.text: If you ever need help to fight back evil, you can rely on me anytime.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_20.text: I wonder if there are rules about shikigami summoning other shikigami?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_21.text: If nobody agrees to believe me, I'll just take another nap...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_22.text: Hmm. How strange, this classified file restricts all form of access. Okay, I gotta get in. Can't resist a challenge!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_23.text: I knew I had a bad feeling about this!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_24.text: I thought so: all bark and no bite. Even the famous 'Spade Queen' should be no different!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_25.text: Echidna. You shouldn't listen to suspicious strangers.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_26.text: I can feel the gaze of the Abyss. Please, o wise book, impart to me knowledge of the darkness...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_27.text: The whole city is my canvas!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_29.text: Tsk. I didn't want to make my debut as a third-rate popstar's backing vocalist... but I have no choice.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_3.text: Even if the horrors of war blind us to the truth... We must seek out the light.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_30.text: I only wanted for everyone to get a chance to enjoy Royal Beans together.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_31.text: Sansami, huh. We're similar, you and me. I won't eat you. Go wherever you want.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_32.text: Here you go: Lazie's All-Purpose Potion! Success or Great Success guaranteed! No such thing as failure!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_33.text: So this... This is the true power of the ring!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_35.text: I wish for a world where no one gets hurt or sick.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_4.text: Would he be happy as well, if I succeed in becoming a human?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_5.text: You should dedicate yourself to your mission  - agent work or otherwise. I'm going to become a top nurse, too!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_7.text: The heir of Kurenai... I have no interest in such a vain and vague title.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_8.text: Would the pupil have achieved anything if not for their teacher's guidance? That's why I'll be borrowing Sentinel for some time, Stanya!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_9.text: Mr. Baek's cooking competition? Winner receives a food truck fully equipped with Neth appliances? This is it!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_10.text: My happiness lies in adventure, song, and dance - not in mediating at a temple!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_11.text: The Black Order is open to all Devils and any who suffer under the power of the darkness.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_12.text: A century has passed, yet evil still remains in these lands.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_13.text: All beautiful things have thorns. And it seems like yours have pricked me.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_14.text: Edenberg. That's where your destiny awaits, Lionel.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_15.text: Our roads may have diverged, but I know we once dreamt of the same future.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_16.text: Sien... Where did you disappear to?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_17.text: I want to show that 'red-haired human' my gratitude!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_18.text: Welcome to Elandia, the Holy Capital of Hasla! I'll give you a tour around the city!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_19.text: Close your eyes and breathe in. Can you smell the scent of this white flower without a name?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_2.text: The Goddess has decreed for me to cleanse this land of all darkness.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_20.text: Yuki... That shikigami was you all along?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_21.text: The nun I met in my dreams... She was pretty.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_22.text: Huh? A list of club members? Booooring. ...Or... I could tweak this a little to stir things up.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_25.text: Why are you trying to return to a cruel and dangerous world?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_26.text: As the darkest Abyss wills it, I shall depart for pilgrimage.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_27.text: This is tyranny! Give me back my friends!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_29.text: Erm, Cano? About that last time we performed... I-I-I'm... sor-

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_30.text: A gigantic plant? Sounds fascinating! I'm on my way!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_31.text: Sob... Humans burnt down my mountain. Is there no other mountain saint to help me?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_32.text: Stupid nobles! My potions are perfect, but they can't heal stupidity!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_33.text: As if I'd let a mere ring control my fans! I'm in charge here, and I mean to keep it that way!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_35.text: Zeus, thanks for helping me out every time!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_5.text: Maybe my calling in life was to become a nurse, not a spy...?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_6.text: One can only cultivate oneself through fine music and literature. Would you like me to recommend a book for you?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_7.text: Becoming a priestess is no reason to stop one's training.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_8.text: Muhahaha! It's... ALIVE! I only have to gather and register more test data! AND I discovered a dimensional portal in the process. I knew I was a genius!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_9.text: Grandpa! I won! I won the competition with your recipe!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_APFOOL_.text: Oi, is this one of those 'isekai reincarnations' that you always hear about? Noice!
Yeah! I'll take over this otherworld with my ultimate cheats! This is how it should go!
Something doesn't feel right. Did I do something wrong? And this world kinda sucks. Like it's half-made.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTO_4_.text: Christmas is a lie created by an ethically repulsive company!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTO_5_.text: Ugh... I was so close! I guess this is why a good reputation is important...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTO_6_.text: You're on my 'naughty' list! Have a lump of coal!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTUMN_.text: Huh, I picked up a human girl! What should I do with her?
I'm 'Kaede the Ninja'!  Don't worry! I'll keep you safe!
I-I need to confess something. I'm actually a raccoon in disguise! I'm sorry for lying to you all this time!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_EAST_4_.text: Frederick! I'll save you, I promise!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_EAST_5_.text: It hurts... But I can't give up, not now.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_EAST_6_.text: Chamber of Blessing? Hypocrites. I'll show them the true darkness within their own hearts.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_GG_4_1.text: Come on, tell me that you want me.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMTED_SEVENTH_.text: One day, I'll become a great gladiator like Dad!
I'll be right there! One Chocolat's Chocolate Donut Set coming right up!
A new recipe, a new me! Let's continue doing our best, Captain!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_UNIQUE_4_ELLIE.text: You're my favorite person in the whole world, Captain! That's why... you're my 'darling'!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_UNIQUE_5_ELLIE.text: Please tell Prestina that I'm sorry. Thank you for everything, darling!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_UNIQUE_6_ELLIE.text: A dream of a giant bird... Darling, I knew we would meet again.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_1_1.text: Leave everything to me, THE great Leon! ... Well, everything except carrying fragile objects.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_1_11.text: More years of service? By the Goddess, no.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_2_1.text: An ogre in the forest? Won't be a match for me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_2_11.text: Time is slow to pass in the army. And where could be the ladylove of my dreams?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_3_1.text: You've heard the songs singing my praise, right? I'm famous, if you haven't noticed!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_3_11.text: D'Artagnan... I have finally found the lady of my destiny, to whom I may sacrifice my life to be used as she sees fit!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_1.text: Let's go back to basics, Leon. Being a Hero should be about helping people, not fame and riches.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_10.text: If I don't want to lose my body to evil spirits, I'll need to find a cure.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_11.text: An eye for the love of my lady? Not a bad deal at all, I must say.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_12.text: The seas of this kingdom lie under my watch.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_13.text: Talent before bloodline. The people shall realize before long.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_14.text: The sins of my ancestors of the House of Ferdinand is my burden to bear, my repentance.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_15.text: I am so sleepy... Yet I can't sleep...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_16.text: Faust! It's such a nice day outside - come on, let's go on a picnic! Your research can wait!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_17.text: Muhahahaha! You weaklings! I will kill every last one of you! ... That sounds too cruel, doesn't it? Acting the part of villain is difficult.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_18.text: Ghosts do not care for the woes of the living.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_19.text: Cowards. What's so scary about humans?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_2.text: I must become a knight, for I must restore honor to my family's name.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_20.text: Ares... Ares...! May you rot in hell!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_21.text: Oh, Set! Stop bothering Osiris so much!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_22.text: 'Not meant to lead'? 'Don't have the leadership'? We'll see about that!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_23.text: Ah, a foe worthy of the blade of Einherjar. You shall raise my glory.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_24.text: Oh, Professor. For a genius like me, this seal is child's play.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_25.text: Sorry, Sfera! But it's so boring here, without any friends!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_26.text: Simcheong~! Fetch me a glass of water! I may die of thirst if I wait any longer!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_27.text: Maybe Thjalfi will finally acknowledge my presence when I bring back treasure from this expedition.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_29.text: Ooh, the holy sword of Elanuma! I wish I was the knight destined for it.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_3.text: Serves them right for calling me 'commoner scum'!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_30.text: Is it not obvious I'm superior to everyone else? I deserve to be crowned the next emperor.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_31.text: It is my duty to guard the throne until the return of the rightful king.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_32.text: Sigh... What has gotten into me? This anger that overcomes me... It doesn't seem normal.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_33.text: Erm, everyone? Please stop fussing over me so much!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_34.text: I-it's rude to ask about a lady's past! Everyone is bound to have some secrets they'd rather not tell!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_35.text: Wolfgang, was it? What is the secret to your might and valor?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_36.text: I'll become strong. Strong enough not to lose anyone ever again.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_4.text: Can't believe Dad would actually kick me out. I mean, it's not like I have to get a job! Sheesh.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_6.text: I wonder if Hikari's doing alright.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_8.text: Alisha... Do you know how I feel for you?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_4_9.text: My father, who abandoned my mother... I shall abandon my father and his ways.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_1.text: I won't avoid the hardships that come my way. I'll face my destiny as a Hero!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_10.text: No... With my own hands... No...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_11.text: You underestimate the years behind my blade.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_12.text: You are too kind to call me thus.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_13.text: Today's victory belongs to us all, for we fought as one. Isn't that right, Caeneus?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_14.text: Aria... Sometimes, I can't see the path I must take.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_15.text: I must find the witch who cursed me with this eternal insomnia.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_17.text: Hmm... You get a lot of attention even as a henchman. Hey! Erm, stupid humans! Look at me! Pretty please?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_18.text: That Death Messenger is proving to be quite troublesome these days.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_19.text: A human pupil, huh? She won't last a week, not under my watch.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_2.text: Until when must I hide my true self under a heavy coat of armor?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_20.text: The ecstasy of battle and bloodshed... No, must... resist...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_21.text: Set is an idiot. Who else would take care of Osiris if not for me?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_22.text: Sigh... I never knew living on your own could be so expensive. I could hunt down wanted criminals for the money...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_23.text: Nothing is more important than the traditions of the Einherjar.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_24.text: The wisdom this blade whispers to me...! It is a whole world unveiled before your eyes!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_25.text: Woah, Elf Mask! Take me with you!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_26.text: H-hmm? Sermon of the Enlightened Otter? I don't need any se- Ack! Get your hands off me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_27.text: No! I need to return to my brother!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_28.text: Everything is gone. Even my own memories...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_29.text: The Order of Lion has changed. Am I still fighting for true justice?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_3.text: It's not enough being strong... I must learn ways of the court if I want to help our Priestess.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_30.text: Victoria... That idiot of a girl...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_31.text: The throne is not mine to claim. The true king... shall return someday.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_32.text: Hahaha! The glory of the battlefield all belongs to me, the great Ares!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_34.text: Sob... I'm not even making minimum wage.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_35.text: Hahaha! I will crack open your skulls like tiny bird eggs!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_36.text: I'll prove myself with these bare fists!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_4.text: I go through that hell of training, only to come home to... 'Sorry, kiddo, gone on vacation'? Are you kidding me?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_5.text: Battle data transfer complete. Activating cloned battle modules.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_6.text: Stop talking behind my back! If you have a problem with me, say it to my face!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_8.text: Nazrune's plan of uniting the two clans is the only road to peace. I must become the chieftain of my tribe if I wish to fulfill it.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_5_9.text: It is time to shed my dark life of the shadows that haunt it.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_1.text: I'll strike fear in the hearts of my enemies and bring new hope for humankind!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_10.text: Necron... I will never forgive you!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_11.text: The symbol of victory? I would rather keep my lady's love.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_12.text: None shall defeat me on the high seas, no matter who they are.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_13.text: As the representative of the Central Knights, I shall bear myself with honor and pride.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_14.text: The Fortress of Souls - and Soltar. It is time to cut these times of ill fate once and for all.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_15.text: Loviatar... Until your return, I shall protect these woods as the second Witch of the Forest.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_17.text: Oh! Gacha Rangers! My adversaries! It's so nice to see you guys again!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_18.text: As unreal as it seems, being the descendant of the Ghost King feels no different from before.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_19.text: If all humans were like you, Dorothy, we devils wouldn't have suffered so much.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_2.text: With a steely heart and a sharp mind, I shall serve you, milord.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_20.text: I'll accept my lot - and cut everything down!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_21.text: Under the Rosetta Stone's guidance, I'll protect you two!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_22.text: Money! Glory! Cool swordsmanship! I don't want to become a boring old clan master anyway. I'm going to be famous, you'll see!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_23.text: I will teach those two Snorrisons a lesson on true fear.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_24.text: At last, this human body is mine to use... I can properly serve my master now!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_25.text: Oh, Sfera. Humans aren't as dangerous as you think. They squeal like piglets before a couple of snakes.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_26.text: Pretending to be blind is difficult... Don't say anything to my daughter. She'll kill me.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_27.text: You're joking. What do you mean, centuries have passed?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_28.text: The glorious lineage of the sun god's thousand-year-old kingdom continues to this day.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_29.text: The holy sword doesn't mean anything by itself. I know that I'm walking the true path of light, by my own will.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_3.text: I will cut down any who dares to corrupt our kingdom of Ryu.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_30.text: No... No...! It isn't over...! I will return, one day!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_31.text: Lionel... Can he be the one that I have been waiting for?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_32.text: If I can only atone for my crimes...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_34.text: L-Lord Gordian called me back! I'm not unemployed anymore! I-I need to get my armor back, too...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_35.text: The future of Nosgard needs no weaklings.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_36.text: I will find that scoundrel who turned me into this monstrous machine - and make them pay!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_4.text: So... This is the story of my life, huh. Becoming the 'Absolute Devil' without getting a single drop of blood on my sword.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_5.text: Battle data 'file_1-1_final_final_06' transfer complete. Activating code: Monte Cristo.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_6.text: Oh, are you here to sign up for the kendo club?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_8.text: Alisha... I shall avenge your death.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_6_9.text: I have accepted the darkness within my heart to slay the darkness without.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_COUPLE_.text: These skies are unfamiliar to me. Where must I go?
Can you feel it? The silent will of these lands.
The forgotten past, the forthcoming future... All shall return to dust by my hands.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_FOURWEE.text: Huh? Why're you staring at me? You wanna piece of me?
So, this is the potion that will turn me into a human...
Okay, I call it quits. When is Habaek going to return?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_GG3_4_B.text: I humbly ask, I humbly ask: though 'tis sudden, where doth lie Hell? Whilst the demons laugh, the people weep. Since it doth lie outside the bounds of virtuous deeds, I shall undertake the task of felling the Netherworld. For I am a vulgar samurai of lowest rank. I have no intent of dying the honorable death of a warrior.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_GG4_4_0.text: Oh… is this where I say my line?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_GG_4_1.text: I shall show you why I am called 'faith'!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_GG_4_2.text: Whatever. Hope you've said your prayers.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_GG_4_3.text: Oh, you won't bore me at all.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_GG_4_4.text: I'll warn you now... I'M PERFECT!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_LASTSOU.text: Oh... My precious pumpkins...What have they done...?
Get out of my pumpkin patch! Stop ruining everything!
Beware... I will show you the wrath of my beloved pumpkins!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_SPR_4_T.text: Ana Heinkel. I won't let you have your evil ways.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_SPR_6_T.text: The time for the final battle has arrived, Ana.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMTED_FOURTH_4.text: Maria... I've finally become a real knight.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMTED_FOURTH_5.text: Strange occurences around Hero Town... This may lead to trouble for the entire kingdom fo Grancia.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMTED_FOURTH_6.text: Ah, welcome. You must be the new Hero Captain. I have heard much of your prowess on the battlefield.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_SUPPORT_5_1.text: I can't die in a place like this. I need to return home...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_UNIQUE_4_JARYON.text: In order to serve my country, I must grow stronger.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_UNIQUE_4_RAEL.text: My ambitions lie far higher than a young margrave of the kingdom.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_UNIQUE_5_JARYON.text: Virtue on the battlefield can only be reached through efficient, quick battles that minimize death and suffering.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_UNIQUE_5_RAEL.text: Lionel... I won't let a bastard like you steal my rightful honor.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_UNIQUE_6_JARYON.text: The darkness that plagues this kingdom...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_UNIQUE_6_RAEL.text: I will serve you, true king of Valencia.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_1_11.text: After this year, I won't have time to sing. I need to study for my college entrance exams!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_1_3.text: I want to learn more about mana.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_2_11.text: I wonder if the Magic Academy has a band?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_2_3.text: I learned everything I can from these books I borrowed from the library. I want to know more!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_3_11.text: Me, pretty? Haha, you're so funny!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_3_3.text: Pumpkin City... Will I be able to quench my thirst for knowledge there?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_1.text: The voices are growing louder. They keep telling me to... go to Valencia... to the Fortress of Souls?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_10.text: Fools. The truth lies in the darkness.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_11.text: Me, a popstar...? I'm just an ordinary girl!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_12.text: Those cakes are too sweet! They aren't good for you! My bread, on the other hand...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_13.text: O Goddess who guides me, your servant shall judge the pagans to their dooms!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_14.text: What a greedy, proud race. They will serve me well in my plans.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_15.text: If only I could be as agile and sneaky as a cat...!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_16.text: Yawn... Let me return to my nap...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_17.text: Viola won't be lonely if I make her a magically moving doll, right?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_18.text: This... stupid... flame...! When is it going to disappear? I'm going to study hard and get rid of it someday!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_19.text: The path of learning is open to everyone.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_2.text: Death angel? I'm sure that's only an urban legend.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_20.text: What once is, will be not. The symbol on my back shall fade away, one day. Friends, will you not allow me into the village?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_21.text: What led us to forget our ancient heritage? Why do we continue to wander without a home?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_22.text: Ooh, aah. How boring, how wrong. A tribe of friendly neighbors and loving friends? Where's the jealousy? The resentment and the accusations? TIME TO START THE SHOW!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_23.text: Ethereal magic? Well, I guess I need SOMETHING to do.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_24.text: We must not let anything divide us, the tribe of the Winter Wind, for a sacred duty has been entrusted to us.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_25.text: The work of guiding souls beyond death belongs to us death angels, Saintess of Roman!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_26.text: Who did it? Who was the one who beat up Daddy and stole our entire fortune?!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_28.text: Why are your eyes red? Why are you dripping in red water? I want to know. Can I be like you when I grow up?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_29.text: I have trained for only one goal: assassinating the Emperor.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_3.text: In order to learn Dark Magic, I have to master the four elementals first.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_30.text: Everyone should have one perfect set of clothes that was made only for them.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_31.text: My own genius frightens me at times. I'm sure Professor Loviatar will love me, too!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_32.text: ... Reading this book... empties my head of all other thoughts.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_33.text: The plants of my forest must be perfect. I'll keep every last one of you green all year round.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_34.text: 'Another' Hasla, huh. Huhu... I wonder what 'I' am doing in this dimension?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_35.text: Your pain is my own. I hope you remember that.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_4.text: What kind of tricks should I play today?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_5.text: Ohoho... What a sprightly young fellow.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_6.text: Everyone is so mean to me... But you're not, Vivian. That's why I love you the best!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_7.text: I play today, I'll play tomorrow. Super Fighting Cards is the only game for me.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_8.text: Only harmony with nature shall allow us to survive in these harsh lands.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_9.text: I met someone - fresh and pretty, like a spring blossom. I will restore honor to my family so that I may court her without shame.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_1.text: An army of cursed souls... I've seen that before. I've been here before.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_10.text: This beautiful massacre... This bloodshed! The beginning of my life's work!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_11.text: In the name of love and justice! All evil, watch out!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_12.text: Grr... I can't lose to that Chocolat. I must think of healthier recipes!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_13.text: Victoria, Victoria, Victoria! You're my one and only Goddess!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_14.text: Again, a complete failure. Such an incomplete body would never be enough...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_15.text: This is it, nya! This feline coordination was just what I needed! ... Although I hadn't been expecting this side effect of ending most of my sentences with 'nya,' nya.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_16.text: Dorothy... She's very persistent... Perhaps she will leave me alone if I teach her...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_17.text: The magic dolls are complete, but the village...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_18.text: Sigh... What are these ears? And these arms? I can't even control them.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_19.text: Beware, all evil! None shall escape the never-sleeping eyes of the Night Witches!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_2.text: Guide the dead? Uh, this is a little abrupt.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_20.text: Everything depends on your mindset... As for me, I THINK my stomach doesn't hurt... I believe it not to hurt...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_21.text: I thought the Temple of Anubisis would yield some answers, but I see that I was wrong.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_22.text: ... B-OOOO-RING!! I'll have to take you OUT OF THE GAME!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_23.text: Sigh... Training is a little better than studying, but it's still not a 'real' life. I need to go out and see the world!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_24.text: Could it be true, the prophecy of the Great Oracle? Is it truly the will of the gods?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_25.text: When the time comes for me to call your name, you shall have no choice but to follow me to the afterlife.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_26.text: ... I never knew money was a factor for other people's opinion of you. Everything is that thief's fault!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_28.text: My life? Come and take it from me - if you can.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_29.text: The art of face-changing is no trivial trick. One requires not only speed but also accuracy.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_3.text: The Four Great Witches of Pumpkin City will guide me in my studies!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_30.text: Morgan... He's meaner than the rumors had him. This order could be my chance to impart him a lesson.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_31.text: Professor! My thesis is finally complete! Could you - huh?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_32.text: Relationships with other human beings are too complicated... All I need is this book.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_33.text: Even the best botanist in Hasla becomes blind with jealousy before my talent!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_34.text: Grandpa actually liked you in this dimension, huh, Levine?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_35.text: She was no different from the rest of them. ... My own sister. I was foolish to trust her.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_36.text: ... And I didn't even get her name.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_4.text: I never asked for this! How do you get them off? Someone, please help!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_5.text: Sigh... I need more mana than this. Perhaps the young witches of my home can give their elder a hand.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_6.text: I want to become a Succubus, but I'm not so comfortable standing in front of other people...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_7.text: To game or not to game, that is the question.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_8.text: To face the dangers of the future, we must stand united.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_9.text: Is this my limit? No... I cannot give up if I am to see her again!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_1.text: I remember everything, now. My sacred duty...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_10.text: Idiots... Become food for my ghoul.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_11.text: Music is love! So sing with me!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_12.text: I have to develop a better variety of wheat in order to bake tastier bread!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_13.text: Filthy maggots who dare crawl to my goddess! You shall all receive your judgement!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_14.text: Destiny cannot be foreseen. It is one of the few things that cannot be calculated.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_15.text: Nyanya... Do you hear a dog barking somewhere, nya?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_16.text: Mm... I thought I'd be getting some time by myself... But something feels wrong...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_17.text: No matter what happens, I'll keep Viola safe.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_18.text: I give up. At least I'll be able to use these powers to help other people...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_19.text: I will do anything in order to protect Pumpkin City.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_2.text: Okay, everybody! Let's reap some souls!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_20.text: Are you finally ready to receive my teachings?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_21.text: The Temple of Illusions... and the Seeker of Truth.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_22.text: It's so MARVELOUS how they continue to fight! SIMPLY DIVINE! In all ironic senses of the word! I'll make all of you SING AND DANCE in agony!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_24.text: Where am I...? Where is the Sanctuary... Where is my tribe?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_25.text: The dead who dare to escape the bondage of death will all be judged by my scythe.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_26.text: I found you at last! Momota- Gasp!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_28.text: 'The Ghost King'... I wonder if he can save me from this deep and desperate loneliness.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_29.text: Hahaha! Your death has finally found you, Emperor! I, Wang Dao, shall take your life!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_3.text: I only want to see how far magic can reach!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_30.text: Oh, are you not satisfied with your new suit? You don't mean to say... that you can't see it?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_31.text: I'll guide the younger witches so that they don't lose their way, like I once did.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_32.text: You were lonely, too? I'm you. You're me. We'll help each other.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_33.text: Have I been mistaken all along? My forest is dying...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_34.text: So, you call yourself a Hero Captain? Let me give you a short demonstration of my newest ultrasonic weapon. 'D-CAT' will break your heart and soul.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_35.text: Patience... Soon, soon shall I shatter this endless cycle of agony!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_36.text: The situation is worse than I expected. ... Where did she go, Hanee Baram?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_4.text: This strength... I was frightened of it in the beginning, but I'm glad I accepted it. I couldn't have saved the village otherwise.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_5.text: Ah... Delicious. The Goddess of the Night has returned!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_6.text: Welcome to the Succubus Troupe! We'll give you another night of amazing performance!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_7.text: This will show my old teacher that you CAN make a name for yourself through playing games!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_8.text: As one, the Tribe of the Frost Wolves will overcome all.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_9.text: I have achieved everything to be achieved - save one. I know that she'll be waiting for me. My sweet Arona...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_AUTO_4_.text: It's finally complete: 'Candy Delivery Magic'! Now I can deliver candy to children with more speed AND accuracy!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_AUTO_5_.text: This should have never happened... How could have my candy magic hurt a child?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_AUTO_6_.text: Okay, let's depart, everyone, and give all those children a happy, merry Christmas!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_AUTUMN_.text: I want nothing more than some peace and quiet.
That ninja, Kaede... She's a little strange, but I don't think she means ill.
Thank you, Kaede. We will always be together.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_EAST_5_.text: I think... I forgot something precious... But I can't remember.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_EAST_6_.text: I couldn't become... what you wished for me to become.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_GG3_4_D.text: I want to know. Am I your enemy?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_GG_4_1.text: Dolls can't choose their own futures.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SIXTH_4.text: The Temple of Illusions always filled me with a sense of dread.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SIXTH_5.text: Father... Can we meet again, someday?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SIXTH_6.text: Humans... They always repeat the same mistakes.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_4_A.text: Hiosbruke belongs to me, Twillie of Tasitte!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_5_A.text: Did you get scared, Twillie? I shall take the western front.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMTED_FIFTH_5_.text: A fragment of Pandora's emotions... ... I want to be something more.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMTED_FIFTH_6_.text: What is the meaning of life...? Maybe I can find out - with you.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_4_LOVIAT.text: Wolfram... I will become stronger, so that I may protect other children from a fate like mine.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_5_LOVIAT.text: My unsleeping eyes will never let injustice go unpunished.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_LOVIAT.text: I am sorry, Master... I could not let them sacrifice that girl.

TEXT_GACHA_WEP_FOR_PAYING_DESC.text: ★4~6 Weapons Chance to obtain Weapon Option Ticket

TEXT_GACHA_WEP_PICKUP10_DESC.text: ★4~6 Weapons ★4 Soulbound Weapon Guaranteed 1 Weapon Option Ticket Guaranteed Higher chance to obtain selected Weapons

TEXT_GACHA_WEP_PICKUP1_DESC.text: ★4~6 Weapons Chance to obtain Weapon Option Ticket Higher chance to obtain selected Weapons

TEXT_GACHA_WEP_PICKUP_DESC.text: A magical chest with a higher chance of holding the Soulbound Weapon of your choice.

TEXT_GACHA_WEP_REPEAT10_DESC.text: Obtain 4~6-Star Weapons One 6-Star Soulbound Weapon Guaranteed Random Weapon Option Ticket Guaranteed

TEXT_GROUND_AMUSEMENT_STONE_01_DESC.text: Young and old alike will skip with excitement on these stone tiles when they find themselves in the amusement park.

TEXT_GROUND_CHEN_STONE_01_DESC.text: A floor of biophilic design, crafted out of Chen rock.

TEXT_HOW_TO_FORGE_WEP_MAKE_2.text: Obtainable from Raid, Ancient Dungeon, and Story Mode.

TEXT_ITEM_CARVE_STONE_HELP.text: Open to obtain a random Sigil.

TEXT_LIMIT_INC_CARVE_STONE_DONE_DESC.text: Your Sigil Inventory has been expanded!

TEXT_NOS_BOTTOM_STONE_01_DESC.text: A snow-covered rock. Be careful not to trip and fall!

TEXT_NOS_BOTTOM_STONE_02_DESC.text: A snow-covered rock. Be careful not to trip and fall!

TEXT_PATTERN_S2_EP5_GAPGWI_SKILL_DESC.text: Frontal area attack Critical resistance increased

TEXT_PATTERN_S2_EP5_SWORDEN_SKILL_DESC.text: DoT, Cancel Buffs Armor and resistance increased

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_1.text: Her stumble into a nearly abandoned foxhole yielded no game for her fruitless hunt, but a chance meeting with a trembling cub who waited for parents that would not return. Gon, in a striking moment of sympathy - for she too was a young girl with no family - took the baby fox with her, and gave him the name "Foxy." The two have been inseparable ever since, but Gon has noticed that Foxy seems to find her bothersome as of late.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_10.text: Tradition decreed that Magnus be betrothed to noble blood from childhood. Political complications surrounding the throne, however, nullified the engagement.
