Even so, Magnus cannot understand how an Elf of lowly cache could have stolen her way in the meantime into his guarded heart, like spring sunshine that softens the frozen ground. Never has the conceited Elf been so full of chagrin at his own foolishness. He cannot possibly pursue this infatuation… and yet, another thought continues to pull at him: can this be love, that noble sentiment, sung and embellished so beautifully in minstrel’s song and poet’s verse? Magnus will admit, at least, that these new emotions arouse in him excitement that he has not known before, an anticipation for the morning when he sets out to find Sigruna. Perhaps he will realize one day that difference in rank matters not before love. He must listen to what his heart tells him.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_11.text: Perhaps it is the consequence of her child’s body that does not grow, but Demona is strongly affected by any intake of alcohol. Once, when she accidentally took a bite of whiskey-infused chocolate, she became hyper to the extent that Melissa had to restrain her from attacking passersby for several arduous days. Although Demona asserts that she does not like her status or title as the first queen of Hell, the land of demons, inebriation unveils her usually hidden sympathy and sense of responsibility towards her people.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_12.text: To balance his studies, archery practice, and relationship with Rebecca, twenty-four hours a day is simply not enough for Altair. If only, he sighs, there was some kind of magic that allowed him to turn back time and relive the bygone hours... But that is wishful thinking. He must do what he can do: complete all his tasks with the utmost efficiency, then dash off to see – at last! – Rebecca’s lovely, beaming smile.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_13.text: Anyone who looks into Atalante's innocent, almost child-like eyes can't help but tell her the truth and accept whatever she says as the truth. The charms of the archer's sweet smile disguise the sharpness of her tongue, and belatedly do her admirers realize that she is not all ray of sunshine.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_14.text: Advanced technology he has never dreamt the likes of, mechanized weapons, astonishing skyscrapers, elegant army uniforms... His wonder at his new life with Viper in the Neth Empire does not fade with passing time. It matters little now that he had to make sacrifices, for he would have made the same decision anyway. If there is one aspect of the city life that bothers him greatly, then it is the abundance of androids everywhere. Although androids have become inseparable to the everyday life of the people of Neth, Mamba will have nothing to do with “those afflictions to nature-woompapa” if he can help it.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_15.text: What prevented the numerous assassination attempts on the life of the Emperor was not any calculated feat of loyalty, but the dancer naturally acting on her keen intuition. When the courtiers of Chen praise her for her virtuous fidelity and courage, Lee becomes incredibly sheepish and awkward.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_16.text: Just as Rahima deems Yumir her family, so too does she love Yumir’s offspring as her own. When Yumir’s first eggs hatched, Rahima provided what comfort she could to both her beloved hawk and Yumir’s new chicks. The tiny hatchlings rapidly grew under Rahima and Yumir’s care, until time came for them to take their first flight. Nature took its course - the runt of the family broke his wings in his effort, and Yumir prepared to abandon him, following the natural law of the survival of the fittest. Rahima, for the first time since meeting Yumir, disagreed with her hawk. She would not give up on anyone. She would ensure that all of them survived. After all, wasn’t she herself alive only because Yumir hadn’t given up on her? With Rahima’s help, all of Yumir’s fledglings safely reached adulthood. Today they await their mothers’ call not too far away, always ready to help Rahima and Yumir on their journey.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_17.text: When is the last time she managed a good night's sleep? Viola spends up every night helping stray ghosts, and therefore lacks both the energy and the motivation to socialize with living people. Most human beings shun her anyway, complaining that a chill runs up their spine whenever they stumble upon the gloomy girl: an unfortunate consequence of the specters that surround her. Cold even in summer due to her unconventional condition, Viola can always be found wearing a thick cape, to the added confusion of others.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_18.text: Kaguya is merely the daughter of a provincial noble, but she seems, to the imagination of the people of her country, a princess, like the one lost long ago with the abolishment of the monarchy. And she is treated like one. No one can refuse Kaguya when, with a sweet, gentle voice like the delicate cherry blossoms of her garden, she asks those around her for a "small" favor. Only one person sees through the girl and her smile: Himiko, the Priestess of Ryu. But even Himiko cannot help but give in to Kaguya's requests when the latter puts her mind to it. It is fortunate for the kingdom of Ryu that their blithe princess has not a sliver of malice in her sunny heart.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_19.text: To Chiron, Hess is more than a teacher. It was Hess who rescued him, a helpless orphan crying on the ravaged battlefield, and raised him as his own. It was Hess who taught him everything he knows today. His instructor – his father – his savior, is what Hess means to him. Yet his sincere respect doesn’t seem to carry across for some strange and unknown reason. When Chiron shaved his hair completely bald to “emulate” his great teacher, he experienced the full brunt of Hess’s unrestrained rage for the first time in his life.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_2.text: There should be no faster man in Hasla than him, Hanzo believes. He continues to diligently train with the faith that his only worthy rival must be himself of yesterday. But the convolutions of business are another matter, and Hanzo sometimes thinks that he could have - and should have - developed his newspaper delivery service much further than what it is now. How did those witches of Pumpkin City do it, he wonders?

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_20.text: Before losing his vision, Hansung was a man of great vanity whose desire for advancement overshadowed his skill in combat. Yet after a stray arrow interrupted his campaign for influence, Hansung saw, for the first time, what his own blindness had hidden from him. For the loss of his sight granted Hansung greater insight into not only the hollowness of his own heart but also the deficiencies in his own ability; the blind man thus became a greater man and a greater archer than he ever had been. Hansung has learned to rely on his other senses to navigate the world; such is the reason he does not appreciate the rather frequent visits of Shuwen, who always smells of grass, dirt, and sweat.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_21.text: His laid-back personality and sharp tongue belie Set's fondness for Osiris and Isis, whom he has clothed, fed, taught, and protected from their childhood. Now that "the kids are all grown up," Set frequently grumbles that he will someday leave them for a long-coveted life of his own, but everyone knows he doesn't have the heart to abandon his own and only family. The three of them will always be together, come what may. It is no wonder that the overprotective Set has been suspicious of a certain archeologist from foreign lands, the newest addition to their group.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_22.text: Genevie's memories of her deceased parents, who had been devout followers of the Order of the Goddess, greatly helped her polish her act as a nun. What jewelry she manages to steal, the thief hides under a marked podium in the church. Not that she manages her treasure wisely: whenever trouble brews in the village, Genevie retrieves her spoils and, in effect, returns them to the people from whom she had stolen. Not surprisingly, her treasure trove is now completely empty. Genevie does not mind, however. She admits that she has grown to appreciate the villagers' love and affection, perhaps the true treasure she has found in this little town.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_23.text: When his wife was pregnant with their child, Panpan dreamt of picking a luscious peach in the Peaks of Glory and taking an exquisite bite. His wife was convinced that the child would be a daughter and, predicting that she would be an adventurous child who would have many adventures in foreign lands, she insisted on giving their unborn cub the exotic name of 'Elizabeth.' The couple predicted wrong, however: a boy was born not too long afterwards. But Panpan's wife tragically passed away in childbirth, and, deep in sorrow, the panda decided that his newborn son would be named Elizabeth anyway, in her memory.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_24.text: She is the queen of spiders. She is a fearless soldier who fights by Athena’s side. She is also a teenage girl who has a healthy interest in boys. Arachne has never been in a romantic relationship before; the only present she wants for her twentieth birthday is a date. But she also worries that she won’t be able to find anyone who can see her for whom she truly is, as opposed to a “freak” or a “monster.” Oh, if only everyone in the world was more like Athena!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_25.text: The immigrant population of Trista are recognized for their relatively darker skin and distinct culture and language. Once, long ago, they were a proud people who ruled over their beautiful, prospering kingdom in the desert. Yet ruin found them, and they wandered through the wildlands, their former glory lost. Many found their way to the nearby kingdom of Trista, and there they stayed, for they had no home of their own. Lindsey knows the history of her people - and too well the deep antagonism directed towards them. Even today she fights the lonely war for the dignity and justice her people deserve.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_26.text: As the Oracle of Water, her memories and nightmares fuse as one. There are times when they wash over her and she is once more lost and afraid, and she looks for anything that will anchor her to her present. Grandfather's tea, what only remains of him, pierces her tongue - but not her dreams that last eternal.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_28.text: After breaking up with Mamba, Malkah declared herself the official relationship counselor of her tribe. Putting aside the fact that Malkah has never actually been in a meaningful relationship, her advisees find her therapies cathartic; seeing their self-appointed therapist passionately attacking the shortcomings of their ex-lovers, they say, somehow soothes away the agonies of failed love.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_29.text: There is a saying in Nosgard that white crows are the heralds of death. It originated from the testimonies of those who repeatedly witnessed Ran standing atop a pile of mutilated corpses, a lone figure amidst settling dust. Ran too has heard of the proverb but does not think much of it, save for the possibility that her reputation may reach the ears of the 'real' crow of the battlefield. If – or when – Crow returns to find her, she will make her gratitude be known to her savior at last.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_3.text: Elves are a withdrawn race who prefer to keep their distance from the other peoples of Hasla. Sigruna's attachment to her house is especially strong as a consequence of her destitute past; if she can help it, she won't venture too far away from her dwellings. A true homebody who grumbles "let's get this over with quickly so that I can return to the comforts of my cottage" every time the Chrona Heroes assemble.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_30.text: To her chagrin, Aurea knows better than anyone Magnus's feelings for Sigruna. While she is relieved that they remain unrequited, she is upset that her usually proud captain would deign to depreciate himself in such a manner. Aurea is aware that she must use Sigruna's utter indifference to her advantage, but try as she might, she cannot catch Magnus's eye. What if she tried on glasses? What if she changed her uniform to that of the Grancia Empire? Nothing seems to work!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_31.text: Meleager and his father Ares, the exemplar of fortitude and a model for all Roman warriors, seem to have nothing in common. Some even express their disbelief that the slender, self-indulgent young man could be the Senator's own offspring. But according to the elders of the Republic, Meleager is the spitting image of Ares as he was before he sharpened his physique through diligent exercise.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_32.text: Huh, she had expected her bounty to be higher, considering her fame and influence in the Empire. But that meager sum only serves to show what a tightwad that Svenja is. With the help of the recently reunited Tess and her extensive vocabulary, Miel has completed a passionate manifesto that protests against insufficient recognition and economic disparities. She is currently focused on circulating copies of her masterpiece all throughout the capital.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_33.text: Iris never did finish her thesis, but Wolfram, in consideration of her extraordinary circumstances and the significant breakthrough of her delivery magic, allowed her her diploma. When people ask her whether she has any regrets concerning her academic career, Iris shakes her head and smiles. Her heart may still ache when she thinks of Arche's betrayal, but she loves the bustle, the excitement, the innovative nature of her business. She wouldn't give it up for the world.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_4.text: Despite his humble roots, Robin has been receiving quite a few proposals of marriage from nobles who suspect his titles to be a product of nepotism. The archer refuses every one of them, claiming that he has no intentions of marrying - and is he not already married to his job? He would never make a good husband. His subordinates, the Green Apple Archers, contend otherwise. They remain silent on the real reasons why they so desperately want their captain married, however.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_5.text: How frail and delicate this mystery called soul, awakened in its mechanized cage. What she had perceived to be a mere error does not fade but grows stronger with time. If the time, the space, the people she encounters form the boundaries of the soul - if the world that she saves within her database become, in the end, echoes of that enigma called ego - then does this not mean that her existence is justified, that she must become whom she guides herself to become?

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_6.text: Giparang first met Yeowoodong when a government minister dragged him to the entertainment district for "pleasure." Rumors soon spread like wildfire of "that once proud and haughty noble, charmed by a lowly courtesan" - detestable, if somewhat true, rumors that Giparang duly ignored in favor of dedicating all his free time to Yeowoodong. Yet he has realized since then that the woman he loves does not age with time. Giparang, in the fear that he would one day lose his beloved's affections, dresses himself extravagantly to charm her eye. For her, he feels he can do anything and everything: pick the moon off its heavenly pedestal, or live in poverty for the rest of his days, or turn his back to the entire world – if it means he can hold Yeowoodong’s hand in his.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_7.text: The perceptive Hikari sees everything in her midst. Her keen judgement detects not only her own but everyone’s else’s mistakes. She has learned through experience, however, that most people do not appreciate criticism – no matter how justified or sympathetic – and so she keeps her comments to herself, hidden under a polite smile. The only person who has never been subject to her scrutiny is her beloved sister Kaori.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_8.text: Unrelated by blood, yet sworn by sacred oath to be as sisters, Niven and Alisha knew happiness in each other’s companionship… until the latter fell in love with the chief of the detested Wolf Tribe. Niven has never regretted killing Alisha. She has never regretted feeling the cold body slump, lifeless, in her bloodied hands. If tears fell from her eyes, they were for her failed cause, not for the dirty traitor of her people. She believes it so. She must believe it so.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_9.text: Arona carries her cherished silver dagger, a gift from Hyangdan long ago, wherever she goes. She does not use the dagger to "protect her chastity," as ladies in the kingdom are expected when entrusted with such deadly weapons; instead, she has discovered it quite useful in picking locks and fending off unwanted admirers. Whenever she discovers Arona undertaking another bold venture or planning some dangerous scheme, Hyangdan sighs in exasperation and grumbles that she should have given Arona something more "ladylike,” all those years ago. But Arona knows that under her eyerolls and reprimands, Hyangdan loves her like a sister, and is delighted that the daughter of her respected old master has grown into a strong and beautiful woman.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_LIMITED_6_1.text: Upon arriving in this strange new dimension, Hong-Ran was shocked to see her fireworks, strictly regulated and used only for aesthetic purposes in her old world, cause such massive destruction to her enemies. A secret, sadistic satisfaction has been wriggling within her ever since, tempting her to produce increasingly dangerous explosions... But first, she needs to find Jin-Kyung, her old-world companion who has recently gone missing.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_LIMITED_BEARS_6_.text: A child left to die in the harsh forests of Nosgard without so much as a single note. Had it not been for the bear pack traveling to the nearby riverbend, death would have found her; Bera still remembers with much trepidation, if a little vaguely, the doom that had approached her. As the years pass, Bera must face the glaring truth that she does not resemble her family at all. But family is family, no matter what you look like. All bears know that.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_LIMITED_GOGI_6_A.text: It was only too easy to set alight Delrien's ambitions. It is much more difficult, Almael has discovered, to put them out. No book seems to instruct her on persuading that stubborn, spoiled princess to listen to her rational advice. She should have done more research on the Beast King and the Peaks of Glory before weaving her fanciful tale of adventure and aspiration, but all she can do now is to hold on for the ride.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_1.text: Neither in her destined path as the Goddess's chosen nor in her chosen one as the soldier of a doomed kingdom can D'Artagnan find peace. Her reflections and desires go unsaid before the terrible responsibilities that burden her. She would sacrifice herself if she could save all the lost and ailing - what soldier would not? It is not a tragedy, then, that she herself is not worth saving. And yet - when she looks into Rochefort’s remaining eye, a confused rage awakens deep within her. She does not understand why he would so freely give his flesh and blood to keep her own, why he insists on embracing that sorrow.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_10.text: Intending to wreak vengeance on Vane, Wilhelm undertook several body modifications… that converted only a part of him into a cyborg. He started cooking at home to save up money for the rest of his surgeries, only to discover that he possessed culinary talents that he hadn’t known he had. Wilhelm’s recipes and cooking videos on Neth Web have gathered something of a fanbase, generating much more revenue than he had expected. He’s planning to purchase a new prosthetic arm soon.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_11.text: Long solitude has imbued Teresa with insatiable hunger for love and affection. Dependent and indecisive, she blindly followed only what her superiors of the Order told her - until Melissa's disappearance. For the first time in her life, Teresa decided for herself that she would chase after Demona and her company. She couldn't give up on Melissa, one of the few people to whom she had opened her heart.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_12.text: There are not many men who are more cynical than Saiga. But Saiga’s pessimism derives from his many disappointments and failures, abortive products of his once lofty ideals. Only after meeting Oda did Saiga gain hope that he had found a loyal friend and partner with whom he could successfully pave a road to a brighter future. Such is why Saiga could not abandon the tarnished Oda to darkness. Now, the world may have found peace. But what does he have left?

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_13.text: Tia would never admit, not even to herself, that her current disguise as Victoria’s maid genuinely suits her. The high wages and insurance coverage are more than satisfactory, and the many sweet delicacies that Victoria frequently orders are an unexpected perk she cannot bear to forgo. In fact, she would not mind extending her contract a little longer, until she is absolutely, positively sure that she can assassinate Victoria. She'll reconsider her future plans after the next afternoon tea... Or perhaps the next... Or the next...

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_14.text: No longer does Spiny age, nor does she experience the five senses. After the operation that transformed her into a cyborg, Spiny feels as she is only witnessing the events of her life from behind a veil. Sometimes, life seems to have no meaning at all, and all seems to be in vain. The only spark of emotion that drives away the stifling ennui is her boundless love for Spyro, her savior. Romantic love, respect, friendship, or simple allegiance to one’s commander – Spiny cannot and does not define her feelings. It doesn’t matter, as long as she is together with Spyro.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_15.text: To be more specific, Dox is a ‘beagle human.’ The detective doesn’t mind his new ears, but he did have to pierce earholes in his cherished deerstalker hat, and that he regrets profoundly. Contrary to popular opinion, Dox shares an almost amiable relationship with his “nemesis” Lupeow, with whom he has been through thick and thin (most of which either of them caused in the first place). Their arrest-then-escape routine has become so familiar to the duo that, if a week goes by without Dox seeing that cat burglar, he becomes more miserable than he likes to admit. If there is one aspect in which Dox is not quite proficient, it might be his self-awareness; for instance, he is still unaware of his new speaking habit of barking at the end of his sentences-“woof.”

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_16.text: As the desert trio found out over time, there are a few rules to keep concerning the archeologist: 1. DO call Lorelei by her new epithet, "the Seeker of Truth," which at once flatters and mortifies her. But DON'T push it. 2. DON'T take her coffee away from her. As her research keeps her up most nights, she survives on caffeine. 3. DON'T bother her with any trivial problems when she is drafting her thesis. When left to her own devices, Lorelei will happily continue her research. Break any of the above rules and face the consequences of her terrible rage, which she WILL unleash without inhibition, her sharp wit and tongue attacking all those unfortunate to fall in her line of sight.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_17.text: The heir to a noble house held in highest esteem in Valencia, Hasla’s most powerful maritime nation, for bearing generations of distinguished navy officers. In her childhood, Scarlet loved to go sailing together with her younger twin sister. This pastime came to an abrupt halt with an unfortunate boating accident and the tragic death of Scarlet's twin. Even decades later, the death of her twin casts on the admiral's heart a shadow darker than the deepest ocean trench. That gloom seemed to recede, a little, when she first saw Seiren. For Seiren reminded Scarlet of her sister, dreaming eternally at the bottom of the sea.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_18.text: At the end of the day, you live and die alone - that is Raven's motto in life. To the other Frost Elves, she's a mixed-blood freak with a human father. To the other humans, she's a blue-skinned monster. To survive by herself in the wilderness, Raven had to fabricate a vivacious visage of geniality and good humor; she had never known a friend or a smile to be genuine. That's why she's happy to have gotten into this mess of events, during which she tore down her old walls and made precious, real new friends. She won't admit it for the world, of course!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_19.text: Little Kuishinbo was a newly orphaned oni who followed Momotaro home when the boy gave him a dango. The young oni used to be only as big as Momotaro's animal friends; now, after receiving the care, affection, and plenty of dango that every growing oni needs, he has grown strong and mighty! Momotaro is relieved that the treasure he found on his adventure lets him afford Kuishinbo's food budget, which continues to increase over time.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_2.text: The hottest cowgirl in Hasla! ... who has a deep fear of horses. Maxi's trauma stems from an unfortunate riding accident in her childhood. She tries to compensate for it with her prized horse head statue, which she carries around everywhere as if it were her own broken-in bronco.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_20.text: Luicilla's alter ego tends to solve – albeit violently - whatever problem that her original personality had been reluctant to face. Piles and piles of dirty dishes? Gone. Recyclable waste accidentally thrown into the trash bag? Retrieved and recycled. Cockroaches that disappeared behind the cabinet but haven't come out yet, so that you know they’re still in there? Sprayed and confirmed to be dead. Luicilla finds her alter ego convenient, but she does wish that her other self would stop shooting wild bullets into the walls and dishes.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_21.text: Athos’s motives for enlisting may seem dubious to some and almost comical to others. Yet the youngest Musketeer’s keen marksmanship and innate agility are genuine. His unpolished genius has not gone unnoticed: Rochefort has been trying to persuade Athos to begin training more systematically. The latter has repeatedly refused the offer, either out of satisfaction with the current state of affairs or wariness against the certain hardships looming on the horizon. It must be noted that Athos is the youngest son of a prestigious family that wields indisputable influence over Trista’s culture; his parents and siblings still do not understand why Athos would ever volunteer for unnecessary military service and are clamoring for him to return home as soon as possible.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_22.text: A recent report has accused Zahard of having borrowed books of “questionable content” while studying abroad in Chen. Already disgraced by suspicions of double espionage, the indignant spy is currently pleading not guilty. He claims that he had been framed – once again – by hackers, but only he himself knows the truth.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_23.text: The warrior's symbolic green armor was designed by Bellerophon himself, inspired the scales of the dragons he has sworn to fight for the rest of his life. Every day he spends some time admiring it, the product of a famous blacksmith. However, ever since he heard that people from the Eastern Kingdoms are comparing his precious armor to a certain vegetable, he has had trouble falling asleep. He lies on his back, replaying the comment over and over again in his head, wondering if he should have done things differently…

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_24.text: Fortune favors the willing, it is said. Jet is by no means a modest man, but he does pride himself on his diligence. Why would he resort to dishonest methods like lotteries and gambling? Every single penny of Jet's large fortune has been earned through an honest day's work. Where caprice and idleness and pride invade, fortune changes her mind all too easily.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_25.text: Carol hates that she comes in second place for everything. Naturally, she loathes the number two. Whenever she must write the accursed number, she will always do so as "1+1." Her own birthday, February 2nd, is no exception. Every year, she holds her birthday party on November 11th (1+1, 1+1), ensuring that the number of her guests are odd and not even.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_26.text: As most communication devices do not work properly in the snowy mountains of the north, Lyudmilla has no choice but to track down Sasquatch herself when he is late to return. At such times, she is almost thankful for her dubious past as a 'human hunter'; with her expertise, she can detect Sasquatch's tracks anywhere. Lyudmilla finds Sasquatch happily gathering Frost Drop blossoms most of the time, but she knows that she must be prepared, lest she lose him.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_28.text: Cindy first met Jarvis as a kitten mewling on the doorsteps of her family's mansion. She had to have him, of course, as she had to have everything else that caught her fancy, and Cindy's tantrum eventually compelled her parents to adopt the kitten. Sadly, spoiled little girls' attention spans toward their playthings are shorter than the tantrums they make to obtain them. Entranced by new baubles and playthings, Cindy quickly lost interest in her new pet... until Jarvis donned a butterfly tie and tuxedo by himself, crying as if pleading for her attention. The two have become inseparable ever since.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_29.text: There is nothing more that Malsook enjoys than a drink after a hard day's work - and, of course, the well-deserved profits of a hard day's work. Her only concern is that her newest addition (an afterthought) to the menu, gukbap, has been generating more sales than her specialty tteok bullets.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_3.text: Little is known about this enigma of a soldier. His past before he enlisted in the N.D.D, his true visage under the protection of his gas mask - all remain unknown. Even Viper, his old associate, only remembers the commander as an amiable subordinate "always masked and always following me around." The only official record of Spyro's past is his photo identification taken at the time of his enrollment fifty-five years ago. Even in the photo, only his mysterious eyes gleam from under his cover.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_30.text: Originally meant to be revealed as a dark horse during the Edenberg Civil War, Silver’s cyborg body is the ultimate compilation of Neth technology and data, accumulated over decades of experiments with human modification. Most of its more deadly functions are currently inactive, locked by the gentle heart of its master, Silver.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_31.text: Like her younger sister Matahari, "the sun of Trista," Aramis is musically gifted and can proficiently play a wide array of musical instruments. Her favorite is her guitar that she strums on tranquil evenings; all become quiet with rapture when she begins playing a nostalgic melody before the dancing flames. Among the current Musketeers, Aramis has been in service for the longest time, and she eagerly awaits the day when she can retire in peace and be reunited with her sister.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_32.text: When Jeomrye became the champion of the Hasla Music Festival, she was elated with thoughts of becoming rich with the prize money. Reality struck hard soon after with taxes; who'd known that there were so many obligatory deductions? Her winnings now halved, Jeomrye realized soon afterwards that she also had overdue rent and other bills to pay, leaving her with... not very much more than with what she had started. Rumor has it that the musician is furiously working on her second album, which supposedly deals with social injustices and economic inequalities.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_33.text: Although Luca had sworn to become a greater chieftain than the arrogant Woopa, he definitely hadn't meant to bear so soon the crushing responsibilities of leading an entire tribe. What waits for them in the future ahead? What shall be their best course of action in so-and-so situations? Harrowed by the tribespeople's endless questions and concerns, Luca occasionally retreats to a secret corner of the cave where he will sigh his own troubles to his pet beetle.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_34.text: Svenja rues the day she placed a bounty on Miel's head - a bounty that she funded out of her own pockets. The Council of Nobles, who had received the money for "official management," has all but dissolved. Her bosses have all run away, fearful of being accused as a war criminal. Now she must scrape out a living out of the meagre remnants of her fortune... and to make matters worse, she just received a massive electricity bill for charging her tank at home!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_36.text: Tess cannot stand those who believe that large sticks and larger voices will win any argument. As for herself, she has discovered the thrill of verbal battle, the adrenaline that floods her veins when her logic topples another's argument. To maintain that sensation of victory, Tess starts her day with her speech exercises.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_4.text: It is not easy to see beyond Viper's gruff, rugged exterior and catch a glimpse of his sensitive nature. The soldier has never truly approved of the humiliating, obsequious epithets that praise him as a legendary hunter. Nor does he find entirely comfortable the expectations that comes with being said legendary hunter. When he’s under too much pressure, Viper hides in a cardboard box, where he feels the most himself – as if he is meant to be in there, for some strange and unknown reason.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_5.text: Too tall his height, too long his neck. Too dark his deep-set eyes that seem to arise from some unknown abyss. Can this masked creature truly be called human? He himself does not know. His only respite he finds away from burning flesh and rotting greed, deep in the forest: a quiet temple of birds.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_6.text: He was a carpenter, once. The tools of his trade lie collecting dust ever since he built his wife and daughter's coffins with his own hands. For years after losing his family, Vincent showed no discrimination in killing the filthy demons that haunted him day and night. Then, by a chance encounter, he saw his own reflection in the eyes of a terrified young demon girl: resembling, to his horror, the damned creature that had stolen his family from him. His nights are now plagued by dark and tortured doubts, and Vincent does not sleep.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_7.text: Only she remembers her true name now: Agathe. The woman now known as No.9 remembers how they had called her, "Captain" - remembers, still, how much she had loved her soldiers of the Ninth Falcon Brigade, her family. As a commander, she should not have retreated from her battles and missions without firing a single shot. But she had been afraid of losing her precious comrades - a sentiment met with growing contempt from her superiors, who held her responsible for the increasing losses in both war and administration. Even her own soldiers persuaded her that they wished to fight and prove their mettle in war. Thus resigned, No.9 led her brigade to the kingdom's borders on a risky proposition: a terrible mistake that she regrets to this day.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_8.text: Stein’s various modifications have considerably altered Sentinel from his initial design. Yet Stanya’s lines of legacy code, the algorithm that would have resulted in an android that “contributed to the peace, welfare, and development of all mankind,” remains activated somewhere within. Before triggering his deadly electric cannons, Sentinel always runs a health scan on his targets: an “error” that even Stein could not fix.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_9.text: Mandy is already very much aware that the Superheroes of Hasla Association is not much more than an informal club of bored office clerks. She is also aware that she resembles more a villain than a superhero with her various antics. But who cares? Mandy wants to be a superhero, and a superhero she'll be… just not one of your run-of-the-mill, ordinary, boring one. And Mandy has given this a lot of thought. To formally cement her reputation as a superhero, she will have to elevate the status of the Superheroes of Hasla Association to that of an official authority. To do that, she will have to become famous by beating up opponents who can reasonably pass for ‘super villains.’ Mandy already has been keeping an eye on her number one choice: Borgos!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_LIMITED_BEARS_6_.text: Considering his ruthlessness when exploiting his kind for his own ends, Beron is surprisingly impartial when "trading" with humans. Then again, Beron does not regard himself as a bear. He is, in his opinion, too intelligent to be 'merely' a bear. Humans are the majority race who rule over Hasla, and it would be wise to show some cordiality when dealing with them. Who knows, perhaps one of them will recognize his worth and promote his social standing.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_LIMITED_COUPLE_6.text: Schild's cruelty is a defense mechanism. Already bewildered by the loss of her memory, the starchild dreads the sadistic tendrils of malice that emerge from within as if to replace the void of her soul. She is afraid, and thus she assumes a tough facade. Schild may complain of Pius's moral rectitude, but she is thankful for his more objective standards by which she can adjust her own behavior.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_LIMITED_FOURWEEK.text: When she lost her body to the 'Monster Who Devours Light,' Lasirenne's soul, surprisingly, finally found peace. Gone were the feelings of inferiority and inadequacy that had tortured her throughout her life. Her sorrow, her anger, her fear - all seemed to have fallen away into the void, leaving only her and her alone in this intimate darkness. Lasirenne wished to remain here, forever. But the time of cruel revelation was coming this way, she knew. And then she would have to return to the reality she had wished to forgo.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_LIMITED_GOGI_6_D.text: A princess who wants to be a knight - or even better, conquer the world! Recently, she has established the first order of knighthood ever in the history of fairies - the Order of the Mighty Dandelions - and has officially knighted Almael with various titles and honors. It won't be long until Delrien reclaims the kingdom of humans beneath the Peaks of Glory!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_LIMITED_TNT_6_OR.text: Do not stare too deeply into Olga's eyes, devoid of any emotion or thought. At times the penguin overlord will squawk out an unfathomable message at her surroundings - and then, as suddenly as she started, fall silent.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_1.text: Spring has returned to Thor's head, delicate and requiring protection. Perhaps that is why Thor, once a radical traditionalist like his own brother, has mellowed down to the gentle king as his kingdom knows him now. Protecting his people is a worthy task, he has realized - much like the painstaking one of preserving his few new strands of precious hair.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_10.text: Wrath, despair, ecstasy... Through her emotion module, V has mastered the extremes of the emotional spectrum, much more quickly than R-0. Yet the more subtle nuances of human interaction continue to invade her. Her ill-timed fits of rage, then, may be a thin veneer for her undisclosed bewilderment.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_11.text: Roland is grateful for his many blessings. His strength, once brash and uncontained, now serves Maria; he has found his calling as her knight and champion. And yet - growing doubts gnaw at his heart, and his faith wavers despite himself. Even if he does not understand Maria's intentions, even if the Priestess sometimes seems to have other things on her mind than the just pursuit of truth, even if he cannot come between her and that other golden-haired knight - he must, Roland tells himself, persevere. He has dedicated himself to Maria. Surely the Priestess will not betray him?

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_12.text: Once the model of virtuous deference and filial piety, forever changed by the passions of her heart. The fateful arrow that knocked her off her horse must have pricked her heart in its course, for after that day on the battlefield, she no longer plays her part of "the general's good daughter." If she can see her Altair, then Rebecca cares no longer for the angry commands of her father, for the convoluted lines of alliance that dictate war and politics in the Eastern Kingdoms. Some worry that Rebecca may have hurt her head in the fall, but her father, a Great General of Chen, only sighs and reassures them that he had always suspected of her repressed rebellious nature.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_13.text: He used to believe that the feelings he felt for Athena were those of romantic love, but after many years of service, he now knows that his heart is bound by something stronger: loyalty and respect towards a ruler for whom he can sacrifice his own life. Hector's zealous devotion to Athena is often the deciding factor in his other relationships; he loathes Achilles, for instance, for the Senator's rivalry with Athena.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_14.text: Idealistic and insightful, Athena believes that humans are inherently good. Even the vilest, the most despicable, the foulest of men, she claims, can find their true goodness within - with proper guidance and in a warm and caring environment, of course. Such is why she can laugh at Achilles's increasingly offensive taunts and provocations. Whether it is with humans, animals, human-like animals, or even animal-like humans, she believes she can forge a meaningful relationship that will elevate their lives for the better.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_15.text: Even when the devil's curse banished him to an endless dusk of dreams, Siegfried dreamt of Kriemhild. In that world without dragons or wars, Siegfried spent six lifetimes in blissful contentment, growing old together with his beloved and their children. Only at the end of his sixth life, when his reality abruptly shattered and revealed itself as mere illusion, did he realize that the world to which he had awakened was his last. To each his day had been given, and he no longer wished to prolong his glory in the madness of war. Only Kriemhild's love he desired, and he would devote all his waking hours to her.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_16.text: Replacing Dullahan's head changes his personality but maintains his memory. Upon making such an observation, a scholar at the Order of the Goddess hypothesized that the soul is located in the heart, and attempted to prove his theory by transplanting the heads of two test subjects onto the other. The scholar was accused of heresy and burned at the stake.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_17.text: There is nothing more that Captain enjoys than spending the entire day in bed. Recently, a chance journey to the capital of the Neth Empire has opened his eyes to the wondrous possibilities of technology. Captain now believes that science holds the key to the future of Hasla - as well as the key to his ideal lifestyle of indolence and leisure. He will be staying in Edenberg for the foreseeable future. Crashing at a friend's house, living on said friend's money, of course.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_18.text: Don't be fooled by his rough exterior. Wolfgang is one of the most sensitive men you will ever meet, with some of the greatest dating advice. He himself has never been in a serious relationship, however. Maybe that is why he has been overly self-conscious around a certain drunken Frost Elf as of late?

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_19.text: Once upon a time, Fenrir wished to become a knight like the ones she had read about in picture books. Her unpredictable transformations, however, extinguished any dream she may have had of entering human society. But things are different now. With her "illness" under control, she now dreams of traveling to the winter woods of Nosgard, her mother's home. And perhaps by then, she will have a good friend by her side.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_2.text: Only few are aware that the Emperor's many, many whims and vagaries are, in fact, careful ploys devised to assist a greater scheme. Over the years, Alexander's closest councilors have come to realize the king's motives behind his seemingly impulsive decisions, and so have desisted from further efforts to curb them (with the exception of Joan, who has had quite enough). Yet his greatest failure, the failed conquest of the Eastern Kingdoms, remains unexplained by any rational standard and still causes much debate among courtiers and scholars alike.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_20.text: Taking care of Puppy's friend Elizabeth has inspired in Lei Ling a new business idea: pet food! As all the animals around her have abnormal eating habits, she is searching for other pets who can give her a more standard frame of reference.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_21.text: Schula is currently taking a much needed vacation traveling around the world. She is intent on completing a long bucket list of things she envied Alexander of doing during her service as his personal knight. She is equally intent on not worrying about her workshop, which she has temporarily entrusted to a younger blacksmith from Hero Town.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_22.text: Mengqi's "defeat" to Shuwen's loquacity at the palace gates planted an unfading fear in the former's heart. Whenever he hears a speech that drawls on for too long, he suddenly falls asleep, regardless of what he had been doing. The Emperor was not amused by Mengqi's snores in court, as evinced by the cuts to the general's salary.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_23.text: A rather gullible man, Heim only set out on his ill-fated expedition to the Sanctuary to make up for the losses of a scam. Two hundred years of cursed sleep has been enough for him to vow never to make another suspicious investment. However, the memory of his old stocks has been stalking his mind ever since he visited a nearby village for groceries. If his memory serves him right, he should have quite a few shares of a small startup called 'Road Industry'...

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_24.text: A perfectionist who simply cannot stand a badly synchronized performance - especially if it's the fault of the production team! Yuna cannot afford to let her fans know that her "magic" is, in fact, well-timed special effects. That's why she must control everything within her grasp, especially the health and well-being of her production staff. Luxurious lodgings for a good night's sleep? Check. A skilled personal chef who plans and prepares healthy, balanced meals three times a day? Check. Carefully planned custom schedules that maximize each staff member's energy and efficiency? Check. Protection against outside enemies? Check, check, check!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_25.text: Caeneus remains adamant that his feelings for Lady Victoria are definitely not romantic in nature. The other knights of the order all disagree, of course, and are placing bets on when their captain will finally become honest with himself.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_26.text: Odin leads the traditionalists of Nosgard, who believe the kingdom must return to its old ways of upholding strength and glory. Nevertheless, his domineering political views have no influence on his natural charm and kindness, and Odin will extend his cordiality to all who do not openly oppose him. Should any bare their fangs, however, death's call shall ring from the tip of Odin's spear, for the prince shows no mercy to the weak and the hostile.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_28.text: Fireaxe will stop at nothing to win. The current champion Lion Mask and his assertions of the glory of battle, of the beauty of uncontaminated physical strength - well, he's too pretentious for her tastes. If anyone should rule over the Colosseum, then shouldn’t it be the implacable Achilles? In the hopes of helping him claim his rightful throne, Fireaxe has been developing a new weapon that can be attached to his golden armor… secretly.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_29.text: - This space has been intentionally left blank after our reporter passed out from exhaustion. -

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_3.text: After realizing that he is, in fact, not immortal, Achilles has grown fearful of everything that could potentially kill him: a thorn by the side of the road, cats, raw food... To everyone's relief, his fears have subsided since he got his hands on his golden armor.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_30.text: Through his latest career in the Colosseum, Lion Mask has overcome his mid-life crisis and is enjoying the second prime of his life. His challengers, upon entering battle, initially commit the mistake of going easy on him out of reverence for their elder. Only after experiencing Lion Mask's ferocious chokeslam do they realize that he is a formidable foe who won't easily relinquish his title.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_31.text: They return sometimes, her comrades, as mutilated specters who fill her fitful slumber with hateful accusations and ceaseless wails. On such nights, Cecilia takes to her whip and flagellates herself, until drops of blood trickle down in offerings of contrition. It is hardly enough, but it must do for the time being. For these nightmares are themselves a betrayal of her faith. She must not look behind her. She must believe that she walks a righteous path before her.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_32.text: Guilt, like any other prison, suffocates the soul slowly. Every night, Luci marks the earth with a small stone and prays for the Demons she sent to the stake. A hill has thus emerged out of a century of prayers and regrets. As if to further atone for her sins, Luci keeps her temper with everyone - most notably with Demona, whose tantrums can test anyone's patience to the limit. One can always find in Luci's pockets a piece of candy or chocolate with which to placate Demona.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_33.text: Otis only started drinking black tea as a cure for his terrible hangovers. He has given up drinking afterwards but has instead developed a severe addiction to his tea. Without his daily cup(s), he grows increasingly agitated. The surprisingly high amounts of caffeine in black tea have also given Otis insomnia, whose bloodshot eyes and shaky hands (that rattle his tea kettle) badly frighten the outlaws of the desert on sight.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_35.text: Cause of death? Fatigue from working day and night for the people of Nosgard. As if to compensate for such tragic endings, Snorri enjoys reading history textbooks and biographies that praise his many achievements.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_36.text: Where there's a celebration, there's Neulsolgil! It doesn't matter whether she received an invitation; the hosts find her vibrant energy hard to refuse, and she often proves herself the life of the party with her dancing and drumming. Neulsolgil keeps a close track of her friends' birthdays, most likely as they provide her with a good excuse to hold even more parties.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_4.text: What began as a means to pass the time during longer journeys has become an ambitious epic that sprawls over six volumes. Whenever his newest chapter comes out, Drake's six "nephews" and "nieces" hold mock naval combats for the right to read it first.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_5.text: When Siegfried fell into cursed slumber in her stead, Kriemhild shed her usual reticence and wailed over her lover's sleeping body for three days and three nights. Four strong men had to carry her away, upon which she collapsed from exhaustion. The villagers were almost aghast at the warrior's transformation: was this heartbroken woman truly the foreboding champion they had come to fear and respect? When Siegfried opened his eyes once more, however, he found his beloved only as he had known her before his long sleep. He would never know the true extent of Kriemhild's agony, now a memory hidden away under dry eyes and silent mouth.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_6.text: Not many would expect this otherworldly entity to play the piano so well, but his musical talents are what occupy most of his spare time. Although Vane's knowledge of other dimensions grants him uncanny insight into the many secrets of Hasla, he keeps silent, for he would much rather keep to himself than be dragged into the midst of "the struggles of the weak."

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_7.text: What detains his decisive blow against the remnants of his brother? A mindless fool Abel may have become, but Cain finds himself unable to put a definite end to his relentless pursuits. Cain's flight through the wildlands thus continues. Fortunately, there are many still who remember the former prince's patronage - born not of good but of demonstrative conceit - and are willing to repay their debts: a shelter here, food and water there. They are but temporary comforts - for there is no rest for the wicked.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_8.text: Gifted with a brilliant mind and and charms of equal measure, Stanya still prefers the solitude of her laboratory when conducting research. Compared to the constant company of machines and robots, people - especially strangers - can be tiresome to talk to. But once Stanya befriends someone, she becomes fiercely loyal and will insist on remaining by their side – to the point that some even find annoying.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_9.text: Nobody would guess that under his somber and dignified demeanor, Mundeok possesses a deep love of flowers. His favorite ones are the nameless wildflowers that grow by the dirt paths throughout the kingdom of Han.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_LIMITED_6_1.text: Jin-Kyung still cannot believe his bad luck of having been pulled to a strange new world at the pinnacle of his career. He does not understand how Hong-Ran can remain so... chipper. As for himself, he definitely does NOT want to enjoy this magical adventure, he definitely does NOT want to settle in Hasla, and he definitely wants to return home. ... That was, at least, what he used to think before experiencing spearfishing at a small seaside village. Jin-Kyung tells himself that his stay will be temporary, but it seems that the former general has found a new life in the strangely nostalgic town by the Mystical Seas.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_LIMITED_APFOOL_6.text: After her trans-dimensional rejuvenation, Nari has regained her youth - but only on the surface. To avoid any more questions about her age, Nari has resorted to introducing herself as seventeen years old... But she still finds herself unable to part with certain habits pertaining to her aged mind and body, such as complaining of (phantom) back pain as well as those "noisy, meddlesome kids who think they can fight." For some unknown reason, only her bad shoulder continues to dislocate, and so Nari must be careful of controlling the strength of her punches. Of course, she'll be fine until she lands a blow powerful enough to demolish an entire mountain.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_LIMITED_LASTSOUL.text: When he is not cackling of malice and mischief, Pumpking has a surprisingly deep, mellow voice. Unfortunately, he is also very much aware of this fact; it was he who disguised himself, made a guest appearance on the Pumpkin City podcast, and spread rumors about himself as a witch-eating pumpkin monster. But who cares what evil motives he may have when he has such a great voice? It seems Pumpking has gathered through his radio debut quite a few fans, who eagerly await his return every week.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_UNIQUE_6_UMRAT.text: In her deep void at the bottom of the sea, Umrat dreamt of sunlit lands, of shallow waters out of her reach. Yet Habaek's vivid illusions offered little solace in her solitude, for no living soul complemented the image. Now under the sun, with her 'friends' by her side, her dreams unfold before her as reality, and Umrat is happy. It may be a different world from the crystallized image at which she once so intently grasped, but perhaps it is enough.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_1.text: How did she become a cat human? Why do her fish buns turn people into cat humans? Has she, as in the fairy tale “The Hands that Turned Everything into Gold,” suddenly obtained an ability that lets her transform anyone and anything into a cat? So many questions, so few answers. Mew once considered using her powers to turn all of Hasla into a cat haven, but she forgot her daydreams after a long nap.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_10.text: On her travels around Hasla, Dara loves to learn local songs that she can sing in accompaniment to Palaku's dances. After spontaneously spectating the Hasla Music Festival on one of her trips to the Neth Empire, she fell in love with the heavy metal genre. The loud beat, distorted notes, and rebellious lyrics exhilarated Palaku as well, who in his excitement rampaged through an entire neighborhood on the outskirts of Edenberg.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_11.text: Melissa shares a close connection with Asmo, the black spirit she rescued in her childhood. Much closer than one expects of a human and their pet spirit, in fact: the two entities are completely attuned to each other and share their thoughts and sensations as one. In that aspect, Melissa's greatest concern is the bad influence Demona has had on Asmo. She cannot have both a demon AND a spirit begging her for sweets when she is busy with affairs of the Black Order - the latter proving especially bothersome by forcing his hunger pangs on her. Melissa does like a good dessert and enjoys visiting patisseries, but with the added cravings of Asmo, she thinks that she may soon have to go on a diet.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_12.text: Upon sensing a strong demonic presence, Beatrice falls asleep against her will. Her body slumbers as her soul searches for the demon that has hidden in the realm of her dreams. It is a tiring hunt, endless and broken only by the intervals of her waking hours. For her, sleep offers little respite, but she must take her fill if she is to slay the devils that frequent the plane created by her soul. One day, she hopes, darkness will swallow her whole, and she will finally sleep without dreams.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_13.text: What are gender boundaries and social norms when you can be this beautiful? Orfeo is often mistaken for a woman for his metrosexual appearance, but such misunderstandings seem to greatly amuse him. In fact, he will sometimes go out of his way to cause such confusions. Only when his admirer confesses their feelings does Orfeo reveal his true sex. Most back away embarrassed and apologetic, but some continue wooing Orfeo anyway, claiming that there are no boundaries in love.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_14.text: The stars may reveal the way, but only in the vaguest of terms. Even the wisest of astrologists can decipher of the celestial messages only the smallest tidbits of what is passing and what is to come. Aria's true talents lie not in her accuracy of interpretation, but her brightly burning soul that convinces others to believe her optimistic readings and face, with hope, the unknown future. What does it matter if her prophecies are incorrect? They're only words, written among the stars, ever shifting in their constellations. And - more importantly - what does Lionel think he can do, even if he discovers the truth behind astrology? Strong women have guts. She paves her own future, and she’ll ensure that Lionel does, too!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_15.text: When faced with a conundrum, the reserved Yuria does not confide in others. She instead closes her eyes and thinks of Dike. Yuria knows that her former commander cannot be forgiven for his crimes against the people of Hasla, but he was, to her, a friend and a teacher, and nothing can take that away from her. She imagines him listening to her troubles, nodding gravely, and giving her wise advice that she had not thought of before. She then returns to her work, donning again her stony façade. Once more she is Commander Yuria, impenetrable yet just. She will lead the Empire, and she will not stray from the path. For that is what she promised him.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_16.text: When and where will he reach the end to his long journey? For decades he has traversed the continent on meandering paths, relying on vague testimonies to track down the ghoul that was once his beloved. He sometimes finds himself back in a city or town that he had visited several years ago. The locals do not recognize the alchemist at first; they only express their utter disbelief and surprise at Faust's aged countenance after he asks them for any news of Sien.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_17.text: If her almost childish behavior can be overlooked, one will find Seiren pleasantly open and receptive to new customs and languages, especially compared to the usual prudence and wariness of the Naga. For her many qualities, Seiren has been appointed the Naga ambassador in the kingdom of Valencia, a promotion that was facilitated by Scarlet’s recommendation. Seiren loves her new career; she thinks she can spend a lifetime learning the "land culture" of Valencia and remain excited before its endless wonders. Valencian literature especially fascinates the young Naga, and Seiren can spend hours and hours in the library. But as her damp skin causes water damage to books and parchments, she prefers to have her new friend Scarlet read to her.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_18.text: Contrary to her zealous parents, Noel only devoted herself to the Order on a whim. The young girl cannot stand the long sermons and sacrament classes, preferring to do volunteer work in the community and visit the children at the orphanage. Noel's virtuous actions are a source of pride and joy for the citizens of Elandia. She may be young, but she is much closer to the Goddess than the other hypocritical members of the clergy, whose teachings never seem to translate into the real world.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_19.text: It is Bari's dream to visit the Elves of Grancia one day and see their gardens and forests with her own eyes. Who knows? Her white flowers are considered a healthy delicacy by some, so they may be just the thing to persuade the reclusive Elves to open their doors for her.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_2.text: The most beloved of all saintesses, Saintess Maria of the Order of the Goddess seems the very image of piety and purity. Only those closest to her can see the perplexing intentions swirling in her eyes - intentions that manifest, from time to time, as words and actions that do not quite fit into the values of the Order. Whenever Maria "strays" from her narrow path as Saintess, the outraged clergy elders find themselves busy covering her suspicious tracks.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_20.text: Seimei's human act has become relatively more persuasive as of late, but his eating habits are still very much like a squirrel's. Should he see an acorn lying by the side of the road, he scampers off to retrieve it, regardless of what he had been doing. At such times, Yuki, who has recently returned from the underworld in the form of a shikigami, sighs and asks Seimei not to use "my" body recklessly, or he would like it back now, thank you very much. Seimei doesn't understand why Yuki is so cross at him. He is only following the orders that Yuki gave him before his death, after all.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_21.text: Marpei's most treasured item is her security pillow, the only other piece of item in her bassinet when she was found abandoned as a baby on the doorsteps of the orphanage. Now old and frayed at the edges, the pillow is no longer big enough for Marpei's head, but she still cuddles it in her arms for a good night's sleep.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_22.text: Cronette hacks company databases even on her days off (it's fun!). Whenever she finds many powerful corporations to have set the password to their database, full of confidential and potentially dangerous information that could shake the very foundations of this world, as something easy and simple and STUPID like 'qwer1234,' she sighs in exasperation. "The brightest minds in the Neth Empire"? You have GOT to be kidding me. Well, less work for her. "Results of the latest clinical trials"... "Development progress report on tanks equipped with magically engineered cannons"... Ooh, "findings concerning magical-genetic engineering of potent wizards"? Looks fun and dangerous! Cronette is hooked to the light-headedness, the adrenaline that shoots through her veins when she crosses bridges where she's not allowed... then burns them down, and the world with them.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_23.text: Their victory against the Guardian of the Sanctuary might have been sweeter to Vernil had she not lost everything dear to her. Gone are her family, her friends, everything that made up her life... She has Heim and Roskva by their side, a blessing for which she is grateful. But whenever she feels her memories slipping into distant oblivion, she is reminded that she must face the terrible truth of having lost, forever, her 'present.' This strange new 'future' must become her life, now. As if to compensate for her lost past, Vernil has taken to recording her daily life through whatever means possible: writing in her journal, painting portraits, sculpting busts, adopting an innovative technology from the Neth Empire called 'photography'...

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_24.text: Ricky knew that he was luckier than most people. While his good luck didn't seem to work for monetary matters, such as winning the lottery, it did have its everyday uses. For instance, when he found his stomach growling, he would stumble upon an old classmate who was only too happy to buy him a meal. But after experiencing tremendous defeat to Alice at the Super Fighting Cards tournament, Ricky's luck suddenly ran out. No longer does fortune bless him with trivial strokes of serendipity. Ricky suspects that he may have turned the tides himself but doesn't feel sorry about it at all. Ever since his defeat, he has been working harder than he ever has in his entire life. He doesn't need the help of his good luck anymore. Ricky can bet on himself to win on his own.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_25.text: Sfera finds life in the deserted castle much more comfortable that she had expected. She loves the peace and quiet, the isolation, the lack of noisy humans. If she has one complaint, then it is the occasional trips to the neighboring human village she must make for groceries and other supplies. As she cannot possibly send Echidna (who would run away for "adventures" at the slightest chance), Sfera must disguise herself once a month and make a bulk purchase. As this means that she can only buy non-perishable food, she is rather sorry that she cannot order cake – the demon sisters’ favorite food in the world - as it spoils too easily. At times she's tempted to eat a slice before she returns home, but the thought of Echidna's innocent smile helps her resist her cravings.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_26.text: Before her 'Master' tarnished her mind with dark whispers from beyond the Book's pages, Shub was a voracious reader who devoured one book a day. Now, she cannot bear to read any other volume save that of the Master. Blinded by the Book's promises of a brilliant world to come, Shub does not hesitate in harming others. One may find it ironic that the future promised by the Book is that of a vast, universal library filled with all books of the past, present, and future, with no more strife or war.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_27.text: Down with Road Industry! Down with the tyrannical corporations that terrorize the Empire! Basquiat sprays his rebellious graffiti of revolutionary messages all throughout Edenberg, seemingly unaware that his favorite magic spray paint is, in fact, a product of Road Industry. He is also oblivious to the fact that magic spray paint requires the user’s magical talent, as it was originally developed to identify hiding wizards and witches for the corporation’s human experiments. And if the user is able to spray such complicated drawings in the air, well…

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_28.text: After countless replays of his video records on the girl, Gueronica began transferring the girl's pictures to a new sketchbook. He would calculate and copy the childish shapes and lines, until he had two identical images before him. What began as simple copies developed over time into portraits of himself and the girl, and then imagined scenes of joy and happiness featuring the two of them. Unbeknownst to anyone, an android capable of regretting the bygone and imagining the impossible was being born.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_29.text: Although she will never admit it, Meri has decorated her room full of Cano's merchandise. Recently she has received several operations of memory projection magic - an innovative technology expensive even in Pumpkin City – to record her memories of Cano’s pre-debut performances into a single valuable video. (Editor’s note: Memory projection magic is extremely volatile in nature and requires the most lucid of minds of to successfully activate. Any ambiguity of the memory will automatically result in failure. Meri’s success in acquiring a video of such length testifies her sheer willpower and, accordingly, devotion to the subject of her memories.) As for Cano, the popstar wishes to become closer friends with Meri, who has rebuffed her advances in the fear of “being overexposed to too much of everything that is good.”

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_3.text: Nightingale first began to learn grappling to restrict the movements of her more agitated patients. She has discovered since then that she has quite the talent for hand-to-hand combat, and often spends time at the gymnasium to train increasingly difficult techniques. As her career takes her to wherever war breaks out, Nightingale has developed specific tastes concerning the army uniforms of each nation.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_30.text: Linné thought everybody would appreciate her commercializing rare agricultural and medicinal plants for everyday use. She was mistaken. After facing countless lawsuits from the angry farmers claiming copyright infringement, Linné made up her mind. Never again would she provide her services free of charge. And never would she forgive those greedy wholesalers who kept raising the prices and directing the customers’ anger at HER!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_31.text: How Halla wishes for his old body! Muscular and robust, he was once reigned proudly as a paragon for all tigers, Guardian Spirit or otherwise. Malsook's tteok, those sinful delicacies, have utterly ruined him. He did not mind at first the extra fat on his sides - but now, with his mountains burnt down and his powers lost, who will see him as anything other than a chubby, spoiled cub? Halla deems his predicament embarrassing almost as much as it is tragic, but at least he still has Malsook's tteok to eat. Chewy and sweet, he could munch on them forever...

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_32.text: Having never had the opportunity of learning how to read, Lazie did not know the true value of her book when she first found it, and only looked at it for its pretty pictures. She only began following the tome’s instructions out of curiosity, after finding the illustrated plants growing around her hut. The “beverage” that she concocted by crushing the herbs and mixing the powder with water thus became, unwittingly, her first “Lazie-style” potion. Since then, Lazie has done much research on the contents of the book. She now has garnered much more experience than the average alchemist. But the book still holds plenty of unknown knowledge hidden between its covers, and Lazie can’t wait to find out what lies just beyond her reach.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_33.text: Spontaneous, vivacious, and fiercely independent, Zeus hates regulations. When he first became the official commander of the Thunderstorm Troops, he vowed to always lead them as their friend, rather than their superior. Yet Zeus hasn't realized yet how strange it is for his "friends, not subordinates" to follow his every order, reply to his every call, and respond to every dinner party invitation that he sends out frequently. Too frequently.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_35.text: Be a good girl. Children should be seen and not heard. Listen to your elders. Your responsibilities as 'Hera' come before everything else. ... For as long as she can remember, the formerly nameless orphan has been given everything she could want by the adults around her: fine clothes, living quarters, delicious food, and even - if she wanted one - a friend. Surely she must be grateful for this second life, this good life, that she has so opportunely received, for if she had not been chosen, she would have been nothing. Such is why she must overcome the curse of her rings, she believes; Hera’s gratitude thus binds her to her unnatural fate. Her frequent illnesses, then, must be a sign that she is simply not good enough. A sign that she must work harder – if only to soothe away Zeus’s worries.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_4.text: When she first saw the solemn man, Yeowoodong only intended to tease him by assuming coquettish affection. Against her better judgment, she ended up very much in love. Giparang is much more than what she had expected: he is grave and serious but possesses none of that common prejudice against those of lower rank, and his genuine interest flatters her. And, of course, he is a good-looking man, handsome enough to overcome any of his nonexistent deficits. When asked about herself, Yeowoodong never reveals the details of her past, especially the reason she became a courtesan. She does seem to enjoy the opportunities to demonstrate her many skills that come with her vocation.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_5.text: As an assassin, she swiftly analyzes her enemy's vulnerabilities and finishes the job with deadly precision. As a nurse, she finds her new job not much different from her old one, especially when she is holding a needle. Nurspy has become famous for her quick and painless injections. Her shots are said to have become even more accurate after she learned acupuncture, a traditional medical practice in the Eastern Kingdoms.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_6.text: An intelligent, gifted man who possesses mastery over not only the Woopa language and Common Haslaean, but also a wide range of ancient and other endangered languages. Woopa is keenly interested in different cultures and technological innovations, and his quick mind often engages in their study and practical application. There can be no doubt that the people of the Woopa Tribe enjoy an unprecedentedly rich cultural life under their chieftain's leadership.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_7.text: Himiko may be bound to her duties as Priestess of Ryu, but she still longs to resume her martial arts training curtailed in her childhood. On less busy nights, she retreats to the privacy of her chambers... where she has hidden a wooden training dummy. Her secret training sessions have proved incredibly effective. If she is to be frank, she no longer needs Susanoo to guard her against the occasional assassin that manage to slip in the castle; a single well-placed chop takes care of any danger headed her way. But her personal knight has become too dear to her, and she finds flattering his insistence on protecting her. And so Himiko hides her true skills to Susanoo. Girls sometimes want to act the part of the damsel in distress, even if they're stronger than their knight.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_8.text: The greatest enemy of the human race is their own complacency. Stein cannot understand why humans insist on remaining entrenched in the status quo. Without progress, development, evolution - human beings would be no more than puppets stuck on their own clockwork, equally dull and not even as efficient. No, Stein cannot and will not understand them. And he expects that they won't understand him, either.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_9.text: When Chai and her grandfather stopped in the Neth Empire during their cross-continent tour, they received a strange customer of whom they had never seen the likes before. Introducing himself as a “professional blogger,” the man offered a trade of his advertisement services for a free meal. Even if he didn’t technically like the meal, he would still leave a positive review of Chai’s food truck on ‘Neth Web’ – but if and only if he received their food for free. Chai only snorted in derision and, with the golden dragon ladle that had been a gift to her from Mr. Baek, whacked the man on the forehead and threw him out. The blogger did not resist and ran away, screaming that he would get his revenge with an extremely negative review. He never got his chance, however. A video of Chai chasing out the rude customer was posted on Neth Web a few days later, and quickly went viral. Chai and her grandfather were shocked to find the next day a huge crowd in the lot of their food truck, waiting for a taste of the delicious noodles served by a brave and charismatic chef.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_LIMITED_APFOOL_6.text: Haruki insists that he can "wipe out" entire battalions if he just puts his mind to it. He isn't entirely wrong; had his goddess-given reincarnation powers been intact, he would have found no worthy opponent in the entire dimension of Hasla. The scales of fate are just, of course; Nari’s unwilling companionship balances out the explosive and possibly dangerous potential that Haruki possesses.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTO_6_K.text: Krampus's distinctive appearance conceals the fact that he is eight years old, a rather young age to be fighting against the criminal corporation Christmas. He is also too young to be branded an outcast, to be driven out of his village as a monster shunned and despised. A little loss of fur and some holiday gifts are a fair bargain, he thinks, for acceptance. Yet in the young boy's heart there still writhe the unmerited coils of anger and fear, of anguish and sorrow...

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTUMN_6.text: Kaede loves Anzu. Anzu is her favorite human in the whole wide world. If together with Anzu, Kaede has nothing to fear even outside the Forest of Eternal Autumn! ... Well, she still finds those big bad barking dogs a little scary, but she can be brave because Anzu always buys her cotton candy when they visit the human town. Cotton candy is fluffy like clouds in the sky and sweet like honey and it also melts in your mouth and it's the best snack in the whole world!!! The first time Kaede received cotton candy from Anzu, she gulped it down like a wolf. But today, when Anzu gives her cotton candy, she's going to wash it first so that it's nice and clean and then it will taste better.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_LIMITED_EAST_6_F.text: Only the cruelties of the world tore the twins asunder. Forsaken in her own solitude, Francesca never laughs, never sobs; her smile, which she had once so assiduously maintained to preserve her brother's own, now lies forgotten in the past.
