The stain of darkness within imbues her with deep despair and sorrow, but she keeps the encroaching night at bay with memories of her brother's smile.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_LIMITED_SEVENTH_.text: Apparently, baking large batches for hungry heroes every day effectively builds your muscles! After a particular course of events during which Chocolat officially started her training, her gladiator father's genes finally awakened in the young baker. To increase both her strength and technical skills, Chocolat trains and bakes in accordance with a productive daily schedule. One day, she dreams of becoming the greatest – and strongest- baker in Hasla.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_UNIQUE_6_ELLIE.text: Upon recovering her true identity and the full extent of her memories, Ellie was shocked to realize that her severe lack of knowledge had not been caused by memory loss, but a lack of proper education in her childhood. Fortunately, kind and gentle Galatea is only too happy to impart her knowledge, answering any questions the girl may have on the world around her. The only downside to their current arrangements is that the Ancient Being's knowledge is - literally - ancient, and so Ellie sometimes receives answers that are rather outdated.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_1.text: An avid fan of Neth technology, especially androids, although he hides the fact due to his status as a famous hero of Grancia as well as a member of the Chrona Heroes. The other Chrona Heroes, however, are well aware of Leon's "special preferences."

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_10.text: Isabel used to be a completely different person before she lost everything to Necron. Then defined by her love of fashion and interest in cosmetics, she could be often seen poring over one beauty magazine or another. Isabel does not have anyone to show off her new makeup techniques now, but she still cherishes her most prized treasure: her cosmetic bag filled with cheap lipstick and face powder, a present from the children of her parish that they bought with a month's worth of their pocket money.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_11.text: Rochefort's past of serving the kingdom as a knight taught him not only skill with the blade but also discipline at domestic chores. The task of keeping his rather indulgent comrades fed and alive is but another one of his many preoccupations; the meals that induced Athos to enlist, he makes daily. Rochefort does not seem too opposed to such a life, however, for while his heart had not been tethered by any duty in the past, neither had it any faith in the world that came to him so easily. Only D'Artagnan's resolute soul, her noble fire that blazes in the place he had none, thawed his heart. His dark years have been driven away, and he will not return to them.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_12.text: Koxinga seems to have a plan for everything; from day to night, for seven days a week, and for months, years, decades into the future, he has organized meticulous schedules that somehow take into account hundreds of different scenarios and possibilities. You can never be too prepared: that is his motto in life.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_13.text: Victoria often finds herself the center of attention, but she confesses that she sometimes cannot distinguish the zealous adoration of her admirers from the thinly veiled animosity of her enemies. Her cool demeanor and impartiality are an armor that she dons against the dangers that lurk around her; too many times has she discovered that her affections result in the disappearance of her friends.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_14.text: Lionel first started wearing his helmet out of the fear that the people of Valencia would recognize the last heir of the House of Ferdinand. He no longer needs to hide his identity, of course, but he has grown so used to the reassuring diguise that he seldom goes bareheaded, even now.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_15.text: On nights she cannot fall asleep, Arita wanders the woods on long and meandering walks, or quietly peruses old books on earth magic. Her frequent nighttime activities have caught the attention of Wolfram, who has asked her to become the next Captain of the Night Witches. Arita has politely refused the offer. She has had enough of the other Great Witches and prefers peace and quiet over another headache, thank you very much.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_16.text: Once she was a young lady who had many dreams and liked many things. Now she is a corpse who doggedly chases after darkness, and not a sliver of her spirited nature can be found in her clouded eyes. But Faust still thinks a part of her lives on somewhere inside, especially when she suddenly stops in her path, turns to her former beloved, and silently gazes into his eyes.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_17.text: A devilish villain with the heart of an angel. Borgos likes animation movies and romance novels. Borgos cannot and will not hurt a fly. Borgos is a true romantic who still looks out for his one and only soulmate. Everyone who knows Borgos well (which is, granted, not a lot) knows that he is a sweetheart. Please give him a call if you are interested. Thank you.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_18.text: Has Bihyeongrang, in fact, grown younger? His face belies the wisdom of his years. He used to grow a bushy beard for an older and thus more "authoritative" look, but ever since the spirits - especially Vaisravana - expressed their aversion, he keeps his face cleanly shaven.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_19.text: Her confidence and blazing hot temper betray none of the terrible nightmares she has been suffering for many years, scars left behind by the torture and derision she had once endured at the hands of cruel humans. Although she was formerly averse to accepting Dorothy as her student, it seems, unbeknownst to either of them, that the young witch's presence somehow alleviates Shasha's night terrors. Shasha has more recently proven herself a fierce competitor in the local 'Pumpkin Wars,' despite still not fully understanding the rules (although she would never admit it).

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_2.text: Relentless against her enemies and kind to her own people, Joan is beloved by both her comrades and the citizens of the kingdom. She seems to suffer much stress from Alexander's endless whims and impulses, but everyone knows that the loyal knight will never leave the Emperor's side.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_20.text: She fights for the fight itself. What does it matter whom or what she fights for? Only victory is important. Deep within, Harpya despises what she has become. Yet in order to forget, she must fight once more.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_21.text: Isis believes herself much more rational and collected than the free-spirited Set and the idealistic Osiris, but according to Lorelei, she is "the one who encourages the other two." As she has vowed to always remain by Osiris's side for all eternity, Isis has spent her entire life in the desert. Nevertheless, she does think that it would be nice to travel the world and see for herself the vast seas of Valencia and the frozen winter forests of Nosgard, exotic landscapes of which she has only heard passing tales.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_22.text: After being called "small fry" by her opponents and "a big frog in a small pond" by the elders of her house, Izuna has grown to despise the word "small" and, inconveniently, anything small. Supersize anything and everything: tea bowls, rice bowls, ribbons, you name it.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_23.text: Randgrid has no patience for the weak - and that includes herself. Her standards of what constitutes true strength are quite high, however, and comprise a variety of values, including one's intelligence. Recently she has given herself to learning the history of Hasla (two hours every day, no excuses!) in order to disprove the prejudice that warmongers are brainless idiots, and blonde warmongers especially more so.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_24.text: Cassia's soul may have let the magic blade 'Plaga' take over control of her body, but she continues to amusedly watch everything that happens to "us" from beyond the veil. Her only complaint is Plaga's fashion sense; why must she insist on dressing her physical body in such dark and frilly clothes? They have internal arguments every morning on the matter, but all things considered, they remain on good terms.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_25.text: When she first set out on her adventure away from home, Echidna quickly discovered that survival requires money, and that money does not grow from trees. Having quickly run out of funds, she had to resort to using the snakes that followed her everywhere she went; snake charming and snake venom alcohol fortunately fetched high prices among humans. Afterwards, out of guilt and regret, Echidna held an elaborate funeral for the snakes that died for her sake.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_26.text: Don't be fooled by Hak-Gyu's masterful act; in truth he has a vision of 40/40. Who knows what he is thinking behind those beady eyes? (We do: ways to rip off an innocent traveler of donations.)

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_27.text: Roskva may have been released from the curse of the Sanctuary, but her heart and feet remain bound to the past. She simply cannot bring herself to run anymore. The once energetic girl instead spends her days before the fireplace, staring at the flames. When Vernil manages to coax her out of doors, Roskva ensures that she wears the shoes that her brother left her many years ago.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_28.text: Nefer's vision has been failing for some time now, but she has discovered since then that her laser vision makes it incredibly cumbersome to get prescription glasses. Hence, she will often express frustration at her inability to read smaller runes and letters. And it is unfair, Nefer thinks, that she must endure the inconveniences of the modern world while failing to enjoy its benefits. The language and culture of these "new humans nowadays" can be difficult to understand, and sometimes she becomes fed up with everything. What a generation gap she must suffer!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_29.text: Always be modest. Remember your humble beginnings, the most important things that make you who you are. That is what Gwen tells herself as she rises with the sun and, like every other day since the one she had first held a blade in her hands, begins to train. Perhaps that is why the young knight is averse to change, and prefers to keep her hair short and her style simple.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_3.text: It is difficult to imagine that the courteous, mild-mannered warrior was once a rowdy country soldier who thought etiquette classes were worse than the most arduous training routines. But whenever Himiko falls in danger, anyone near Susanoo can hear that, despite all his external changes, his extensive knowledge of profanities has not been forgotten.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_30.text: Family connections? Pure talent? Leadership? Money? Handsome good looks? Morgan has it all... except a tad of discernment. Under his confident facade, Morgan is extremely self-conscious and frequently turns to others for validation, but his judgements are not always accurate. Those who offer bitter pills to swallow he instantly deems his worst enemy; those who lure him with poisonous honey, his good friends. Despite the numerous betrayals he has thus experienced, Morgan cannot imagine that he can be wrong in any way and continues to blame only others for his misfortunes.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_31.text: With the corruption of Soltar, the noble houses of Valencia all fled to neighboring kingdoms in search of refuge, save one: Laertes's father. The last Duke of Valencia knew his fate before it came to meet him. All knew within their silence that if he were guilty of any wrongdoing, then it was his desperate fidelity to the ailing country; the Duke thus ascended the scaffold with unwavering steps. Harboring a dignity rarely found, he basked in his last glimpse of his beloved homeland, facing death with the knowledge that he would forever remain a loyal vassal of Valencia. The execution of his father instilled an almost obsessive sense of responsibility in Laertes. Many years later, the people of Valencia would come to praise Laertes as their rightful ruler, but the margrave only believed it his obligation to protect the throne. And when the true king returned at last, Laertes finally found peace. He had kept his promise to his father. The kingdom would endure.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_32.text: Under the dark influence of the ring, Ares spared nothing in his path to gain more power. Only afterwards did he realize the expansive consequences of his actions. Since then, Ares has taken to apologizing profusely to his former victims. He becomes even more contrite when he drinks, which is often.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_33.text: Macaria tries to live up to her father's name, but beneath her rigid exterior, she is but an adolescent girl with too heavy a burden on her young shoulders. Unbeknownst to Macaria, the Styx soldiers devote themselves to guarding her safety at all hours from the secrecy of the shadows. She is family before she is their new lord, after all. And is it not the rightful duty of uncles and aunts to "take care of" those insolent boys who were centuries too early in asking out their sweet little niece?

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_34.text: Despite her apparent youth, Jack is older than any Demon in Hasla. A staunch traditionalist, she refuses to call Rachel, whom she deems a bastard and thus unqualified to succeed the throne of Hell, by the title of "princess." Jack's advanced age additionally makes it difficult to keep track of time. As a Dryad, she often reverts to living the "time of plants" and frequently discovers that many months have passed in what seemed to her like a blink of an eye.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_35.text: Titles make the man; such is the case for Hrolf. After being made the commander of the Royal Guard, he carefully honed his image and conduct to behoove his new status. To borrow his words, he is now "the manliest of men." Except, perhaps, when he comes across a cute baby animal in the woods. Or takes the first bite of a delectable dish he has never tasted before in his life. Or brags about the said delicacy to anyone who bothers to lend him an ear. Yes, except for all those times when he unintentionally returns to his meek, quiet old self, he is indeed the manliest of men.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_36.text: As he loathes his mechanized prosthetic arm, Dempsey only uses his right arm and hand for his everyday tasks. If need be, he entrusts the more difficult, delicate tasks that require both hands to his butler, whom he has hired with what remains of the family fortune.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_4.text: She inherited her father's obstinacy and her late mother's physical strength, two traits which only exacerbate her frequent quarrels with her father Gordian. Vivian used to be extremely vocal about her opposition to Gordian's second marriage, but the moment she first laid eyes on her newborn sister Rachel, she grudgingly decided she could like her stepmother after all.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_5.text: Originally conceived as a female model, Monte Cristo was redesigned as his current form at the request of the supervising team leader, who wanted "something cool." The marketing team was definitely not happy afterwards when they discovered male androids do not generate as much revenue.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_6.text: Every so often, defeated challengers demand for a second duel using not their swords, but only their fists. Kaori does not mind, however. She says pummeling her stunned opponents brings back fond memories of the karate classes she took in her childhood. A true warrior of Ryu can fight with both her blade AND her bare fists.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_7.text: Before his untimely death, Abel was a just and compassionate prince who saw the good in everyone he met, whether it be the most eminent aristocrat or the most accursed wretch. Most subjects adored the crown prince and thought him the perfect successor to the throne. There were some, however, who deplored his conscientious sympathy towards the refugees of the Neth Empire, the enemy nation in the two kingdoms' long war.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_8.text: The youngest chieftain in the history of the Wolf Tribe, Uzimant is a paragon of courage and prowess to all warriors. He breaks his stoic attitude only before his beloved, becoming uncharacteristically affectionate and expressive. It is rumored that his stranger garments were chosen by Alisha.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_6_9.text: Handsome and refined, Sworden is no stranger to the attention of the opposite sex - except when he opens his mouth, that is. His strange, anachronistic manner of speaking is thought to be a consequence of the illnesses he suffered in his childhood, when he would often crawl into a well-shaded nook in the family mansion and read tales of chivalrous knights and courageous warriors for hours on end.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_LIMITED_COUPLE_6.text: Can it be that he has developed some kind of psychological attachment to Schild, the first being he encountered in this dimension upon awakening? Yet he also finds Schild's cruelty truly despicable. Perhaps in their old world, before they lost their memories, they were not friends but enemies.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_LIMITED_FOURWEEK.text: After losing her mermaid fins, Maré can no longer navigate the waters as rapidly as she once did. Fortunately, she has discovered a new love of running on earth with her human feet. One can find her every morning jogging throughout the village.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_LIMITED_LASTSOUL.text: Pumpqueen simply could not STAND those hoity-toity witches acting as if they are queens of the city, dubbing themselves with conceited titles such as "the Four Great Witches." And when those witches began smashing her beloved pumpkins for a silly "Pumpkin War," dislike turned to loathing, and irritation turned to wrath.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_LIMITED_SPR_6_TW.text: Twillie is always in full armor during war. As the war with Gotruvin drags on, she has been in armor for quite some time now. She craves for the day when the war will finally end and she can return to her lacy pajamas and lovely hair ribbons, clips, and barrettes.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TNT_6_RA.text: As Rano was born in prehistoric times, she does not speak the Modern Common Haslean that is used throughout the continent. Thus, not many are aware that she was famous within her tribe for her eloquence. Rano is a quick learner, though, and with her natural knack for learning new languages, she may soon come to express herself fully once more.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_LIMTED_FOURTH_6_.text: Lednas has been noticing as of late that she repeatedly gets mistaken for a man. But what can be the reason for the misunderstanding? Her courage and composure? Her calm demeanor that disguises her occasional surprise at the antics of often eccentric heroes? Her skill in a wide variety of sports, excluding, perhaps, swimming? Lednas remains unconvinced that such traits, in any way, imply masculinity.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_SUPPORT_6_1.text: A boy who volunteered as a test subject at a laboratory in the Neth Empire to provide for his family, but was converted into an android... is the "backstory" that has been coded in his mechanical brain. The 'real' boy, Stan, returned home safely to his family a long time ago. His copies, the Battleloids, each believe that they are the real Stan through the personality chips embedded in their necklaces. As long as they believe in their "life" and the existence of their "family," they will continue to fight to their deaths.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_UNIQUE_6_JARYONG.text: Zilong has never admitted aloud that he actually enjoys Shuwen's long-winded conversations. Reticent and awkward in most social situations, the young general prefers listening to others over vocally expressing his own thoughts. Needless to 'say,' Shuwen is the perfect companion in this aspect, for the former Tiger General's incessant talking allows little room for replies. So comfortable does Zilong feel listening to Shuwen's tales that he often falls asleep, the latter's voice acting as soothing white noise lulling him to much-needed slumber. Shuwen, on the other hand, feels rather unappreciated before Zilong's snoring.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_UNIQUE_6_RAEL.text: Only now, after being freed from the darkness of the Fortress of Souls, does Rael see the error of her ways. Pride had driven her to grasp at a fleeting dream that would never truly fall into her grasp. As Rael lingers by Lionel's side, she sees for the first time what it truly means to be a king. She sees how heavy the burden of leading a kingdom lies on Lionel's shoulders, how humbly the man puts himself below his people. Rael's greatest desire now is to serve the man who she knows is the true king - her king. ... The knight admits, however, that she has had some misgivings about swearing fealty to Lionel as of late. This new murderous intent that follows her everywhere but narrowly escapes detection unsettles her. Can there be a killer in their midst?

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_1.text: A century's dedication to one's calling can prove exhausting even to Archana of the Chrona Heroes. Frankly speaking, she is burned out by the seemingly endless pile of responsibilities, duties, adventures, quests, and tasks... One day, after all her ordeals are over, Archana will file for a long overdue vacation. She will travel to the sunny beaches of Valencia and spend every day under the sun, swimming and drinking cocktails and enjoying herself like everyone else. One day. ... Just not today.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_10.text: Knowledge, that poisoned chalice. To pacify his ghouls, Necron must regularly sacrifice innocent souls for their consumption. To catch a glimpse of that enticing truth, he must contact increasingly powerful spirits. How many have seen beyond the veil, into that boundless realm where infernal knowledge abounds? Only he, Necron believes, has truly witnessed the darkness that lurks beneath and beyond these lands. The revelations of the world’s secrets he will collect one by one, as his victims pile one by one, and he will delve deeper into this dimension's thick web of deception. Even if the truth tears apart his body and condemns his soul, he will drink from that cup.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_11.text: Don’t underestimate Cano. It’s too easy to label her ‘only’ as Hasla’s number-one idol popstar and a pivotal member of the Night Witches, but Cano is far more intelligent than she lets on, as evinced by her perfect grades at the Magic Academy. In fact, many of Cano’s seemingly thoughtless actions have been calculated to arouse certain responses in others, which she predicts with high accuracy. Her agency and Wolfram treasure Cano for her versatility, acting skills, and lack of embarrassment in trying out new styles and looks.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_12.text: Demeter almost prides herself on being Chocolat's greatest rival. She secretly thinks Chocolat's cakes at least TASTE healthy, "considering it's only cake." Although she is young, Demeter has earned the wholehearted trust of the farmers of Grancia.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_13.text: He is doing the Goddess's work in her stead. None of them can be trusted, those sycophants who worm their way into his Goddess's graces. He, Her loyal servant, must remain wary against that undesired future in which his Goddess bestows Her love onto another, blinded by Her own kindness. His accusations of heresy and consequent executions are thus justified - even divine.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_14.text: Benjamin only wishes to be left alone. He abhors, more than anything in the world, "small talk." For what purpose, to what end would he engage in unnecessary conversation with these foolish mortals? It is a waste of precious time, time that he must employ to liberate 'her' - the divine - his dearest one.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_15.text: Lupeow always had a nose for money. After turning into a cat human, her nose became even more sensitive to profitable ventures. Too sensitive, in fact - her overly keen sense of smell makes her everyday life difficult. But who would have known she had the solution right under her 'nose'? Lupeow is severely allergic to dog fur, and she has discovered that whenever she is arrested by Dox – who has also recently transformed into a dog human -- she begins sneezing and sniffling, losing her sense of smell for at least a few days.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_16.text: The eldest of the Four Great Witches of Pumpkin City. Decades ago, Vesper was feared and revered by witches and wizards alike; deep in her lair, she seemed the epitome of cold and imposing majesty with her icy gaze that pierced one's heart; ruthless and aloof demeanor; and long, cascading hair that seemed a waterfall of silver. All called the demon not the Witch of Water, but "the Witch of Ice." Everyone now knows that her cold reticence was a consequence of her social awkwardness, and that she had only kept silent because she had not known what to say.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_17.text: Violet's favorite hobby is making dolls that resemble the people around her and giving them out as presents. As Violet imbues her work with her magic, the dolls from time to time move on their own, unwittingly frightening their new owners. Worse came to worst when Violet gave such a doll to the nun who had taken care of her and Viola in their childhood. She had meant it as an expression of her gratitude. But after the ensuing chaos of a botched exorcism and horrified priests, Violet has decided to keep her artwork private for the time being.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_18.text: Yichui's trials and tribulations in researching the flame atop her head eventually led to her acceptance at the Magic Academy of Pumpkin City. After all these years, she has only learned that the flame is a special form of magic that the Bunny King, who is mysteriously attuned with her soul, is channeling from another dimension. She herself is unsatisfied with the results of her research, but Estelle, her thesis supervisor, seems to have taken a liking to her for her diligence and work ethic. Yichui has received various scholarship offers for graduate school, which she is still deliberating.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_19.text: Had she not run away from the realm of Elves in search of another future, Wolfram would have been throned as her people's next queen. The rigidity of her people, their obsessive love of nature, their haughty dismissal of the outside world - she found them all repulsive. Wolfram wished for adventure, for excitement, for chaos. Such is why she decided to become a professional gambler, the polar opposite of the Elves' traditional values, and set out for casinos of Grancia. Five years later, having lost her entire fortune, the Elf had to resort to teaching magic to fledgling wizards and witches for a living; her fame spread, and soon afterwards, Wolfram established the first official school of magic in Hasla. From these humble beginnings, Pumpkin City was born.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_2.text: Every day she looks death in the eye, and agony burns her within. Korin is careful to always have a smile plastered to her face when guiding the dead, but at times she wishes she could have another life than that of a death messenger. Such is why she cherishes the few hours that she spends with Bihyeongrang from time to time; only their conversations, filled with inconsequential quips and an almost resolute humdrum, divert her attention away from the scale of life and death.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_20.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment. I will not speak of my tortured past. I will instead look to my peace within.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_21.text: Osiris's grave temperament, polite manners, and mature visage all contribute to the impression of being the oldest of the desert trio. He is, in fact, the youngest. Set - who has an uncanny ability of sensing ways to be annoying - often teases him, calling him "Old Timer" and "O Wise Elder Osiris," while Isis rolls her eyes at the former and tells Osiris that he shouldn't pay any attention to Set. The disparity between his appearance and his actual age should not bother him so much, Osiris knows. But it does!

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_22.text: The icy plains of Nosgard resonate with tales hundreds of years old, featuring a jester who found malicious enjoyment in tricking others with his cunning. Most were of the true Loki; others, of pretenders who falsely claimed his name to harm those they hated. Loki does not mind the existence of his imposters, however. He only wishes to spread more chaos, and if some agree with his views - well, the more the merrier! He still has standards, though, and will not allow for banal trickery that fails to entertain him.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_23.text: Despite his flippant, indifferent attitude, Han Xiangzi can master any subject in four days... when he feels like it. His disrespect towards his instructors, whom he easily outsmarts, may stem from such genius. The only people whom Han Xiangzi acknowledges as his true masters are the Ethereals He Xiangu and Lu Dongbin.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_24.text: A brief slumber, hazy dreams, and then - her home and kin, forever lost to the passage of time. Her world she unwittingly abandoned hundreds of years ago remain a heavy burden on her heart. At times, she thinks the cold that clutches her soul will never thaw: the guilt of a chieftain who failed her people, loathing for Loki to whom she sacrificed all for naught. Her gaze no longer falls upon her people. And yet here, among the ice and snow, remains proudly standing the great ancient city. Only the reconstruction of Elder Edda gives her hope; her new responsibilities, a brief respite from her longing for the past.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_25.text: Contrary to other death messengers, Grim Reaper has never led a human life. He therefore does not understand how or why other death messengers let themselves be led astray by fragile emotions like compassion and remorse. His world is defined only by the will and law of Thanatos: great king of the underworld, lord of all death messengers, the one who created and guided him, made him as he is now.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_26.text: When she lived with her dad, the oni Ura, in the island of Onigashima, it had seemed okay for Urako not to have any thoughts for her future. She had everything she needed, the most important of which was her collection of sappy romance novels from the mainland. The only dreams she had were her colorful daydreams featuring her imaginary would-be boyfriend, who closely resembled the pretty men illustrated beautifully in the said romance novels. Yes, she would meet the handsome 'bad boy' of her dreams, someday, and she would know love for its worth. But when an unexpected series of events knocked Urako into reality and opened her eyes to a new type of 'bad boy,' she found herself confused by the myriad of conflicting emotions that engulfed her.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_28.text: The dead do not speak. Engulfed in madness, hatred, contempt, desperation fear - the passions that had gripped them at the moment of their death - they have lost all ability to reflect on anything else. The long years spent among them have taught Bihwa too well the vileness of humanity at their rawest and basest. She therefore does not trust the carefully constructed facades they don in the world of the living. In the end, all shall meet with death, and they will fester in their own flames.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_29.text: Wang Dao deemed bian lian only as a means to an end: his revenge against the Emperor of Chen. But when a young and cocky Tiger General dismissed his performance as "a couple of tricks, nothing more" at the royal feast, Wang Dao became truly angry - then confused. He senses that the indifference that fooled even himself has given away, without his knowing it, to true attachment to his arts.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_3.text: A true genius who easily surpasses years' worth of other witches' achievements in a matter of days. The other witches are reluctant to collaborate with her, in fears of being seen as a fool. Only the Four Great Witches of Pumpkin City could understand the deep complexities of Dorothy's brilliant mind, but when the young witch, despite their guidance, surrendered to her unrestrained curiosity and turned to dark magic, they too left her. None believe that Dorothy's intentions can be pure, unlike other dark mages whose desire for knowledge eternally corrupted their souls. Armed with her luminous intellect and keen rationality, the young witch continues to seek the ore of truth that whispers to her from within the darkness.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_30.text: Labelle's grandfather was an ordinary tailor whose only defining trait was his diligence. When he took his retirement after decades of hard work, he passed on both his shop and his list of regular customers to his granddaughter. The elderly patrons had been frequenting the tailor for many years, and were familiar to Labelle, whom they had showered with affection since her childhood as if she were their own granddaughter. But Labelle was and still is more grateful for their genuine love and appreciation for her grandfather's work. Even after her promotion to Imperial Seamstress, Labelle will prioritize her grandfather’s patrons’ orders before any of her other reservations - even if they order only a single shirt.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_31.text: To hone her magic as the idiosyncratic 'Witch of Stars,' Estelle regularly observes the celestial bodies in their heavenly orbit. Her diligence in surveying the heavens have resulted in a stunning discovery: contrary to other planets and stars, Hasla is flat! Quivering in excitement, Estelle at once published her findings to the prestigious academic circles of witches and wizards. She has not had much luck in persuading anyone to believe her, however; ridiculed as a superstitious conspiracy theorist, the witch has had to face many sarcastic (but also difficult-to-prove) questions, such as "If Hasla is flat, why don't people fall off at the edge?"

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_32.text: His mind now a conduit for the strange voice of the Book, Shu Gwi now looks without seeing and eats without tasting. But what's this? The impressions that once imprinted on his consciousness are now curiously transferred onto the pages of the Book, his swirling sensations reduced to the clean cuts of language. Shu Gwi finally understands what he has been craving after all along, and departs. His desires and the Book's are now as one.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_33.text: After she nearly destroyed her forest with her overconfidence in her own magic, Éfendére took Linné's advice to heart and adopted more organic agricultural methods. Her obsession with vibrant, soil-depleting flowers has not faded, however. Éfendére's recent attempts to create a more potent "fertilizer cocktail" resulted in hours and hours of lecturing from Linné.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_34.text: As a child, Caroline Ludovico wanted to become a singer. Those of the noble House of Ludovico, the presiding aristocratic family of the Neth Empire, would not hear of it; how could their dynasty member devote herself to a passion as undignified as music? Caroline's genius in the sciences further sealed her fate. She would have all but forgotten her childhood dreams years later, when she would have gained tremendous prestige and renown as the leading research officer of the Neth Army. But when a chance melody found its way into her heart and impelled her to sing once more, Caroline's life was changed - forever.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_35.text: Medea has become madness embodied, tarnished by the grief of losing her sister and a thirst for vengeance. Yet a fragment of her compassionate nature yet remains, and shines forth, when she meets those who are humble in their abilities. Yes, she will become the silent patron of the gifted, the guardian of the blessed. The wretches who in their greed exploit her innocent benefactors shall receive the punishment waiting in her poisoned chalice.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_36.text: The currents of time have not washed away his longing for the nameless girl he lost long ago, whose ocean-colored hair he still sees in the darkness of his dreams. To bear his sorrows, he turns to his words. He writes poetry, verses and verses veiled with regret. One day, Eungaram thought that he could share his poems with the other Guardian Spirits, and that a tiger spirit's birthday would be the perfect occasion. What should have been a joyous celebration quickly filled with tears and wails, and from that day onwards, Eungaram vowed to keep his verses to himself.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_4.text: When he is surrounded by the warmth of his new family, Sasquatch feels as if he could forget the crippling loneliness that once overshadowed his past. Now, he is happy. He was especially surprised to encounter Lakias, the only blood relation he has ever met (the older sister of his great-great-grandmother) and whom he now calls ‘Auntie.’ Before chance brought them together with those of Elder Edda, Sasquatch and Lyudmilla were always on the run from the dangers that hunted them without end; now, he and everyone precious to him can be together, safe in the ancient city: their new home.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_5.text: The denizens of the night whisper that their queen returned through her mastery of dark magic... but in truth, it was her rigorous skin care routine and plenty of exercise that did the trick. Quiet and reserved, Lilith has no intentions of pursuing a romantic relationship or interests that require her going outside. She would much rather dwell in the comfort of her own home, reading books or researching unchartered territories of magic. As of late, the witch has purchased a film projector from the Neth Empire, engrossed with their recent invention called 'movies.'

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_6.text: The Succubus troupe is renowned not only in the island of Hell but also the entirety of Hasla; everyone in the continent has either seen or heard of their performance. It is rumored that even the Holy City of Elandia in the Grancia Empire, the religious capital of the Order of the Goddess, has unofficially lifted its prohibition against demons only for the dancers of the Succubus. Rachel is proud of her troupe's achievements and does everything in her power to make every performance the best one.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_7.text: To the world, she is known as the Queen of Spades, the reigning champion of Super Fighting Cards. To her parents, she is known as the Queen of Failures, the black sheep of the family, a problem student who repeated a grade not only once, but twice due to her "silly video game addiction." Yet it seems addictions can easily become talents and gifts, especially when Alice buys her parents an entire mansion with her winnings as their wedding anniversary present.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_8.text: Although he feels most at home in nature with his wilder friends, Nazrune also enjoys reveling and drinking in town together with the other Frost Elves. Everything changed, however, after he received nature's prophecy heralding the dangers that loomed ahead...

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_9.text: Official records state that Mondrian was banished from his village due to the political machinations of a corrupt magistrate. The villagers, on the other hand, whisper another version of the story. According to the witnesses, it was Mondrian who brought on himself his own dismissal. On the magistrate's birthday, Mondrian stormed into the party and began shouting that he "shouldn't be holding such an extravagant feast in the midst of a famine": an entirely just accusation, of course. But when, to everyone's horror, Mondrian knocked off the magistrate's wig to reveal a shiny bald head... Well, let's just say that some lines aren't meant to be crossed. Nobody - not even the most odious of officials - should suffer such humiliation on their own birthday; that is how the villagers see it.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_LIMITED_AUTO_6_N.text: Nicola loves children more than anyone. It is her dream in life to protect their happy smiles from the corruption of the world. For instance, for a little girl who cried over her "disappearing" sweets, she developed a candy that can be sucked on without ever growing smaller. Disregarding Nicola's good intentions, the Department of Weapons Development of the Neth Army has taken great interest in her latest invention. It seems they've found ways to use the surprisingly light and durable candy for their newest line of tanks.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_LIMITED_AUTUMN_6.text: Anzu is actually the heir to a noble house of Ryu. 'The Protection of the Wind Blade' that guards her is, in truth, the power of a household deity that has been protecting their ancient lineage for generations. After the flames of war swallowed her home, the young Anzu - the sole survivor of her line - lost her memories from the shock. She wandered through the ravished lands, until she stumbled upon the entrance of the Forest of Eternal Autumn.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_LIMITED_EAST_6_F.text: He only exists to become a vessel of pure light. He thinks and acts with only that sole purpose in mind. After years of education at the Order, Fredrick has been forged anew - and he must keep it that way. His unhealthy obsession with cleanliness and purity drives him to wash his clothes if brushed with the smallest speck of dust and forgo stew and soup for less messy food. His room he keeps an immaculate, gleaming temple where even the faintest contamination is forbidden.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_LIMITED_FIFTH_6_.text: The embodiment of Pandora's negative emotions, Anesidora made a grand entrance to Hasla... but has had nothing much to do since then. To pass the time, she started traveling on foot to various destinations in Hasla. The landscapes, cultures, and peoples she had initially known only as preexisting information in her mind became suddenly very real to her. Life, on foot, began to move with her. Anesidora now thinks she can even call her physical existence in this plane of dimension - happy. Lately she has been working odd jobs throughout the city of Impalis, earnest to experience everything life sends her way.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SIXTH_6_.text: The forbidden magic infused Camilla with strength like that of the old gods, lost and forgotten. But strength always asks for a sacrifice, which she was forced to give in the form of her memories before she entered the experiment. She still wonders about the man who appeared to her in her dreams, his hand in hers, dancing away the night. She does not dream of him anymore, not after she received her bindings as the Guardian of the Ruins. She has forgotten him, completely - but what of this tear that falls down her cheek?

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_LIMITED_SPR_6_AN.text: The most powerful telekinesis user in Gotruvin, Ana was born with a physical disability that paralyzed her legs, rendering her unable to walk. For more than a decade, however, no one noticed the child's disability. It was revealed only later that Ana's telekinesis moved her lower body where her muscles failed. After reaching adulthood, Ana harnessed her powers to the mechanized muskets for which the House of Heinkel was renowned, successfully mobilizing and commanding an entire brigade. From that day on, Ana became known as the "Bane of Tasitte," and her name came to rouse fear in the hearts of her enemies.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_LOVIATA.text: The nature of her inherent magic may have formed her current personality: reserved and undemanding, much like the mushrooms that grow in shaded woods. And like those mushrooms, Loviatar is unfazed by external factors and patiently continues to do the things that she must do. As she does not need to sleep, the witch has been using the extra hours to organize the results of her research into a book on earth magic. The resulting work, 'An Elementary Guide to Elemental Magic,' remains decades later a must-read classic for even wizards attuned to other elementals.

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_1.text: Protests of the Animal Loving Adventurers, wildfire

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_10.text: Undesirable emotions, any damage to my reputation

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_11.text: Raisins in desserts; vegetables with strong smells, such as cucumber and celery

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_13.text: Marching drills, being reminded of my age

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_15.text: Efficiency-oriented thinking, conventional and uninspired dances

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_17.text: Talking loudly, church bells, loud noises

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_18.text: Sewing, Papa's lectures on being ladylike and securing a good marriage

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_19.text: Nessus, any damage to Master Heth's reputation

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_2.text: Being slower than yesterday, being in a slump

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_20.text: Those who judge a book by its cover, Shuwen

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_23.text: Prejudice and judgement against single dads

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_26.text: Nightmares of bygone memories, the feeling of damp cloth against skin

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_3.text: Immoderation, the excessive and lavish Empire style and aesthetics, official uniforms and ceremonies during which I have to wear them, Leon's babbling

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_30.text: The subject of Captain Magnus's unwavering attention, my age

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_32.text: Defective bullets, misfired shots, shaky hands

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_33.text: Fliers, false witnesses who claim they have seen Arche, Arche's absence

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_4.text: Injustice, the incomprehensible caprice of the whimsical Emperor to whom I have vowed my allegiance, a noble young lady who despises me for some unknown reason, my archers refusing my party invitations

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_5.text: Unpredictable actions, incomprehensible expressions of emotion

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_7.text: Criticism for the sake of criticism, bigotry, greasy food of the Neth Empire

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_8.text: The Wolf Tribe, any danger that threatens my people

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_LIMITED_BEARS_.text: Selfish Beron hogging all the salmon, selfish humans hogging all the salmon

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_LIMITED_GOGI_6.text: Remaining content with the status quo, Delrien's mischief

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_10.text: PTSD of losing to Vane, ocular neuropathic pain

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_12.text: The turbulent political atmosphere of the Eastern Kingdoms, having to shave regularly, being misunderstood for my frequent sighing

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_13.text: Anything that harms Victoria's elegance, stalkers, fungus

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_2.text: Random love confessions, UV radiation, horses

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_21.text: Comments about my weight, unappetizing meals

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_24.text: Poverty, greasy food, cheap clothes, unsanitary living conditions, cheapskates

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_26.text: Fighting in open terrain, blizzards, my dark past

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_28.text: UV radiation, rain, people who threaten or covet Jarvis

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_30.text: Making introductions, Neth corporations, Popo, Captain

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_32.text: Taxes, past pop star personality 'Miyu,' stage budget limits

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_33.text: The heat of lava, people who do not understand that bugs make great pets and who instead insist on squashing them

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_36.text: Logical fallacies, people who refuse to learn, impractical idealism

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_6.text: Demons, tasteless but expensive alcohol, cigarette smoke

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_LIMITED_GOGI_6.text: The village elders who think I'm still too little, humans who live at the foot of the mountains, cockroaches

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_1.text: Showing the top of my head, Odin's silky hair, paperwork

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_11.text: Overly difficult words, violence in the name of justice, my embarrassing past

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_12.text: People with all bark and no bite

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_14.text: Dishonorable acts, brutish behavior that stems from avarice

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_16.text: Magic stakes (Pumpkin), mass destruction (Tin Pot), peace (Demon)

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_17.text: Traveling long distances, crying babies, pets in general

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_20.text: Picky eaters; restaurants that serve terrible, almost inedible food; dine and dash

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_22.text: Zilong's long-winded speeches, the cheeky troublemaker who keeps running off to Han, Shuwen

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_24.text: Being compared to Cano, being ranked lower than Cano, a poorly synchronized performance

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_25.text: My comrades getting injured, the Order of the Central Knights

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_3.text: Other people's crying, claims of moral high ground, Athena and Hector

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_32.text: The Inquisitors of the Order of the Goddess, dichotomous thinking, my existence

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_35.text: The messenger of death who pesters me from time to time, frost damage to my armor

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_36.text: Guests who don't RSVP, parties that end too early

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_6_29.text: Heart-to-heart conversations, training, friendly duels, face-to-face combat

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_6_30.text: The cheers of the crowd, my Champion Belt

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_6_35.text: The Elder Edda Renovation Committee, my tombstone, Wolfgang

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_6_36.text: Making new friends, holding birthday parties, celebrating anniversaries

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_6_4.text: Good wine, lemons, fresh meat, interesting tales

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_6_5.text: Happy memories, planning the future with Siegfried, dreaming of a better world

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_6_7.text: Apples, the number six, lamb meat

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_6_9.text: Glory scars, my stallion, flower arrangements

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_LIMITED_6_1.text: Catching big fish, training by myself

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_LIMITED_APFOOL.text: Trendy dessert shops, wrist wraps, sewing

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_LIMITED_LASTSO.text: The delicious fear of young witches

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PA_UNIQUE_6_UMRAT.text: Overhearing other people's conversations, sunlight, shopping for clothes

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_10.text: Lively melodies, Palaku fanning me with his ears on hot days

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_11.text: Listening to Asmo mumbling in his sleep, Demona, desserts

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_13.text: Jewelry that brings out my eyes, genuine people

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_14.text: Teasing Lionel, reading through the night

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_15.text: Macarons from Chocolat's Bakery, instant coffee mix

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_17.text: Land culture, seashells, singing, red-haired humans

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_18.text: Volunteer work, visits to the orphanage, practice duels with Roland

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_19.text: Plants in nature, vegetarianism, floral accessories

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_20.text: Acorn noodle soup, human clothing, Yuki as MY shikigami

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_21.text: My security pillow, sleep socks, military sleeping bags

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_24.text: Board games, my cape that allows me to make a dramatic and masculine appearance

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_26.text: ????, cool and dry places, high-quality ink

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_27.text: Sprays from 'Underground,' the Scrappy Gang, clean white walls to be drawn on

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_28.text: The name 'Gueronica,' premium oil, the girl's sketchbook

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_29.text: The crystal ball preserving an image of Cano singing at the freshman talent show, the glasses Cano thinks she lost after tripping and falling, Cano's school uniform ribbon, the handkerchief Cano gave me for my nosebleed, Cano's... [the list continues]

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_3.text: Maria, the smell of disinfectant, the Neth Army uniform

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_31.text: Malsook's tteok, revenge against the bully tigers

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_32.text: Discovering new ways to make profit

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_33.text: The late Hera, dinner parties, excursions, holiday bonuses

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_35.text: The flowerpots sent by my mysterious friend, morning sunshine, the scent of fresh linen

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_8.text: Unchartered areas of knowledge, my magnifying glass

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTO_6.text: Love and care, happy children enjoying their presents, jingle bells

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_LIMITED_AUTUMN.text: Anzu, sweet and fluffy cotton candy, hazelnuts

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_LIMITED_EAST_6.text: Tight-fitting leather belts, the scar on my forehead

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_LIMITED_SEVENT.text: Thinking up new dessert recipes, protein shakes

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_11.text: My dearest darling D'Artagnan, peace and quiet, 'Allegro Assai' (rapier)

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_13.text: Afternoon tea served by Tia, the latest fashion in the Empire, high-quality black tea produced by the best artisans in the Empire

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_18.text: Offering advice on the grievances of the dead

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_19.text: Anything hot, like myself, including fashion

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_2.text: Elegantly designed armor, high-quality black tea

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_24.text: New tidbits of knowledge, interesting and potentially dangerous rumors

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_25.text: Seeing the world, things seen for the first time

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_27.text: Running faster than the speed of falling snowflakes, visiting the place where I used to live

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_28.text: Fresh blood, bubble baths, hand cream

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_29.text: Hard work and training, short hair

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_3.text: Sweets, proving my worth against class discrimination

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_30.text: Positions of power, fame, songs of praise sung in one's honor

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_31.text: Keeping the peace and safety of my people, discovering like-minded subordinate officers, my sweet if misguided granddaughter Rael

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_35.text: Animals, well-sharpened axes, a warrior's honor, learning on the job

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_4.text: Rachel (the cutest little sister in the world, I WILL cut you down if you disagree), spicy chicken flavored instant noodles

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_6.text: Hikari, visiting the Archery Club, acknowledgement of my talents

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_6_8.text: Alisha, my one and only love

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_LIMITED_LASTSO.text: Pumpkin soup, quiet time, a room of my own, pet pumpkins

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_LIMITED_SPR_6_.text: Displaying my collection of hair accessories, trying on my collection by myself in the dead of night

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TNT_6_.text: Juicy meat, fish, riding on Rex's back

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_10.text: The last screams of my victims, contracting more powerful spirits

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_11.text: My school friends, cute accessories, the color pink

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_12.text: Upgrading my scarecrows, developing healthy bread recipes

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_15.text: Mew's top secret fish bun recipe, small and shiny items of value

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_19.text: Much-needed alone time, bright students who show promise

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_2.text: Holidays, successfully guiding evil spirits to receive their punishment

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_21.text: Excavation work, ancestors' heirlooms, Isis and Set

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_22.text: Tricks and pranks of all kind, baseless rumors

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_23.text: Candied fruit, meat kebabs, peach flower sweet wine

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_24.text: The snowy landscapes of Elder Edda, Odin's uncharacteristic blushing

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_25.text: Compliments about my competence, efficiency and productivity

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_28.text: Bells, the spirits I have known from my childhood, sacred food offerings

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_29.text: The adrenaline that courses through my veins before a performance

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_3.text: Oz (my cat), studying and developing dark magic, my journal in which I record my magic experiments

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_30.text: Fabric shopping, the patisseries in Impalis

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_31.text: Observing the celestial bodies, having my nails done, mystery novels

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_33.text: Big and vibrant flowers, the smell of the forest after rain

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_36.text: My pebble, tea brewed with water from my river

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_6.text: Vivian, my troupe family, dance costumes

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_7.text: The title of 'the Queen of Spades,' my fans, challengers who can hold their own ground

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_8.text: My antlers, flying on Griffon's back

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_6_9.text: Siroo tteok, spring pastures, drinking games

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_LIMITED_AUTO_6.text: Nice children, candy, the Christmas corporation

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_LIMITED_AUTUMN.text: Ginkgo trees, autumn leaves, raccoons, steamed sweet potatoes

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_LIMITED_EAST_6.text: Clean white clothes, the scar on my forehead

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_LOVIA.text: Dark and humid places, Arita, Wolfram

TEXT_RARE_3G_STONE_1_DESC.text: Georgia's mineral tattoo that she had on her back. It's shaped like the scythe of a reaper.

TEXT_RARE_3G_STONE_2_DESC.text: Gujarat's magnifying glass that he used to aim his shots. It seems to be a product of the Neth Empire.

TEXT_RARE_ACCURACY_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Accuracy of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_AMMUT_STONE_1_DESC.text: Hmm, could this be chicken? Or does it taste more like pork?

TEXT_RARE_AMMUT_STONE_2_DESC.text: Legend has it that soup cooked with this scale grants immortality. Unfortunately, its foul smell eliminates any thought related to food.

TEXT_RARE_ANUBISIS_STONE_1_DESC.text: Created out of the finest cloth and used only by royalty. It is comfortable beyond measure.

TEXT_RARE_ANUBISIS_STONE_2_DESC.text: A pectoral decorated with lapis lazuli. A lone ancestral spirit seems to be lingering within...

TEXT_RARE_ATK_POWER_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Attack Power of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_BLOODHOUND_STONE_1_DESC.text: A small air conditioner found in Blood Hound’s coat. Especially useful if you’re equipped with a lot of overheating machines.

TEXT_RARE_BOUILLABAISSE_STONE_1_DESC.text: The core of the machine Bouillabaisse used to increase his acceleration force.

TEXT_RARE_CHANGGWI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A barrel cover with an animal-print that Changgwi decorated his gun with. It's actually made of cowhide, but it feels great.

TEXT_RARE_CODEVV_STONE_1_DESC.text: A heat tile made of mercury and unobtanium alloy, the latter of which leaks out of Rapture Science in small amounts. It dissipates heat so well that it even withstands V’s Slash attacks.

TEXT_RARE_CODEVV_STONE_2_DESC.text: Excellent head gear recovered from V’s old body frame. Recorded within are V-Berserk’s history data. Although the data consists of only unnecessary actions, it still seems to increase androids’ attack power when applied.

TEXT_RARE_CRIT_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_CRIT_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Critical Chance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_DALGI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A hairpin made with poisonous wood. Turn the golden ornament to see the sharp end.

TEXT_RARE_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_DODGE_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Evasion of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_DOMPERIGNON_STONE_1_DESC.text: A fragment of "humanity." Holding it in your hand evokes many emotions: happiness, guilt, sorrow, despair, rage, death…

TEXT_RARE_ENBYEONG_STONE_1_DESC.text: A poster scroll of Five Tiger General Hansheng and Shuwen discussing about strategies. It shows the artist's ulterior motive.

TEXT_RARE_EVE606_STONE_1_DESC.text: It may seem like ordinary wreckage, but it boasts tremendous durability and weight as it once constituted Galatea’s physical body.

TEXT_RARE_EVE606_STONE_2_DESC.text: The one eye of EVE-606, said to predict the future. It is actually a computing device equipped with a high-performance camera.

TEXT_RARE_FREYJA_STONE_1_DESC.text: Allegedly, this necklace is supposed to grant immense beauty to its wearer. But maybe it's just a rumor, and Freyja is exceedingly beautiful even without it? Or at least that's what the warriors of the Einherjar think, anyway.

TEXT_RARE_FREYJA_STONE_2_DESC.text: Rumored to be one of the secrets to Freyja's beauty, this golden essence is said to create flawless skin. Needless to say, it is coveted by countless people.

TEXT_RARE_GAPGWI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A lump of rock salt that Guard Captain Gapgwi carries for Ochu. It's absolutely needed for a cow's health.

TEXT_RARE_GENERALWINTER_STONE_1_DESC.text: If there is one thing General Winter is proud of, it's his beard: seemingly rough and coarse, but velvety soft upon touch. He took care of it quite diligently.

TEXT_RARE_GENERALWINTER_STONE_2_DESC.text: It may resemble an ordinary conch, but 'Ahh!' is actually the roar of General Winter frozen into physical form. If you put your ear to it, you can hear the echoing shouts and war-cries.

TEXT_RARE_GG_STONE_1_DESC.text: The controlstone that Georg and Geralt used to regulate their synchronization level. The default amount is 30%.

TEXT_RARE_GG_STONE_2_DESC.text: Georg's necklace. On it are engraved the words 'Best friends forever, GG.'

TEXT_RARE_JANGPO_STONE_1_DESC.text: A poster scroll of Five Tiger General Hansheng when he was young. How handsome!

TEXT_RARE_JANGSANBEOUM_STONE_1_DESC.text: Jang San Beom's fluffy fur. It feels like a cloud, but it's heavier than expected.

TEXT_RARE_JERAPHIM_STONE_1_DESC.text: A device that controls energy within the Temple. It loses all power outside, becoming nothing more than an oddly durable rock.

TEXT_RARE_JERAPHIM_STONE_2_DESC.text: A fragment of Jeraphim's halo. How on earth did one break this sturdy thing?

TEXT_RARE_LEESIN_STONE_1_DESC.text: Ratoichi's eyepatch, which he began to wear after he lost his sight to the filth of the sewers.

TEXT_RARE_LEESIN_STONE_2_DESC.text: The belongings of the Warrat who taught Ratoichi all that he knew. It helped to control his senses, which perceived a single drop of water as loudly as thunder.

TEXT_RARE_MATAHARI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A mark that Matahari held in her possession. It is given to the Musketeers of Trista.

TEXT_RARE_MAX_HP_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Maximum HP of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_NATI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A precious crystal of Ishimi. It was thought to be a dragon ball, but it was just a gallstone.

TEXT_RARE_OMEGA_STONE_1_DESC.text: A crystal eye attached to the mask of Test Subject Omega. It provides the wearer with all-penetrating vision.

TEXT_RARE_OMEGA_STONE_2_DESC.text: An organ of sixth sense attached through surgery. It lets one see things that cannot be usually seen.

TEXT_RARE_PANDEMONIUM_STONE_1_DESC.text: Pandemonium’s mighty claw. On the inside are engraved an ornate pattern and the words “Developed by the greatest genius scientist Gunther, who threatens the power of the Goddesses themselves."

TEXT_RARE_PANDEMONIUM_STONE_2_DESC.text: Pandemonium’s left arm component. Open it to see the words “I am now death, the destroyer of the world.”

TEXT_RARE_PENETRATE_DEF_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Armor Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_PENETRATE_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance Penetration of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_QIONGQI_STONE_1_DESC.text: A claw of Qiongqi, one of the four evils. Good-hearted people will face a misfortune if they get close to this claw.

TEXT_RARE_RAVENLEADERRAN_STONE_1_DESC.text: Anxious about being the only white-haired assassin in the Night Ravens, Ran has been secretly using hair dye to fit in with the rest of her troop. Recently she has given it up after discovering the excessive damage done to her hair.

TEXT_RARE_RAVENLEADERRAN_STONE_2_DESC.text: The white mask worn by Captain Ran. Rumor has it that she was rescued by a passing 'evil spirit' and afterwards vowed to wear this mask to honor him.

TEXT_RARE_RECEIVE_DMG_RATE_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Damage Reduction rate of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_RI_DELTASQUAD_STONE_1_DESC.text: The official equipment of Road Industry’s private troops. As the soldiers often face wizards in battle, it has high resistance to magic but is ironically more vulnerable to bullets.

TEXT_RARE_RSFLAMETANK_STONE_1_DESC.text: A fragment of a Rapture Science Upgraded Flame Tank’s gun barrel. It is composed of a special alloy made to withstand the flames of synthetic spirits.

TEXT_RARE_RST_STONE_1_DESC.text: Increases the Resistance of a Soulbound weapon.

TEXT_RARE_SEKHMET_STONE_1_DESC.text: The essence of fire concentrated through Sekhmet's powers. It is blazingly hot, but can still be touched.

TEXT_RARE_SEKHMET_STONE_2_DESC.text: A fragment of the horn headdress always worn by the Queen on the battlefield. It boosts morale.

TEXT_RARE_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_1_DESC.text: A liquid found running through Narmer's joints. It regularly glows.

TEXT_RARE_SET_DEFFENCE_STONE_2_DESC.text: A levitating stone bearing the wear of time. It still weakly floats above your hand.

TEXT_RARE_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: Don't let its simple appearance fool you - this material is essential to the mobility of the armor.

TEXT_RARE_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: The blue blood spilt by the Incarnate. It is of a strange color and texture, almost as if intangible.

TEXT_RARE_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_3_DESC.text: One of the many steel plates that fell from Bjorn's shield. Arraying it into layers provides protection that no weapon can penetrate.

TEXT_RARE_SET_DEF_EP2_STONE_4_DESC.text: A fragment of armor weathered by the harsh winds that ravished the northern lands long ago.

TEXT_RARE_SET_HEAL_STONE_1_DESC.text: Machinery found in Khasekhemwy's core. The light at its center cannot be quenched.

TEXT_RARE_SET_HEAL_STONE_2_DESC.text: The crown from Banoub's head. Shattered yet still beautiful in its pride.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAGIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: A shard emanating blue light. Holding it in your hand, you are vaguely comforted.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAGIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: A blade found within Narmer's tail. You probably shouldn't run around while holding it.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_AIR_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: Durable cable used to hold incomplete Battleloids' frames in place. The cable is made of technology as advanced as that used in constructing the main robot.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_ATK_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A handmade Night Witch badge, with the words 'Loviatar, Night Witch Third Division' sewn in the back.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_ATK_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: The ribs of a luminous moray that inhabits the deep waters of the mystical sea. They are of extraordinary hardness and, in the hands of an excellent swordsman, will serve as a valuable weapon against enemies from other dimensions.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_ATK_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: A jewel carrying a part of the consciousness of the 'Deepest Abyss,' as used when they imitated Habaek's dream. Hold it and fragmented memories of another dimension will flow into your mind.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_DEF_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A mask once known throughout the continent as the feared face of an Apostle. Sometimes its eyes will light up for seemingly no reason at all...

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_DEF_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A torn piece of a robe that belonged to a king whose name cannot be mentioned. On the back the reason for his notoriety is written: 'You must not call his name. The king of yellow will come and destroy your kingdom. The last of a doomed land leave this final warning to you.'

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: A block of ice that cracked off Logi's body. It coldly burns with a blue flame.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: A fragment of Bjorn's broken hammer. Its unimpressive size hides its massive weight.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_SP_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: Moss that can be found growing on the metal coverings of Battleloids. Containing great quantities of pure mana, it is a valuable research material.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_SP_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A mysterious powder that allows one to see things that usually go unseen. Those who use it report sightings of terrible creatures that continue to exert their influence in nightmares.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_1_DESC.text: A shard emanating red light. It makes you rather anxious...

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHYSIC_STONE_2_DESC.text: A fractured rock that used to be a part of Khasekhemwy. You can feel a mysterious power within.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_AIR_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A cylinder alloy specially built to withstand the power of Battleloids that have been upgraded with all kinds of magical engineering weapons.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_ATK_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: One of the power sources that fuel Battleloid ST006. Turning the crank will generate power at surprisingly efficient rates.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_ATK_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: The mucus exuded by an otherworldly creature crawling the lowest floors of the deep sea. It refuses to dry or adhere to anything, almost as if it cannot mix with anything of this world.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_ATK_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: The fragment of an extremely durable glass mirror that used to serve as the door between worlds, but was destroyed by the power of light.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_DEF_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A voice changer tuned to the voice of the Apostle Nemesis. If you turn off the settings, it will instead play the voice of a lonely old man.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_DEF_EP4_STONE_1_DESC.text: A stone on which the Deros, the residents of 'Lemuria,' carved their likenesses. Their ghoulish faces may resemble that of a vile serpent, but one can discern traces of delicate intelligence.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_EP2_STONE_1_DESC.text: A transparent blade almost wholly enveloped in ice. Could it be changing shape?

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_EP2_STONE_2_DESC.text: A blue mane that shines with a transparent light, as if it were made out of ice. It is tougher than it looks.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_SP_EP3_STONE_1_DESC.text: A chipset made with magic engineering technology. It boasts of a conductivity rate of 100%.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_SP_EP4_STONE_2_DESC.text: A flask imprisoning an intelligent creature captured by a forgotten ancient race. Even after the fall of the ancient civilization, the creature is said to have survived and continues to suffer today.

TEXT_RARE_SHADOWDEVILFINAL_STONE_1_DESC.text: The core of power that the Hybrid Shadowdemon had been holding.

TEXT_RARE_SHADOWDEVILFINAL_STONE_2_DESC.text: A shrunken head decoration piece that belonged to the Order of the Shadow Rose. You can observe veins and nerves entwined within it. Curiously enough, this head is still "connected" to its body.

TEXT_RARE_SHADOWDEVILFINAL_STONE_3_DESC.text: A solidified fragment of "shadow." If not properly dealt with, it attempts to enter the beholder's mind and body.

TEXT_RARE_SKIRIMIR_STONE_1_DESC.text: An icy cold yet surprisingly soft paw obtained from Skrymir's footprint.

TEXT_RARE_SKIRIMIR_STONE_2_DESC.text: A leg bone that Skrymir picked up before he completely faded away. It is made of pure ice.

TEXT_RARE_SVENJA_STONE_1_DESC.text: The pointy fangs of the smaller Warhound models. Svenja cleans them herself before every battle campaign.

TEXT_RARE_SWORDEN_STONE_1_DESC.text: Black sesame rice cake that has an unbelievable smell and is rock solid.

TEXT_RARE_TAOIST_STONE_1_DESC.text: A copy of a forbidden spell that the imperial Taoist copied from a scroll of magic. It's encoded so it cannot be read, but it's ominous.

TEXT_RARE_THIALFI_STONE_1_DESC.text: SIGYN was the most popular brand of running shoes in Ancient Nosgard. This pair had been carefully packaged, as if meant to have been given as a gift.

TEXT_RARE_THIALFI_STONE_2_DESC.text: A token bestowed upon Thjalfi by Ancient Nosgardians as acknowledgement of his extraordinary speed. It becomes translucent at certain angles.

TEXT_RARE_TOMBKING_STONE_1_DESC.text: A piece of cloth dyed in the color reserved only for the royalty of the Desert Kingdom. It may be a mere imitation, but at least it's durable.

TEXT_RARE_TOMBKING_STONE_2_DESC.text: A poorly crafted Uraeus decoration made out of wood.

TEXT_RARE_TRUEGULLVEIG_STONE_1_DESC.text: Elaborate lies deceive even those who are lying. But truths get in the way and remain as weights in the conscious.

TEXT_RARE_TYRANT_STONE_1_DESC.text: A durable bundle of artificial muscles modeled after Galatea’s physical body. It bestows the user with superhuman power, but it will quickly shrivel up if not infused with energy through its tube.

TEXT_RARE_TYRANT_STONE_2_DESC.text: It seems like mere tattered leather, but due to the various drugs saturating the material, it cannot be stretched or folded.

TEXT_RARE_VAJRAPANI_STONE_1_DESC.text: Deva King's eyebrow. It looks shiny, but it's just plated.

TEXT_RARE_VALKYRIESTONESTATUS_STONE_1_DE.text: The letter of a powerful lord who, long ago, divided Nosgard into two and fought to dominate both halves. Yet its recipient also received the fury of the king.

TEXT_RARE_VALKYRIESTONESTATUS_STONE_2_DE.text: Only this fragment remains of the sword of a fabled warrior who knew no defeat. Legend has it that fate, in the form of a one-eyed man, came and finally broke the undefeated blade.

TEXT_SKILL_AF_BLOCK_DESC.text: Increased Block Generation Speed, Atk Pwr

TEXT_SKILL_AF_BREAD_DESC.text: Greatly increases attack power and hero size

TEXT_SKILL_AF_SPEED_DESC.text: Increased Atk and Motion Speed, Atk Pwr

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ALMAEL_DESC.text: Upon pressing her block skill, Almael deals @magical damage@ equal to [200/500/800]% of her attack power to the enemy before her, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ALMAEL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally leader's 3-chain, Almael uses 'Morpho's Wings' for 8 seconds. (Cooltime: 9 seconds) During 'Morpho's Wings,' Almael does not use her normal attacks. If her block skill deals a critical hit during 'Morpho's Wings,' Almael generates 'Azure Fantasy' around the hit enemy for 5 seconds, decreasing enemy armor and resistance by 10%. (Cannot be stacked)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ALMAEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally leader's 3-chain, Almael uses 'Morpho's Wings' for 15 seconds. (Cooltime: 16 seconds) During 'Morpho's Wings,' Almael does not use her normal attacks. If her block skill deals a critical hit during 'Morpho's Wings,' Almael generates 'Azure Fantasy' around the hit enemy for 5 seconds, decreasing enemy armor and resistance by 15%. (Cannot be stacked)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARACHNE_DESC.text: Arachne shoots a 'spider web' at the farthest enemy within her range to deal #physical damage# equal to [75/136/288]% of her attack power. Enemies hit by Arachne's 'spider web' lose 30 of their evasion and cannot move for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARACHNE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a 3-chain, Arachne additionally summons 'baby spiders' that deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of her attack power to the farthest enemy within her range.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ARACHNE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a 3-chain, Arachne additionally summons 'baby spiders' that deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of her attack power to the farthest enemy within her range. Enemies hit by 'baby spiders' receive a 'spider bite.' Enemies with a 'spider bite' lose their armor for 10 seconds by 5% of Arachne's attack power, and receive #physical damage# equal to 100% of her attack power per second. (Maximum 12 stacks)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_AUREA_DESC.text: Aurea deals #physical damage# equal to [120/180/280]% of her attack power to the rearmost enemy, according to the chain number used. The hit enemy receives the 'Ranger's Mark' for 3 seconds. 'Ranger's Mark' affects only one enemy at a time.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_AUREA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain, the Hero activates 'Golden Rain' over the nearest enemy to deal 7 hits of #physical damage# equal to 200% of the Hero's attack power. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_AUREA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain, the Hero activates 'Golden Rain' over the nearest enemy to deal 7 hits of #physical damage# equal to 1500% of the Hero's attack power. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_BERA_DESC.text: The Hero summons fresh salmon that deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/400]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_BERA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Fresh Salmon Run' become 'bait' and lose movement speed by 10% for 5 seconds. Duration of the effect renews with reuse. (Maximum 5 stacks)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_BERA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Fresh Salmon Run' become 'bait,' losing movement speed by 10% and receiving @magical damage@ equal to 100% of the Hero's attack power every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds. 'Bait' ignores all enemy evasion and effects that receive damage in place of others. Duration of the effect renews with reuse. (Maximum 5 stacks) Additionally, when enemies have maximum 'bait' stacks, they receive 30% more magical damage.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_BOOMERANG_DESC.text: The hero throws a boomerang that deals #physical damage# equal to 30% of the attack power with every hit.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_BOOMERANG_LV2_DESC.text: The hero throws a boomerang that deals #physical damage# equal to 45% of the attack power with every hit.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_BOOMERANG_LV3_DESC.text: The hero throws a boomerang that deals #physical damage# equal to 60% of the attack power with every hit. The boomerang's critical chance increases by 30% on its return route.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_BOOMERANG_LV4_DESC.text: The hero throws a boomerang that deals #physical damage# equal to 90% of the attack power with every hit. The boomerang's critical chance increases by 30% on its return route.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_BOOMERANG_LV5_DESC.text: The hero throws a boomerang that deals #physical damage# equal to 120% of the attack power with every hit. The boomerang's critical chance increases by 30% on its return route. Upon the boomerang's return, the hero instantly generates 1 block.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_CONDEMN2_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero shoots an arrow that pierces the enemy and deals @magical damage@ equal to [34/122/250]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.
