TEXT_SKILL_AR_CONDEMN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the ally leader's 3-chain, Gon shoots 4 arrowheads towards the enemy in the rear to deal #physical damage# equal to 225% of her attack power. Afterwards, she uses 'Resolute Shot' to deal #physical damage# equal to 414% of her attack power. Enemies hit by 'Resolute Shot' lose 50% of their armor for 5 seconds and are dispelled of all of their buffs. This debuff is only applied to 'Resolute Shot' activated as Gon's passive. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ELF_ARCHER_DESC.text: High Elf Archer shoots an arrow to the enemy in the front to deal #physical damage# equal to [200/300/400]% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ELF_ARCHER_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's chain, High Elf Archer deals #physical damage# equal to 1250% of her attack power to all enemies within her range. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ELF_ARCHER_LV3_SUBDESC.text: High Elf Archer's evasion and accuracy are increased by 25. Upon using another ally's chain, High Elf Archer deals #physical damage# equal to 1250% of her attack power to all enemies within her range. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FASTSHOT_SPIRIT_LV1_DESC.text: Awakens 'Rapid Firing Soul' for 10 seconds. Attack is increased by 50% and critical chance is increased by 10%.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FASTSHOT_SPIRIT_LV2_DESC.text: Awakens 'Rapid Firing Soul' for 10 seconds. Attack is increased by 75% and critical chance is increased by 20%.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FASTSHOT_SPIRIT_LV3_DESC.text: Awakens 'Rapid Firing Soul' for 10 seconds. Attack is increased by 125% and critical chance is increased by 40%. Upon reactivating before termination, motion speed is increased by 10%, evasion by 30 for 10 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLAME_BLAST_LV3_SUBDESC.text: An enemy damaged by Thorns of Hell is lit on fire and receives $neutral damage$ equal to 50% of the Hero's Attack Power for 5 seconds. Every 3 times this effect is stacked, the hero shoots the ultimate flame arrow that deals @magical damage@ equal to 350% of attack power and $neutral damage$ equal to 1000% of attack power. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLOATNSTING_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 15% and critical chance by 10% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLOATNSTING_LV2_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 25% and critical chance by 15% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLOATNSTING_LV3_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 35% and critical chance by 20% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLOATNSTING_LV4_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 45% and critical chance by 25% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FLOATNSTING_LV5_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 55% and critical chance by 30% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_FROZEN_THORN_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero shoots an ice arrow that deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/400]% of their attack power at enemies in the rear. Hit enemies are pulled in towards allies.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_GENEVIE_DESC.text: Hero throws daggers that deal #physical damage# equal to [100/150/200]% of her attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_GENEVIE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Genevie leaves a 'Mark of Mana' that lasts 5 seconds to an enemy hit by 'Dagger Throw.' The mark decreases the enemy's evasion by 20 and increases the damage by 50%. Only one enemy can be marked at a time.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_GENEVIE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Genevie leaves a 'Mark of Mana' that lasts 5 seconds to an enemy hit by 'Dagger Throw.' The mark decreases the enemy's evasion by 20 and increases the damage by 50%. Only one enemy can be marked at a time. Additionally, if another ally uses 3-chain, she shoots a 'Chaser's Arrow' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of her attack power to each of 3 enemies at the front. 'Chaser's Arrow' attacks a marked enemy preferentially. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_GG_CHIPP_SKILL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If 'Y Blade' hits an enemy, Chipp Zanuff generates 1 block at a 50% chance at the cost of 5 SP.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_GG_CHIPP_SKILL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If 'Y Blade' hits an enemy, Chipp Zanuff generates 1 block at a 75% chance at the cost of 5 SP. Additionally, using a block after an ally's 3-chain activates 'Throwing Daggers,' dealing @magical damage@ equal to [80/100/120]% of attack power each, and generates 1 block.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_GHOST_ARROW_DESC.text: The Hero deals 5 hits of @magical damage@ equal to 250% of their attack power to the farthest enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_GHOST_ARROW_LV2_DESC.text: The Hero deals 5 hits of @magical damage@ equal to 500% of their attack power to the farthest enemy. This attack ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_GHOST_ARROW_LV3_DESC.text: The Hero deals 5 hits of @magical damage@ equal to 800% of their attack power to the farthest enemy. This attack ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies, and generates 1 block for the caster and the ally leader.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_HAERANG_DESC.text: Haerang shoots [1/2/3] water projectiles that each deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_HAERANG_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon hitting the enemy 4 times with her normal attack or block skill, Haerang uses 'Ocean's Tears' on the frontmost enemy to deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_HAERANG_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon hitting the enemy 4 times with her normal attack or block skill, Haerang uses 'Ocean's Tears' on the frontmost enemy to deal @magical damage@ equal to 700% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_HANSEUNG_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his own block after another ally's 3-chain, Hansheng releases his 'Inner Sight' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of his attack power. 'Inner Sight' targets the farthest enemy in Hansheng's range and ignores their evasion. If another ally's block is pressed during the skill, Hansheng releases 2 additional streaks of 'Inner Sight.' This skill ignores enemy effects that absorb damage in place of their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_IRIS_DESC.text: This letter was first started in Pumpkin City and penetrates the enemy to deal @magical damage@ equal to [350/400/450]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_IRIS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon attacking the enemy 3 times, the Hero uses 'Address Checker' to increase their own critical chance by 20% for 5 seconds. Reusing the skill will reset its duration, but its effects will not be stacked.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_IRIS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon attacking the enemy 3 times, the Hero uses 'Address Checker' to increase the entire team's critical chance by 30% for 5 seconds. Reusing the skill will reset its duration, but its effects will not be stacked.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_KAGUYA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Each auto attack or 'Storm of Cherry Blossoms' generates 1 'Cherry Blossom Petal.' Upon gathering 5 'Cherry Blossom Petals,' the Hero summons a 'Cherry Blossom Tree' before the nearest enemy. The 'Cherry Blossom Tree' deals @magical damage@ equal to 90% of the Hero's attack power per hit for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_KAGUYA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Each auto attack generates 1 'Cherry Blossom Petal,' while 'Storm of Cherry Blossoms' generates [2/3/5] 'Cherry Blossom Petal,' according to the chain number used. Upon gathering 5 'Cherry Blossom Petals,' the Hero summons a 'Cherry Blossom Tree' before the nearest enemy. The 'Cherry Blossom Tree' pulls in all enemies within range and deals @magical damage@ equal to 110% of the Hero's attack power per hit for 3 seconds. Enemies within range of the 'Cherry Blossom Tree' lose movement speed by 50% for 3.5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_KNIFE_STORM_DESC.text: The caster rapidly throws multiple daggers to deal #physical damage# equal to 250% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_KNIFE_STORM_LV2_DESC.text: The caster rapidly throws multiple daggers to deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_KNIFE_STORM_LV3_DESC.text: The caster rapidly throws multiple daggers to deal #physical damage# equal to 350% of their attack power. The last dagger decreases the hit enemy's armor by 10% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_KNIFE_STORM_LV4_DESC.text: The caster rapidly throws multiple daggers to deal #physical damage# equal to 400% of their attack power. The last dagger decreases the hit enemy's armor by 15% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_KNIFE_STORM_LV5_DESC.text: The caster rapidly throws multiple daggers to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of their attack power. The last dagger decreases the hit enemy's armor by 20% for 5 seconds. If the hit enemy receives another debuff within the duration, they are stunned for 2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LIMITED_ER_07_DESC.text: Throws a boomerang to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/350]% of attack power according to chain number used. The boomerang deals damage again while returning.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LIMITED_ER_07_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing another ally's 3-chain, Pakaracchi uses 'Horseshoe Kick of Youth'. (Cooltime: 5 seconds) 'Horseshoe Kick of Youth': Pakaracchi charges to the front and attacks an enemy to deal #physical damage# equal to 1800% of attack power. The hit enemy is sent flying back and is stunned for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LIMITED_ER_07_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing another ally's 3-chain, Pakaracchi uses 'Horseshoe Kick of Youth'. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) 'Horseshoe Kick of Youth': Pakaracchi charges to the front and attacks an enemy to deal #physical damage# equal to 2500% of attack power. The hit enemy is sent flying back and is stunned for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LIMITED_OT_08_DESC.text: The Hero fires an arrow at the frontmost enemy to deal #physical damage# equal to [250/350/450]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used, and marks the enemy with 'Provoke' for 5 seconds. The mark cannot be canceled. (Duration reset upon reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LIMITED_OT_08_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the Hero's 3-chain when an enemy is marked with 'Provoke,' the Hero summons Linde in front of the marked enemy to deal area #physical damage# equal to 800% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LIMITED_OT_08_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the Hero's 3-chain when an enemy is marked with 'Provoke,' the Hero summons Linde in front of the marked enemy to deal area #physical damage# equal to 1200% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LINDSEY_DESC.text: Lindsey shoots arrows that deal #physical damage# equal to [200/250/300]% of her attack power to the enemy in the front, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LINDSEY_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero shoots an arrow that deals #physical damage# equal to [200/250/300]% of their attack power to the enemy in the front, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LINDSEY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Lindsey additionally throws two 'fission bombs.' Each 'fission bomb' deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_LINDSEY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Lindsey additionally throws two 'fission bombs.' Each 'fission bomb' deals #physical damage# equal to 300% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MALKAR_DESC.text: Malkah shoots a venomous arrow that deals @magical damage@ equal to [200/300/400/]% of attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MALKAR_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Poison Arrow' receive @magical damage@ equal to 100% of Malkah's attack power per second for 3 seconds. (Maximum 3 stacks) 'Serpent Venom' renews its duration every time it is reused. Additionally, upon using another ally's 3-chain, Malkah immediately fires 'Snake Arrow,' which deals @magical damage@ equal to 500% of her attack power and applies the effects of 'Serpent Venom.'

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MALKAR_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Poison Arrow' receive @magical damage@ equal to 150% of Malkah's attack power per second for 3 seconds. (Maximum 3 stacks) 'Serpent Venom' renews its duration every time it is reused. Additionally, upon using another ally's 3-chain, Malkah immediately fires 'Snake Arrow,' which deals @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of her attack power and applies the effects of 'Serpent Venom.'

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MELEAGROS_DESC.text: The Hero shoots flaming arrows that penetrate the enemy and deal @magical damage@ equal to [250/350/450]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MELEAGROS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: 'Ignition' marks hit enemies with 'Embers' for 8 seconds. 'Embers' affect a maximum of 5 enemies at once and decrease evasion by 20. (Cannot be canceled, duration renewed if reused) Additionally, upon using another ally's 3-chain, the Hero uses 'Combustion' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of their attack power. If 'Combustion' hits an enemy marked with 'Embers,' the Hero uses 'Detonation' to deal splash @magical damage@ equal to 600% of their attack power around the hit enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MELEAGROS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: 'Ignition' marks hit enemies with 'Embers' for 8 seconds. 'Embers' affect a maximum of 5 enemies at once and decrease evasion by 20. (Cannot be dispelled, duration renewed with reuse) Additionally, upon using another ally's 3-chain, the Hero uses 'Combustion' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 3000% of the Hero's attack power and mark the enemy with 'Embers.' If 'Combustion' hits an enemy marked with 'Embers,' the Hero uses 'Detonation' to deal splash @magical damage@ equal to 2000% of their attack power around the hit enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MIEL_DESC.text: The Hero shoots a mechanical arrow to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MIEL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If the 'Mechanical Arrow' accurately deals a critical hit, the Hero shoots an 'Upgraded Electric Arrow' to deal 3 hits of #physical damage# each equal to 300% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_MIEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If the 'Mechanical Arrow' accurately deals a critical hit, the Hero shoots an 'Upgraded Electric Arrow' to deal 3 hits of #physical damage# each equal to 500% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_OT_05_DESC.text: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/300/500]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used, to the frontmost nearby enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_OT_05_LV2_SUBDESC.text: At the start of battle, the Hero grants the ally Leader (excluding self) the 'Dancer Moves' effect. This effect cannot be canceled. Depending on the block skills used by the Hero and the target affected by 'Dancer Moves,' a different buff is granted to the Hero and the target affected by 'Dancer Moves:'  Lion Dance: Activates when the target affected by 'Dancer Moves' uses a block skill. Increases attack power by 20% and critical damage by 15% for 10 seconds. (Cooltime: 10 seconds) Peacock Strut: Activates when the Hero uses their own block skill. Increases critical chance by 10%, armor penetration by 5%, and resistance penetration by 5% for 10 seconds. (Cooltime: 10 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_OT_05_LV3_SUBDESC.text: At the start of battle, the Hero grants the ally Leader (excluding self) the 'Dancer Moves' effect. This effect cannot be canceled. Depending on the block skills used by the Hero and the target affected by 'Dancer Moves,' a different buff is granted to the Hero and the target affected by 'Dancer Moves:'  Lion Dance: Activates when the target affected by 'Dancer Moves' uses a block skill. Increases attack power by 30% and critical damage by 20% for 10 seconds. (Cooltime: 10 seconds) Peacock Strut: Activates when the Hero uses their own block skill. Increases critical chance by 15%, armor penetration by 10%, and resistance penetration by 10% for 10 seconds. (Cooltime: 10 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_PANPAN_DESC.text: Panpan fires 'bamboo shoots' to deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/150/200]% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_PANPAN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Panpan's skill 'bleed' for 3 seconds. 'Bleeding' enemies receive $neutral damage$ equal to 100% of Panpan's attack power per second. This 'bleeding' effect cannot be stacked.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_PANPAN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Panpan's skill 'bleed' for 3 seconds. 'Bleeding' enemies receive $neutral damage$ equal to 100% of Panpan's attack power per second, and all heals they receive are decreased by 50%. (The effects of 'bleeding' cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_POISON_DART_DESC.text: The caster's block skill is enhanced for 7 seconds, dealing additional @magical damage@ equal to 100% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_POISON_DART_LV2_DESC.text: The caster's block skill is enhanced for 7 seconds, dealing additional @magical damage@ equal to 170% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_POISON_DART_LV3_DESC.text: The caster's block skill is enhanced for 7 seconds, dealing additional @magical damage@ equal to 195% of their attack power. Enemies hit twice by this enhanced arrow receives additional $neutral damage$ equal to 1% of the enemy's maximum HP (maximum limit per hit being 9000).

TEXT_SKILL_AR_POISON_DART_LV4_DESC.text: The caster's block skill is enhanced for 7 seconds, dealing additional @magical damage@ equal to 225% of their attack power. Enemies hit twice by this enhanced arrow receives additional $neutral damage$ equal to 1% of the enemy's maximum HP (maximum limit per hit being 9000).

TEXT_SKILL_AR_POISON_DART_LV5_DESC.text: The caster's block skill is enhanced for 7 seconds to deal additional @magical damage@ equal to 255% of their attack power. Enemies hit twice by this poisoned arrow receive additional $neutral damage$ equal to 1.5% of the enemy's maximum HP (maximum limit per hit being 16000). If the skill is reused within its duration, the caster immediately shoots two poison arrows.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_RAN_DESC.text: Ran shoots bolts to enemies before her to deal #physical damage# equal to [500/600/800]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_RAN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Ran leaves one 'Mark of the Night Raven' to all enemies hit by 'Talon of the Night Raven' (maximum 6 stacks). Each 'Mark of the Night Raven' lasts 6 seconds. With every 'Mark of the Night Raven' affecting the enemy, Ran's attack speed is increased by 10%.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_RAN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Ran leaves one 'Mark of the Night Raven' to all enemies hit by 'Talon of the Night Raven' (maximum 6 stacks). Each 'Mark of the Night Raven' lasts 6 seconds. With every 'Mark of the Night Raven' affecting the enemy, Ran's attack speed is increased by 20%.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ROCKET_BOOM_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero shoots a portable firecracker which deals @magical damage@ equal to [80/150/350]% of their attack power to the enemy with the least HP, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ROOT_WAVE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Magnus summons a 'Tree Spirit' near the 'sown' enemy that deals @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_ROOT_WAVE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When a 'sown' enemy receives a buff, or upon using another ally's 3-chain, Magnus summons a 'Tree Spirit' near the 'sown' enemy that deals @magical damage@ equal to 1200% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_R_DESC.text: Shoots 16 arrows that each deal #physical damage# equal to [10/20/45]% of attack power towards backline enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_R_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Arrow Storm' lose 50% of their attack power for 5 seconds. Upon using her own block after another ally's 3-chain, R-0 will detonate the arrows of 'Arrow Storm' to deal additional #physical damage# equal to 50% of her attack power to enemies within her range. Hit enemies will lose 5 SP per hit.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_R_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Arrow Storm' lose 50% of their attack power for 5 seconds. Upon using her own block after another ally's 3-chain, R-0 will detonate the arrows of 'Arrow Storm' to deal additional #physical damage# equal to 100% of her attack power to enemies within her range. Hit enemies will lose 5 SP per hit.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_SETH_LV2_SUBDESC.text: In order to control the dead, the Hero sacrifices 50% of all heals they receive. This effect is acknowledged as a debuff. Upon using a 3-chain, the Hero summons 'Land of the Dead' over the area affected by the block skill for 10 seconds. 'Land of the Dead' deals #physical damage# equal to 250% of the Hero's attack power to enemies within range and decreases their SP by 4. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_AR_SETH_LV3_SUBDESC.text: In order to control the dead, the Hero sacrifices 50% of all heals they receive. This effect is acknowledged as a debuff. Upon using a 3-chain, the Hero summons 'Land of the Dead' over the area affected by the block skill for 10 seconds. 'Land of the Dead' deals #physical damage# equal to 250% of the Hero's attack power to enemies within range per second and decreases their SP by 4 per second. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) When enemies receive 10 hits from 'Land of the Dead,' the Hero additionally summons 'Hellhound of the Underworld' behind the enemy to deal #physical damage# equal to 600% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_SHOOTING_STAR_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every time she receives a heal or uses an auto attack, Atalante stacks 1 'fairy essence' (maximum 3 stacks). Upon using her own block or another ally's 3-chain, Atalante uses all her currently charged 'fairy essence' to shoot a 'fairy arrow' that deals @magical damage@ equal to [500/650/800]% of her attack power and 50% of the enemy's attack power. 'Fairy arrows' ignore enemy effects that absorb damage in place of their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_WILD_BITE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemy hit by poison arrow will be poisoned, receiving @magical damage@ equal to 2400% of Mamba's attack power for 5 seconds. Poison will stack up. When poison arrow gives critical damage to the poisoned enemy, hit enemy's chance of evasion will decrease 30 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_WINDFORCE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: With every 7 auto attacks, the Hero shoots a 'Tempest Arrow' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 80% of the Hero's attack power. Whenever the Hero uses their block skill, the number of auto attacks required to activate this passive will be reduced by 2.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_WINDFORCE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every 5 auto attacks, the Hero shoots a 'Tempest Arrow' that deals 4 hits of @magical damage@ equal to 2000% of the Hero's attack power. If the Hero is receiving a buff, they shoot one more 'Tempest Arrow.' Whenever the Hero uses their block skill, the number of auto attacks required to activate this passive will be reduced by 2.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_WIND_DANCE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Using her own block after another ally's 3-chain, Lee throws a fan to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of her attack power. Enemies hit by 'Wind Dance' or 'Dance of Blossoming Fans' lose 30% of their armor for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_WIND_DANCE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Using her own block after another ally's 3-chain, Lee throws a fan to deal #physical damage# equal to 750% of her attack power. Enemies hit by 'Wind Dance' or 'Dance of Blossoming Fans' lose 50% of their armor for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_DG_BUGLC_GOD_LINK_DESC.text: We are the champions, my friends~

TEXT_SKILL_DG_BUGLC_GOD_LINK_NAME.text: We share a special Bond, don't you think?

TEXT_SKILL_DG_BUGLC_GOD_S2_DESC.text: Thank you for your love and support!

TEXT_SKILL_DG_BUGLC_GOD_SAFE_DESC.text: I won't stop developing until my sixtieth birthday!

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ARAMIS_DESC.text: The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to [1000/1300/1800]% of their attack power to a maximum of 5 enemies within their range.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ARAMIS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero enters 'Chaser's Heat' mode. In 'Chaser's Heat,' the Hero's critical chance and attack power increase by 2% for every enemy they attack with their block skill. (Maximum 5 stacks)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ARAMIS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero enters 'Chaser's Heat' mode. In 'Chaser's Heat,' the Hero's critical chance increases by 4% and attack power by 5% for every enemy they attack with their block skill. (Maximum 5 stacks)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ARMOR_LEILA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Using 3 own blocks leads to overheat mode, increasing resistance penetration 30% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ARMOR_MEL_DESC.text: Mel shoots missiles to deal #physical damage# equal to [60/120/400]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ARMOR_MEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own block, the Hero ejects energy and powers up. Their next block skill deals 300% more damage and knocks back the hit enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ATHOS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Athos's movement speed is increased by 25%. Upon pressing his own block, he generates 1 ally leader block. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ATHOS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Athos's movement speed is increased by 25%. Upon pressing his own block, he generates 1 ally leader block. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) If his block skill targets a nearby enemy within his range, Athos attacks one more time to deal #physical damage# equal to [1000/500/150]% of his attack power and knock back the hit enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BELLEROPHON_DESC.text: Bellerophon shoots an explosive bullet that deals @magical damage@ equal to [120/240/360]% of his attack power to a single enemy in the front, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BELLEROPHON_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero shoots an explosive bullet that deals @magical damage@ equal to [120/240/360]% of their attack power to a single enemy in the front, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BELLEROPHON_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his 3-chain, Bellerophon deals additional @magical damage@ equal to 300% of the enemy's armor. Hit enemies 'overheat' for 5 seconds, during which they receive 10% increased damage.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BELLEROPHON_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his 3-chain, Bellerophon deals additional @magical damage@ equal to 500% of the enemy's armor. Hit enemies 'overheat' for 5 seconds, during which they receive 10% increased damage.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BERON_DESC.text: The Hero throws salmon roe at the nearest enemy to deal #physical damage# equal to 100% of their attack power every 0.1 seconds for [3/4/5] seconds, according to the chain number used. Reusing the Hero's own block during their block skill activation will increase the duration by 1 second. (Maximum 5 seconds; duration will not refresh beyond limit)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BERON_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero succeeds in continuously using their block skill for 5 seconds, they 'overheat' for 10 seconds. While 'overheating,' the Hero cannot use their block skills but increases their attack power by 100%. This effect cannot be dispelled nor reset. At the end of 'overheating,' the Hero generates 1 block for themselves.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BERON_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero succeeds in continuously using their block skill for 5 seconds, they 'overheat' for 10 seconds. While 'overheating,' the Hero cannot use their block skills but increases their attack power by 150%. Additionally, all their auto attacks changes to 'SALMON CHASER' that deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of their attack power to all enemies within range. This effect cannot be dispelled nor reset. At the end of 'overheating,' the Hero generates 1 block for themselves.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BOMB_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block skill 3 times, the Hero enters 'Concentrated Bombing' mode for 5 seconds. Upon using another ally's block in 'Concentrated Bombing,' the Hero releases bombs to deal 4 hits of #physical damage# equal to 50% of their attack power. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_BOMB_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block skill 3 times, the Hero enters 'Concentrated Bombing' mode for 5 seconds. Upon using another ally's block in 'Concentrated Bombing,' the Hero releases bombs to deal 4 hits of #physical damage# equal to 100% of their attack power. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds) Additionally, they increase all allies' attack power by 10% for 2.5 seconds. (Maximum 4 stacks)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CAROL_DESC.text: Carol shoots 3 bullets that deal #physical damage# equal to [50/90/150]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CAROL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If an ally deals a critical hit, Carol uses 'Radiance of the Battlefield' to increase her own attack power by 50% and armor penetration by 25% for 5 seconds. 'Radiance of the Battlefield' cannot be canceled, and reusing the skill before its termination will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CAROL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If an ally deals a critical hit, Carol uses 'Radiance of the Battlefield' to increase her own attack power by 75% and armor penetration by 50% for 8 seconds. 'Radiance of the Battlefield' cannot be canceled, and reusing the skill before its termination will reset its duration. Additionally, Carol will generate 1 ally leader block upon using 'Radiance of the Battlefield.' (Cooltime: 6 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CARPET_BOMB_DESC.text: The Hero drops bombs that deal 10 hits of #physical damage# equal to 80% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CARPET_BOMB_LV2_DESC.text: The Hero drops bombs that deal 10 hits of #physical damage# equal to 100% of their attack power. Hit enemies lose their armor and resistance by 10% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CARPET_BOMB_LV3_DESC.text: The Hero drops bombs that deal 10 hits of #physical damage# equal to 175% of their attack power. Hit enemies lose their armor and resistance by 30% for 8 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CINDY_DESC.text: Cindy shoots a bullet that deals #physical damage# equal to [200/250/300]% of attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CINDY_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero shoots a bullet that deals #physical damage# equal to [200/250/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CINDY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Cindy's critical chance is increased by 20% and accuracy by 20 for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CINDY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Cindy's critical chance is increased by 20% and accuracy by 20 for 3 seconds. Additionally, upon using another ally's 3-chain block skill, Cindy's next block skill is changed to 'Lady's Secret,' which deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of her attack power. 'Lady's Secret' ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CROW_DESC.text: Upon using his block, Crow shoots bullets that deal #physical damage# equal to 100% of his attack power to all enemies before him for 5 seconds. 'Automatic Shot' ignores enemy effects that absorb damage in place of their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CROW_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing his block, Crow's movement speed is decreased by 30%, and the duration of 'Automatic Shot' is increased by 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_CROW_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing his block, Crow's movement speed is decreased by 30%, and the duration of 'Automatic Shot' is increased by 3 seconds. Upon using his own block after another ally's 3-chain, Crow summons a crow that throws a bomb at the rearmost enemy. The bomb explodes to deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of Crow's attack power, ignoring enemy effects that absorb damage in place of their allies. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_DEADLY_SPIRIT_LV1_DESC.text: Awakens 'Deadly Soul' for 10 seconds. Attack is increased by 40% and critical damage is increased by 50%.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_DEADLY_SPIRIT_LV2_DESC.text: Awakens 'Deadly Soul' for 10 seconds. Attack is increased by 60% and critical damage is increased by 100%.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_DEADLY_SPIRIT_LV3_DESC.text: Awakens 'Deadly Soul' for 10 seconds. Attack is increased by 100% and critical damage is increased by 150%. Upon reactivating before termination, explodes at every attack and deals $neutral damage$ equal to 300% of attack power. (Cooltime: 0.5 second)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_DELRIEN_DESC.text: Delrien plants explosive dandelion seeds onto the enemy before her, dealing area @magical damage@ equal to [1000/1000/2000]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_DELRIEN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain while she is the ally leader, Delrien casts 'Fairy's Zephyr' for 8 seconds. (Cooltime: 9 seconds)  During 'Fairy's Zephyr,' Delrien does not use her normal attacks, her block skill ignores 10% of enemy resistance, and her critical damage is increased by 10%.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_DELRIEN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain while she is the ally leader, Delrien casts 'Fairy's Zephyr' for 15 seconds. (Cooltime: 16 seconds)  During 'Fairy's Zephyr,' Delrien does not use her normal attacks, her block skill ignores 25% of enemy resistance, and her critical damage is increased by 15%.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_DRILL_GUN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Using a block after an ally uses a chain skill causes the hero to summon Support Equipment Protocol in front of the enemies. The Protocol will summon Drill Gun out of the ground that deals #physical damage# equal to 600% of the hero's attack power. It deals additional #physical damage# equal to 600% of the hero's attack power if the subject enemies are receiving buff.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ENCHANTED_BULLET_LV5_DESC.text: The caster immediately fires two silver bullets that explode upon contact to deal @magical damage@ equal to 250% of their attack power. Additionally, the caster generates 1 block of their own.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_FISHERCAT_DESC.text: Fishernyan shoots his cat harpoon to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/230/400]% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_FISHERCAT_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his own block after another ally's 3-chain, Fishernyan deals #physical damage# equal to 800% of his attack power, knocks up enemies in the air, then catches them with his amazing fishing skills.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_GG_ELPHELT_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Using Elphelt's 1- or 2-chain activates "Pistol Stance" for the next 5 blocks, dealing physical damage equal to [200/350/560]% of Elphelt's attack power. Using Elphelt's 3-chain activates "Miss Confil Stance" for the next 5 blocks, increasing her critical chance by 50% for 2 seconds and dealing physical damage equal to [300/600/900]% of her attack power. The final block skill of every Stance deals 3 consecutive hits. The activated Stance will end after using 5 blocks.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_HEAVYMACHINE2_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Using the Hero's block has 35% chance of causing a chain explosion that knocks back the enemy and dealing #physical damage# equal to 300% of their attack power. Upon activating a chain explosion, the Hero increases the leader ally's SP by 2.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_HEAVYMACHINE_DESC.text: The Hero consecutively fires bullets to deal #physical damage# equal to [81/297/540]% of their attack power and knock back the hit enemy, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_HEAVYMACHINE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When D'Artagnan uses her own block or receives a heal, she will have a 50% chance of immediately using 'Consecutive Shot' that has the strength of a 3-chain. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_HEAVYMACHINE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When D'Artagnan uses her own block or receives a heal, she will have a 75% chance of immediately using 'Consecutive Shot' that has the strength of a 3-chain. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JAHARD_DESC.text: Zahard runs ahead, shooting a beam that deals @magical damage@ equal to [90/150/225]% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JAHARD_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Zahard activates 'Enemy Detection Beam' with a 3-chain, he gives an 'Optical Mark' to the hit enemy for 5 seconds, and teleports before the enemy with the entire party. Upon teleportation, Zahard's evasion is increased by 50 and critical chance by 35% for 5 seconds. 'Optical Mark' decreases the target's accuracy by 25, and its duration time cannot be renewed.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JAHARD_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If Zahard activates 'Enemy Detection Beam' with a 3-chain, he gives an 'Optical Mark' to the hit enemy for 5 seconds, and teleports before the enemy with the entire party. Upon teleportation, Zahard's evasion is increased by 50 and critical chance by 35% for 5 seconds. 'Optical Mark' decreases the target's accuracy by 25, and its duration time cannot be renewed. If Zahard uses his block skill during 'Optical Mark,' he teleports backward and shoots 5 bullets that deal @magical damage@ equal to 1250% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JEOMRYE_DESC.text: The Hero plays their bass guitar to play 'notes' that deal #physical damage# equal to [80/180/380]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JEOMRYE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain on the ground, the Hero dashes to the enemy before them and smashes their guitar to deal #physical damage# equal to 800% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JEOMRYE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain on the ground, the Hero dashes to the enemy before them and smashes their guitar to deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of their attack power. Afterwards, the Hero uses the resulting blast to leap into the air.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JET_DESC.text: Jet fires a golden bullet that deals #physical damage# equal to [115/220/330]% of his attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JET_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Jet's block skill become 'wanted criminals' for 5 seconds. 'Wanted' enemies receive 10% more damage for the duration of the mark.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_JET_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Jet's block skill become 'wanted criminals' for 5 seconds. 'Wanted' enemies receive 20% more damage for the duration of the mark. If a 'wanted' enemy is killed, Jet explodes his bundles of money to deal widespread #physical damage# equal to 1000% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_KILL_CASE_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero shoots a secret bullet which deals #physical damage# equal to [75/150/275]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used. Hit enemies receive the 'Assassin's Mark' for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LASIRENE_DESC.text: Lasirenne deals #physical damage# equal to [120/240/320]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LASIRENE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain 2 times, the Hero activates 'Symbiosis' upon the frontmost ally excluding themselves. 'Symbiosis' will grant the below effects for 10 seconds to both the Hero and the affected ally. Reusing the skill will reset its duration. Effects of the skill cannot be stacked. Hero (Self): The Hero's critical chance increases by 20%. This effect cannot be cancelled but is not recognized as a buff. Ally: The ally receives 20% less damage from enemies. Their attack power increases by 15%. This effect cannot be cancelled but is not recognized as a buff.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LASIRENE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain 2 times, the Hero activates 'Symbiosis' upon the frontmost ally excluding themselves. 'Symbiosis' will grant the below effects for 10 seconds to both the Hero and the affected ally. Reusing the skill will reset its duration. Effects of the skill cannot be stacked. Hero (Self): The Hero's critical chance increases by 25% and their armor penetration increases by 500. This effect cannot be cancelled but is not recognized as a buff. Ally: The ally receives 30% less damage from enemies. Their attack power increases by 30%. This effect cannot be cancelled but is not recognized as a buff.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LIGHT_LINE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies with the 'Mark of Light' loses 2 SP every time they receive an attack. Upon activating 'The Last Light,' the Hero uses 'Artillery of Light' to additionally deal @magical damage@ equal to 200% of their attack power. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LIGHT_LINE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies with the 'Mark of Light' lose 5 SP every time they receive an attack. Upon activating 'The Last Light,' the Hero uses 'Artillery of Light' to additionally deal @magical damage@ equal to 350% of their attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LUCA_DESC.text: The Hero shoots liquid bullets that deal #physical damage# equal to [500/550/600]% of their attack power to the nearest enemy, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LUCA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon shooting 3 'Liquid Bullets,' the Hero summons a swarm of bugs that penetrates the enemy and deals #physical damage# equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LUCA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon shooting 2 'Liquid Bullets,' the Hero summons a swarm of bugs that penetrates the enemy and deals #physical damage# equal to 700% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LUICILLA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero fails to kill the enemy with their block skill, they lunge forward and fire uncontrollably to deal 20 hits of #physical damage# equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power. Additionally, they deal $neutral damage$ equal to 40% of their attack power to enemies with less than 50% HP. The Hero becomes immune to stuns and receives 25% additional life steal for the duration of the skill. (Cooltime: 10 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LYUDMILLA_DESC.text: Lyudmilla shoots bullets that deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/300]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LYUDMILLA_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero shoots bullets that deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LYUDMILLA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every time Lyudmilla uses her block, she receives the 'Lady Death' effect, which increases her attack power by 1%, critical chance by 2%, and accuracy by 2 for 4 seconds. (Maximum 5 stacks) This effect cannot be purged.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_LYUDMILLA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every time Lyudmilla uses her block, she receives the 'Lady Death' effect, which increases her attack power by 2%, critical chance by 2%, and accuracy by 3 for 5 seconds. (Maximum 5 stacks) This effect cannot be purged.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MALSUK_DESC.text: Malsook shoots hardened tteok bullets to deal #physical damage# equal to [150/300/450]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MALSUK_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Block skills used by Malsook after receiving a heal from an ally are changed to 'Soybean Injeolmi.' 'Soybean Injeolmi' deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of Malsook's attack power and causes nearby enemies to 'cough' for 3 seconds, dealing #physical damage# equal to 100% of Malsook's attack power every 0.5 seconds. (Maximum 5 stacks)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MALSUK_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Block skills used by Malsook after receiving a heal from an ally are changed to 'Soybean Injeolmi.' 'Soybean Injeolmi' deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of Malsook's attack power and causes nearby enemies to 'cough' for 5 seconds, dealing #physical damage# equal to 200% of Malsook's attack power every 0.5 seconds. (Maximum 5 stacks) Reusing the skill before its termination will reset the duration of 'coughing.' Upon receiving 5 heals from an ally, Malsook uses 'Ironclad Five-Colored Songpyeon' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1500% of her attack power for 2 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MANLY_FIRE_DESC.text: The caster immediately fires consecutive shots that deal @magical damage@ equal to 300% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MANLY_FIRE_LV2_DESC.text: The caster immediately fires consecutive shots that deal @magical damage@ equal to 350% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MANLY_FIRE_LV3_DESC.text: The caster immediately fires consecutive shots that deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of their attack power. The caster's next block is activated as a 3-chain.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MANLY_FIRE_LV4_DESC.text: The caster immediately fires consecutive shots that deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of their attack power. The caster's next block is activated as a 3-chain.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MANLY_FIRE_LV5_DESC.text: The caster immediately fires consecutive shots that deal @magical damage@ equal to 600% of their attack power. The caster's next two blocks are activated as 3-chains.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MAXI_DESC.text: Maxi deals @magical damage@ equal to [150/300/600]% of her attack power, to enemies within her range, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MAXI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Maxi uses 'Maximum Shot! once to deal additional @magical damage@ equal to 500% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) 'Maximum Shot' is acknowledged as a 3-chain but does not generate SP.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_MAXI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Maxi uses 'Maximum Shot! once to deal additional @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) 'Maximum Shot' is acknowledged as a 3-chain but does not generate SP.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_NAPALMBOMB_LV5_DESC.text: The caster requests carpet bombing upon activating the skill, summoning napalm bombs that explode 5 times to each deal @magical damage@ equal to 170% of the caster's attack power. Hit enemies are stunned for 1 second. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_NO9_DESC.text: No. 9 shoots the farthest enemy in range and deals #physical damage# equal to [300/400/500]% of attack power, according to the chain number used. 'Samiel's Hunt' ignores all effects that take damage in place of others.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_NO9_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero aims for the enemy and deals #physical damage# equal to [300/400/500]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_NO9_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 3 blocks, No.9 becomes 'Der Freischütz (the Marksman)' for 5 seconds, with her critical chance increased by 30% and critical damage by 50%. This passive cannot be canceled and renews its effect and duration every time No.9 uses her block.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_NO9_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 3 blocks, No.9 becomes 'Der Freischütz (the Marksman)' for 5 seconds, with her critical chance increased by 50%, critical damage by 100%, and armor penetration by 50% of her attack power. This passive cannot be canceled and renews its effect and duration every time No.9 uses her block.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ORGA_DESC.text: Olga orders 'Death Sentence' to enemies before her to deal @magical damage@ equal to [150/270/450]% of her attack power. Afterwards, she enters 'Executioner' mode for 5 seconds, during which her critical chance is increased by 40%. Olga only uses her passive skills during 'Executioner' mode.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ORGA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her own block skill during 'Executioner' mode, Olga summons a 'Missile Penguin' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of her attack power to enemies before her. Every second summon of 'Missile Penguins' will increase the duration of Olga's 'Executioner' mode by 3 seconds. Additionally, Olga's Special Skill is changed to 'Overclocqueen.' Overclocqueen: Olga's critical damage is increased by 150% for 10 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ORGA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her own block skill during 'Executioner' mode, Olga summons a 'Missile Penguin' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 2000% of her attack power to enemies before her. Every second summon of 'Missile Penguins' will increase the duration of Olga's 'Executioner' mode by 3 seconds. Upon using another ally's 3-chain in 'Executioner' mode, Olga summons a 'Flamethrower Penguin' for 3 seconds to deal @magical damage@ equal to 800% of Olga's attack power every 0.1 seconds to all enemies and decrease their evasion by 20. (Cooltime: 5 seconds) Additionally, Olga's Special Skill is changed to 'Overclocqueen.' Overclocqueen: Olga's critical damage is increased by 300% for 10 seconds. Reusing the skill before its termination will summon 'the Red Comet,' who deals @magical damage@ 3 times the damage dealt by 'Missile Penguins.'

TEXT_SKILL_HU_OT_03_DESC.text: The Hero hires help from a mercenary cleric. The mercenary cleric uses a holy prayer to deal @magical damage@ equal to [150/250/400]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_OT_03_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero's block skill deals a critical hit, the Hero gets 'Boosted' by 1 stage for 7 seconds. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds) This effect cannot be canceled. The Hero's block skill effects are changed based on how many stages of 'Boost' they have:  Stage 1: The mercenary cleric's holy prayer deals @magical damage@ equal to [300/500/800]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used. Stage 2: The mercenary cleric's holy prayer deals @magical damage@ equal to [450/750/1200]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used. Upon reactivation of 'Boost' at Stage 2, the duration is refreshed.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_OT_03_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero's block skill deals a critical hit, the Hero gets 'Boosted' by 1 stage for 7 seconds. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds) This effect cannot be canceled. The Hero's block skill effects are changed based on how many stages of 'Boost' they have:  Stage 1: The mercenary cleric's holy prayer deals @magical damage@ equal to [300/500/800]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used. Stage 2: The mercenary cleric's holy prayer deals @magical damage@ equal to [450/750/1200]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used. Stage 3: The mercenary cleric's holy prayer deals @magical damage@ equal to [600/1000/1600]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used. Upon reactivation of 'Boost' at Stage 3, the duration is refreshed.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_POWERBULLET_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Using a 3-chain skill will add 300 attack power to the skill. 3-chain skill will reactivated up to 2 times with 50% chance. Bonus bullets triggered by passive skill will not recover SP.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_POWERBULLET_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Using a 3-chain skill will add 600 attack power to the skill. 3-chain skill will reactivated up to 3 times with 65% chance. Bonus bullets triggered by passive skill will not recover SP.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_QUICKEN_DESC.text: The caster's critical damage is immediately increased by 10% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_QUICKEN_LV2_DESC.text: The caster's critical damage is immediately increased by 15% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_QUICKEN_LV3_DESC.text: The caster's critical damage is immediately increased by 20% and critical chance by 10% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_QUICKEN_LV4_DESC.text: The caster's critical damage is immediately increased by 25% and critical chance by 15% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_QUICKEN_LV5_DESC.text: The caster's critical damage is immediately increased by 45% and critical chance by 20% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_RAVEN_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero shoots 5 ice bullets that each deal @magical damage@ equal to [40/50/70]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_RAVEN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Frost Bullet' receive a 'Frost Bite' that decreases movement speed by 3.33% for 10 seconds. 'Frost Bites' can be stacked, and are enhanced every [1/10/20/30] stacks. Upon using a special skill, Raven detonates the stacked 'Frost Bites' to deal @magical damage@ equal to [1000/1500/2500/4000]% of her attack power, according to the enhanced level of the attack. The explosion cannot be evaded. After exploding, all 'Frost Bites' are cancelled. Additionally, upon using another ally's 3-chain, Raven throws a 'Frost Grenade' which stacks 5 'Frost Bites' and explodes to deal @magical damage@ equal to 200% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_RPG_SHOT_DESC.text: Shoots a bullet to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/220/400]% of attack power. 'GP-7 Shot' ignores enemy effects that absorb damage in place of their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SCARLET_DESC.text: The Hero shoots a bullet that deals #physical damage# equal to [100/220/350]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used, and knocks back the enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SCARLET_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using any 3 ally blocks, the Hero activates 'Barrel Bomb.' (Cooltime: 1 second) Barrel Bomb: The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to 800% of their attack power, knocks back the hit enemy, and stuns them for 1 second. This attack ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of others.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SCARLET_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using any 3 ally blocks, the Hero activates 'Barrel Bomb.' (Cooltime: 1 second) Barrel Bomb: The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to 1500% of their attack power, knocks back the hit enemy, and stuns them for 1 second. This attack ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of others.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SCHILD_DESC.text: The Hero shoots 'Gravity Compression Cubes' to deal #physical damage# equal to [180/270/360]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SCHILD_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Gravity Compression Cubes' enter 'Event Horizon' for 5 seconds. Enemies in 'Event Horizon' lose movement speed and critical resistance by 66%.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SCHILD_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Gravity Compression Cubes' enter 'Event Horizon' for 5 seconds. Enemies in 'Event Horizon' lose movement speed and critical resistance by 66%. If an enemy in 'Event Horizon' gets near the Hero, the Hero knocks them into the air and then knocks them back. Upon activating an ally block skill, the Hero deals $neutral damage$ equal to 400% of the Hero's attack power to enemies in 'Event Horizon.' (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SILVER_DESC.text: Silver shoots a laser beam to the nearest enemy to deal @magical damage@ equal to [120/220/350]% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SILVER_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Silver's Special Skill is changed to 'Ultimate Weapon.' Ultimate Weapon: Silver transforms into a giant cannon for 10 seconds. His block skills are changed to 'Prism Shot,' which deals @magical damage@ equal to [120/220/500]% of Silver's attack power, according to the chain number used. Upon reactivating 'Ultimate Weapon,' the skill's duration is renewed and Silver uses 'Star Cannon.' Star Cannon: Silver deals @magical damage@ equal to 150% of his attack power every 0.3 seconds for 8 seconds, at the cost of 30% of his movement speed. Upon reactivating 'Star Cannon,' the skill's duration is renewed.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SILVER_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Silver's Special Skill is changed to 'Ultimate Weapon.' Ultimate Weapon: Silver transforms into a giant cannon for 10 seconds. In this state, his attack power and critical damage are increased by 125%. His block skills are changed to 'Prism Shot,' which deals @magical damage@ equal to [120/220/500]% of Silver's attack power, according to the chain number used. Upon reactivating 'Ultimate Weapon,' the skill's duration is renewed and Silver uses 'Star Cannon.' Star Cannon: Silver deals @magical damage@ equal to 250% of his attack power every 0.3 seconds for 8 seconds, at the cost of 30% of his movement speed. Upon reactivating 'Star Cannon,' the skill's duration is renewed. Additionally, upon using his 3-chain, Silver generates 40 SP for himself. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SMOKE_LV3_DESC.text: The caster throws a smoke bomb that decreases the enemy's accuracy and critical chance by 25%. Enemies within the smoke will lose their armor and resistance by 300 each.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SMOKE_LV4_DESC.text: The caster throws a smoke bomb that decreases the enemy's accuracy and critical chance by 30%. Enemies within the smoke will lose their armor and resistance by 500 each.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SMOKE_LV5_DESC.text: The caster throws a smoke bomb that decreases the enemy's accuracy and critical chance by 35%. Enemies within the smoke will lose their armor and resistance by 1000 each.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SVENJA_DESC.text: The Hero summons mini tracker tanks that deal #physical damage# equal to [150/300/450]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SVENJA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block 2 times, the Hero additionally shoots 'Armor Piercing High Explosives' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of their attack power. Their Special Skill is changed to 'Overhit.' 'Overhit' increases the Hero's attack power by 50% and critical damage by 100% for 10 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_SVENJA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block 2 times, the Hero additionally shoots 'Armor Piercing High Explosives' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of their attack power. Their Special Skill is changed to 'Overhit.' 'Overhit' increases the Hero's attack power by 70%, armor penetration by 40%, and critical damage by 250% for 10 seconds. If 'Overhit' is reused within its duration, the Hero summons military satellites to deal #physical damage# equal to 2500% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TESS_DESC.text: The Hero gushes out 'eight bars pondered throughout the night' that penetrate the enemy and deal 8 hits of @magical damage@ equal to [100/125/150]% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TESS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block skill twice, the Hero activates 'Killing Verse.' Killing Verse: The Hero howls a brilliant melody that suddenly came to their mind at 2 o'clock in the morning. The verse penetrates the enemy and deals 8 hits of @magical damage@ equal to 300% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TESS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block skill twice, the Hero activates 'Killing Verse.' Killing Verse: The Hero howls a brilliant melody that suddenly came to their mind at 2 o'clock in the morning. The verse penetrates the enemy and deals 8 hits of @magical damage@ equal to 600% of the Hero's attack power. The Hero marks enemies critically hit by their attack with 'Know Thyself' for 6 seconds. Know Thyself: The marked enemy falls in deep contemplation and loses the will to fight, losing all buffs and 30% of their resistance. They cannot receive any additional buffs for the duration of the skill. (Duration renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TESS_NAME.text: Eight Bars Pondered Throughout the Night

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TRIPLE_SHOT_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon dealing 2 critical hits with their block skill, the Hero's auto attack is changed to 'Blast Shot' for 5 seconds. Each 'Blast Shot' deals #physical damage# equal to 300% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TRIPLE_SHOT_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon dealing 2 critical hits with their block skill, the Hero's auto attacks are changed to 'Blast Shot' for 8 seconds. Each 'Blast Shot' deals #physical damage# equal to 600% of the Hero's attack power. Upon using their block skill during this passive, the Hero's accuracy is increased by 40 for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 4 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TURRET_009_DESC.text: Immediately installs a reinforcement turret that stands for 10 seconds and deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of attack power per second. The turret has 50% of the summoner's stats. (Maximum 1 turret can be installed.)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TURRET_009_LV2_DESC.text: Immediately installs a reinforcement turret that stands for 10 seconds and deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of attack power per second. The turret has 75% of the summoner's stats. (Maximum 1 turret can be installed.)

TEXT_SKILL_HU_TURRET_009_LV3_DESC.text: Immediately installs a reinforcement turret that stands for 10 seconds and deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of attack power per second. The turret has 100% of the summoner's stats. (Maximum 1 turret can be installed.) If reactivated before termination, the timer for the turret is reset and 3 missiles are fired to each deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_YS8_HUMMEL_DESC.text: Hummel shoots to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/150/200]% of his attack power 2 times, according to the chain number he used.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_YS8_HUMMEL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Hummel's block is pressed immediately before being hit, he activates 'Flash Guard' that increases his critical chance by 10% and decreases the damage he receives by 20% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_YS8_HUMMEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If Hummel's block is pressed immediately before being hit, he activates 'Flash Guard' that increases his critical chance by 10% and decreases the damage he receives by 20% for 3 seconds.  Upon using his own block after another ally's 3-chain, Hummel additionally uses 'Judgment' to deal #physical damage# equal to 600% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_LEARN_REPEAT_STOP_NOTICE.text: Stopping Transfer as you do not have enough resources.

TEXT_SKILL_PACK_COVER.text: May the Spirits be with you! #(1 per Account)#

TEXT_SKILL_PACK_DESC.text: Advanced Special Skill Unlock Hero Guaranteed!

TEXT_SKILL_PACK_DESC2.text: May the Souls be with you! Purchase to immediately receive 200 Jewels and a Skill Unlock Hero Select Ticket!

TEXT_SKILL_PACK_HELP.text: Joan of Arc, Kaori, Vivian, Abel, Alexander, Achilles, Vane, Robin Hood, Gon, Giparang, Spyro, D'Artagnan, Viper, Dorothy, Sasquatch, Korin, Lilith, Mew, Nightingale, Himiko, Arona, Tia

TEXT_SKILL_PACK_HELP_INFO.text: Click the button to see the list of heroes that unlock Adv. Special Skills.

TEXT_SKILL_PACK_ITEM1_DESC.text: Can Select a 4-Star Skill Unlock Hero

TEXT_SKILL_PACK_MAIL_CONTENT.text: Here's your Skill Researcher's Package purchase!

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ANCHOR_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his block, Drake raises the entire team's critical chance by 50% of his own for 5 seconds. If enemies receive 2 critical hits during this effect, Drake casts a shield over the entire team that absorbs damage equal to 20% of his maximum HP. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ATHENA_DESC.text: Deals @magical damage@ equal to (250/350/500)% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ATHENA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Athena generates a shield over the entire team for 10 seconds that absorbs damage up to 200% of Athena's resistance. She then deals additional @magical damage@ equal to 500% of her resistance.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ATHENA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Athena generates a shield over the entire team for 10 seconds that absorbs damage up to 300% of Athena's resistance. She then deals additional @magical damage@ equal to 750% of her resistance.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BEAM_SLASH_DESC.text: V charges toward the enemy and deals #physical damage# equal to [50/150/250]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used. Upon using a 3-chain, V attacks the enemy 2 times.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BEAM_SLASH_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, V enters 'Fury Mode' for 5 seconds. In 'Fury Mode,' V's attack power increases by 1500 and armor and all penetration increase by 375 per second. (Maximum 5 stacks) V's 3-chains also deal 50% more damage. However, 'Fury Mode' overheats V and costs 3% of her maximum HP per second. Using V's block skill will increase the duration of 'Fury Mode' by 1 second.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BEAM_SLASH_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, V enters 'Fury Mode' for 5 seconds. In 'Fury Mode,' V's attack power increases by 1500 and armor and all penetration increase by 375 per second. (Maximum 5 stacks) V's 3-chains also deal 50% more damage in 'Fury Mode.' Additionally, using any ally block activates V's block skill, while every block skill used by V activates as a 3-chain. V's every third block skill is enhanced to deal #physical damage# equal to 750% of her attack power. However, 'Fury Mode' overheats V and costs 3% of her maximum HP per second. Using V's block skill will increase the duration of 'Fury Mode' by 1 second.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BOMBING_WATERS_DESC.text: The caster triggers successive explosions to deal @magical damage@ equal to 300% of their attack power. This attack knocks hit enemies into the air.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BOMBING_WATERS_LV2_DESC.text: The caster triggers successive explosions to deal @magical damage@ equal to 350% of their attack power. This attack knocks hit enemies into the air.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BOMBING_WATERS_LV3_DESC.text: The caster triggers successive explosions to deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of their attack power. This attack knocks hit enemies into the air, decreases their resistance by 20% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BOMBING_WATERS_LV4_DESC.text: The caster triggers successive explosions to deal @magical damage@ equal to 475% of their attack power. This attack knocks hit enemies into the air, decreases their resistance by 25% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BOMBING_WATERS_LV5_DESC.text: The caster triggers successive explosions to deal @magical damage@ equal to 525% of their attack power. This attack knocks hit enemies into the air, decreases their resistance by 30% for 3 seconds, and dispels all enemy buffs.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BRAVERYROAR_DESC.text: The caster immediately increases the entire party's maximum HP by 2000 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BRAVERYROAR_LV2_DESC.text: The caster immediately increases the entire party's maximum HP by 3000 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BRAVERYROAR_LV3_DESC.text: The caster immediately increases the entire party's maximum HP by 4000 and armor and resistance by 100 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BRAVERYROAR_LV4_DESC.text: The caster immediately increases the entire party's maximum HP by 5000 and armor and resistance by 150 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_BRAVERYROAR_LV5_DESC.text: The caster immediately increases the entire party's maximum HP by 8000 and armor and resistance by 200 for 5 seconds, and receives all damage dealt to the party for the same amount of time.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CAENEUS_DESC.text: Caeneus raises his flag, removing all ally and enemy shields. He also prevents any subject from receiving shields for [3/4/5] seconds according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CAENEUS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: During his shield canceling debuff, Caeneus decreases the damage he receives by 20%.  (Block Skill Altered) If pressing his block during his block skill, only the duration of the shield canceling debuff is renewed.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CAENEUS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: During his shield canceling debuff, Caeneus decreases the damage he receives by 25% and increases his armor and resistance by 500.  (Block Skill Altered) If pressing his block during his block skill, only the duration of the shield canceling debuff is renewed.  If only Caeneus remains standing during battle, he enters 'Courageous Fury' mode. (Only activates once per round)  'Courageous Fury': Caeneus immediately heals 100% of his HP. His attack speed is increased by 50%. His normal attacks are enhanced to deal #physical damage# equal to 100% of his resistance.  (Block Skill and Passive Altered) Caeneus's original Block Skill and Passive do not activate during 'Courageous Fury.'

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CECILIA_DESC.text: The Hero charges forward and smashes their hammer to deal #physical damage# equal to [250/500/750]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CECILIA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero activates 'Immolation' for 10 seconds. Immolation: The Hero sacrifices 20% of their maximum HP. In return, the Hero's block skills are enhanced to deal #physical damage# equal to [500/1000/1500]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used. (Cannot be dispelled; duration renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CECILIA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero activates 'Immolation' for 10 seconds. Immolation: The Hero sacrifices 20% of their maximum HP. In return, the Hero's block skills are enhanced to deal #physical damage# equal to [750/1500/2250]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used, and additional #physical damage# equal to 100% of the Hero's attack power every 0.2 seconds to all enemies within range. (Cannot be dispelled; duration renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CHAIN_BINDING_DESC.text: Siegfried binds the enemy within his range for 2 seconds and deals #physical damage# equal to [200/300/400]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CHAIN_BINDING_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every 4 times Siegfried binds the enemy with 'Chains of Confinement,' he charges forward and uses 'Cry of the Dragon' to deal #physical damage# equal to 600% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_CHAIN_BINDING_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every 4 times Siegfried binds the enemy with 'Chains of Confinement,' he charges forward and uses 'Cry of the Dragon' to deal #physical damage# equal to 600% of his attack power. Enemies bound by 'Chains of Confinement' lose evasion by 100 for 8 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_DOCKING_ANCHOR_LV5_DESC.text: Strikes the enemy with a big anchor, dealing #physical damage# equal to 500% of attack power, and fixes the target's chance to get hit to max for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_FENRIR_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's block, Fenrir pulls in the enemy with the highest HP. (Cooltime: 5 seconds) If Fenrir uses her own block within 3 seconds of using an ally's block, she leaves a 'Wolf's Mark' on the nearest enemy for 5 seconds. 'Wolf's Mark' decreases armor and resistance by 30% and prevents enemy buffs. If Fenrir used a 3-chain to leave her 'Wolf's Mark,' she enters the 'Day of Sol' phase.    'Day of Sol' (Duration: 10 seconds)  While 'Sol' is in the sky, Fenrir's armor and resistance are increased by 50%. Upon using her own block, Fenrir receives all damage targeted at the entire team for 4 seconds. If pressing her block at the moment 'Sol' shines, her evasion is increased by 15 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_FENRIR_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's block, Fenrir pulls in the enemy with the highest HP. (Cooltime: 5 seconds) If Fenrir uses her own block within 3 seconds of using an ally's block, she leaves a 'Wolf's Mark' on the nearest enemy for 5 seconds. 'Wolf's Mark' decreases armor and resistance by 50% and prevents enemy buffs.    If Fenrir used a 1- or 2-chain to leave her 'Wolf's Mark,' she enters the 'Day of Sol' phase; if she used a 3-chain, she enters the 'Night of Mani' phase. Each phase cannot be changed for the other until it ends.    'Night of Mani' (Duration: 10 seconds)  While 'Mani' is in the sky, Fenrir's resistance is decreased to 0, while her armor is increased by 300. Upon using her own block, Fenrir scratches the frontmost enemy with her claws to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/400]% of her attack power; if the hit enemy is marked by 'Wolf's Mark,' Fenrir deals additional #physical damage# equal to [160/320/640]% of her attack power. If pressing her block at the moment 'Mani' shines, her critical chance is increased by 30% for 6 seconds, and the duration of the phase is increased by 6 seconds. When 'Night of Mani' ends, Fenrir is stunned for 2 seconds.    'Day of Sol' (Duration: 10 seconds)  While 'Sol' is in the sky, Fenrir's armor and resistance are increased by 100%. Upon using her own block, Fenrir receives all damage targeted at the entire team for 4 seconds. If pressing her block at the moment 'Sol' shines, her evasion is increased by 30 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_FIREAXE_DESC.text: The hero swings her burning weapon to deal #physical damage# equal to [110/220/330]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_FIREAXE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: With every 5 hits she receives, Fireaxe uses 'Feel the Heat!' to increase her damage reduction rate by 12% for 5 seconds. (Maximum 5 stacks)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_FIREAXE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every 5 hits she receives, Fireaxe uses 'Feel the Heat!' to increase her damage reduction rate by 12% for 5 seconds. (Maximum 5 stacks) Upon receiving a critical hit, Fireaxe immediately activates her 3-chain skill. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_FUGUROID_DESC.text: Fergusroid pounds its hammer three times to deal #physical damage# equal to [40/70/100]% of its attack power per hit, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_FUGUROID_SUBDESC.text: Upon accurately dealing all hits of its block skill, Fergusroid enters 'Overheated' mode. In 'Overheated' mode, Fergusroid deals all hits with 100% critical chance, and its attack activates as 'Everything's Great Success' to deal #physical damage# equal to 200% of its current attack power. If it succeeds in attacking, Fergusroid's 'Overheated' mode turns off, and enemies hit by 'Everything's Great Success' are stunned for 2 seconds and knocked back.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_HEIM_DESC.text: Heim leaps forward and deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/300]% of his attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_HEIM_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero leaps forward and deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_HEIM_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his block after another ally's 3-chain, Heim summons ice shards from the earth to deal @magical damage@ equal to 300% of his resistance.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_HEIM_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his block after another ally's 3-chain, Heim summons icicles from the ground to deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of his resistance. The land over which the icicles are summoned turns into 'Land of Ice and Snow' for 3 seconds. Enemies on the 'Land of Ice and Snow' receive @magical damage@ equal to 100% of Heim's resistance every 0.1 seconds, and an evasion debuff of 10.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_IRON_HAMMER_DESC.text: Rebecca swings her iron mace 2 times to deal #physical damage# equal to [150/200/260]% of her attack power according to the chain number she used. Enemies hit by this attack receive a 'Mark of the Sun' that lasts 10 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_IRON_HAMMER_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Rebecca cannot be pushed back for 1 second after using block. If an ally hits an enemy with the 'Mark of the Sun' 5 times, the enemy receives additional #physical damage# equal to 200% of Rebecca's attack power and the 'Mark of the Sun' disappears afterwards. (Cooltime: 0.5 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_IRON_HAMMER_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a block, Rebecca becomes resistant to knockback for 1 second. If allies hit an enemy with the 'Mark of the Sun' 5 times, the mark disappears as they deal additional #Physical damage# equal to 500% of Rebecca's attack power. (Cooltime: 1 second) When the 'Mark of the Sun' is activated, Rebecca's maximum HP is increased by 15% while armor piercing increases by 1500 for 10 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_02_DESC.text: Hols uses 'Hols Super Punch' to charge forward and deal #physical damage# equal to [120/220/350]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_02_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing his block skill, Hols takes damage in place of his allies for 3 seconds. This effect cannot be cancelled.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_02_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing his block skill, Hols takes damage in place of his allies for 4 seconds and decreases his own received damage by 50%. This effect cannot be cancelled.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_03_DESC.text: Gao uses 'Tiger Punch' to deal #physical damage# equal to [300/400/500]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_03_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain block skill and then using his own block, Gao uses 'Tiger Claw' to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_03_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain block skill and then using his own block, Gao uses 'Tiger Claw' to deal #physical damage# equal to 600% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_09_DESC.text: Runs quickly to the front and kicks the enemy to deal #physical damage# equal to [250/500/1000]% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_09_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero's movement speed is increased by 50%. This effect cannot be cancelled. Upon pressing their own block after another ally's block, the Hero's next block skill is changed to 'Vocoder.' (Cooltime: 3 seconds) 'Vocoder': The Hero decreases the frontmost enemy's movement speed by 25% and evasion by 25 for 2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_09_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero's movement speed is increased by 100%. This effect cannot be cancelled. Upon pressing their own block after another ally's block, the Hero's next block skill is changed to 'Vocoder.' (Cooltime: 3 seconds) 'Vocoder': The Hero decreases the frontmost enemy's movement speed by 50% and evasion by 50 for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_10_DESC.text: Deals #physical damage# equal to [150/250/350]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_10_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 'Tart Power,' Tart's next block skill is changed to 'Kick,' which deals #physical damage# equal to 800% of attack power and stuns the enemy for 1 second. Upon using 'Kick,' Tart's next block skill is changed to 'Body Slam,' which deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_10_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 'Tart Power,' Tart's evasion is increased by 40 for 4 seconds, and Tart's next block skill is changed to 'Kick,' which deals #physical damage# equal to 800% of attack power and stuns the enemy for 1 second. Upon using 'Kick,' Tart's next block skill is changed to 'Body Slam,' which deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of attack power and stuns the enemy for 2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_12_DESC.text: Urii explodes into tears for 5 seconds, decreasing the enemy's attack power by [45/50/55]% according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_12_LV2_SUBDESC.text: While 'Urii is Scared' is active, for every 5 hits, the Red Hatted Sister appears and deals physical damage equal to 300% of Urii's resistance and stuns for 1 second. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_ER_12_LV3_SUBDESC.text: While 'Urii is Scared' is active, for every 5 hits, the Red Hatted Sister appears and deals physical damage equal to 300% of Urii's resistance and stuns for 1 second. (Cooltime: 1 second) While 'Urii is Scared' is active, Urii takes damage in place of his allies.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_GG4_01_DESC.text: The Hero charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [100/200/400]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_GG4_01_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon activating their own block skill, the Hero randomly takes out and throws one of the below items. Hammer: Deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of the Hero's attack power to one hit enemy. Bomb: Deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of the Hero's attack power to hit enemies. Weight: Deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of the Hero's attack power to all enemies, and lifts all allies and enemies into the air. Banana: Heals all allies' HP by 30%.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_GG4_01_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon activating their own block skill, the Hero randomly takes out and throws one of the below items. Hammer: Deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of the Hero's attack power to one hit enemy. Bomb: Deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of the Hero's attack power to hit enemies. Weight: Deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of the Hero's attack power to all enemies, and lifts all allies and enemies into the air. Banana: Heals all allies' HP by 30%. Mini Faust: Deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of the Hero's HP to one enemy with the lowest HP. This attack ignores effects that take damage in place of others as well as evasion. Meteor: Deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of the Hero's HP per hit to hit enemies. This attack ignores enemy evasion.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_OT_06_DESC.text: The Hero strikes down with an axe to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_OT_06_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing the Hero's own block, the Hero activates 'Grapewood Curative.' 'Grapewood Curative:' Increases the Hero's own HP by 2x for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 7 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_OT_06_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing the Hero's own block, the Hero activates 'Grapewood Curative.' 'Grapewood Curative:' Increases the Hero's own HP by 2x for 6 seconds, and takes damage in place of all allies. (Cooltime: 7 seconds) Upon pressing the Hero's own block while 'Grapewood Curative' is active, 'Grapewood Curative' is changed to 'Pomegranate Panacea.'
