'Pomegranate Panacea:' increases all allies' SP by 20, and generates 1 block for the Leader.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_SH_02_DESC.text: 1-Chain: Naofumi uses 'Air Strike Shield' over the entire team. 'Air Strike Shield' receives damage up to 200% of Naofumi's HP and changes Naofumi's Shield into 'Small Shield.' 2-Chain: Naofumi's Shield changes to 'Dog Bite' Shield. 'Dog Bite' deals #physical damage# equal to 300% of Naofumi's armor to enemies before him and decreases enemy accuracy by 50 for 3 seconds. After the attack, Naofumi's Shield changes to 'Small Shield.' (Cooltime: 1 second) 3-Chain: Naofumi's Shield changes to 'Soul Eater Shield.' Enemies who attack Naofumi during 'Soul Eater Shield' will lose 3 SP per hit.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_SH_02_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally block, Naofumi receives all damage targeted at the entire team for 3 seconds. This effect cannot be canceled. Reusing the skill before its termination will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_SH_02_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally block, Naofumi receives all damage targeted at the entire team for 5 seconds. This effect cannot be canceled. Reusing the skill before its termination will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_SH_02_NAME.text: Air Strike Shield / Dog Bite / Soul Eater Shield

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_SH_03_DESC.text: Filo transforms into her 'Filolial Queen' form. This transformation cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_SH_03_LV2_SUBDESC.text: 'Filolial Queen' Form: Filo's block skill is changed to 'Full-Powered Kick,' through which Filo deals #physical damage# equal to [180/320/460]% of her attack power by stomping upon the enemy from the air.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIMITED_SH_03_LV3_SUBDESC.text: 'Filolial Queen' Form: Filo's block skill is changed to 'Full-Powered Kick,' through which Filo deals #physical damage# equal to [180/320/460]% of her attack power by stomping upon the enemy from the air. Upon using 'Full-Powered Kick' 5 times, Filo uses 'Fast Tornado' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIONMASK_DESC.text: Lion Mask dropkicks the enemy to deal #physical damage# equal to [200/400/600]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used, and stuns the hit enemy for 1 second.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIONMASK_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When the enemy comes within his range, Lion Mask generates a 'Wrestling Ring' for 10 seconds. (Cooltime: 13 seconds) If no enemy is in the Ring, the Ring disappears and its cooltime is reset. Wrestling Ring: Whenever Lion Mask receives a hit in the ring, his armor is increased by 20% and his damage reduction rate is increased by 4%. This effect is canceled only when Lion Mask leaves the Ring or the Ring disappears. (Maximum 3 stacks; effect cannot be dispelled)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIONMASK_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When the enemy comes within his range, Lion Mask generates a 'Wrestling Ring' for 10 seconds. (Cooltime: 13 seconds) If no enemy is in the Ring, the Ring disappears and its cooltime is reset. Wrestling Ring: Whenever Lion Mask receives a hit in the ring, his armor is increased by 40% and his damage reduction rate is increased by 8%. This effect is only canceled when Lion Mask leaves the Ring or the Ring disappears. (Maximum 5 stacks; effect cannot be dispelled) Upon using his block while in the Ring, Lion Mask activates his block skills as 'Chair Shot' that deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of his attack power and stuns the hit enemy for 2 seconds. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LUCY_DESC.text: The Hero dashes forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LUCY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: With every 5 hits they receive, the Hero activates 'Knight in Shining Armor' for 8 seconds.(Cooltime: 3 seconds) Knight in Shining Armor: The Hero's armor is increased by 600. The Hero receives 20% less damage.  During 'Knight in Shining Armor,' the Hero receives all damage targeted at the entire team. (Cannot be canceled)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LUCY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every second hit they receive, the Hero activates 'Knight in Shining Armor' for 8 seconds.(Cooltime: 3 seconds) Knight in Shining Armor: The Hero's armor is increased by 900. The Hero receives 50% less damage.  During 'Knight in Shining Armor,' the Hero receives all damage targeted at the entire team. (Cannot be canceled)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_MAENGGI_DESC.text: Mengqi leaps on his horse and charges forth for [1/3/5] seconds according to the chain number used, spinning his spear to deal #physical damage# equal to [75/225/750]% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_MAENGGI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's block after the Hero's 3-chain, the Hero leaps off their horse and uses 'Fierce Dragon Slash.' 'Fierce Dragon Slash' dispels all enemy buffs and deals #physical damage# equal to 575% of the Hero's attack power. If the Hero's HP is less than 50%, their armor and resistance are increased by 300.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_MAENGGI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's block after the Hero's 3-chain, the Hero leaps off their horse and uses 'Fierce Dragon Slash.' 'Fierce Dragon Slash' dispels all enemy buffs and deals #physical damage# equal to 1500% of the Hero's attack power. If another ally's block is used during 'Fierce Dragon Slash,' the Hero uses 'Fierce Dragon Charge' to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of their attack power per hit for 3 seconds. Additionally, every time an ally receives damage, the Hero deals #physical damage# equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power to the enemy that attacked. If the Hero's HP is less than 50%, their armor and resistance are increased by 300.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_NARI_DESC.text: The Hero charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [100/150/200]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_NARI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If an enemy is within the Hero's range, the Hero's block skill is changed to 'Fourth Stance - Force of the Penetrating Palm' that deals $neutral damage$ equal to 700% of the enemy's armor. 'Fourth Stance' ignores all enemy evasion and effects that receive damage in place of their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_NARI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If an enemy is within the Hero's range, the Hero's block skill is changed to 'Fourth Stance - Force of the Penetrating Palm' that deals $neutral damage$ equal to 1000% of the enemy's armor. 'Fourth Stance' ignores all enemy evasion and effects that receive damage in place of their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_NARI_NAME.text: First Stance - Way of the Gale

TEXT_SKILL_PA_NARI_SUBNAME.text: Fourth Stance - Force of the Penetrating Palm

TEXT_SKILL_PA_NEULSOLGIL_DESC.text: The Hero swings their weapon to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/400]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used, and knock back hit enemies.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_NEULSOLGIL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally's 3-chain, the Hero activates 'Forest's Blessing' to increase their own armor and resistance by 50% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_NEULSOLGIL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally's 3-chain, the Hero activates 'Forest's Blessing' to increase their own armor and resistance by 50% and receive all damage targeted at the entire team for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ODIN_DESC.text: Odin wields [1/2/3] spears that deal #physical damage# equal to [400/400/400]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used. Each of Odin's spears activates different effects, in the order they are used. First Spear: Knocks back enemies within its range. Second Spear: Pulls in enemies within its range. Third Spear: Knocks enemies within its range into the air.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ODIN_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero wields [1/2/3] Odin's Spears that deal #physical damage# equal to [400/400/400]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used. Each of Odin's Spears activates different effects, in the order they are used. First Spear: Knocks back enemies within its range. Second Spear: Pulls in enemies within its range. Third Spear: Knocks enemies within its range into the air.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ODIN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Odin's block skill receive the effect of 'Odin's Eye' for 5 seconds. 'Odin's Eye' decreases 5% of its subject's armor.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ODIN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Odin's block skill receive the effect of 'Odin's Eye' for 5 seconds. 'Odin's Eye' decreases 10% of its subject's armor.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ORBITAL_HAMMER_DESC.text: The caster summons spinning hammers around their body that deal @magical damage@ equal to 30% of the caster's attack power upon contact.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ORBITAL_HAMMER_LV2_DESC.text: The caster summons spinning hammers around their body that deal @magical damage@ equal to 35% of the caster's attack power upon contact.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ORBITAL_HAMMER_LV3_DESC.text: The caster summons spinning hammers around their body that deal @magical damage@ equal to 40% of the caster's attack power upon contact. Enemies that receive 5 hits by this skill become stunned for 1 second. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ORBITAL_HAMMER_LV4_DESC.text: The caster summons spinning hammers around their body that deal @magical damage@ equal to 45% of the caster's attack power upon contact. Enemies that receive 5 hits by this skill become stunned for 1 second. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ORBITAL_HAMMER_LV5_DESC.text: The caster summons spinning hammers around their body that deal @magical damage@ equal to 75% of the caster's attack power upon contact. Enemies that receive 5 hits by this skill become stunned for 1 second. Stunning an enemy will heal the leader ally by 5% of their HP. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OTIS_DESC.text: The Hero swings their bottle to deal #physical damage# equal to [120/240/320]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OTIS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally’s 3-chain, the Hero increases their own and another frontmost ally’s attack power by 20% for 5 seconds. (Reusing skill will reset duration)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OTIS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally’s 3-chain, the Hero increases their own and another frontmost ally’s attack power by 25% for 5 seconds. (Reusing skill will reset duration)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OVERPOWER_DESC.text: The hero unleashes a blast to deal #physical damage# equal to 250% of the attack power, stunning the enemy hit by the last explosion for 1.5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OVERPOWER_LV2_DESC.text: The hero unleashes a blast to deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of the attack power, stunning the enemy hit by the last explosion for 1.5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OVERPOWER_LV3_DESC.text: The hero unleashes a blast to deal #physical damage# equal to 350% of the attack power, stunning the enemy hit by the last explosion for 1.5 seconds..

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OVERPOWER_LV4_DESC.text: The hero unleashes a blast to deal #physical damage# equal to 425% of the attack power, stunning the enemy hit by the last explosion for 1.5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OVERPOWER_LV5_DESC.text: The hero unleashes a blast to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of the attack power, stunning the enemy hit by the last explosion for 1.5 seconds and bringing them closer to the caster. The skill has 50% chance to reactivate 'Strength of Oppression'.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PAINWHEEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon attacking an enemy under a debuff with 'Whirlwind of Pain,' Cain stuns the hit enemy for 3 seconds. The last hit of 'Whirlwind of Pain' decreases the hit enemy's attack power by 60% for 5 seconds, and has a 65% chance of activating Cain's 3-chain one more time.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PALA_HEAL_DESC.text: The caster immediately heals the hero with the least remaining HP by 250% of the caster's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PALA_HEAL_LV2_DESC.text: The caster immediately heals the hero with the least remaining HP by 300% of the caster's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PALA_HEAL_LV3_DESC.text: The caster immediately heals the hero with the least remaining HP by 350% of the caster's attack power. Healed allies receive 25% less damage for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PALA_HEAL_LV4_DESC.text: The caster immediately heals the hero with the least remaining HP by 400% of the caster's attack power. Healed allies receive 30% less damage for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PALA_HEAL_LV5_DESC.text: The caster immediately heals the leader ally and the hero with the least remaining HP by 450% of the caster's attack power. Healed allies receive 50% less damage for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_POWERWAVE3_LV2_SUBDESC.text: With every 3 blocks that they use, the Hero activates 'Ultimate Firesprout' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of their attack power and stun the enemy for 0.75 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_POWERWAVE3_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every 3 blocks or 3 auto attacks that they use, the Hero activates 'Ultimate Firesprout' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of their attack power and stun the enemy for 0.75 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_POWERWAVE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his own 3-chain, Thor summons a lightning bolt that deals @magical damage@ equal to 50% of his maximum HP. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_POWERWAVE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his own 3-chain, Thor summons a lightning bolt that deals @magical damage@ equal to 50% of his maximum HP. (Cooltime: 1 second) Additionally, he gains 40 SP. (Cooltime: 4 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PUMPKING_DESC.text: The Hero leaps into the air and deals #physical damage# equal to [120/240/320]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PUMPKING_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies within range of the Hero's block skill receive a 'Marker of Malice.' Marked enemies receive 20% more physical damage for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_PUMPKING_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies within range of the Hero's block skill receive a 'Marker of Malice.' Marked enemies receive 50% more physical damage for 5 seconds. Additionally, other allies within the range of the Hero's block skill receive a 'Bond of Malice' that increases their attack power by 35% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ROMAN_SPEAR_LV2_SUBDESC.text: With every 5 hits he receives, Hector activates 'Shield of Roman' that increases his resistance by 100% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_ROMAN_SPEAR_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every 5 hits he receives, Hector activates 'Shield of Roman' that increases his resistance and critical damage by 125% for 5 seconds. Additionally, his every second block charges his SP by 40. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_RZ_03_DESC.text: Rem uses 'Al Huma' to deal @magical damage@ equal to [150/300/500]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_RZ_03_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Using Water Mana, Rem heals the entire team by 30% of her maximum HP every 10 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_RZ_03_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Using Water Mana, Rem heals the entire team by 30% of her maximum HP every 10 seconds. Additionally, she uses 'Huma!' to absorb damage equal to 15% of her maximum HP.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SCHLA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If 'Mastery' hits an enemy, Schula uses 'Salvage' to decrease the hit enemy's attack power by 50% for 5 seconds. This debuff doesn't stack.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SCHLA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If 'Mastery' hits an enemy, Schula uses 'Salvage' to decrease the hit enemy's attack power by 50% for 5 seconds. This debuff doesn't stack. Whenever Schula uses 'Mastery,' she uses 'Upgrade' to increase the entire team's attack power by 10% for 15 seconds to a maximum of 5 stacks.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SEOMOON_DESC.text: Shuwen charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SEOMOON_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SEOMOON_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon dealing 7 hits, Shuwen immediately dispels all debuffs and enters 'Vajrapani' mode for 5 seconds. (Cooltime: 6 seconds) In 'Vajrapani,' Shuwen's attack power is increased by 300%, and Shuwen receives 30% less damage. 'Vajrapani' cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SEOMOON_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon dealing 5 hits, Shuwen immediately dispels all debuffs and enters 'Vajrapani' mode for 5 seconds. (Cooltime: 6 seconds) In 'Vajrapani,' Shuwen's attack power is increased by 500%, and Shuwen receives 30% less damage and becomes resistant to knockbacks. Additionally, he uses 'Force Discharge' with every block and passive skill as an extra hit dealing #physical damage# equal to 1000% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SHINE_SMASH_DESC.text: When a skill block is used, the Hero deals #physical damage# equal to (50/100/175)% of the hero's resistance according to the chain length and the Hero's defense increases by 150% of hero's resistance for 7 secs.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SNORRI_DESC.text: The Hero swings down their weapon to deal $neutral damage$ equal to [130/240/350]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SNORRI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon activating their block skill, the Hero receives all damage targeted at the team for 5 seconds. The Hero is always considered 'living dead.' This state cannot be dispelled. 'Living Dead': The Hero receives 80% more damage. They cannot receive shields or heals.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SNORRI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon activating their block skill, the Hero receives all damage targeted at the team for 5 seconds and generates 30 SP for all other allies. The Hero is always considered 'living dead.' This state cannot be dispelled. Upon reaching death, the Hero's soul explodes to deal $neutral damage$ equal to 1000% of their attack power and generate 30 SP for all other allies. The Hero comes back from death and revives to 100% HP when another ally defeats an enemy. 'Living Dead': The Hero receives 80% more damage. They cannot receive shields or heals.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SPEAR_SLASH_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's block within 10 seconds of using his own 3-chain, Jin-Kyung charges toward the enemy and uses 'Ornate Warfare' to deal #physical damage# equal to 30% of his maximum HP.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SPEAR_SLASH_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's block within 10 seconds of using his own 3-chain, Jin-Kyung charges toward the enemy and uses 'Ornate Warfare' to deal #physical damage# equal to 90% of his maximum HP.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SPIKE_DESC.text: Knock back enemies, creating a boulder [1/2/3] times that deals #physical damage# equal to [56/89/90]% of attack power based on the chain number.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SUN_LIGHT_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to [50/120/210]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SWORDMAIDEN_DESC.text: Sword Maiden wields her Celestial Sword to deal #physical damage# equal to [150/300/480]% of her attack power, and heal the lowest remaining HP ally by 100% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SWORDMAIDEN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her own chain 2 times, Sword Maiden infuses her weapon with a divine power for 5 seconds, which adds additional $neutral damage$ equal to 50% of her attack power to every hit.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SWORDMAIDEN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her own chain 2 times, Sword Maiden infuses her weapon with a divine power for 7 seconds, which adds additional $neutral damage$ equal to 50% of her attack power to every hit and increases her [attack power / armor / resistance] by [30/70/70]%.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_THORNS_ARMOR_LV3_DESC.text: Upon activation, immediately reflects 45% of all damage received by entire party as $neutral damage$ for 7 seconds. When 5 hits are reflected, the enemy instantly receives #physical damage# equal to 2% of their maximum HP. (maximum limit per hit being 10000).

TEXT_SKILL_PA_THORNS_ARMOR_LV4_DESC.text: Upon activation, immediately reflects 55% of all damage received by entire party as $neutral damage$ for 7 seconds. When 5 hits are reflected, the enemy instantly receives #physical damage# equal to 2% of their maximum HP. (maximum limit per hit being 10000).

TEXT_SKILL_PA_THORNS_ARMOR_LV5_DESC.text: Upon activation, immediately reflects 65% of all damage received by entire party as $neutral damage$ for 7 seconds. When 3 hits are reflected, the enemy instantly receives #physical damage# equal to 3% of their maximum HP. (maximum limit per hit being 20000).

TEXT_SKILL_PA_UMRAT_DESC.text: The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of their attack power to a single enemy before them, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_UMRAT_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every time 'Call of the Void' deals damage to the enemy, the Hero decreases the hit enemy's attack power by 5% for 3 seconds. (Maximum 3 stacks; duration renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_UMRAT_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every time 'Call of the Void' deals damage to the enemy, the Hero decreases the hit enemy's attack power by 5% for 3 seconds. (Maximum 5 stacks; duration renewed with reuse) While facing a Boss Monster, the Hero's 'Call of the Void' dispels the hit enemy's buff and increases the damage the enemy receives by 50% for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_WOLFGANG_DESC_S2EP4.text: Upon using a block, the Hero charges forward for 3 seconds while swinging their hammer to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/250/450]% of their attack power. If the Hero used a 3-chain, they deal additional #physical damage# equal to 350% of their attack power afterwards.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YS8_RICOTTA_DESC.text: Ricotta twists around to gain momentum to rapidly brandish her whip mace, dealing #physical damage# equal to [90/180/270]% of her attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YS8_RICOTTA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Ricotta's block is pressed immediately before being hit, she uses 'Flash Move' that increases her motion speed by 10% and decreases the damage she receives by 20% for 3 seconds. Upon being hit 7 times, Ricotta uses 'Bandit Tackle' to club the enemy and deal #physical damage# equal to 400% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YS8_RICOTTA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If Ricotta's block is pressed immediately before being hit, she uses 'Flash Move' that increases her motion speed by 10% and decreases the damage she receives by 20% for 3 seconds.  Upon being hit 7 times, Ricotta uses 'Bandit Tackle' to club the enemy and deal #physical damage# equal to 600% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)  Upon being hit 15 times, Ricotta uses 'Beast Attack' to charge forward and spin, dealing #physical damage# equal to 900% of her attack power. (Cooltime:4 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YS8_SAHAD_DESC.text: Sahad releases a shock wave to deal @magical damage@ equal to [60/100/140]% of his attack power according to his block chain number.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YS8_SAHAD_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Sahad's block is pressed immediately before being hit, he activates 'Flash Guard' that increases his critical chance by 10% and decreases the damage he receives by 20% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YS8_SAHAD_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If Sahad's block is pressed immediately before being hit, he activates 'Flash Guard' that increases his critical chance by 10% and decreases the damage he receives by 20% for 3 seconds.  Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Sahad immediately throws 'Seine Toss' to reel in the enemy. Enemies entangled in 'Seine Toss' lose evasion by 30 and cannot move for 5 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YUNA_DESC.text: Yuna leaps forward to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of her resistance according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YUNA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When any 3-chain is used on the ally team, Yuna cheers up the allies by striking an idol pose, which increases the entire allies' attack by 20% and movement speed by 5% for 5 seconds. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_YUNA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When any 3-chain is used on the ally team, Yuna cheers up the allies by striking an idol pose, which increases the entire allies' attack by 25% and movement speed by 5% for 6 seconds. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_3_16_DESC.text: The Hero heals the ally with the lowest HP by [30/42/58]% of the Hero's maximum HP, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_BASQUIAT_DESC.text: Basquiat draws graffiti, which decreases nearby enemies' attack power by  [25/30/40]% for 5 seconds, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_BASQUIAT_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Allies within the range of 'Graffiti' are healed by 100% of Basquiat's attack power per second.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_BASQUIAT_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Allies within the range of 'Graffiti' are healed by 150% of Basquiat's attack power per second. Additionally, 'Graffiti' decreases nearby enemies' attack speed by 40%.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_BLACK_HEAL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own block, the Hero casts a 'Curse' on the enemy with the lowest remaining HP for 5 seconds. Under the 'Curse,' the enemy receives only 50% of all heals. If an ally healed by 'Cursed Blessing' hits an enemy under the 'Curse,' the Hero activates 'Cursed Hand' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 300% of the Hero's attack power.(Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_BLACK_HEAL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block, the Hero casts a 'Curse' on the enemy with the lowest remaining HP. The 'Curse' lasts 5 seconds and the enemy cannot receive any heals under its effect. Every time an ally healed by 'Cursed Blessing' hits an enemy under the 'Curse,' the Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 300% of the Hero's attack power and heals the entire team by 30% of the Hero's attack power. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_BLKGEN_LV2_DESC.text: The caster immediately generates their and the leader hero's block, and heal the leader hero by 1000.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_BLKGEN_LV3_DESC.text: The caster immediately generates their and the leader hero's block, and heals the entire team by 3000.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_CHOCOLA_DESC.text: The Hero heals the entire team by [150/200/250]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_CHOCOLA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the ally leader's 3-chain, the Hero increases the entire team's attack power by 25% for 7 seconds. (Duration reset with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_CHOCOLA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the ally leader's 3-chain, the Hero increases the entire team's attack power by 50% and critical chance by 35% for 7 seconds. (Duration reset with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_CRONET_DESC.text: Cronette heals the entire team by [100/150/200]% of her attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_CRONET_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero heals the entire team by [100/150/200]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_CRONET_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Cronette enters 'Terminal Activation!' mode for 5 seconds. During 'Terminal Activation,' Cronette heals the entire team by 700% of her attack power per second.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_CRONET_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Cronette enters 'Terminal Activation!' mode for 5 seconds. During 'Terminal Activation,' Cronette heals the entire team by 700% of her attack power per second and increases their accuracy by 30.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_DANCE_PARTY_DESC.text: The Hero casts a 'bard's song' over the entire team for [3/4/5] seconds, according to the chain number used. Allies affected by 'bard's song' recover HP equal to 30% of their attack power every time they hit an enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_DANCE_PARTY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 3 ally leader blocks, the Hero summons 'Pala Ku' for 3 seconds and teleports the entire team to the front. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) Pala Ku: Increases the entire team's movement speed and attack power by 25%.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_DANCE_PARTY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 3 ally leader blocks, the Hero summons 'Pala Ku' for 3 seconds and teleports the entire team to the front. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) Pala Ku: Increases the entire team's movement speed and attack power by 50%.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_ELLIE_DESC.text: Ellie heals the entire team by [125/250/375]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_ELLIE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Ellie activates 'Salvation of Wind' for 3 seconds over allies healed by her block skill. Allies under 'Salvation of Wind' become immune to knockbacks and are healed by 1% of their maximum HP per second.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_ELLIE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Ellie activates 'Salvation of Wind' for 3 seconds over allies healed by her block skill. Allies under ' Salvation of Wind' become immune to knockbacks and are healed by 3% of their maximum HP per second. Additionally, upon using another ally's 3-chain, Ellie casts 'Shroud of Wind' around herself for 5 seconds. Allies within the range of 'Shroud of Wind' gain 15% damage reduction and critical resistance. If Ellie uses 'Shroud of Wind' while any ally, including herself, is under the effects of 'Salvation of Wind,' she teleports the ally to the place of the ally leader and binds them there for 2 seconds. (Cooltime: 10 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_FRANCESCA_DESC.text: Deals $neutral damage$ 3 times equal to [1/2/3]% of own maximum HP to the enemy with the highest HP according to the chain number used, and recovers the same amount of HP for the ally with the lowest HP.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_FRANCESCA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing her own blocks three times consecutively, creates a rift for 4 seconds, inflicting 'feeble' status to all enemies every second. Evasion decreases by 50 for 4 seconds for enemies in a 'feeble' state. If Fredrick is amongst allies, Fredrick's blocks are considered as her own.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_FRANCESCA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing her own blocks three times consecutively, creates a rift for 4 seconds, inflicting 'feeble' status to all enemies every second. Evasion decreases by 50, critical resistance by 50%, and damage received increases by 80% for 4 seconds for enemies in a 'feeble' state. If Fredrick is amongst allies, Fredrick's blocks are considered as her own.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_GG_INO_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Discharge Antidepressant Scale deals @magical damage@ equal to 360% of hero's attack power when an ally uses a chain-3 skill. Enemy hit by block and Discharge Antidepressant gains a mark for 4 seconds that has a 60% chance to block buffs and the party becomes immune to all debuffs for 4 seconds when using blocks while the mark is active. (once every 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_GUERONICA_DESC.text: Gueronica sends 'Nanomachines' to heal the ally with the lowest remaining HP by [220/430/550]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_GUERONICA_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero sends 'Nanomachines' to heal the ally with the lowest remaining HP by [220/430/550]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_GUERONICA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Whenever he receives a hit, or another ally uses a 3-chain, Gueronica activates his 'Plasma Shield' that absorbs all damage targeted at the entire team up to 500% of his attack power for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_GUERONICA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Whenever he receives a hit, or another ally uses a 3-chain, Gueronica activates his 'Plasma Shield' that absorbs all damage targeted at the entire team up to 1000% of his attack power for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HANLA_DESC.text: The Hero heals the entire team by 60% of their attack power every 0.5 seconds for a total of [1/2/3] seconds, according to the chain number used. (Maximum 5 seconds, renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HANLA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own block, the Hero summons 'Tiger Spirit.' 'Tiger Spirit' immediately heals the ally by 10% of their maximum HP and increases the entire team's accuracy by 10 for 2 seconds. (Renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HANLA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own block, the Hero generates 1 block for the ally leader and summons 'Tiger Spirit.' 'Tiger Spirit' immediately heals the ally by 20% of their maximum HP and increases the entire team's accuracy by 20 for 3 seconds. (Renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HARUKI_DESC.text: The Hero heals the entire team by [75/125/175]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HARUKI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero's block skill increases healed allies' attack power by 50% of the Hero's attack power for 10 seconds. Reusing the skill will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HARUKI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero's block skill increases healed allies' attack power, armor penetration, and resistance penetration by 50% of the Hero's respective stats for 10 seconds. Reusing the skill will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HERA_DESC.text: The Hero heals the entire team by [100/200/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HERA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block skill, the Hero casts 'Hera's Protection' on the ally with the highest HP and 'Hera's Benevolence' on the enemy with the highest HP for 5 seconds. 'Hera's Protection' and 'Hera's Guidance' cannot be dispelled. Reusing either skill will reset its duration but maintain its original target. Hera's Protection: The Hero heals the ally by 50% of the Hero's attack power every 3 seconds. Hera's Benevolence: The Hero heals the enemy by 50% of the Hero's attack power every 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HERA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block skill, the Hero casts 'Hera's Protection' on the ally with the highest HP and 'Hera's Benevolence' on the enemy with the highest HP for 5 seconds. 'Hera's Protection' and 'Hera's Guidance' cannot be dispelled. Reusing either skill will reset its duration but maintain its original target. Hera's Protection: The Hero heals the ally by 500% of the Hero's attack power. Hera's Benevolence: The Hero heals the enemy by 500% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HOLY_SANCTUARY_LV3_DESC.text: The caster creates a sanctuary for 3 seconds that continuously heals allies by 75% of the caster's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HOLY_SANCTUARY_LV4_DESC.text: The caster creates a sanctuary for 3 seconds that continuously heals allies by 100% of the caster's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_HOLY_SANCTUARY_LV5_DESC.text: The caster creates a sanctuary for 5 seconds that continuously heals allies by 100% of the caster's attack power. Allies under the effect of this sanctuary recover an additional 5% of their maximum HP when healed by another skill.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_KAEDE_DESC.text: Kaede heals the ally with the least remaining HP by [100/150/200]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_KAEDE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon entering battle, Kaede summons 'Pompoko' the raccoon ninja, who follows the ally leader for the duration of the battle. Upon pressing Kaede's block, Pompoko transforms into the ally leader's double for 10 seconds, receiving 50% of their stats and imitating all their block skills and passive skills except Special Skills and skills activated by pressing blocks. (Pompoko is affected by the chain number used by the ally leader.) Using Kaede's block skill during Pompoko's transformation will renew the duration of the transformation. If Pompoko's HP reaches 0% or he reaches the end of his transformation, he turns back into his original raccoon form. 'Pompoko' goes into hiding if Kaede or the ally leader dies, and cannot be summoned again for the remainder of the battle. (Only one Pompoko can be summoned in battle.)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_KAEDE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon entering battle, Kaede summons 'Pompoko' the raccoon ninja, who follows the ally leader for the duration of the battle. Upon pressing Kaede's block, Pompoko transforms into the ally leader's double for 10 seconds, receiving 75% of their stats and imitating all their block skills and passive skills except Special Skills and skills activated by pressing blocks. (Pompoko is affected by the chain number used by the ally leader.) Using Kaede's block skill during Pompoko's transformation will renew the duration of the transformation. If Pompoko's HP reaches 0% or he reaches the end of his transformation, he turns back into his original raccoon form. 'Pompoko' goes into hiding if Kaede or the ally leader dies, and cannot be summoned again for the remainder of the battle. (Only one Pompoko can be summoned in battle.)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_KRAMPUS_DESC.text: The Hero heals the ally with the lowest remaining HP by [3/6/10]% of the Hero's maximum HP, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_KRAMPUS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally block skill, the Hero increases their own accuracy by 100 for 7 seconds and gives enemies within range 'Jolly Presents.' If an enemy with a 'Jolly Present' evades an attack, the Hero gives out 'Lumps of Coal' to all enemies within range to deal @magical damage@ equal to 50% of the Hero's maximum HP. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_KRAMPUS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally block skill, the Hero increases their own accuracy by 100 for 7 seconds and gives enemies within range 'Jolly Presents.' If an enemy with a 'Jolly Present' evades an attack, the Hero gives out 'Lumps of Coal' to all enemies within range to deal @magical damage@ equal to 70% of the Hero's maximum HP. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LAZY_DESC.text: The Hero throws a potion that heals all allies by [100/125/150]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LAZY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using any 5 ally blocks including their own, the Hero throws a potion to the ally with the highest accuracy. The potion alternates its effects with every use and lasts 5 seconds. (Duration reset with reuse) - Success Potion: Increases critical chance by 10%. - Great Success Potion: Increases armor penetration by 800.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LAZY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using any 5 ally blocks including their own, the Hero throws a potion to the ally with the highest accuracy. The potion alternates its effects with every use and lasts 5 seconds. (Duration reset with reuse) - Success Potion: Increases critical chance by 20%. - Great Success Potion: Increases armor penetration by 1000.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_04_DESC.text: Cream heals all ally Heroes by [104/181/257]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_04_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the ally leader's block skill, Cream increases the leader's evasion by 30 for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_04_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the ally leader's block skill, Cream increases the leader's evasion by 30 and critical chance by 30% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_06_DESC.text: Nyorori heals all allies by [100/200/300]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_06_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When an ally excluding himself receives damage, Nyorori charges at the frontmost enemy, dealing #physical damage# equal to 100% of attack power. The enemy hit by Nyorori's charge is knocked back and stunned for 3 seconds. Additionally, upon activating his passive, Nyorori takes damage in place of his allies for 5 seconds. (Cooltime: 7 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_06_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When an ally excluding himself receives damage, Nyorori charges at the frontmost enemy, dealing #physical damage# equal to 100% of attack power. The enemy hit by Nyorori's charge is knocked back and stunned for 3 seconds. Additionally, upon activating his passive, Nyorori takes damage in place of his allies for 5 seconds, and all allies' armor and resistance are increased by Nyorori's armor and resistance respectively (including his own). (Cooltime: 7 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_08_DESC.text: Heals all allies by [120/200/350%] of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_08_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Allies healed by Souffle's block skill get their accuracy increased by 40 for 8 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIMITED_ER_08_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Allies healed by Souffle's block skill get their accuracy increased by 60 for 8 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LINNAE_DESC.text: Linné heals herself by [40/80/150]% of her attack power every 0.5 seconds 3 times, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LINNAE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own block 2 times, the Hero summons 'Flora Magica' for 3 seconds at the place of the ally leader to heal all allies within range by 150% of the Hero's attack power per second.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LINNAE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own block, the Hero summons 'Flora Magica' for 3 seconds at the place of the ally leader to heal all allies within range by 200% of the Hero's attack power per second. Additionally, allies within the range of 'Flora Magica,' excluding the Hero, are healed by 200% of the Hero's attack power every time they receive a hit. This healing effect cannot be stacked.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIZARDMAN_MONK_DESC.text: Lizardman Priest heals the ally with the lowest HP by [100/200/300]% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIZARDMAN_MONK_LV2_SUBDESC.text: After entering battle, Lizardman Priest summons a 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior.' The 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior' has the same stats as Lizardman Priest. Only one 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior' can be summoned at a time. Upon using an ally's block skill, 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior' charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to 300% of its attack power to enemies within range.  If it dies, the 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior' will revive after 1.5 seconds to its full HP and will not receive damage for 1 second. It will not revive if Lizardman Priest is dead.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LIZARDMAN_MONK_LV3_SUBDESC.text: After entering battle, Lizardman Priest summons a 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior.' The 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior' has double the Lizardman Priest's stats. Only one 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior' can be summoned at a time. Upon using another ally's block skill, 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior' charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to 500% of its attack power to enemies within range.  If it dies, the 'Dragon-Tooth Warrior' will revive after 1.5 seconds to its full HP and will not receive damage for 1 second. It will not revive if Lizardman Priest is dead.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_MARY_DESC.text: Meri heals the ally with the lowest remaining HP by [220/280/360]% of her attack power, and uses the deals the same amount of @magical damage@ to the enemy before her.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_MARY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her own or another ally's 3-chain, Meri sings 'Starsong' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of her attack power. Enemies hit by 'Staccato' and 'Starsong' are marked by 'Starkiss' for 4 seconds, during which they cannot receive buffs. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_MARY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her own or another ally's 3-chain, Meri sings 'Starsong' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of her attack power. Enemies hit by 'Staccato' and 'Starsong' are marked by 'Starkiss' for 4 seconds, during which they cannot receive buffs. Using her own block skill during the activation of 'Starkiss' will dispel all debuffs for the entire team and make them resistant to further debuffs for 4 seconds. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_NOEL_DESC.text: The Hero heals the entire team by [10/20/30]% of the Hero's maximum HP, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_NOEL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When any ally receives an attack, the Hero dashes forward, stuns the nearest enemy for 3 seconds, and activates 'Guardian of the Holy City.' (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_NOEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When any ally receives an attack, the Hero dashes forward, stuns the nearest enemy for 3 seconds, and activates 'Guardian of the Holy City.' (Cooltime: 3 seconds) Guardian of the Holy City: The Hero takes all damage targeted at the entire team for 3 seconds and becomes immune to 10 hits of magical damage. This effect cannot be dispelled.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_ORDER_TEAM_DESC_S2EP3.text: Upon using a block, the Hero heals all allies by [100/150/200]% of the Hero's attack power. Using a 1-chain increases allies' attack power by 20%. Using a 2-chain increases allies' armor by 30%. Using a 3-chain dispels debuffs.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_OT_01_DESC.text: The Hero heals the ally with the lowest HP by [100/150/200]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_OT_01_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally Leader's 3-chain (excluding self) and then using the Hero's own block skill, the Hero generates 1 block for the ally Leader.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_OT_01_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally Leader's 3-chain (excluding self) and then using the Hero's own block skill, the Hero generates 2 blocks for the ally Leader.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_PLAY_LIRA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every 3 times Orfeo uses his block skill, he heals all allies' HP by 35% of his own maximum HP over 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_PLAY_LIRA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every 2 times Orfeo uses his block skill, he heals all allies' HP by 50% of his own maximum HP over 3 seconds. Additionally, allies' accuracy and critical chance are increased by 15%.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_PRIESTESS_DESC.text: Priestess heals the entire ally by [100/200/300]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_PRIESTESS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her chain 3 times, Priestess uses 'Holy Light.' 'Holy Light' deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of Priestess's attack power to enemies within range and decreases their accuracy by 30 for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 4 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_PRIESTESS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her chain 3 times, Priestess uses 'Holy Light.' 'Holy Light' deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of Priestess's attack power to enemies within range, decreases their accuracy by 50 for 3 seconds, and stuns hit enemies for 1.5 seconds. (Cooltime: 4 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RELICOFHEAL_DESC.text: Maria prays to the Goddess, summoning a holy relic that heals nearby allies by [1/3/5]% of her own maximum HP 8 times, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RELICOFHEAL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Allies healed by 'Sacred Treasure of the Goddess' receive a buff that increases their armor and resistance by 30% each for 3 second.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RELICOFHEAL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Allies healed by 'Sacred Treasure of the Goddess' receive a buff that increases their armor and resistance by 30% each for 3 second. If Maria uses her block after another ally's 3-chain, it will activate as a 3-chain.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RICKY_DESC.text: Ricky heals the entire team's HP by [3000/5000/7000] according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RICKY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 3 of his own blocks, a random card is drawn and activates an effect as shown below. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) - K : Generates 1 leader block. (Except Ricky's) - Q : Generates 1 Ricky's block. - J : Nothing happens.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RICKY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 3 of his own blocks, a random card is drawn and activates an effect as shown below. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) - K : Generates 2 leader blocks. (Except Ricky's) - Q : Generates 1 Ricky's block. - J : Nothing happens.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RZ_07_DESC.text: Ferris heals the ally with the lowest remaining HP by [200/400/600]% of his attack power 10 times, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RZ_07_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When Ferris takes damage, or another ally's 3-chain is used, Ferris casts a protective shield over the entire team for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 500% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RZ_07_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When Ferris takes damage, or another ally's 3-chain is used, Ferris casts a protective shield over the entire team for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 1000% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_SEIMEI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When an enemy approaches 'Human Spirit,' Seimei deals @magical damage@ equal to 50% of his attack power, and heals allies by 50% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_SEIMEI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When an enemy approaches 'Human Spirit,' Seimei deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of his attack power, and heals allies by 50% of his attack power. If the enemy near 'Human Spirit' receives a buff, Seimei immediately recasts his passive and dispels all enemy buffs. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_SFERA_DESC.text: Sfera sacrifices [10/10/10]% of her remaining HP to bestow 'Impulse' over the entire party for 5 seconds and increase their life steal by [15/20/25]%, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_SFERA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Sfera summons her familiar 'Ovis' for 6 seconds. (Cooltime: 6 seconds) Ovis heals Sfera by 1500 HP each time an ally is healed by Sfera's 'Impulse' or another healing skill.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_SFERA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Sfera summons her familiar 'Ovis' for 6 seconds. (Cooltime: 6 seconds) During 'Ovis's' summon, Sfera heals herself by 1500 every time allies are healed by 'Impulse' or other healing skills. 'Ovis' additionally increases the entire party's critical damage by 80%.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_SHUB_DESC.text: Shub heals the ally with the least remaining HP by [120/200/280]% of attack power according to chain number.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_SHUB_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing her block, Shub marks the enemy with the least remaining HP as the 'sacrifice,' and the ally with the least remaining HP as the 'disciple' for 5 seconds. The enemy marked as the 'sacrifice' receives 40% more damage, while the ally marked as the 'disciple' receives 40% less damage. Both marks can only affect one target at a time. If re-used before expiring, the marks do not change targets; instead, their durations are renewed.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_SHUB_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing her block, Shub marks the enemy with the least remaining HP as the 'sacrifice,' and the ally with the least remaining HP as the 'disciple' for 5 seconds. The enemy marked as the 'sacrifice' receives 40% more damage, while the ally marked as the 'disciple' receives 40% less damage. Both marks can only affect one target at a time. If re-used before expiring, the marks do not change targets; instead, their durations are renewed. Additionally, whenever the enemy marked as the 'sacrifice' receives a buff or a debuff, Shub releases tentacles to deal @magical damage@ equal to 900% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_STARFALL_LV3_DESC.text: The caster summons a rain of 5 shooting stars that each deals @magical damage@ equal to 60% of the caster's attack power, stuns hit enemies for 0.3 second.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_STARFALL_LV4_DESC.text: The caster summons a rain of 5 shooting stars that each deals @magical damage@ equal to 75% of the caster's attack power, stuns hit enemies for 0.5 second.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_STARFALL_LV5_DESC.text: The caster summons a rain of 7 shooting stars that each deals @magical damage@ equal to 90% of the caster's attack power, stuns hit enemies for 1 second, and dispels all enemy buffs.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_STAR_BLESS_DESC.text: Aria heals the entire team by [35/45/65]% of her maximum HP, according to the chain number used, and casts a 'Celestial Blessing' over them for 8 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_STAR_BLESS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: 'Celestial Blessing' increases ally armor and resistance by 50% of the Hero's armor and resistance, respectively. Every time an ally blessed with 'Celestial Blessing' receives 5 hits, the Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 200% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_STAR_BLESS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: 'Celestial Blessing' increases ally armor and resistance by 125% of the Hero's armor and resistance, respectively. Every time an ally blessed with 'Celestial Blessing' receives 5 hits, the Hero deals $neutral damage$ equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_TRI_TOTEM_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero summons a Totem that heals nearby allies four times by [20/55/95]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_VARNIR_DESC.text: Vernil summons an 'Frosty Heart' for 5 seconds. 'Frosty Heart' heals nearby allies by [80/160/240]% of Vernil's attack power per second, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_VARNIR_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero summons a 'Frosty Heart' for 5 seconds. 'Frosty Heart' heals nearby allies by [80/160/240]% of the Hero's attack power per second, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_VARNIR_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block after another ally's 3-chain, the Hero summons 'Frigid Heart' for 8 seconds. 'Frigid Heart' absorbs all damage targeted at the entire team up to 300% of the Hero's attack power. (Cooltime: 6 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_VARNIR_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block after another ally's 3-chain, the Hero summons 'Frigid Heart' for 8 seconds. 'Frigid Heart' absorbs all damage targeted at the entire team up to 600% of the Hero's attack power, and additionally reduces received damage by 10% for 8 seconds. (Cooltime: 4 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_YEOWOODONG_DESC.text: The entire party's HP is healed by (100/200/300)% of the hero's attack power based on the chain number.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_YEOWOODONG_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Yeowoodong generates 1 block for the entire team and increases the amount of heals they receive by 20% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_YEOWOODONG_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Yeowoodong generates 1 block for the entire team and increases the amount of heals they receive by 30% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_ZEUS_DESC.text: The Hero heals the ally with the least remaining HP by [180/200/220]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_ZEUS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero marks the enemy with the most remaining HP with the 'Eye of Uranus' for 5 seconds. This mark cannot be dispelled, and reusing the skill will reset its duration but maintain the original target. 'Eye of Uranus' decreases the armor and resistance of the marked enemy by 25%.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_ZEUS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero marks the enemy with the most remaining HP with the 'Eye of Uranus' for 5 seconds. This mark cannot be dispelled, and reusing the skill will reset its duration but maintain the original target. 'Eye of Uranus' decreases the armor and resistance of the marked enemy by 45%.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ARES_DESC.text: The Hero charges forth on their chariot and deals #physical damage# equal to [150/175/200]% of their attack power every 0.1 seconds for 5 seconds, according to the chain number used. While on the chariot, Hero gains 20% knockback resistance. Reusing the skill before termination will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ARES_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own block as the ally leader during 'Alale alala!', the Hero uses 'Ei tan ei epi tas!' to deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of their attack power to nearby enemies. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ARES_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own block as the ally leader during 'Alale alala!', the Hero uses 'Ei tan ei epi tas!' to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of their attack power to nearby enemies. (Cooltime: 1 second) Additionally, upon using 'Ei tan ei epi tas!' every 5 times, the Hero uses 'Blessing of the War God' to increase their own attack power by 50% and damage reduction by 15% for 5 seconds. Reusing the skill during the effect will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_AVATAR_DESC.text: The caster awakens "Spirit of Vengeance" for 10 seconds. The Spirit of Vengeance increases the caster's attack power by 50%, and deals @magical damage@ equal to 50% of the caster's armor per second to enemies within its range.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_AVATAR_LV2_DESC.text: The caster awakens "Spirit of Vengeance" for 10 seconds. The Spirit of Vengeance increases the caster's attack power by 100%, and deals @magical damage@ equal to 75% of the caster's armor per second to enemies within its range.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_AVATAR_LV3_DESC.text: The caster awakens "Spirit of Vengeance" for 10 seconds. The Spirit of Vengeance increases the caster's attack power by 150%, and deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of the caster's armor per second to enemies within its range. The caster earns 30% additional knockback resistance for the duration of the skill. If the skill is recast within duration, the caster deals $neutral damage$ equal to 200% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_BLACKMOON_LV2_SUBDESC.text: After using her every second block skill, Kaori uses 'First Strike: Black Moon' to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of her attack power. If 'First Strike: Black Moon' lands a critical hit, Kaori additionally uses 'Second Strike: Black Death' to deal #physical damage# equal to 700% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_BLACKMOON_LV3_SUBDESC.text: After using her second block skill, Kaori uses 'First Strike: Black Moon' to deal #physical damage# equal to 700% of her attack power. If 'First Strike: Black Moon' lands a critical hit, Kaori additionally uses 'Second Strike: Black Death' to deal #physical damage# equal to 900% of her attack power. 'Second Strike: Black Death' ignores enemy armor by 50%. Upon using either 'First Strike: Black Moon' or 'Second Strike: Black Death,' Kaori's critical chance and critical damage are increased by 30% for 8 seconds. Both skills are acknowledged as 3-chains.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_BORGOS_DESC.text: Borgos charges forward while dealing #physical damage# equal to [100/180/280]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_BORGOS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Borgos stacks 'Boss Monster Power' [1/2/4] times according to the chain number used for 3 seconds. Every 'Boss Monster Power' stack increases Borgos's critical damage by 20%. (Maximum 10 stacks) Additionally, upon using his 3-chain, Borgos summons 'Buddy' who deals 6 hits of #physical damage# equal to 350% of Borgos's attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_BORGOS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Borgos stacks 'Boss Monster Power' [1/2/4] times according to the chain number used for 3 seconds. Every 'Boss Monster Power' stack increases Borgos's critical damage by 20%. (Maximum 10 stacks) Additionally, upon using his 3-chain, Borgos summons 'Buddy' who deals 6 hits of #physical damage# equal to 500% of Borgos's attack power. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_DEMPSEY_DESC.text: The Hero ducks forward and lands an uppercut to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used. The Hero's evasion is increased by 80 during the skill.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_DEMPSEY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon attacking a stunned enemy, the Hero's attacks for the next 5 seconds are activated as critical hits.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_DEMPSEY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon attacking a stunned enemy, the Hero's attacks for the next 5 seconds are activated as critical hits, and the Hero's critical damage is increased by 50%. Upon accurately landing a critical hit, the Hero generates 1 block. (Cooltime: 0.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ECHIDNA_DESC.text: According to chain number, Echidna uses [5/8/10]% of her remaining HP to deal #physical damage# equal to [300/500/700]% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ECHIDNA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Echidna activates 'Serpentine Domain' over her surrounding area for 5 seconds. 'Serpentine Domain' deals #physical damage# equal to 500% of Echidna's attack power to enemies within the area. (Cooltime: 6 seconds) If Echidna uses her own block during 'Serpentine Domain,' the duration of the skill increases by 3 seconds. When 'Serpentine Domain' ends, Echidna deals #physical damage# equal to 100% of her attack power to the enemy in the front.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ECHIDNA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Echidna activates 'Serpentine Domain' over her surrounding area for 5 seconds. 'Serpentine Domain' deals #physical damage# equal to 500% of Echidna's attack power to enemies within the area. (Cooltime: 6 seconds) If Echidna uses her own block during 'Serpentine Domain,' the duration of the skill increases by 3 seconds. When 'Serpentine Domain' ends, Echidna deals #physical damage# equal to 100% of her attack power to the enemy in the front. Additionally, with every 25 hits 'Serpentine Domain' deals to the enemy, Echidna summons her familiar 'Loydie' that deals #physical damage# equal to 800% of her attack power to the enemy in the front. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) 'Loydie' also generates 1 ally leader block upon being summoned. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_EVIL_CLAW_DESC.text: Sien deals #physical damage# equal to [200/275/300]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_EVIL_CLAW_LV2_SUBDESC.text: With every 10 heals or life steals, Sien uses her 1-chain. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_EVIL_CLAW_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every 5 heals or life steals, Sien uses her 1-chain. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FIGHTSPIRIT_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 15% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FIGHTSPIRIT_LV2_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 25% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FIGHTSPIRIT_LV3_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 35% and armor by 10% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FIGHTSPIRIT_LV4_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 45% and armor by 25% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FIGHTSPIRIT_LV5_DESC.text: The caster's attack power is increased by 55% and armor by 50% for 10 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FIRESHOT_DESC.text: Pulls enemies in and deals #physical damage# equal to 400% of hero's attack power. During the attack, the hero is immune to debuffs and receives all damage directed at their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FIRESHOT_LV2_DESC.text: Pulls enemies in and deals #physical damage# equal to 500% of hero's attack power. During the attack, the hero is immune to debuffs and receives all damage directed at their allies.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FIRESHOT_LV3_DESC.text: Pulls enemies in and deals #physical damage# equal to 750% of hero's attack power. During the attack, the hero is immune to debuffs and receives all damage directed at their allies. Upon activation, armor and resistance are increased by 200%.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GG3_BAIKEN_DESC.text: Baiken deals #physical damage# equal to [150/210/300]% of her attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GG3_BAIKEN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's chain, Baiken enters 'Azami' for 4 seconds. During this state, Baiken receives 50% less damage, and her armor and resistance are each increased by 80%.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GG3_BAIKEN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's chain, Baiken enters 'Azami' for 4 seconds. During this state, Baiken receives 50% less damage, and her armor and resistance are increased by 80%. If her own or another ally's block is used after Baiken activates 'Suzuran' or 'Azami,' she immediately uses [Sakura/Rokkonsogi/Yashagatana] to deal #physical damage# equal to [300/400/650]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GG_JOHNNY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When an ally uses a 3-chain, Johnny throws a coin at the enemy. When the coin hits an enemy, Mist Finer's damage increases by 30% for one use.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GG_JOHNNY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When an ally uses a 3-chain, Johnny throws a coin at the enemy. When the coin hits an enemy, Mist Finer's damage increases by 100% for two uses. After Mist Finer is activated, "That's My Name" will activate, dealing #physical damage# equal to 3000% of attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GG_SOL_DESC.text: Using a chain skill activates Fafnir, Gun Flame or Grand Viper, dealing #physical damage# equal to [150/210/320]% of hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GHOST_SMASH_DESC.text: The Hero summons Vaisravana for 5 seconds, dealing @magical damage@ equal to [60/180/390]% of their attack power, in accordance to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GHOST_SMASH_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally's 3-chain during Vaisravana's summon, the Hero uses 'Ghost Slash' and 'Ghost Cleaver' in alternating order. Using any passive attack additionally increases Vaisravana's duration by 2 seconds. Ghost Slash: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 250% of their attack power. Ghost Cleaver: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 500% of their attack power and additionally uses 'Ghost Blade Medley.' Ghost Blade Medley: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GHOST_SMASH_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally's 3-chain during Vaisravana's summon, the Hero uses 'Ghost Slash' and 'Ghost Cleaver' in alternating order. Using any passive attack additionally increases Vaisravana's duration by 2 seconds. Ghost Slash: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 500% of their attack power and increases their own attack power by 50% for 8 seconds. Ghost Cleaver: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of their attack power and decreases the hit enemy's resistance by 20% for 4 seconds. The Hero then uses 'Ghost Blade Medley.' Ghost Blade Medley: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 1500% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GOBLIN_SLAYER_DESC.text: Goblin Slayer throws a weapon at the enemy in the front, dealing #physical damage# equal to [250/350/450]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GOBLIN_SLAYER_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Goblin Slayer has a 30% chance of blocking all attacks. When he succeeds in blocking an attack, he uses 'Shield Blow' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1200% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) Enemies hit by 'Shield Blow' are knocked back and stunned for 1 second.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GOBLIN_SLAYER_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Goblin Slayer has a 30% chance of blocking all attacks. When he succeeds in blocking an attack, he uses 'Shield Blow' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1200% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 3 seconds) Enemies hit by 'Shield Blow' are knocked back and stunned for 1 second. Additionally, if Goblin Slayer accurately deals 'One...' or 'Slay Them All,' he immediately uses 'Raging Action' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2400% of his attack power. 'Raging Action' ignores enemy armor by 3000.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GWEN_DESC.text: Gwen dashes forward to deal #physical damage# equal to [500/800/2000]% of her attack power to enemies within her range, according to the chain number used. If there are no enemies within her range, Gwen uses 'Spinning Storm' to deal #physical damage# equal to [500/800/2000]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GWEN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Gwen's next block skill will activate with the power of a 3-chain.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_GWEN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Gwen's next two blocks skill will activate with the power of a 3-chain.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_HEART_SWORD_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally's 3-chain, the Hero wields the 'Flaming Spirit Sword' to deal $neutral damage$ equal to 450% of their armor.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_HEART_SWORD_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally's 3-chain, the Hero wields the 'Flaming Spirit Sword' to deal $neutral damage$ equal to 2000% of their armor.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_HROLF_DESC.text: The Hero dashes forward and heaves their axe to deal #physical damage# equal to [200/400/600]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used, and knock back the hit enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_HROLF_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Whenever an ally excluding the Hero dies, the Hero activates 'Valhalla.' Valhalla: The Hero's SP increases by 10. The Hero increases their own attack power by 5% for 12 seconds. (Maximum 10 stacks, duration renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_HROLF_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Whenever an ally excluding the Hero dies, the Hero activates 'Valhalla.' Valhalla: The Hero's SP increases by 20. The Hero increases their own attack power by 10% for 12 seconds. (Maximum 10 stacks, duration renewed with reuse) Additionally, the Hero's Special Skill is changed to 'Nosgardian Longship.' Nosgardian Longship: The Hero summons 'Nosgardian Longship' that follows them for 10 seconds. 'Nosgardian Longship' generates 10 SP per second and increases movement speed by 50% and knockback resistance by 100% for allies within range. If the Hero reactivates the skill before its termination, they summon 2 'Huscarls.' 'Huscarls' receive 50% of the Hero's stats but no heals or shields. Huscarls copy the Hero's block skills and die after 3 seconds. (Maximum 6 summoned)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ISABEL_DESC.text: Attacks with an evil spirit that deals #physical damage# equal to [200/500/800]% of attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ISABEL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally's 3-chain, the 2, 3-chain attack is activated with the power of a 3-chain, and uses 'Evil Spirit Fury', which increases critical chance by 10% and critical damage by 25% for 6 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ISABEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using an ally's 3-chain, the 2, 3-chain attack is activated with the power of a 3-chain, and uses 'Evil Spirit Fury', which increases critical chance by 20% and critical damage by 50% for 6 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ISIS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Isis decreases the SP of all enemies hit by 'Desert Tide' by 10.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ISIS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Desert Tide' lose 10 SP. Additionally, with every 5 hits an ally receives, Isis summons 'Desert Wave' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 750% of her attack power and knocks back hit enemies. (Cooltime: 2.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_IZUNA_DESC.text: Upon using her block, Izuna takes 'Blade Draw' position for 3 seconds, strengthening her subsequent normal attacks to deal #physical damage# equal to 800% of her attack power. Using Izuna's block skill during this state increases its duration by [3/6/6] seconds according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_IZUNA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: During 'Blade Draw,' the Hero's armor penetration and critical damage increase by 20%.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_IZUNA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: During 'Blade Draw,' the Hero's armor penetration and critical damage increase by 20%. If the Hero uses their block skill during 'Blade Draw,' they use either 'Blade Draw' or 'Blade Gleam' depending on their distance from the enemy.  'Blade Gleam': If no enemy is within range of 'Blade Draw,' the Hero charges forward to the nearest enemy and deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JACK_DESC.text: The Hero charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [300/500/800]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JACK_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero's block skill deals a critical hit, the Hero additionally summons 'Bloodied Thorns' for 6 seconds on the hit enemy. 'Bloodied Thorns' deal $neutral damage$ equal to 2% of the enemy's maximum HP every 0.5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JACK_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero's block skill deals a critical hit, the Hero additionally summons 'Bloodied Thorns' for 6 seconds on the hit enemy. 'Bloodied Thorns' deal $neutral damage$ equal to 2% of the enemy's maximum HP every 0.5 seconds and decrease critical resistance by 20%.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JARYONG_DESC.text: Charges to the front and deals 3 spear strikes that deal #physical damage# equal to [100/120/175]% of attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JARYONG_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon receiving a debuff, activates 'Five Tiger General's Will', which cancels all debuffs and gives immunity to knockbacks and debuffs for 15 seconds. (Cooltime: 20 seconds) When Zilong defeats an enemy with a block skill, the cooltime of 'Five Tiger General's Will' is reduced by 1 second.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JARYONG_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon receiving a debuff, activates 'Five Tiger General's Will', which cancels all debuffs and gives immunity to push and debuffs for 15 seconds. (Cooltime: 20 seconds) When Zilong defeats an enemy with a block skill, the cooltime of 'Five Tiger General's Will' is reduced by 2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JOANOFARC_DESC.text: Throws a wave of energy that deals @magic damage@ equal to (150/200/250)% of attack power based on the chain number.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JOANOFARC_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Joan immediately receives all damage targeted at the entire team and reduces the damage she receives by 20% for 5 seconds. Additionally, she generates 20 SP for the ally leader. Her ability of receiving all damage targeted at the entire team cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JOANOFARC_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Joan immediately receives all damage targeted at the entire team and reduces the damage she receives by 30% for 5 seconds. Additionally, she generates 40 SP for the ally leader. Her ability of receiving all damage targeted at the entire team cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JUSTICE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: With every 3 blocks he uses, Leon uses 'Ultimate Holy Sword' to deal #physical damage# equal to 380% of his attack power. 'Ultimate Holy Sword' ignores all enemy armor by 50% of Leon's own armor.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_JUSTICE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every 3 blocks he uses, Leon uses 'Ultimate Holy Sword' to deal #physical damage# equal to 380% of his attack power and 10% of his maximum HP. 'Ultimate Holy Sword' ignores all enemy armor by 100% of Leon's own armor.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_KASSIA_DESC.text: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to [300/700/1000]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_KASSIA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero summons a shadow 'Cassia' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 1200% of their attack power. Additionally, if 'Cursed Blade' accurately hits an enemy, the Hero enters 'Ecstasy' for 10 seconds, increasing their attack power by 10%, critical damage by 10%, and resistance penetration by 5%. 'Ecstasy' can be stacked 3 times and cannot be dispelled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_KASSIA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero summons a shadow 'Cassia' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 1200% of their attack power. Hit enemies receive a resistance debuff of 30% for 5 seconds. Additionally, if 'Cursed Blade' accurately hits an enemy, the Hero enters 'Ecstasy' for 10 seconds, increasing their attack power by 10%, critical damage by 10%, and resistance penetration by 5%. 'Ecstasy' can be stacked 3 times and cannot be dispelled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LAERTES_DESC.text: Upon using his block, the Hero charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [200/400/700]% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LAERTES_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If the enemy is outside their range, the Hero increases their own accuracy by 10 for 2 seconds and uses their block skill with the strength of a 3-chain. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) Upon receiving 5 hits, the Hero uses 'Gun Parring' to increase the damage received by the enemy in the front by 50% for 2 seconds and stun them for 1 second. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LAERTES_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If the enemy is outside their range, the Hero increases their own accuracy by 20 for 2 seconds and uses their block skill with the power of a 3-chain. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) Upon receiving 5 hits, the Hero uses 'Gun Parring' to increase the damage received by the enemy in the front by 50% for 2 seconds and stun them for 1 second. (Cooltime: 1 second) If the enemy is within the Hero's range when activating 'Gun Parring,' the Hero immediately uses 'Endurance' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of their attack power and greatly knock back the enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_ER_01_DESC.text: Bakumaru swings his Light Saber to deal #physical damage# equal to [200/300/400]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_ER_01_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a Goddess Skill, Bakumaru uses the 'Revealing Mirror's Light'. (Cooltime: 1 second) 'Revealing Mirror's Light': Enemies lit up by the 'Revealing Mirror's Light' have their Accuracy decreased by 50 for 2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_ER_01_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a Goddess Skill, Bakumaru uses the 'Revealing Mirror's Light'. (Cooltime: 1 second) 'Revealing Mirror's Light': Enemies lit up by the 'Revealing Mirror's Light' are stunned for 3 seconds, and have their Accuracy decreased by 50 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_ER_11_DESC.text: Charges to the front and swings the Ruyi Bone to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/300]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_ER_11_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon landing a hit with his block skill, Pochiro activates 'Ruyi Bone, Extend!' 'Ruyi Bone, Extend!': Attacks twice with the Ruyi Bone, dealing #physical damage# equal to 500% of attack power. After 'Ruyi Bone, Extend!' ends, increases attack power by 10% and attack speed by 5%. (Max stacks: 3)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_ER_11_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon landing a hit with his block skill, Pochiro activates 'Ruyi Bone, Extend!' 'Ruyi Bone, Extend!': Attacks twice with the Ruyi Bone, dealing #physical damage# equal to 800% of attack power. After 'Ruyi Bone, Extend!' ends, increases attack power by 15% and attack speed by 10%. (Max stacks: 3)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_GG4_02_DESC.text: The Hero leaps into the air and unleashes 3 kicks, each dealing #physical damage# equal to [50/90/130]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_GG4_02_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing an ally's block skill while the Hero is in the air, the Hero immediately activates 'Tempestade' to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power per hit.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_GG4_02_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing an ally's block skill while the Hero is in the air, the Hero immediately activates 'Tempestade' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of the Hero's attack power per hit. 'Tempestade' ignores effects that take damage in place of others, and stuns the hit enemy for 0.1 second.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_GG4_03_DESC.text: The Hero activates 'Invite Hell' to deal @magical damage@ equal to [240/280/320]% of the Hero's attack power to the enemy with the highest HP, according to chain number used. 'Invite Hell' decreases the hit enemy's resistance by 50% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_GG4_03_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Special Skill is changed to 'Eddie' and upon pressing the Hero's block, the Hero's own SP is increased by 80. 'Eddie:' The Hero calls upon Eddie for 10 seconds, dealing @magical damage@ equal to 800% of the Hero's attack power. If reactivated while Eddie is present, Eddie's duration is refreshed and the Hero's attack power is increased by 150% for 5 seconds. Upon activating 'Eddie' after activating the Hero's block skill while Eddie is present, the Hero activates 'Amorphous' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 100% of the Hero's attack power once to the enemy with the highest HP.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_GG4_03_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Special Skill is changed to 'Eddie' and upon pressing the Hero's block, the Hero's own SP is increased by 80. 'Eddie:' The Hero calls upon Eddie for 10 seconds, dealing @magical damage@ equal to 800% of the Hero's attack power. If reactivated while Eddie is present, Eddie's duration is refreshed and the Hero's attack power is increased by 150% for 5 seconds. Upon activating 'Eddie' after activating the Hero's block skill while Eddie is present, the Hero activates 'Amorphous' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of the Hero's attack power once to the enemy with the highest HP.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_OT_04_DESC.text: The Hero slashes their sword to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/200/400]% of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_OT_04_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a Leader's block skill, the Hero activates 'Abide.' 'Abide:' Increases the Hero's own attack power by 30% for 3 seconds. (Duration can be refreshed)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_OT_04_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a Leader's block skill, the Hero activates 'Abide.' 'Abide:' Increases the Hero's own attack power by 50% for 3 seconds. (Duration can be refreshed) Upon using a Leader's block skill while 'Abide' is active, the Hero activates 'Cross Strike.'
