'Cross Strike:' The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of the Hero's attack power to a single frontmost enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_OT_07_DESC.text: The Hero charges forward to the front to deal #physical damage# equal to [300/350/400]% of the Hero's attack power 2 times, according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_OT_07_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 'Steal SP' the Hero recovers 25 SP for themself. Additionally, the Hero activates 'Wildfire' on the enemy hit by the Hero's block skill. 'Wildfire:' The Hero starts a fire to deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_OT_07_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 'Steal SP' the Hero recovers 25 SP for themself. Additionally, the Hero activates 'Wildfire' on the enemy hit by the Hero's block skill. 'Wildfire:' The Hero starts a fire to deal #physical damage# equal to 3000% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_SH_01_DESC.text: Raphtalia charges forward with her sword to deal #physical damage# equal to [150/220/300]% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_SH_01_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain block skill, Raphtalia uses 'Upward Slice' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_LIMITED_SH_01_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain block skill, Raphtalia uses 'Upward Slice' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of her attack power. Afterwards, she uses 'Downward Slice' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MACARIA_DESC.text: The Hero quickly moves to the front, deals #physical damage# equal to [100/200/500]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used, and knocks back the hit enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MACARIA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero's current critical chance is at least 50%, the Hero's attack power increases by 25%. If their critical chance is below 50%, their attack power decreases by 25%. (Cannot be dispelled)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MACARIA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero's current critical chance is at least 100%, the Hero's attack power increases by 50%. If their critical chance is below 100%, their attack power decreases by 50%. (Cannot be dispelled) If 'Walk of Death' deals a critical hit, the Hero additionally activates 'Blade of Fate' to unleash two pulses of swirling energy that each deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MARE_DESC.text: Maré charges forward for [2/4/7] seconds while dealing @magical damage@ equal to 300% of her attack power every 0.1 seconds, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MARE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: During the Hero's block skill, using the Hero's own block will increase the duration of their block skill by 1 second, while using the ally leader's block will increase the duration by 2 seconds. (Maximum increase of 14 seconds; time will not reset after limit) Additionally, during the Hero's block skill, their resistance penetration increases by 10%.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MARE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: During the Hero's block skill, using their own block or the ally leader's block will increase the duration of the Hero's block skill by 2 seconds. (Maximum increase of 14 seconds; time will not reset after limit) Additionally, during the Hero's block skill, their resistance penetration increases by 15%.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MORGAN_DESC.text: Morgan charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [200/400/600]% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MORGAN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every time any member of the team, including Morgan, uses a block, Morgan activates 'Treachery.' 'Treachery' increases Morgan's attack power by 5% and decreases his accuracy by 10 for 2 seconds. (Maximum 3 stacks; renews duration with usage)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_MORGAN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every time any member of the team, including Morgan, uses a block, Morgan activates 'Treachery.' 'Treachery' increases Morgan's attack power by 10% and decreases his accuracy by 20 for 3 seconds. (Maximum 3 stacks; renews duration with usage) Upon reaching 3 stacks of 'Treachery,' Morgan uses 'Defiance' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of his attack power and reset 'Treachery' stacks.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_NEFER_DESC.text: The hero brandishes their bandage to deal #physical damage# equal to [150/300/500]% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_NEFER_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero brandishes their bandage to deal #physical damage# equal to [150/300/500]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_NEFER_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a block immediately before receiving a hit, Nefer uses 'Path of the Dead' to decrease all damage targeted at the entire ally by 20% and increase her own critical chance by 10% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_NEFER_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a block immediately before receiving a hit, Nefer uses 'Path of the Dead' to reduce damage to allies by 20% and increase her own critical chance by 10% for 3 seconds. Upon using 'Path of the Dead' or activating 'Weight of a Heart' 3 times, 'Weight of a Heart' is activated as 'Craving Thirst' for 5 seconds, through which Nefer deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_PIUS_DESC.text: The Hero dashes forward and thrusts down their sword to deal #physical damage# equal to [300/500/900]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_PIUS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: After using 'Talon Gash,' the Hero becomes 'Crouching Dragon.' The Hero's armor and resistance are increased by 50% for 5 seconds. This status cannot be dispelled. Crouching Dragon: For 1 second after using 'Crouching Dragon,' the Hero pulls in all enemies within range and ends 'Crouching Dragon'. If there are any enemies that are still outside their range, the Hero dashes towards that enemy for 1 second and ends 'Crouching Dragon.' If the Hero as 'Crouching Dragon' is knocked into the air, the Hero ends 'Crouching Dragon' and enters 'Anatta' for 5 seconds. In 'Anatta,' the Hero receives 50% more damage.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_PIUS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: After using 'Talon Gash,' the Hero becomes 'Crouching Dragon.' The Hero's armor and resistance are increased by 100% for 5 seconds. This status cannot be dispelled. Crouching Dragon: The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to 500% of their attack power every 0.1 seconds to enemies within range. For 1 second after using 'Crouching Dragon,' the Hero pulls in all enemies within range and ends 'Crouching Dragon'. If there are any enemies that are still outside their range, the Hero dashes towards that enemy for 1 second and ends 'Crouching Dragon.' After ending 'Crouching Dragon,' the Hero uses 'Dragon Thrash' to deal #physical damage# equal to 3000% of their attack power to nearby enemies. If the Hero as 'Crouching Dragon' is knocked into the air, the Hero ends 'Crouching Dragon' and enters 'Anatta' for 3 seconds. In 'Anatta,' the Hero receives 30% more damage.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_PUMPQUEEN_DESC.text: The Hero charges forward and deals #physical damage# equal to [200/280/320]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_PUMPQUEEN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero additionally deals 3 hits of #physical damage# equal to 200% of their attack power per hit to enemies hit by their block skill. If the enemy hit by the Hero's block skill dies, the Hero stacks 1 'Halloween Massacre.' (Maximum 4 stacks; stacks cannot be decreased) Each stack of 'Halloween Massacre' increases the Hero's critical damage by 10% and attack power by 5% for 4 seconds after using the Hero's block skill twice.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_PUMPQUEEN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero additionally deals 3 hits of #physical damage# equal to 200% of their attack power per hit to enemies hit by their block skill. If the enemy hit by the Hero's block skill dies, the Hero stacks 1 'Halloween Massacre.' (Maximum 4 stacks; stacks cannot be decreased) Each stack of 'Halloween Massacre' increases the Hero's critical damage by 50% and attack power by 10% for 4 seconds after using the Hero's block skill.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RAEL_DESC.text: The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to [180/260/340]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used, and becomes resistant to knockbacks for 1 second.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RAEL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block skill, the Hero receives all damage targeted at the entire team for 5 seconds. This effect cannot be dispelled. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RAEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their block skill, the Hero receives all damage targeted at the entire team and becomes resistant to stuns for 5 seconds. This effect cannot be dispelled. (Cooltime: 1 second) Additionally, the Hero's armor is increased by 150% for 5 seconds, and the Hero becomes resistant to 15 hits of physical damage. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RANDGRID_DESC.text: Randgrid immediately leaps towards the nearest enemy and deals #physical damage# equal to [200/350/500]% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RANDGRID_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero immediately leaps towards the nearest enemy and deals #physical damage# equal to [200/350/500]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RANDGRID_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the Hero's 3-chain, 'Piercing Obliteration' deals additional #physical damage# equal to 300% of the Hero's attack power. The Hero increases their own critical chance by 15% and becomes resistant to knockbacks for 6 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RANDGRID_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the Hero's 3-chain, 'Piercing Obliteration' deals additional #physical damage# equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power. The Hero increases their own critical chance by 25% and becomes resistant to knockbacks for 6 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RANNO_DESC.text: Ranno uses meat bait to lure Rex into using 'Munch' or 'Whoosh,' depending on the enemy's distance. Munch: If the enemy is within Ranno and Rex's range, Rex deals #physical damage# equal to [150/250/400]% of Ranno's attack power, according to the chain number used. Whoosh: If no enemy is within Ranno and Rex's range, Rex jumps forward and deals #physical damage# equal to 400% of Ranno's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RANNO_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Ranno mounts Rex the Dinosaur on entering battle. Upon using a 3-chain, Ranno additionally uses 'Thud!' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of her attack power. Ranno and Rex's Special Skills are changed to 'Primitive Instinct.' Primitive Instinct: Ranno's attack power is increased by 150% for 10 seconds. Reusing the skill before its termination will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RANNO_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Ranno mounts Rex the Dinosaur on entering battle. Upon using a 3-chain, Ranno additionally uses 'Thud!' to deal #physical damage# equal to 2000% of her attack power. Additionally, upon receiving 5 hits, Rex uses 'Rawr!' to decrease enemy evasion by 30 for 5 seconds and stun the enemy for 2 seconds. (Cooltime: 8 seconds) Ranno and Rex's Special Skills are changed to 'Primitive Instinct.' Primitive Instinct: Ranno's attack power is increased by 175% and armor penetration and critical chance by 30% for 10 seconds. Reusing the skill before its termination will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RB_WEISS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Weiss pierces the enemy twice, dealing @magical damage@ equal to 100% of her attack power every time. Upon using 'Barrage,' Weiss's evasion is increased by 20 for 1 second, and she cannot be pushed back for the duration of the attack. Pressing Weiss's block during the attack will increase the entire team's attack power by 60% of Weiss's attack power and make them immune to 2 hits.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_REDNAS_DESC.text: Lednas charges forward to deal #physical damage# equal to [100/150/250]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_REDNAS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her own block skill, Lednas raises her shield and stands in the position of 'Grancian Shield Combat' for 10 seconds. (Cooltime: 12 seconds) During 'Grancian Shield Combat,' Lednas gets 10% damage reduction and cannot be pushed back, but her movement speed is reduced by 30%. Additionally, her block skill is changed to 'Shield Blow' during 'Grancian Shield Combat': <Shield Blow> Upon using her block skill during 'Grancian Shield Combat,' Lednas charges forth and deals #physical damage# equal to 150% of her attack power to 1 enemy within her range. Hit enemies are knocked back and immobilized for 2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_REDNAS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her own block skill, Lednas raises her shield and stands in the position of 'Grancian Shield Combat' for 10 seconds. (Cooltime: 12 seconds) During 'Grancian Shield Combat,' Lednas gets 20% damage reduction and cannot be pushed back, but her movement speed is reduced by 20%. Additionally, her block skill is changed to 'Shield Blow' during 'Grancian Shield Combat': <Shield Blow> Upon using her block skill during 'Grancian Shield Combat,' Lednas charges forth and deals #physical damage# equal to 150% of her attack power to 1 enemy within her range. Hit enemies are knocked back and immobilized for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_REJECT_THORN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: During the activation of Thorn of Refusal, when enemies make attacks from outside of auto-attack range, Thorn of Refusal deals @magical damage@ equal to 200% of the hero's attack power with every hit. The attack power and armor of enemies within range of Thorn of Pain are decreased by 75% of the hero's armor. (Once every 1.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ROSKVA_DESC.text: The Hero dashes forward with their blade, dealing 3 hits of #physical damage# equal to [80/200/320]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ROSKVA_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero dashes forward with their blade, attacking 3 times to deal #physical damage# equal to [45/60/80]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ROSKVA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Roskva's block skill accurately hits, Roskva becomes 'exalted' for 5 seconds. 'Exaltation' increases accuracy by 20.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ROSKVA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If the Hero's block skill accurately hits the enemy, the Hero becomes 'exalted' for 5 seconds. The 'exalted' Hero's accuracy is increased by 30. Upon using the 'exalted' Hero's 3-chain, the Hero additionally uses 'Glacial Blade' to deal 3 hits of physical damage equal to 1500% of their attack power to all enemies within range. Enemies hit by 'Glacial Blade' lose evasion by 10 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RZ_01_DESC.text: Upon using his block, Subaru deals #physical damage# equal to [100/150/250]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RZ_01_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon receiving damage that would be otherwise fatal, Subaru uses 'Return by Death.' Activating 'Return by Death' heals Subaru's HP by 100% and grants him invincibility for 2 seconds. This skill activates once, and is reset after re-entering the battle after actual death.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RZ_02_DESC.text: Upon using her block, Crusch Karsten unleashes her 'Blade of Wind,' dealing #physical damage# equal to [150/300/500]% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RZ_02_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing another ally's block 2 times, Crusch Karsten activates 'Divine Protection of Wind Indication' for 5 seconds. This skill increases 'Crusch's attack power by 75% and alters the form of 'Blade of Wind,' increasing its range.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_RZ_02_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing another ally's block 2 times, Crusch Karsten activates 'Divine Protection of Wind Indication' for 5 seconds. This skill increases 'Crusch's attack power by 100%, critical chance by 10%, and accuracy by 20, and alters the form of 'Blade of Wind,' increasing its range.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SHASHA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero summons globes of fire that deal @magical damage@ equal to 5% of the Hero's attack power to nearby allies and 100% of the Hero's attack power to enemies per second.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SHASHA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero summons globes of fire that deal @magical damage@ equal to 5% of the Hero's attack power to nearby allies and 100% of the Hero's attack power to enemies per second. The Hero's 3-chain skills become resistant to knockbacks and mark enemies with burns that deal @magical damage@ equal to 1500% of the Hero's attack power per second for 5 seconds. The Hero's 3-chain skills additionally deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power to marked enemies.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SIMHAKGYU_DESC.text: Sim Hak-Gyu falls over while swinging his blade around, dealing #physical damage# equal to [80/140/220]% of his attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SIMHAKGYU_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero falls over while swinging his blade, dealing #physical damage# equal to [80/140/220]% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SIMHAKGYU_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon entering battle, the Hero summons 'Sim Cheong.' Sim Cheong's stats are set to the Hero's own at the time of the summon. Upon pressing another ally's block, 'Sim Cheong' uses 'Rush of Filial Piety' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of her attack power per hit.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SIMHAKGYU_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon entering battle, the Hero summons 'Sim Cheong.' Sim Cheong's stats are set to 125% of the Hero's at the time of the summon. Upon pressing another ally's block, 'Sim Cheong' uses 'Rush of Filial Piety' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of her attack power per hit. Upon pressing the Hero's 3-chain, 'Sim Cheong' uses 'Punch of the Indang Waters' to deal #physical damage# equal to 3000% of her attack power. 'Sim Cheong' receives all damage targeted at the Hero.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SOLTAR_SLASH_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every 4 hits received, the Hero summons a 'Sphere of Evil' that deals #physical damage# equal to 250% of the Hero's attack power per hit, and the Hero's attack power is increased by 15% for 10 seconds (maximum 10 stacks). Using the Hero's block afterwards will additionally summon a 'Pillar of Evil' that deals #physical damage# equal to 800% of the Hero's attack power to the enemy with the highest HP.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SPAWN_MANTEAU_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his block skill, for a duration of 2 seconds every time he receives a hit, Abel reflects 150% of the damage received to the attacker as $neutral damage$. For 3 seconds afterwards, he reflects 75% of the damage received as $neutral damage$. If his block skill deals an accurate hit, Abel heals himself by 15% of his maximum HP and receives 30% less damage for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SPEARMAN_DESC.text: Spearman deals #physical damage# equal to [500/700/1000]% of his attack power to the enemy in the front, according to the chain number used. During his block skill, Spearman gains knockback resistance.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SPEARMAN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing another ally's block within 5 seconds of using his own block skill, Spearman deals area #physical damage# equal to 500% of his attack power and generates 1 ally leader block. During 'Spearman's Strike,' Spearman gains knockback resistance.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SPEARMAN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing another ally's block within 5 seconds of using his own block skill, Spearman deals area #physical damage# equal to 800% of his attack power and generates 1 ally leader block. During 'Spearman's Strike,' Spearman gains knockback resistance.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SUSANOO_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 'Sword Shot,' Susanoo's auto attack is changed to 'Downward Strike' for 7 seconds. 'Downward Strike' deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of Susanoo's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SUSANOO_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 'Sword Shot,' Susanoo's auto attack is changed to 'Downward Strike' for 7 seconds. 'Downward Strike' deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of Susanoo's attack power. Additionally, Susanoo becomes immune for 5 hits from all types of damage for 5 seconds. (Cooltime: 7 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SWORDWAVE2_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 2 ally leader blocks, the Hero activates 'Extreme Wind Blade.' (Cooltime: 2 seconds) Extreme Wind Blade: The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to 1000% of their attack power and decreases hit enemies' SP by 10. This attack ignores all enemy effects that take damage in place of others.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_SWORDWAVE2_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 3 ally leader blocks, the Hero activates 'Extreme Wind Blade' and increases their own armor penetration by 50% of their attack power for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 2 seconds) Extreme Wind Blade: The Hero deals #physical damage# equal to 2000% of their attack power and decreases hit enemies' SP by 20. This attack ignores all enemy effects that take damage in place of others.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_TWILLY_DESC.text: Twillie uses [Shield of Glory / Fortress of Victory / Strike of Faith] according to the chain number pressed.  Shield of Glory: Twillie's armor is increased by 50. (Maximum 1000)  Fortress of Victory: Twillie's resistance is increased by 50. (Maximum 1000)  Strike of Faith: Twillie impales her greatsword to deal #physical damage# equal to 500% of her attack power.  After 'Strike of Faith,' Twillie lunges forward and uses 'Earth Divider' to deal #physical damage# equal to 150% of her attack power per hit.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_TWILLY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Activating 'Earth Divider' will change Twillie's block skills to [Enhanced Leg / Enhanced Blade / Last Stand], according to the chain number pressed.  Enhanced Leg: Twillie's speed is increased by 25%. (Maximum 5 stacks)  Enhanced Blade: Twillie deals 12% more damage. (Maximum 5 stacks)  Last Stand: Twillie thrusts her greatsword to deal #physical damage# equal to 700% of her attack power. All block skill effects are reset with this attack. After 15 seconds, Twillie uses her 3-chain.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_TWILLY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Activating 'Earth Divider' will change Twillie's block skills to [Enhanced Leg / Enhanced Blade / Last Stand], according to the chain number pressed.  Enhanced Leg: Twillie's speed is increased by 25%. (Maximum 5 stacks)  Enhanced Blade: Twillie deals 12% more damage. (Maximum 5 stacks)  Last Stand: Twillie thrusts her greatsword to deal #physical damage# equal to 1200% of her attack power. All block skill effects are reset with this attack. After 15 seconds, Twillie uses her 3-chain.  Activating 'Earth Shaker' will grant Twillie immunity to all debuffs. Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Twillie will recover HP equal to 10% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_VICTORY_RUSH_DESC.text: Hero deals #physical damage# equal to (150/235/442)% of Hero's attack power according to the chain number.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_VICTORY_RUSH_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When a block is used, the Flag of Victory is summoned at the front line of the ally for 7 seconds once every 10 seconds. All allies near the summoned flag ignore amount of damage equal to 50% of Victoria's armor.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WATER_SWORD_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his block, Koxinga increases the entire team's evasion by 40 and decreases all enemies' accuracy by 40 for 5 seconds. If he succeeds in evading an attack during this time, Koxinga summons a 'Sea Dragon' that deals @magical damage@ equal to 35% of his maximum HP. (Activates every 1 second.) Evading 2 hits will summon a second 'Sea Dragon.' (Activates every 1 second.)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WHIRLWIND_DESC.text: The caster spins forward, dealing #physical damage# equal to 300% of their attack power and knocking back all enemies in their path. This skill cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WHIRLWIND_LV2_DESC.text: The caster spins forward, dealing #physical damage# equal to 375% of their attack power and knocking back all enemies in their path. This skill cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WHIRLWIND_LV3_DESC.text: The caster spins forward, dealing #physical damage# equal to 450% of their attack power and knocking back all enemies in their path. For the duration of this skill, the caster reflects 50% of all damage they receive from enemies. This skill cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WHIRLWIND_LV4_DESC.text: The caster spins forward, dealing #physical damage# equal to 525% of their attack power and knocking back all enemies in their path. For the duration of this skill, the caster reflects 50% of all damage they receive from enemies. This skill cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WHIRLWIND_LV5_DESC.text: The caster spins forward, dealing #physical damage# equal to 750% of their attack power and knocking back all enemies in their path. For the duration of this skill, the caster reflects 50% of all damage they receive from enemies. The last spin of the attack stuns hit enemies for 1 second. This skill cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WILD_NATURE_DESC.text: The Hero rapidly brandishes their sword to deal #physical damage# equal to [150/300/450]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WILD_NATURE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: With every 3 attacks that are not Special Skills, the Hero uses 'Double Slash' to deal 2 hits of #physical damage# equal to 500% of their attack power. Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero increases their attack speed by 40% for 5 seconds. (Duration renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WILD_NATURE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: With every 3 attacks that are not Special Skills, the Hero uses 'Double Slash' to deal 2 hits of #physical damage# equal to 1000% of their attack power. Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero increases their attack speed by 80% for 7 seconds, and all of their attacks except Special Skills deal additional $neutral damage$ equal to 250% of the Hero's attack power for 7 seconds. (Duration renewed with reuse)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WIND_CLEAVE_LV3_DESC.text: Attacks quickly 3 times, dealing #physical damage# equal to 396% of attack power, and pulls the enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WIND_CLEAVE_LV4_DESC.text: Attacks quickly 3 times, dealing #physical damage# equal to 504% of attack power, and pulls the enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_WIND_CLEAVE_LV5_DESC.text: Attacks quickly 3 times, dealing #physical damage# equal to 798% of attack power, and pulls the enemy.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_ADOL_DESC.text: Adol lunges forward to his enemies and deals #physical damage# equal to 100% of his attack power [1/2/3] times according to the chain number he used.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_ADOL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Adol's block is pressed immediately before being hit, he activates 'Flash Guard' that increases his critical chance by 10% and decreases the damage he receives by 20% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_ADOL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If Adol's block is pressed immediately before being hit, he activates 'Flash Guard' that increases his critical chance by 10% and decreases the damage he receives by 20% for 3 seconds.  Upon using 'Flash Guard' or 'Sonic Slide' 3 times, Adol enhances his 'Sonic Slide' to 'Force Edge' for 5 seconds. 'Force Edge' deals #physical damage# equal to 200% of Adol's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_DANA_DESC.text: Dana swings her Crescent Moon Blades to deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/300]% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_DANA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Dana's block is pressed immediately before being hit, she activates 'Flash Move' that increases her motion speed by 10% and decreases the damage she receives by 20% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_DANA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If Dana's block is pressed immediately before being hit, she activates 'Flash Move' that increases her motion speed by 10% and decreases the damage she receives by 20% for 3 seconds. Additionally, she activates 'Dragon Spirit.'  Dragon Spirit (Cooltime: 3 seconds. Cannot be canceled.)  For 15 seconds, Dana becomes resistant to knockbacks, and her attack power and resistance penetration are increased by 400. During this effect, she uses [Mistrel Blow / Twin Moon Blade / Spiel Round Steps] according to the chain number she uses.  Mistrel Blow: Dana spins as smoothly as the wind to deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of her attack power.  Twin Moon Blade: Dana flashes her crescent moon blades to deal @magical damage@ equal to 600% of her attack power.  Spiel Round Steps: Dana gracefully dances around the enemy to deal @magical damage@ equal to 1800% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_LAXIA_DESC.text: Laxia swiftly pierces her enemies [2/4/6] times, dealing #physical damage# equal to 50% of her attack power every time.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_LAXIA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Laxia's block is pressed immediately before being hit, she activates 'Flash Move' that increases her motion speed by 10% and decreases the damage she receives by 20% for 3 seconds.  After using 'Flash Move,' Laxia additionally uses 'Break Needle' that deals $neutral damage$ equal to 100% of her attack power and stuns the frontmost enemy for 1 second. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_YS8_LAXIA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If Laxia's block is pressed immediately before being hit, she activates 'Flash Move' that increases her motion speed by 10% and decreases the damage she receives by 20% for 3 seconds.  After using 'Flash Move,' Laxia additionally uses 'Break Needle' that deals $neutral damage$ equal to 100% of her attack power and stuns the frontmost enemy for 1.5 seconds. (Cooltime: 2 seconds)  The block skill Laxia uses immediately after 'Break Needle' is changed to 'Blitz Charge,' through which Laxia charges forward with her blade and deals #physical damage# equal to 400% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANESIDORA_DESC.text: Anesidora shoots gravity spheres to deal @magical damage@ equal to [120/230/350]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANESIDORA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her chain 2 times, Anesidora generates a 'Graviton Rift' that lasts 3 seconds and deals @magical damage@ equal to 15% of her attack power and #physical damage# equal to 25% of her attack power every 0.2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANESIDORA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her chain 2 times, Anesidora generates a 'Graviton Rift' that lasts 3 seconds and deals @magical damage@ equal to 15% of her attack power and #physical damage# equal to 25% of her attack power every 0.2 seconds. Additionally, her armor penetration increases by 100% of her resistance penetration and her resistance penetration increases by 100% of her armor penetration upon entering the stage. This effect does not activate as a buff and thus cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANNA_DESC.text: Ana uses telekinesis to shoot her gun, dealing #physical damage# equal to [120/240/400]% of her attack power. She also goes into 'Firearm Control' mode for [3/4/5] seconds, with her accuracy increased by 20.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANNA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: In 'Firearm Control' mode, Ana uses 'Honor Guard's Musket' to deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of her attack power per 1.5 seconds. If she uses her own block during this time, the duration of 'Firearm Control' increases by 2 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANNA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: In 'Firearm Control' mode, Ana uses 'Honor Guard's Musket' to deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of her attack power per 1.5 seconds. If she uses her own block during this time, 'Firearm Control' is strengthened into 'Enhanced Firearm Control.' Additionally, the duration of this mode is increased by 2 seconds. During 'Enhanced Firearm Control,' Ana uses 'Honor Guard's Musket' to additionally deal #physical damage# equal to 540% of her attack power per 1.5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANZU_DESC.text: Anzu casts ginkgo leaves at the enemy to deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/300]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANZU_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every time she uses her block skill, Anzu casts 'Protection of the Wind Blade' on herself for 5 seconds. The effects of 'Protection of the Wind Blade' can be stacked a maximum of 5 times, and increases attack power by 3%, critical chance by 3%, and accuracy by 3 with every stack, with critical chance being limited to a 15% increase and accuracy to 15. This effect cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ANZU_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every time she uses her block skill, Anzu casts 'Protection of the Wind Blade' on herself for 5 seconds. The effects of 'Protection of the Wind Blade' can be stacked a maximum of 5 times, and increases attack power by 5%, critical chance by 5%, and accuracy by 5 with every stack, with critical chance being limited to a 25% increase and accuracy to 25. This effect cannot be canceled. Upon using her 3-chain, Anzu additionally uses 'Wind Blade' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of her attack power to enemies within her range.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_BIHWA_DESC.text: Bihwa uses the strength of her spirits to throw an enormous divine knife to deal @magical damage@ equal to [150/250/350]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_BIHWA_DESC_S2EP4.text: The Hero uses the strength of spirits to throw an enormous divine knife to deal @magical damage@ equal to [150/250/350]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_BIHWA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every second block skill used by Bihwa summons forth the dokkaebi 'Gildal,' who becomes embodied through Bihwa and swings their club to deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of Bihwa's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_BIHWA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every second block skill used by Bihwa summons forth the dokkaebi 'Gildal,' who becomes embodied by Bihwa and swings their club to deal @magical damage@ equal to 800% of Bihwa's attack power. Upon using her own or another ally's 3-chain, Bihwa embodies the spirit 'Gseundae' for 3 seconds, who attacks enemies with their divine branch to deal @magical damage@ equal to 100% of Bihwa's attack power every 0.1 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_BLIZZARD_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero drops [8/12/20] icicles that each deal @magical damage@ equal to [5/13/22]% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_BRIDGET_DESC.text: The Hero summons lucky meteors that deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/150/360]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_BRIDGET_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using every sixth block skill, the Hero drops Bridget Points that deal $neutral damage$ equal to 5000.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CALL_IFRIT_DESC.text: The hero immediately summons a 'Fire Spirit' that aids the hero for 10 seconds. The Fire Spirit deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of the hero's attack power per second. (A maximum of 1 Fire Spirit can be summoned at once. The summoned Fire Spirit receives the same stats as its caster's.)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CALL_IFRIT_LV2_DESC.text: The hero immediately summons a 'Fire Spirit' that aids the hero for 10 seconds. The Fire Spirit deals @magical damage@ equal to 125% of the hero's attack power per second. (A maximum of 1 Fire Spirit can be summoned at once. The summoned Fire Spirit receives the same stats as its caster's.)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CALL_IFRIT_LV3_DESC.text: The hero immediately summons a 'Fire Spirit' that aids the hero for 10 seconds. The Fire Spirit deals @magical damage@ equal to 150% of the hero's attack power per second. (A maximum of 1 Fire Spirit can be summoned at once. The summoned Fire Spirit receives the same stats as its caster's.)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CALL_IFRIT_LV4_DESC.text: The hero immediately summons a 'Fire Spirit' that aids the hero for 10 seconds. The Fire Spirit deals @magical damage@ equal to 175% of the hero's attack power per second. (A maximum of 1 Fire Spirit can be summoned at once. The summoned Fire Spirit receives the same stats as its caster's.)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CALL_IFRIT_LV5_DESC.text: The hero immediately summons a 'Fire Spirit' that aids the hero for 10 seconds. The Fire Spirit deals @magical damage@ equal to 200% of the hero's attack power per second. If the skill is reused before the Fire Spirit disappears, the Fire Spirit immediately breathes flames to deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of the hero's attack power. (A maximum of 1 Fire Spirit can be summoned at once. The summoned Fire Spirit receives its caster's stats.)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CAMILLABANOUB_DESC.text: The Hero summons waves of sand that deal @magical damage@ equal to [150/300/500]% of their attack power and knock back the enemy, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CAMILLABANOUB_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero increases their own attack power by 15% and resistance penetration by 500 for 10 seconds. Reusing the skill will renew its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CAMILLABANOUB_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero increases their own attack power by 30% and resistance penetration by 1000 for 10 seconds. Reusing the skill will renew its duration. Additionally, the Hero activates 'Eroded Tablet' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 300% of their attack power every 0.3 seconds for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CAROLYN_DESC.text: The Hero projects D-CAT sound waves to deal @magical damage@ equal to [90/180/300]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CAROLYN_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 2 chains, the Hero immediately blasts 'Ear-Splitting Ultrasound' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 1600% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_CAROLYN_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 2 chains, the Hero immediately blasts 'Ear-Splitting Ultrasound' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 1600% of their attack power and dispel hit enemies' buffs.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_DWARF_DESC.text: Dwarf Shaman throws sharp stones to deal #physical damage# equal to [180/330/480]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_DWARF_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his own 3-chain, Dwarf Shaman uses 'Falling Control' to deal #physical damage# equal to 600% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_DWARF_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using his own 3-chain, Dwarf Shaman uses 'Falling Control' to deal #physical damage# equal to 900% of his attack power. He then summons a mud barrier to bind enemies for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ENERGYBEAM_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero immediately shoots an 'Ultimate Magic Beam' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 2000% of their attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ENERGYBEAM_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero immediately shoots an 'Ultimate Magic Beam' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 2000% of their attack power and dispel all enemy buffs. 'Ultimate Magic Beam' ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies. Upon activating 'Ultimate Magic Beam,' the Hero generates 1 block of their own.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_EPENDER_DESC.text: The Hero releases flower petals to deal @magical damage@ equal to [200/300/400]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_EPENDER_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero summons a gigantic flower that spits poison and deals @magical damage@ equal to 800% of the Hero’s attack power to all enemies within range.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_EPENDER_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their 3-chain, the Hero summons a gigantic flower that spits poison and deals @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of the Hero’s attack power to all enemies within range.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ESTELLE_DESC.text: The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to [500/1000/2000]% of their attack power to the nearest enemy within range, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ESTELLE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon dealing damage with their block skill, the Hero summons 'Stardust' for 3 seconds that decreases enemy resistance by 10%. (Cannot be stacked)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ESTELLE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon dealing damage with their block skill, the Hero summons 'Stardust' for 3 seconds that decreases enemy resistance by 20%. (Cannot be stacked)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_EUNGARAM_DESC.text: The Hero deals area @magical damage@ equal to [200/300/600]% of their attack power to the nearest enemy and knocks hit enemies into the air.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_EUNGARAM_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Waterspout' lose 10% of their resistance for 5 seconds. Upon using 'Waterspout,' the Hero increases their own critical chance by 10% for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_EUNGARAM_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by 'Waterspout' lose 10% of their resistance for 5 seconds. Upon using 'Waterspout,' the Hero increases their own critical chance by 10% for 5 seconds. Upon activating another ally's Special Skill, the Hero becomes resistant to debuffs for 5 seconds. (Cooltime: 15 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_FREDERICK_DESC.text: Shoots sacred energy to the front, dealing @magical damage@ equal to [250/300/400]% of attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_FREDERICK_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When the blocks of three different Heroes are pressed consecutively, shoots light, dealing @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of attack power immediately. If Francesca is amongst allies, Francesca's blocks are recognized as all different blocks.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_FREDERICK_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When the blocks of three different Heroes are pressed consecutively, shoots light, dealing @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of attack power immediately. If Francesca is amongst allies, Francesca's blocks are recognized as all different blocks. When activated, shoots 1 additional time.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GG3_DIZZY_DESC.text: Dizzy deals @magical damage@ equal to [120/240/400]% of her attack power according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GG3_DIZZY_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The second block Dizzy uses is changed to 'For roasting chestnuts...' which deals @magical damage@ equal to 700% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GG3_DIZZY_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The second block Dizzy uses is changed to 'For roasting chestnuts...' which deals @magical damage@ equal to 700% of her attack power.  Upon using an ally's 3-chain, Dizzy uses 'Imperial Ray' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 100% of her attack power per hit.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GG3_DIZZY_NAME.text: I Used This to Pick Fruit

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GG_RAMLETHAL_SKILL_LV2_SUB.text: After using her 3-chain after her block skill, Ramlethal uses 'Calvados' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 2800% of attack power and increases critical damage by 20% for 8 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GG_RAMLETHAL_SKILL_LV3_SUB.text: After using her 3-chain after her block skill, Ramlethal uses 'Calvados' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 2800% of attack power and increases critical damage by 20% for 8 seconds. The attack also heals her HP based on 30% of the damage dealt.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GRIMREAPER_DESC.text: The Grim Reaper summons a deadly fog that deals @magical damage@ equal to [200/300/400]% of his attack power per second and lasts [2/3/4] seconds, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GRIMREAPER_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If any hero is healed during battle, the Grim Reaper leaves the 'Mark of the Reaper' to all enemies within the range of the 'Fog of Death.' The 'Mark of the Reaper' lasts 2 seconds and decreases the enemy's resistance and healing effect by 15%. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GRIMREAPER_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If any hero is healed during battle, the Grim Reaper leaves the 'Mark of the Reaper' to all enemies within the range of the 'Fog of Death.' The 'Mark of the Reaper' lasts 4 seconds and decreases the enemy's resistance and healing effect by 20%. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GROW_WHEAT_DESC.text: The Hero summons 'Catcher in the Wheat' that deals @magical damage@ equal to [85/150/270]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used. Hit enemies receive a 'Mark of Grain' that lasts 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GROW_WHEAT_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When an ally attacks an enemy with the 'Mark of Grain' 5 times, the Hero summons 'Fields of Gold' and 'Raging Catcher in the Wheat' for 5 seconds. 'Raging Catcher in the Wheat' deals @magical damage@ equal to 150% of the Hero's attack power every 0.5 seconds. (Maximum 3 summoned at once)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_GROW_WHEAT_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When an ally attacks an enemy with the 'Mark of Grain' 5 times, the Hero summons 'Fields of Gold' and 'Raging Catcher in the Wheat' for 5 seconds. 'Raging Catcher in the Wheat' deals @magical damage@ equal to 300% of the Hero's attack power every 0.5 seconds and additional @magical damage@ equal to 100% of their attack power to enemies with the 'Mark of Grain.' (Maximum 3 summoned at once) Additionally, upon summoning 'Raging Catcher in the Wheat,' the Hero's resistance penetration is increased by 500 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_HANSANGJA_DESC.text: Han Xiangzi throws paper talismans that deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/300]% of his attack power to the enemy in the front, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_HANSANGJA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero leaves a 'Qimen Dunjia' that lasts 6 seconds on enemies hit by the Hero's block skill. (Cooltime renewed with reuse) 'Qimen Dunjia': The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 50% of the Hero's attack power every 0.1 seconds and generates 10 SP for the ally leader.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_HANSANGJA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero leaves a 'Qimen Dunjia' that lasts 6 seconds on enemies hit by the Hero's block skill. (Cooltime renewed with reuse) 'Qimen Dunjia': The Hero deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of the Hero's attack power every 0.1 seconds and generates 10 SP for the ally leader.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ILLUSION_MAPAE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Mapae Clones' created after pressing another ally's block will attack twice.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_ILLUSION_MAPAE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Mapae Clones' created after pressing another ally's block will attack twice. Enemies hit by 'Mapae Clones' lose 25% of their attack power for 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LABEL_DESC.text: Labelle flicks her needle to deal @magical damage@ equal to [200/300/400]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LABEL_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Labelle additionally 'darns' the enemy within her range to deal @magical damage@ equal to 600% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LABEL_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Labelle additionally 'darns' the enemy within her range to deal @magical damage@ equal to 800% of her attack power. Hit enemies become immobilized within Labelle's 'Thread Prison' for 5 seconds, in which their resistance is decreased by 30%.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LACIES_DESC.text: Lakias draws a magic circle that lasts [2/3/4] seconds and deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/350]% of her attack power per second, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LACIES_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero draws a magic circle that lasts [2/3/4] seconds and deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/350]% of their attack power per second, accordng to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LACIES_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Lakias's resistance penetration is increased by 100 for 10 seconds. After using her 3-chain, Lakias's 'Glacial Sphere' is activated with the same power as a 3-chain for the next 1 block she uses. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LACIES_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using the Hero's 3-chain, their resistance penetration is increased by 1000 for 10 seconds. For the next 3 blocks after using their 3-chain, the Hero's 'Glacial Sphere' is activated with the power of a 3-chain. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIGHTNING_DROP_DESC.text: Calls 5 thunderbolts that deal @magic damage@ equal to 125% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIGHTNING_DROP_LV2_DESC.text: Calls 5 thunderbolts that deal @magic damage@ equal to 150% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIGHTNING_DROP_LV3_DESC.text: Calls 5 thunderbolts that deal @magic damage@ equal to 200% of the Hero's attack power and stuns for 0.7 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_ER_05_DESC.text: Drago shoots lightning at the frontmost enemy in his surroundings to deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/400]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_ER_05_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Drago's Special Skill is changed to 'Dragon Ball.' Upon using 'Dragon Ball,' Drago transforms into a huge dragon for 8 seconds, and his block skill changes to a dragon breath to deal @magical damage@ equal to [700/1000/1300]% of attack power according to chain number used. Using 'Dragon Ball' while transformed will refresh the duration of the transformation.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_ER_05_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Drago's Special Skill is changed to 'Dragon Ball.' Upon using 'Dragon Ball,' Drago transforms into a huge dragon for 10 seconds, and his block skill changes to a dragon breath to deal @magical damage@ equal to [1000/1400/1800]% of attack power according to chain number used. Using 'Dragon Ball' while transformed will refresh the duration of the transformation.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_ER_05_SP_SUBDESC.text: Upon use, Drago transforms into a huge dragon for 10 seconds, and his block skill changes to a dragon breath to deal @magical damage@ equal to [1000/1400/1800]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_ER_21_DESC.text: Nyanma shoots an 'Energy Ball' 5 times that each deals @magical damage@ equal to [60/70/80]% of attack power according to chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_ER_21_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing their block 2 times, the Hero enters their Soul form and becomes immune to both physical and magical damage for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 10 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_ER_21_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing their block 2 times, the Hero enters their Soul form and becomes immune to both physical and magical damage for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 10 seconds) Additionally, the Hero receives 'the Jyarei Goddess's Favor,' increasing the Hero's attack power by 30% and evasion by 40 for 2 seconds. The duration of 'the Jyarei Goddess's Favor' is reset upon reactivation.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_04_DESC.text: Fitoria shoots 3 light orbs to deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/400]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_04_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 5 ally block skills, Fitoria casts 'Wind Prison' over the closest enemy before her for 3 seconds. 'Wind Prison' immobilizes the trapped enemy and deals @magical damage@ equal to 500% of Fitoria's attack power per second to both the victim and their surroundings. (Cooltime: 1 second) The duration of 'Wind Prison' will be renewed if reused before its termination.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_04_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 5 ally block skills, Fitoria casts 'Wind Prison' over the closest enemy before her for 5 seconds. 'Wind Prison' immobilizes the trapped enemy and deals @magical damage@ equal to 1000% of Fitoria's attack power per second to both the victim and their surroundings. (Cooltime: 1 second) The duration of 'Wind Prison' will be renewed if reused before its termination.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_05_DESC.text: Glass swings her fan to unleash a gusty slash that deals 3 hits of @magical damage@ equal to [50/100/140]% of her attack power and knock back the hit enemy, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_05_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every time Glass fully charges her SP, she activates her 'Soul-Healing Water' potion for 8 seconds to immediately heal her own maximum HP by 50% and change her block skill to 'Circle Dance Zero Formation: Reverse Snow Moon Flower.' 'Circle Dance Zero Formation: Reverse Snow Moon Flower' deals @magical damage@ equal to [150/180/210]% of her attack power 3 times, according to the chain number used, and knocks back the hit enemy. This effect cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_05_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every time Glass fully charges her SP, she activates her 'Soul-Healing Water' potion for 10 seconds to immediately heal her own maximum HP by 80% and change her block skill to 'Circle Dance Zero Formation: Reverse Snow Moon Flower.' 'Circle Dance Zero Formation: Reverse Snow Moon Flower' deals @magical damage@ equal to [250/300/330]% of her attack power 3 times, according to the chain number used, and knocks back the hit enemy. This effect cannot be canceled.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_06_DESC.text: Rishia uses wind magic to throw Rucolu Barrel Bombs that deal @magical damage@ equal to [200/350/500]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_06_LV2_SUBDESC.text: When Rishia's Rucolu Barrel Bomb deals damage, it activates 'Rucolu Fruit Effect' to decrease the hit enemy's accuracy by 30 for a second.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIMITED_SH_06_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When Rishia's Rucolu Barrel Bomb deals damage, it activates 'Rucolu Fruit Effect' to decrease the hit enemy's accuracy and motion speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LOKI_DESC.text: Loki throws a balloon to the enemy, which bounces off [1/3/6] time(s) according to the chain number used, dealing @magical damage@ equal to 150% of his attack power every time.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LOKI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: At the end of its attack, Loki's balloon pops to deal @magical damage@ equal to 100% of Loki's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LOKI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: At the end of its attack, Loki's balloon pops to deal @magical damage@ equal to 300% of Loki's attack power. Hit enemies receive $neutral damage$ equal to 50% of the damage they deal for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LOVIATAR_DESC.text: Loviatar shoots 'mushroom spores' to deal @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/400]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LOVIATAR_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Loviatar 'infests' the enemy with the highest HP with her mushrooms for 4 seconds, decreasing their attack power by 35%. 'Mushroom Infestation' affects only one enemy at a time. Reusing the skill before its termination will reset its duration without changing its target.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LOVIATAR_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her block skill, Loviatar 'infests' the enemy with the highest HP with her mushrooms for 4 seconds, decreasing their attack power by 35%. 'Mushroom Infestation' affects only one enemy at a time. Reusing the skill before its termination will reset its duration without changing its target. If the 'infested' enemy does not change their position for 3 seconds, Loviatar generates a 'Mushroom Forest' around the target for 3 seconds, dealing @magical damage@ equal to 300% of her attack power every 0.3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_MAGIC_SCAN_DESC.text: Benjamin installs a 'scanning area' that deals @magical damage@ equal to [64/120/240]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used. 'Scanning area' ignores enemy effects that absorb damage in place of their allies. Enemies in the 'scanning area' become 'scanned.'

TEXT_SKILL_WI_MEDEA_DESC.text: The Hero shoots cursed orbs that penetrate enemies to deal @magical damage@ equal to [350/400/450]% of the Hero's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_MEDEA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero casts 'Mantle of Aer' over enemies hit by the Hero's block skill for 6 seconds. (Reusing the skill resets duration) 'Mantle of Aer' decreases resistance by 300 and affects a maximum of 5 enemies. (Cannot be stacked)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_MEDEA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero casts 'Mantle of Aer' over enemies hit by the Hero's block skill for 6 seconds. (Reusing the skill resets duration) 'Mantle of Aer' decreases resistance by 600 and affects a maximum of 5 enemies. (Cannot be stacked)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_METEOR2_DESC.text: Hero throws 4 soul-capturing 'bujeoks' to deal @magical damage@ equal to [44/444/444]% of her attack power to enemies before her, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_METEOR2_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a 3-chain, Korin additionally throws an 'Illusion-Capturing Bujeok' to deal $neutral damage$ equal to 444% of her attack power to enemies before her.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_METEOR2_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Korin additionally throws an 'Illusion-Capturing Bujeok' to deal $neutral damage$ equal to 444% of her attack power to enemies before her. The damage dealt by each 'Illusion-Capturing Bujeok' increases by 444% of Korin's attack power every time Korin's passive activates. This effect cannot be canceled. (Maximum 4 stacks)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_NAZRUNE_DESC.text: Nazrune summons a [wolf/wolf/bull] that deals @magical damage@ equal to [200/300/500]% of Nazrune's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_NAZRUNE_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain block skill, the Hero summons all 'beasts,' dealing @magical damage@ equal to 3000% of the Hero's attack power per hit. Each beast decreases the hit enemy's [attack power / armor / resistance] by 20% respectively for 5 seconds and knocks them into the air.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_NAZRUNE_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using another ally's 3-chain block skill, the Hero summons all 'beasts,' dealing @magical damage@ equal to 3000% of the Hero's attack power per hit and increasing the effect of debuffs by 50%. Each beast decreases the hit enemy's [attack power / armor / resistance] by 30% respectively for 5 seconds and knocks them into the air. The debuff caused by the Hero's passive can be stacked with the debuff caused by the Hero's block skill.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_NICOLA_DESC.text: The Hero summons 'Candy Couriers' for [10/10/18] seconds, according to the chain number used. During the call of 'Candy Couriers,' the Hero does not use normal attacks. Reusing the skill before termination will reset its duration.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_NICOLA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own 3-chain as the ally leader during the call of 'Candy Couriers', the Hero uses 'Suspicious Sack' that deals area #physical damage# equal to 800% of their attack power. At the start of battle, the Hero's Special Skill is changed to 'CODE [SUGAR RUSH].' 'CODE [SUGAR RUSH]': The Hero deals 15% more damage for 5 seconds. (Cannot be canceled)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_NICOLA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using their own 3-chain as the ally leader during the call of 'Candy Couriers', the Hero uses 'Suspicious Sack' that deals area #physical damage# equal to 1000% of their attack power. At the start of battle, the Hero's Special Skill is changed to 'CODE [SUGAR RUSH].' 'CODE [SUGAR RUSH]': The Hero deals 15% more damage for 5 seconds. Reusing the skill before termination will increase the damage dealt by the Hero to 30%. (Cannot be canceled)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_NICOLA_SUBDESC.text: Speed Is Key for Great Candy!

TEXT_SKILL_WI_OSIRIS_DESC_S2EP2.text: Osiris summons an 'Ancient Magic Circle' that lasts [2/4/6] seconds according to the chain number used. The 'Ancient Magic Circle' deals @magical damage@ equal to 50% of Osiris's attack power per second.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_OSIRIS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: 'Ancient Magic Circle' gives off 'Light of Illusions' which deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of attack power every second. Upon using another ally's 3-chain while the skill is activated, Osiris additionally summons a 'Sandstorm' from the 'Ancient Magic Circle.' The 'Sandstorm' decreases all enemies' evasion by 25 for 5 seconds, and additionally deals @magical damage@ equal to 200% of attack power.(Cooltime: 1.5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_OT_02_DESC.text: The Hero uses elemental magic to deal @magical damage@ equal [200/300/400%] of the Hero's attack power, according to chain number used. Elemental magic is randomly selected between [Fireball/Icewind/Lightning Bolt].

TEXT_SKILL_WI_OT_02_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Every 3 times the Hero uses Elemental Magic Attack, they analyze the frontmost enemy's weakness. The analyzed enemy takes 20% increased damage from the Hero for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_OT_02_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Every 3 times the Hero uses Elemental Magic Attack, they analyze the frontmost enemy's weakness. The analyzed enemy takes 40% increased damage from the Hero for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_04_DESC.text: Ram swings her arms to shoot out rapid bursts of wind and deal @magical damage@ equal to [140/280/420]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_04_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Ram unleashes an enormous windstorm before the nearest enemy every 15 seconds to deal @magical damage@ equal to 350% of her attack power, knocking back hit enemies

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_04_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Ram unleashes an enormous windstorm before the nearest enemy every 15 seconds to deal @magical damage@ equal to 550% of her attack power, knocking back hit enemies

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_05_DESC.text: Emilia shoots out 6 icy projectiles that each deal @magical damage@ equal to [20/30/50]% of her attack power to the nearest enemy, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_05_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Emilia's block skill lose 10% movement speed and receive @magical damage@ over time equal to 75% of Emilia's attack power per second for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_05_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Emilia's block skill lose 15% movement speed and receive @magical damage@ over time equal to 150% of Emilia's attack power per second for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_06_DESC.text: Beatrice summons a 'Magic Tome' that deals area @magical damage@ equal to [400/450/500]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used. The 'Magic Tome' lasts 5 seconds before disappearing.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_06_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Beatrice does not recover her own SP by using her block skill. Instead, for every enemy hit by her block skill, Beatrice regenerates 1 SP for the ally leader, and 1 SP for herself.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_06_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Beatrice does not recover her own SP by using her block skill. Instead, for every enemy hit by her block skill, Beatrice regenerates 1 SP for the ally leader, and 1 SP for herself. Additionally, enemies standing on the area of her 'Magic Tome' lose 10% of their armor and resistance. (This debuff cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_SEOGWI_DESC.text: The Hero unleashes the magic of their brush and ink to deal @magical damage@ equal to [200/260/320]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_SEOGWI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 'Mightier Than the Sword,' the Hero leaves a 'Prey' mark on the enemy with the highest HP for 5 seconds. Whenever the enemy with the 'Prey' mark receives damage, the Hero recharges 5 SP. The 'Prey' mark only affects one enemy at a time. Reusing the skill will refresh its duration but maintain the original target.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_SEOGWI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using 'Mightier Than the Sword,' the Hero leaves a 'Prey' mark on the enemy with the highest HP for 5 seconds. Whenever the enemy with the 'Prey' mark receives damage, the Hero recharges 5 SP. The 'Prey' mark only affects one enemy at a time. Reusing the skill will refresh its duration but maintain the original target. Upon using 'Mightier Than the Sword' or receiving a debuff while an enemy has been marked as 'Prey,' the Hero summons a tome to deal @magical damage@ equal to 666% of the Hero's attack power to the marked enemy and pull in the hit enemy. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_THIEF_APPEAR_DESC.text: Lupeow throws [1/2/3] cards that each deal @magical damage@ equal to 200% of her attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_THIEF_APPEAR_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If her block skill deals a critical hit, Lupeow summons a 'trick hat' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of her attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_THIEF_APPEAR_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If her block skill deals a critical hit, Lupeow summons a 'trick hat' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 400% of her attack power. Upon using 'The Phantom Thief Appears!' Lupeow summons pigeons for 5 seconds to decrease all enemies' resistance by 30%. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_URAKO_DESC.text: Using blocks summons members of Team Urako for 5 seconds each in the following order: [Tsune/Tenko/Nue]. If members of Team Urako are already summoned, the duration of 'Team Urako!' is renewed. 'Team Urako' ignores enemy effects that absorb damage in place of their allies. - Team Urako! Tsune: A cute fox spirit. Tenko: Tenko throws his feathers toward the frontmost enemy every 2 seconds to deal @magical damage@ equal to 800% of Urako's attack power. Nue: Nue throws fireballs toward the frontmost enemy to deal @magical damage@ equal to [400/700/1300]% of Urako's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_URAKO_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If members of Team Urako are summoned, they additionally cast the below buffs: Tsune: Increases own critical damage by 40% Tenko: Increases own resistance penetration by 1500 Nue: Increases own attack power by 30%

TEXT_SKILL_WI_URAKO_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If members of Team Urako are summoned, they additionally cast the below buffs:  Tsune: Increases own critical damage by 40% Tenko: Increases own resistance penetration by 1500 Nue: Increases own attack power by 30% If the entirety of Team Urako is summoned, the values of the buffs are doubled.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WANGDAO_DESC.text: Wang Dao throws a random mask to deal @magical damage@ equal to [150/300/450]% of his attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WANGDAO_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero randomly throws one of three colorful masks. Each mask deals additional @magical damage@ equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power and a different effect corresponding to the mask color.  'Red Mask': The Hero knocks back the enemy. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds) 'Blue Mask': The Hero knocks the enemy into the air. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds) 'Green Mask': The Hero binds the enemy for 1 second. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WANGDAO_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero randomly throws one of five colorful masks. Each mask deals additional @magical damage@ equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power and a different effect corresponding to the mask color.  'Red Mask': The Hero knocks back the enemy. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds) 'Blue Mask': The Hero knocks the enemy into the air. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds) 'Green Mask': The Hero binds the enemy for 1 second. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds) 'Gold Mask': The Hero stuns the enemy for 1 second. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds) 'White Mask': The Hero pulls in the enemy. (Cooltime: 0.1 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WOLFRAM_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero throws the nearest enemy into the air and summons a wind that deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/350]% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WOLFRAM_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Wolfram casts 'Vigilant Wild' on allies in the air. 'Vigilant Wind' grants immunity to magical damage for 2 seconds. Allies must wait 5 seconds before receiving the effects of 'Vigilant Wind' again.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WOLFRAM_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Wolfram casts 'Vigilant Wild' on allies in the air. 'Vigilant Wind' grants immunity to magical damage for 2 seconds. Allies must wait 5 seconds before receiving the effects of 'Vigilant Wind' again. If there is an ally in the air when Wolfram uses her own block skill, she additionally uses 'Tempestuous Gale' to deal @magical damage@ equal to 500% of her attack power.

TEXT_TIP_SKILL_DELETE.text: You can delete Special Skills from Heroes at the Skill Lab.

TEXT_TOPDEALER_RANDOM_EXCLUSIVE_WEAPON_4.text: Great Success! Fergus has given you a random 4-Star Soulbound Weapon!
A chest holding a random ★4 Soulbound Weapon.

TEXT_TUTO_BOX_SIS_SKILL_1.text: Press the Sera Button on the screen!

TEXT_TUTO_SP_SKILL_1.text: This is a Special Skill block.

TEXT_TUTO_SP_SKILL_2.text: Special Skill blocks are generated when a Hero's SP is fully charged.

TEXT_TUTO_SP_SKILL_3.text: SP is charged by using a Hero's block skill.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_24_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Arachne's 'baby spiders' ignore enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies. (Passive Added) If a 'baby spider' accurately deals a hit, Arachne summons a 'Tarantula' that deals physical damage equal to 1000% of Arachne's attack power, giving the target enemy a 'spider bite.' Arachne additionally recovers HP equal to 50% of the damage dealt by the 'Tarantula.' If the enemy is under the effect of a debuff, the 'Tarantula' deals additional damage equal to 1000% of Arachne's attack power. If the 'Tarantula' accurately deals a hit, Arachne generates 1 block of her own. The 'Tarantula' ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies. (Cooltime: 0.7 second)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_25_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Each 'fission bomb' deals physical damage equal to 1200% of Lindsey's attack power. Additionally, the number of thrown fission bombs is increased to 3, and their range is increased by 100%.

As the 'Oracle of Water,' the Hero becomes immune to stuns. (Cooltime: 20 seconds) (Passive Added) As the 'Oracle of Water,' the Hero's normal attacks and block skills are activated as 'Oracle's Arrows.' - 'Oracle's Arrows': The Hero shoots 4 'Oracle's Arrows' at a single enemy in the front, dealing magical damage equal to 800% of the Hero's attack power. All 'Oracle's Arrows' ignore enemy evasion and are acknowledged as 1-chains.
