TEXT_WR_BOMB_CHANGE_SKILL_BELLA.text: You can change your Special Skills in this place. Choose wisely!

TEXT_CHA_AR_4_35_DESC.text: Devoted to seeking justice, Nottingham applies to be enlisted as a new member of the Green Apple. But he is denied enlistment because Robin Hood, the head of Green Apple, doubts his conviction. This is because Robin Hood has been paying close attention to House Lowell, considered the symbol of aristocratic corruption, and their eldest son, Nottingham. Nottingham, determined to prove his resolution towards justice regardless of his family, makes a difficult decision. He decides to hand over to the Green Apple the ledger with the names of corrupt aristocrats associated with his own family. Thanks to this ledger, the Green Apple is able to successfully eradicate aristocratic corruption, earning the trust of the Emperor, and Robin Hood officially accepts Nottingham as a member of the Green Apple.

TEXT_CHA_AR_5_35_DESC.text: Even after Nottingham becomes an official Green Apple archer, Robin Hood still has doubts about his conviction and wants Nottingham to prove himself.  Then, Emperor Alexander orders the assassination of a corrupt aristocrat, and Nottingham volunteers for the task in order to prove himself. He successfully assassinates the target. But then, he finds out the target was his own childhood friend, and he becomes flabbergasted. How was it that the arrow of justice ended up at the heart of an innocent citizen! Nottingham, convinced something is fishy, suspects for the first time the justice that the Green Apple supposedly serves.

TEXT_CHA_AR_6_35_DESC.text: That very night, Robin Hood praises Nottingham for the assassination and appoints him as deputy head. Nottingham finally receives the recognition he wanted, but he finds no joy. Unable to free himself of the questions he has about the assassination, Nottingham sneaks into Robin Hood’s library, where he comes across an order from Alexander. After reading the order, Nottingham realizes the purpose of the assassination was to lay a political foundation for Alexander. His childhood friend was not a corrupt aristocrat. The Grancia Empire and the Green Apple were. Feeling betrayed and distanced by the degenerated Green Apple, Nottingham pledges to never again be used by the powerful, and takes with him the order of Alexander as he goes on to gather his own group of just men.

TEXT_CHA_HU_4_35_DESC.text: Pumpkin City was known to be a place where cats and wizards lived together as friends, but in reality, humans were reigning over cats as owners. Anima, who has been a fan of cats since childhood, strongly believed humans shouldn’t reign over cats but serve them instead. Anima tried to convince the adults of this theory, but most of them disregarded her seemingly absurd theory. Disgusted at the ignorance of grown-ups in Pumpkin City, Anima spent years devising a master plan.

TEXT_CHA_HU_5_35_DESC.text: And soon after, the sounds of cats meowing started to diminish. One by one, cats were disappearing from the streets. While some welcomed this change, saying the nights at Pumpkin City now felt more pleasant, those whose cats had gone missing cried their eyes out while looking for the missing member of their family. Anima didn't let the chaos bother her. Instead, she composedly headed home, as she held onto a huge bag of cat feed.

TEXT_CHA_HU_6_35_DESC.text: Then one night, all the cats who had disappeared from the streets of Pumpkin City suddenly reappeared and started plundering food. All of them had been influenced by the charm spell of Anima, and they moved as she commanded. Wizards, who came to their senses late in the night, were caught off guard by these elusive cats. Having successfully plundered goods and left Pumpkin City confused, Anima and her cats vanished into somewhere where they were going to build a paradise of cats.

TEXT_CHA_HU_6_35_NAME.text: Anima from the Paradise of Cats

TEXT_CHA_PA_4_34_DESC.text: Although small even in human standards, Ozma is surely one of the brightest ogres among her kin. When she was three years old, she learned human language from the human invader. At five, she invented a series of tools that can be used to boost her physical capabilities, which she called the 'Ogrenology.' However, her kin could not understand her superior intelligence for an ogre. Her parents thought their daughter in her Ku-Klip suit an enemy and attacked her, making her to flee from her own tribe. Since that unfortunate event, Ozma began to wander the world until she found herself in the realm of the demons. She introduced herself as 'Ku-Klip the Iron Ogre' to the demons who were baffled by their finding.

TEXT_CHA_PA_5_34_DESC.text: The demons didn't believe that she was an iron ogre, but they accepted her among them as the demons themselves were also outcasts rejected by Hasla. Ozma, known as Ku-Klip among the demons, fought a war under the banner of Lord Gordian and distinguished herself. Impressed by the destruction that Ku-Klip and her twin axes 'Dest' and 'Roy' unleash upon the battlefield, Gordian promoted Ku-Klip as one of his four lieutenants who lead his legion of demons. While Ozma was pleased to finally have a place she could call home, part of her was still frustrated from hiding her true identity from anyone. When the war was over, Ozma decided to end her struggle and went to Gordian to reveal her true identity.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_34_DESC.text: Gordian wasn't bothered at all by her coming out but rather impressed by her technological genius behind the making of Ku-Klip. Ozma was surprised and happy by the reaction of her lord, but nonetheless she still felt uncomfortable, so she hided herself again inside the suit. It turned out that Ozma developed sociophobia because she had lived without revealing herself for too long. Embarrassed and panicked, Ozma wanted to leave the realm of the demons, but Gordian wasn't ready to lose one of his best lieutenants and her 'Ogrenology.' After a rather destructive conversation with Gordian, during which about a half of Gordian's castle was destroyed, Ozma decided to stay beside her lord and help him prosper his world. But she would stay inside Ku-Klip until she suffers from sociophobia no more.

TEXT_CHA_PA_6_34_NAME.text: Ozma of the Four Heavenly Kings

TEXT_CHA_PR_4_37_DESC.text: Rie was a member of a house famous for its long line of great swordsmen. She wandered the Kingdom of Ryu with her carefree master. While learning swordsmanship in play, she went to a lot of places to learn many different customs and cultures. Wherever she went, she found a lot of musical instruments to play with and always turned any gathering into a joyful party. One day, an old friend of her master came to visit and asked Rie what the thing is that motivates everyone. Rie put his hand on her heart. With the sound of a drum, a wave is pulsated. As Rie's apprenticeship ended, her master sent her to her house and she became the next leader of the house.

TEXT_CHA_PR_5_37_DESC.text: As Rie became the leader of the house, the first thing she did was holding a festival. She invited all house members to the festival celebrating it with drums. But not everyone celebrated her succession. Some members blamed the ex-party leader for the wrong choice. They did not acknowledge Rie's legitimacy and left the house in support of Izuna, whom they think is the legitimate leader. They planned to assassinate Rie and have Izuna claim the leadership, but Rie's festival did not know when to end, so their evil plan could not even be started because of too many party people. The sound of the drums played by Rie was loud enough to be heard from afar. As swordsmen of various kinds visited her place out of curiosity, the festival grew even bigger.

TEXT_CHA_PR_6_37_DESC.text: However, people's perspective on Rie was different from that of the senior members of the house.  Watching Rie having fun drumming together with other house members, many swordsmen praised her as a 'non-authoritative leader who values equality and friendship.' Also, Rie's drum play was so energetic that many were inspired by her play, leading to the high morale of the house members. Everyone there was shouting Rie's name in unison. The house that used to suffer from the lack of new students suddenly became a hot place for many. The senior members of the house began to wonder if this was what was intended by the former house leader. Nonetheless, they wanted Izuna to come back and restore the legitimate reputation of the house. Regardless of what they thought and wanted, Rie raised her drum sticks every day to welcome the ceaseless flow of new students.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_TRADE_4_LACRIMOSO_DE.text: Opening his eyes in the middle of the pitch-black darkness, Lacrimoso recalled the subterranean lake of his home. An extreme environment with no living being other than himself. When he was there, Lacrimoso spent millennia without even realizing what he felt was solitude. One day, he came to see another being visiting his place after his long alienation from the world. She only came to enjoy the darkness of the lake, but she was nevertheless Lacrimoso's first dear friend, who taught him of the beauty of the outside world and the meaning of life. Her name was... What was her name? Realizing he does not remember his dear friend's name, Lacrimoso broke into tears.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_TRADE_5_LACRIMOSO_DE.text: Desperate, Lacrimoso tried to recall her name. However, his memory was severed as if cut with a blade, and Lacrimoso gave up his vain effort in the end. How much time has passed since then? When Lacrimoso, collapsed and weeping, lifted up his head to someone's footstep, light poured in out of nowhere and engulfed them. His surroundings suddenly brightened, and Lacrimoso locked eyes with Livea looking at him. Although he had never seen her like that, Lacrimoso instinctively realized that she was his dear friend Sagara and helped Livea up as she fell unconscious. Next, they were flown to somewhere in Hasla by a mysterious force.

TEXT_CHA_PR_LIMITED_TRADE_6_LACRIMOSO_DE.text: Coming to his senses, Lacrimoso learned that he and Livea had been dropped on the outskirts of a rural village in Valencia. Lacrimoso visited the village to take care of Livea, still unconscious. Initially wary of Lacrimoso's foreign looks, the villagers started to open up to his healing powers and personality, finally accepting him as one of their own in just a few days. Lacrimoso was finally happy. His past self, not in his memories anymore, would have wanted this peaceful life anyhow with others' kindness and trust earned. He was only worried about Livea still being unconscious. Moved by sadness of Lacrimoso weeping at her side every day, the villagers put all matters aside and searched everywhere in Valencia for a way to awaken Livea. The peculiar rumors of the village finally reached the royal palace, and the King of Valencia came to visit the village to see the truth for himself.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_4_ASMODEUS_DES.text: Like Demona and Luci, Asmodeus is a first-generation Demon who immigrated to the Demon Realm. With her charms cultivated over the years as an ageless demon, she stole the hearts of numerous males. Uninterested in trifling romances, she fled from barrages of gifts and courtship and spent her years hiding away in her abode reading books from Ryu over and over again. She corresponded with no one for decades, the only exception being Gustav the Familiar to do her chores and keep her company.

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_5_ASMODEUS_DES.text: One day, her Familiar went on a no-chore strike, resulting in an unprecedented shortage of supplies from the outside world. Anxious to find out how the next installment of her favorite literary series will unfold, she stepped out of her house for the first time in more than ten years to head into a bookstore downtown As she was reading through and nearing the book's ending, the door bell rang to signal someone entering: a boy stepping in with rays of the sun. "Incredibly charming..." Might this be a love at first sight? During her long years of reclusion, the Demon Realm was perhaps growing this charming flower of paradise. Asmodeus' eyes were irresistibly fixed on the boy, and her tactless heart was beating hard as if it would devour her. His slightly jaded yet sorrowed eyes, his two rosy and soft cheeks, and his delicate hands turning the pages. All of them came to her at an indescribable wavelength. Until he left, she could not move an inch as if bound at her feet. What was it that he was looking into with so much interest? Unable to suppress her curiosity, she found a pamphlet for a performance from a Succubus troupe. The title was "The Magical Girl Chronicles".

TEXT_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_6_ASMODEUS_DES.text: After that day, feverish love took over Asmodeus night and day. Such an anxious yearning she had to endure. Determined to make herself known to the boy she fell in love with, she started formulating a plot with her Familiar. However, plans coming from a Familiar and a reclusive centenarian could only be so delightfully romantic and rose-tinted. She has been courted but never the one to court, and the boy was 90 years her junior at best. Temporarily wrapped in despair, she could not let this feeling for the first time in her 110 years of life slide and suddenly thought of the pamphlet he was reading. "Magical girl..." Yes, that will definitely grab his attention. Donning a perfect magical girl attire, she stepped out the door to find the traveling Succubus Troupe in search of the boy, her first love.

TEXT_CHA_WI_4_37_DESC.text: Born a member of the high nobility in Neth Empire, Winston exercised powerful magics that lived up to his house's name and everyone had high hopes on him. He graduated the Neth Royal School with distinguished achievements. Afterwards, he joined the Magic Academy of Pumpkin City for higher education and graduated the elite school as the top student. Disappointed and dissatisfied with the restricted and confined life of the elite, he ran away from his house to wander all over the lands of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_WI_5_37_DESC.text: When he got caught by a blizzard while passing through the snowy lands of Nosgard, he managed to survive the initial crisis by creating a spherical barrier around him. However, he was eventually covered and buried under the enormous amount of snow that fell around the barrier. He was dying from hypothermia under the snow, and that is when a group of Nosgardian warriors miraculously appear to sweep away the snow. It was the moment when Winston began to admire the braveness and wild spirit of the warriors removing snow with only a shovel.

TEXT_CHA_WI_6_37_DESC.text: Admiring those burly Nosgardian warriors, Winston stopped wandering Hasla, settled in the area to live with them. So inspired by their strong physical abilities and spirit, Winston did his best to be like them for years. However, he couldn't have a strong body like them because he was born weak by nature. Realizing this fact, he came to devise spells that could transform his body and finally succeeded in making his body look buffy like the warriors. The only problem was that it was only for the looks and without any real physical strength. To research new spells that would actually enhance his strength as well, he resumed wandering all over the lands of Hasla.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_4_LIVEA_DESC.text: Opening her eyes in the middle of the pitch-black darkness, Livea had nary an inkling of fear in her heart. Livea, the ruler of fate who brought death to its knees, the great master of the void. Darkness and solitude were not only familiar to her; they were also testaments to her achievements. Incredulous from her awakening and about to close her eyes once more, Livea woke back up from a perplexing sense of cold and hunger. The senses of skin and flesh, abandoned as she became a being of the void, felt again? In her confusion, she unconsciously touched the wall to realize that she is in a cave instead of her familiar void rift, and began to wander aimlessly on the appendages presumed to be arms and legs.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_5_LIVEA_DESC.text: How long has she walked? With the unfamiliar sense of fatigue weighing down her body, Livea heard someone weeping across the darkness and froze. Not knowing how weaker she has become, she wondered if she had to turn back and run, but she soon remembered her status as the great ruler and was filled with anger. When she got herself together and ready to bellow at the being across the darkness, light poured in out of nowhere and engulfed them. Her surroundings suddenly brightened, and she fainted from shock and awe when she saw Lacrimoso's blue face that was closer to her than she thought.

TEXT_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_6_LIVEA_DESC.text: Waking up on her bed, Livea locked eyes with Lacrimoso taking care of her. Unable to bear the sunlight and the others' looks for the first time in millennia, Livea ran away from him. Or, she tried to. Livea leaped from the bed only to fall face-down on the floor and could not get back up in embarrassment. As if he had not noticed such an unbecoming sight, Lacrimoso told her that they are now in the nation of Valencia under King Ferdinand's protection. Livea could not comprehend his bright, grateful smile. Weakened as they may be, he would deign to smile over the indignity of being helped by an usurper of the throne. Just like he was before. That Anavatapta... Anavatapta? Unfamiliar face but familiar name. Realizing that she was acquainted with the being before her yet has no whole memory of it. Livea once again felt fear. Her powers had to be recovered as soon as possible. For her to be herself again. For that, she needed complete darkness nearly close to the void. Livea got on her feet, left the room, and ran off as fast as she could. Toward that tall, ominous tower over the grassland plain.

TEXT_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_4_YAMA_DESC.text: One of the Ten Kings of Hell, Yama is the judge of the Underworld. He is also the leader of the Death Angels of the East, such as Korin. Or so Korin thinks. In fact, Yama is the ancient guardian deity Chantico, who protects the Primal Volcano where all of Hasla’s mortal souls end up after death, by guiding them in different forms, as Judge Thanatos of the Death Angels of the West or as Quaxolotl, the God of Death and Ashes, worshiped by the Coatl tribe.

TEXT_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_5_YAMA_DESC.text: Chantico intervened in the lives of humans more actively than any other ancient guardian deities. Chantico, the controller of Primal Flames, was responsible for making sure the impure energy remaining in human souls did not reach Hasla’s heart. After all, a less chaotic world meant less work for her. But the weakness of humans was beyond one’s imagination. Even Chantico’s ‘successors,’ whom she approved and entrusted with the Legend of Primal Flames, had long been fallen and corrupted after misusing their power. Having given up any hope in humans, Chantico cut off communications with all except Death Angels responsible for guiding the dead, and fell again into a deep sleep, deep inside the Primal Volcano. After hundreds of years pass by, Chantico was woken up by a sense of something unusual.

TEXT_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_YAMA_DESC.text: Waking up from a long sleep, Chantico panicked as she realized the boundary of the living and the dead had been collapsed in the three nations of the East. The energy of the land was greatly disturbed unleashing the Legend of Primal Flames in an uncontrolled state. Her ‘master’ was nowhere to be found. Even other ancient guardian deities went missing. Chantico gathered Death Angels and heard about what happen in Hasla. Chantico, after learning about the Crusader who had saved Hasla, transformed into Yama and gave orders to Korin to follow the will of her master, who went missing. She command Korin to bring her master back to the Primal Volcano.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_ATK_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: An orb that contains the embers of hellfire. Hellfire burns the guilty who came to Hell. This fire cannot be put out.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_ATK_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: Remains of boiling magma erupted from the deep inside the Primal Volcano. It is sought after by collectors as these rocks contain rare metals sometimes.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_DEF_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: Feathers used to decorate participants in a shamanic ritual of the Woopa and Coatl tribes. More powerful shamans are, more flamboyant their feathers are.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_MAG_SP_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: A talisman used to neutralize the spirits who refuse to follow the grim reaper. The spell infused in the talisman makes spirits more docile.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_ATK_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: A research log written by an unknown person. Some of its pages are torn off and the remaining pages are burnt so its content cannot be discerned.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_ATK_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: A piece of stalactite slowly formed on the ceilings of a deep cave somewhere inside the Primal Volcano. This rock has a characteristic similar to the growth rings of a tree, so anyone can guess the age of this rock.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_DEF_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: An urn that feels cold when touched. They say that this urn is used to contain incorporeal beings. When one puts their ear to the urn, they could hear someone's voice.

TEXT_COMMON_SET_PHY_SP_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: The Coatl tribesmen use this jug when they go deep into the caves of the volcano. The jug contains refreshing water that quench thirst when going through hot areas.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_ATK_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: Orb of Yama that contains the powers of Red Lotus. It is said that anyone who stares at the mysterious red glow of this orb would see the flitting images of their past.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_ATK_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: A fragment came off of Chantico's armor. The fragment is still hot, as it contains the heat from Chantico's smoldering breath. This item should be handled with care because it's hot enough to burn careless hands that touch it.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_DEF_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: A head dress found in a place where the Festival of the Dead was hosted. It is said that whoever wears this head dress would hear an incomprehensible chaotic voice. If anyone could discern the voice, they would know that it is actually someone's prophecy.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_MAG_SP_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: The flaming flower that appears in the legends of the Woopa and Coatl tribes. Legends tell that the goddess of Hasla picked off this flower and gave it to ancient humans who hadn't yet discovered fire.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_ATK_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: The dragon scale that came off of Chantico. It glows menacingly red. They say that any wound caused by this scale would not be healed. It is thought to be fell off when Chantico shed its skin.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_ATK_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: A lump of rock found in the core of the Primal Volcano. From inside the rock still oozes hot lava. This rock pulsates in red as if it is the heart of a living creature.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_DEF_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: A fragment of a tablet containing the records of a civilization that previously existed. The text is written in a language long forgotten and some claim that it contains a forbidden spell.

TEXT_EPIC_SET_PHY_SP_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: This golden skin is created when the shed skin of a lava bug is overly heated. Although this fell off the bug, it still glows in red with heat. More precious than gold, but only a few who witnessed this survived to tell others about it.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_11.text: (Passive Added) When block skill is used during the activation of passive effect, all the enemies' chance of evasion decreases by 20 for 5 seconds. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_4_20.text: (Passive Enhanced) Lei Ling's gigantic wok changes to a fiery wok. The 'fiery wok' deals physical damage equal to 1200% of Lei Ling's attack power, and stuns the enemy for 1 second. (Cooldown: 1 second)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_5_20.text: (Passive Enhanced) Lei Ling's gigantic wok changes to a fiery wok. The 'fiery wok' deals physical damage equal to 1200% of Lei Ling's attack power, and stuns the enemy for 1 second. (Cooldown: 1 second)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_11.text: (Passive Added) When block skill is used during the activation of passive effect, all the enemies' chance of evasion decreases by 100 for 5 seconds and deals magical damage equal to 2400% of his resistance. (Cooldown: 1 second)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_20.text: (Passive Enhanced) Lei Ling's gigantic wok changes to a fiery wok. The 'fiery wok' deals physical damage equal to 4000% of her resistance, and stuns the enemy for 3 seconds. Lei Ling additionally deals physical damage equal to 4000% of her resistance every time she flips the enemy up and down, causing enemies [Damage received +30%, no healing for 3 seconds, and 50% more damage received for 3 seconds] each time. 'Fiery wok' ignores the enemies’ abilities of taking damage for their ally. (Cooldown: 1 second)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_HA_6_8.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon counterattacking the enemy, Stanya deals additional neutral damage equal to 3200% of the enemy's armor and dispels all enemy buffs. She generates 1 block for herself. (Cooldown: 1 second)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_4_11.text: (Passive Added) Upon using his counterattack, Rochefort's evasion increases by 10 and critical chance by 20% for 5 seconds. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_4_15.text: (Passive Enhanced) The cooldown of Thorn of Pain changes to 1 second.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_6_11.text: (Passive Added) Upon using his counterattack, Rochefort's evasion increases by 30 and critical chance by 50% for 5 seconds. (Cooldown: 2 seconds) (Passive Enhanced) Rochefort now deals more physical damage equal to 2500% of his armor with his counterattacks.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_6_13.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon using her own block and Empire Swordsmanship, Victoria’s cooldown of Ensign of Victory' decreases by 0.5 seconds. (Passive Added) If Victoria deals 3 normal attacks while under the effects of 'Ensign of Victory,' she attacks once more to deal neutral damage equal to 2560% of her armor.

TEXT_EXCLUSIVE_SW_6_15.text: (Passive Enhanced) The cooldown of Thorn of Pain changes to 0.33 seconds. Thorn of Pain is activated when hit while in the 'Thorn of Refusal state regardless of the distance. (Passive Enhanced) Red rosebush and blue rosebush randomly bloom on the Thorn of Pain, ignores enemies' abilities of taking damage for their group and respectively deals physical damage and magical damage equal to 640% of Arita's armor per hit.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_5_35.text: Until I become a true member of the Green Apple, I shall prove myself over and over again.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_AR_6_35.text: Finding true justice is the only way to make atonement to my friend.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_4_35.text: You don’t raise cats, you live together with them!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_5_35.text: If I don’t do something, the world of cats will never come!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_HU_6_35.text: I shall fight until the end for the world of cats!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_4_34.text: Mom! Dad! Look at this. I can now join the hunt with others!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PA_6_34.text: Oops, it's too bright! It's been years since I last felt sunlight on my face...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_4_37.text: Dum, dum, dum, drrum! Here comes Rie! Dum dum Rie!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_5_37.text: Come here, everyone! My festival is about to begin! Dum, dum, dum, dum!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_6_37.text: Are you troubled? Don't think too much because doing so won't give you any good answer.  Have some fun first! Dum, dum, dum, dum!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_TRADE_5.text: To see you once again, I cannot stop my tears of joy...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_PR_LIMITED_TRADE_6.text: All I want is for you all to be happy. Will you let me... ...help you?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_4.text: Don't even bother with your confessions of love...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_5.text: I am getting butterflies in my stomach...  for the first time... in 110 years... Could this be... Love...?

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_6.text: So why am I not telling you how old I am?  That☆ is a secret, hiya-!☆ (* ˊ-ˋ)/~* +☆˚♬

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_4_37.text: I aced the test again... Studying is hardly a challenge for me.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_5_37.text: Whoa... How wild and strong they are... I can feel their raw power.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_6_37.text: Well, if I can't have a body like that, I can create one up with my spell.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_4.text: Wait, what is this soft body? It's going to break at the slightest application of strength!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_5.text: I hate whining. So stop right now, or face severe punishment.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_6.text: The ruler must stay dignified, always and everywhere. So… Hey, do not come any closer with your tears!

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_4_YAMA.text: Today’s meeting schedule... Grim Reaper first, and then Korin and Anubisis? How boring...

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_5_YAMA.text: Humans are always causing such an inconvenience. They feel no shame for undermining their own value? I’d rather sleep than get more of this nonsense.

TEXT_GACHA_SPEECH_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_YAMA.text: What happened here while I was asleep? I shall have all the details.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_AR_6_35.text: He grew up as a wealthy boy in a huge castle. Nottingham’s hobby was exploring every nook and cranny of his castle. One day, he stumbled upon a hidden place that led to a basement cellar. There, he found prisoners and smuggled properties. Shocked at the discovery of the unjust ways with which his family had been gaining wealth, he felt ashamed of the privileges and luxuries that he had been unknowingly enjoying.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_HU_6_35.text: Although the paradise of cats she created near Pumpkin City has now become a target for both Pumpkin City and Animal Loving Adventurers, there isn’t much that could be done because it is impossible to conquer the place without hurting the cats who fiercely protect Anima.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PA_6_34.text: As the inventor of ‘Ogrenology,’ Ozma made some other handy inventions as well, but she couldn’t explain the exact mechanism behind them. After a few miraculous inventions like the infinite power generator or the wireless shower head, which would have flabbergasted any engineer of Neth, the Devil Island now turned into a bizarrely good place to live...

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_6_37.text: She falls asleep when she listens to gentle and soothing music. She can turn anything she gets her hands on into a drum set. Whatever she finds around her, she taps it with hands. It is difficult to say if she is serious about succeeding her family legacy since she is a party animal. Still, her positive and energetic attitude tend to help her solve complicated problems so easily with the best result. Some consider her a grand strategist while others discount her as a spoiled child in a string of luck.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_PR_LIMITED_TRADE_6_.text: Lacrimoso always acts to help others and gives his all to help those in need. Lacrimoso's followers worry that he might be taken advantage of by those with ill intentions, but even the shadiest people eventually reform themselves and do Lacrimoso's "smallest" favors to the best of their abilities after spending some time with him.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_6_.text: Knowing only that he looks much younger than her and is interested in magical girls, she jumped to a hasty conclusion and became a ☆magical☆ ☆girl☆ out of the blue. Her goal is to familiarize herself with the culture of the current Demon youths and hold uninterrupted conversations with the youthful boy. However, her long years of reclusion without correspondence made it extremely difficult for her to stay up to others’ conversational tempo and comprehend the pop culture of the latest generation, making her spout cringeworthy, out-of-context slangs and putting the listeners at unease.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_6_37.text: He had a complex about his curly hair, so he used to hide it under the hood when he was young. Now, after learning what makes a Nosgardian warrior stand out from the crowd, he feels comfortable with his wild curly hair. He loves exercise but has gained not much muscle since he has a poor appetite and is naturally born weak.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_6_.text: Despite having lost most of her memories, Livea is still aware of herself as a proudly solitary and absolute being. Holding immeasurable powers, the sturdy bones summoned by Livea from beyond the void are actually her own bones. However, Livea's current body separated from her primary body is as fragile as an ordinary human body, so it easily gets hurt from tripping and hitting objects.

TEXT_PROFILE_ETC_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_YAMA.text: One of the titles of 'Chantico,' the ancient guardian goddess that protects the Primal Volcano. She shows herself in different forms depending on who sees her, and supposedly, the soul of the viewer that perceives the world seem to determine her appearance. For this reason, she was called by hundreds or even thousands of names in the ancient times, but ever since the mankind of Hasla built civilization and agreed on a unified sense of the world, this number was reduced to a dozen or so.

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_AR_6_35.text: Conceit and pretense, pride and prejudice, bull’s eye betting, trying to read Robin Hood’s mind, drunkard’s nuisance, and sarcastic remarks

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_HU_6_35.text: A human who abuses cats, an intruder

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PA_6_34.text: Sunlight, hanging out with many people without the ‘Ku-Klip’ suit

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_PR_6_37.text: Gentle classical music, study light, meditation, extended introspection, living in a cave

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_.text: House chores, loud singing, uninvited guests

TEXT_PROFILE_HATES_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_YAMA.text: Self-conceited humans, holes drilled by a lava bug

TEXT_PROFILE_HOBBY_CHA_AR_6_35.text: Examining blueprints, exploring the basement, meditating, and studying history

TEXT_PROFILE_HOBBY_CHA_PA_6_34.text: Buying ‘Ku-Klip’ goods at the town in the disguise of an ordinary devil

TEXT_PROFILE_HOBBY_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_.text: Studying today's trends, dancing to idol choreography tutorials in slower speed

TEXT_PROFILE_HOBBY_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_.text: Dressing herself in white from head to toe

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_AR_6_35.text: Finding secret spaces, investigating the truth, and having casual and honest conversations

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_6_37.text: Soothing drum sound, brotherhood and bonding by dancing, positive interpretation of situations

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_PR_LIMITED_TRADE_.text: Intelligent beings to talk to, Livea, flowing water

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WA_LIMITED_TRADE_.text: Books of Ryu, ordering around her friend Gustav

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_LIMITED_TRADE_.text: Levitating in the darkness, dark of the night, Valencian specialty lace

TEXT_PROFILE_LIKES_CHA_WI_UNIQUE_6_YAMA.text: Well-behaved humans, all sorts of totems

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_ATK_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: A judgment reading the type of crime and penalty for the guilty. Anyone who is sentenced guilty here would suffer eternally for their crime.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_ATK_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: Part of skin shed by a lava bug. As this skin tends to turn into a rock after it falls off, be careful when you see this skin. There is likely to be a lava bug nearby.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_DEF_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: Someone's chocolate fondant accidentally dropped into the crater. Anyone who takes a bite would taste the burning sweetness of Hell.

TEXT_RARE_SET_MAG_SP_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: A claw fell off of the swift front leg of a salamander. There are still bloodstains and a chunk of flesh at the tip of the claw.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_ATK_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: A written judgment stating the merit in life and allowing the recipient to avoid the penalty of Hell in afterlife. The qualification criteria is very high that only few are enlisted here.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_ATK_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: A broken arrow used by a member of the Chrona Heroes. A fierce battle should have occurred in the area where it was found.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_DEF_EP5_STONE_1_DESC.text: Rumor has it that this is the solidified tears of Goddess Hasla. People say that holding it in mouth would help reducing the nausea caused by heat.

TEXT_RARE_SET_PHY_SP_EP5_STONE_2_DESC.text: An ancient weapon intricately engraved with obsidian stones. It is puzzling that a weapon made from a soft material could survive this long without any damage.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_NOTTINGHAM_DESC.text: Fires a bolt that pierces the enemy, dealing #physical damage# equal to [100/125/175]% of attack power depending on the number of chains. ‘Piercing Bolt’ ignores the enemy’s armor by 20%.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_NOTTINGHAM_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon using one’s block skill, normal attack is changed to 1-chain block skill for 10 seconds, and attack power increases by 75% of one’s attack speed. For this effect, the value before the increase of attack speed is applied, and the duration is reset if reused while already in effect.

TEXT_SKILL_AR_NOTTINGHAM_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using one’s block skill, normal attack is changed to 1-chain block skill for 10 seconds, and attack power is increased by 100% of one’s attack speed. For this effect, the value before the increase of attack speed is applied, and the duration is reset if reused while already in effect.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ANIMA_DESC.text: Throw [1/2/3] fish that inflict #physical damage# equal to 150% of attack power depending on the number of chains.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ANIMA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The aggressive cat, ‘Siro,’ clings to the enemy who has been damaged by ‘Today's Treats!’ Siro: Deals sustained #physical damage# equal to 400% of Anima’s attack power for 8 seconds. Duration is reset if reactivated while in effect, and can be stacked up to 3 times. This effect cannot be dispelled or blocked.

TEXT_SKILL_HU_ANIMA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The aggressive cat, ‘Siro,’ clings to the enemy who has been damaged by ‘Today's Treats!’  The lethargic cat, ‘Nero,’ also clings to the enemy. Siro: Deals sustained #physical damage# equal to 400% of Anima’s attack power for 8 seconds. Duration is reset if reactivated while in effect, and can be stacked up to 3 times. This effect cannot be dispelled or blocked. Nero: Reduces armor by 500 and critical resistance by 10% for 8 seconds. Duration is reset if reactivated while in effect, and can be stacked up to 3 times.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LEILING_DESC.text: Upon using a block skill, Lei Ling gives the enemy a different effect according to the chain number. [1-chain - 'Chop' : Lei Ling rapidly chops bundles of leek at the enemy. Each leek is divided into 5 parts, each dealing #physical damage# equal to 20% of Lei Ling's attack power. Hit enemies receive 30% increased damage for 3 seconds.] [2-chain - 'Dredge' : Lei Ling throws a bag of flour at the enemy, dealing #physical damage# equal to 200% of her attack power. Hit enemies cannot be healed for 3 seconds.] [3-chain - 'Deep-Fry' : Lei Ling throws cooking oil forward, dealing #physical damage# equal to 400% of her attack power. Hit enemies receive 50% more damage for 3 seconds.]

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LEILING_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing each block for 3 allies regardless of order, Lei Ling pulls out a gigantic wok, which she smashes down to deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of her attack power and stun hit enemies for 1 second.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LEILING_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon pressing each block for 3 allies regardless of order, Lei Ling pulls out a gigantic wok, which she smashes down to deal #physical damage# equal to 300% of her attack power and stun hit enemies for 1 second. Afterwards, Lei Ling uses her wok to flip the enemy up and down 3 times, stunning them for 3 seconds with the last toss.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIGHTMAKER_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Stanya is immune to all debuffs for 5 seconds after using a chain-3 skill. When hit during this effect, she dashes forward and deals #physical damage# equal to 322% of her attack power. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_LIGHTMAKER_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using her 3-chain, Stanya receives all damage targeted at the entire party for 5 seconds and becomes immune to 5 hits, while the entire party becomes immune to debuffs. If she receives a hit from the enemy during this time, she charges forward to stun the enemy for 1 second and deal #physical damage# equal to 1000% of her attack power. (Cooldown: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OZMA_DESC.text: Ku-Klip chops enemy with her twin ax in turn to inflict #physical damage# equal to [500/700/1000]% of Attack Power 2 times according to the number of chains.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OZMA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Ozma mounts on Ku-Klip as she enters combat. Ozma's HP is increased by 1.5 times immediately as she mounts on Ku-Klip.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_OZMA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Ozma mounts on Ku-Klip as she enters combat. Ozma's HP is increased by 1.5 times and the damage taken by her friendly units is redirected to her immediately after she mounts on Ku-Klip. Increases SP of all friendly units by 10 as Ozma presses on her own block while in Ku-Klip.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SHINE_SMASH_LV2_SUBDESC.text: After Roland's skill block is used, he heals the entire party for 40% of his resistance up to 5 times whenever he is attacked by an enemy for the next 5 secs.

TEXT_SKILL_PA_SHINE_SMASH_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Upon using a block, Roland, for the next 5 seconds, receives all damage targeted at the entire party and heals the entire party by 220% of his resistance while increasing their SP by 30 every time he receives a hit (maximum 8 times). With every 5th heal, he immediately stuns all enemies for 2 seconds, deals #physical damage# equal to 195% of his attack power to the frontmost enemy, and generates 1 block for himself. (Cooldown: 1 second)

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LACRIMOSO_DESC.text: Heals the entire ally by [100/125/150]% of their attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LACRIMOSO_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Water Serpent' every time the ally leader hits an enemy. (Cooldown: 3 seconds) Water Serpent: Deals $neutral damage$ equal to 50% of attack power to the enemy with the highest Max HP. The 'Water Serpent' ignores effects that take damage in place of others and Evasion.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_LACRIMOSO_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Water Serpent' every time the ally leader hits an enemy. (Cooldown: 1 second) Water Serpent: Deals $neutral damage$ equal to 50% of attack power to the enemy with the highest Max HP and heals the entire ally by the amount equal to the damage dealt. The 'Water Serpent' ignores effects that take damage in place of others and Evasion.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RAI_DESC.text: Rie taps the drum to heal friendly units by [120/250/380]% of their Attack Power according to the number of chains.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RAI_LV2_SUBDESC.text: 'Dum Dum Drrum!' Stuns all enemy units for 1 second when triggered.

TEXT_SKILL_PR_RAI_LV3_SUBDESC.text: 'Dum Dum Drrum!' When activated, stuns all enemies for 1 second. When another ally activates a 3-chain skill, additionally recovers 200% of attack power of all allies except self.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ASMODEUS_DESC.text: Deals @magical damage@ equal to 100% of the attack power to all enemies within range according to the chain number used, and uses [Lovely Hearts/Magical Blessings/Bright Stars]. Lovely Hearts: Generates 10 SP for the entire ally. Magical Blessings: Dispels debuffs for the entire ally. (Cooldown: 3 seconds) Bright Stars: Generates a block for all allies. (Cooldown: 5 seconds)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ASMODEUS_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Special Skill changes to 'Aura of Charms'. Aura of Charms: Generates an Aura of Charms around the self. All enemies within the aura have motion speed increased by 5% while evasion and accuracy decreased by 15 each. (Every second)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_ASMODEUS_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Special Skill changes to 'Aura of Charms'. Aura of Charms: Generates an Aura of Charms around the self. All enemies within the aura have motion speed increased by 5% while evasion and accuracy decreased by 15 each. (Every second) Enters 'Exhausted' when stayed inside 'Aura of Charms' for 5 seconds. 'Exhausted' enemies have motion speed decreased by 20% and their rate of decrease in evasion and accuracy increases by 2 times.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FALCON_ATTACK_DESC.text: Upon using a block, Rochefort, according to the chain number used, deals #physical damage# equal to [100/150/250]% of his attack power, and has a 50% chance of blocking attacks for the next 5 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FALCON_ATTACK_LV2_SUBDESC.text: If Rochefort succeeds in blocking or evading an attack within 5 seconds of using a block skill, he counterattacks to deal #physical damage# equal to 400% of his armor. (Maximum 10 times) Using a block after Rochefort's counterattack will summon 3 'hawks' that each deal #physical damage# equal to 400% of his armor. (Activates 1 per second)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_FALCON_ATTACK_LV3_SUBDESC.text: If Rochefort succeeds in blocking or evading an attack within 5 seconds of using a block skill, he counterattacks to deal #physical damage# equal to 800% of his armor. (Maximum 10 times) Using a block after Rochefort's counterattack will summon 3 'hawks' that each deal #physical damage# equal to 5000% of his armor. If this attack deals a critical hit, Rochefort will generate 1 block for himself. (Triggered once every second)

TEXT_SKILL_WA_VICTORY_RUSH_LV3_SUBDESC.text: When a block is used, the Ensign of Victory is summoned at the front line of the ally for 7 seconds once every 10 seconds. All allies near the summoned flag ignore amount of damage equal to 1000% of Victoria's armor. During the duration of the effect, her auto attack changes to Empire Swordsmanship that deals $neutral damage$ equal to 1280% of her armor.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIVEA_DESC.text: Uses sharp bones to deal @magical damage@ equal to [220/310/390]% of the Hero's resistance per hit, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIVEA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: The Hero's Special Skill changes to 'Dragon Fang'. 'Dragon Fang' lasts for 15 seconds, and if the leader block is skill is activated while  'Dragon Fang' is active, activates 'Dragon Ribs' with the power of a 1-chain.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_LIVEA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: The Hero's Special Skill changes to 'Dragon Fang'. 'Dragon Fang' lasts for 15 seconds, and if the leader block is skill is activated while  'Dragon Fang' is active, activates 'Dragon Ribs' with the power of a 1-chain. When activating 'Dragon Ribs' while 'Dragon Fang' is acive, enemies who have a lower Max HP than Livea will be put in the 'Gap in the Subspace' state, where they will @magical damage@ equal to 500% of Livea's resistance for 3 seconds.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WINSTON_DESC.text: Winston inflicts @magical damage@ equal to [200/300/600]% of his Attack Power to enemies in the front.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WINSTON_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Winston's Critical Chance is increased by 20% for 3 seconds when using the block skill.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WINSTON_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Winston's Critical Chance is increased by 20% and maximum HP by 100% for 3 seconds when using the block skill.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_YAMA_DESC.text: Sets off fire that inflicts @magical damage@ equal to [350/400/450]% of attack power according to the number of chains.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_YAMA_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Special skill is changed to ‘Moment of Justice.’ Moment of Justice: Increases the hero’s critical damage by 50% and resistance penetration by 1000 for 7 seconds. (Duration reset upon reactivation)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_YAMA_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Special skill is changed to ‘Moment of Justice.’ Moment of Justice: Increases the hero’s critical damage by 75% and resistance penetration by 2000 for 7 seconds. Inflicts @magical damage@ equal to 450% of Yama’s attack power every 0.1 second on the front-most enemy. (Duration reset upon reactivation)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_4_35_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) The number of projectiles of ‘Piercing Bolt’ is increased to 3, and the enemy’s armor is ignored by 50%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_5_35_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) The number of projectiles of ‘Piercing Bolt’ is increased to 3, and the enemy’s armor is ignored by 50%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_35_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) The number of projectiles of ‘Piercing Bolt’ is increased to 3, and the enemy’s armor is ignored by 50%. (Passive Enhanced) ‘Calm Hunter’ is enhanced to increase one’s attack power by 150% of one’s attack speed. (Passive Enhanced) Using a special skill of an ally other than oneself summons ‘Giant Siege Ballista’ for 4 seconds. ‘Giant Siege Ballista’ fires giant bolts that deal physical damage equal to 1800% of attack power every second. ‘Giant Siege Ballista’ ignores the enemy’s armor, and when critically hit, the critical damage increases by 50%. (Cooldown: 5 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_4_35_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) ‘Today’s Treats!’ is enhanced to ‘Today’s Feast!’ and throws [1/2/3] canned fish instead of fish depending on the number of chains. Upon hitting an enemy, canned fish causes an explosion dealing physical damage equal to 150% of attack power. All enemies damaged by the explosion are subject to the effect of ‘Everyone, Bite!’

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_5_35_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) ‘Today’s Treats!’ is enhanced to ‘Today’s Feast!’ and throws [1/2/3] canned fish instead of fish depending on the number of chains. Upon hitting an enemy, canned fish causes an explosion dealing physical damage equal to 150% of attack power. All enemies damaged by the explosion are subject to the effect of ‘Everyone, Bite!’

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_6_35_DESC.text: (Block Skill Enhanced) ‘Today’s Treats!’ is enhanced to ‘Today’s Feast!’ and throws [1/2/3] canned fish instead of fish depending on the number of chains. Upon hitting an enemy, canned fish causes an explosion dealing physical damage equal to 150% of attack power. All enemies damaged by the explosion are subject to the effect of ‘Everyone, Bite!’  (Passive Enhanced) The enemy, who is stacked to the maximum level of ‘Siro’ as the result of ‘Everyone, Bite!,’ turns into the ‘Giant Churu Churu!’ state. This effect cannot be dispelled or blocked. When using one’s 3-chain, Anima aims the laser pointer, and if any enemies are in the ‘Giant Churu Churu!’ state, then ‘Wild instincts!’ is activated upon them. ‘Wild instincts!’ : Uses a laser pointer to get the cats to attack the target dealing physical damage equal to 1000% of attack power 15 times for 3 seconds. Duration of Bunch of Cats is reset if reactivated.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_4_34_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) While in Ku-Klip, damage to Ozma is decreased by 20% and Ozma heals 10% of her maximum HP every second.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_5_34_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) While in Ku-Klip, damage to Ozma is decreased by 20% and Ozma heals 10% of her maximum HP every second.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_HA_CHA_6_34_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) While in Ku-Klip, damage to Ozma is decreased by 30% and 'Self Enhancement' is triggered, which heals 15% of her maximum HP every second. (Passive Added) Whenever Ozma's SP reaches 100, she triggers Restoration Order, which heals 5% of maximum HP of every friendly units. (Cooldown: 10 seconds) (Passive Added) While in Ku-Klip, when Ozma is healed 10 times in any manner except life steal, Ozma uses 'Restoration Protocol Error', which inflicts neutral damage equal to 200% of the amount of HP healed every time for 5 seconds. 'Restoration Protocol Error' applies as a debuff. (Cooldown: 7 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_4_37_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Dum Dum Drrum!' When activated, increases resistance penetration of the ally with the greatest attack power by 50% for 3 seconds if there is an enemy immune to stun.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_5_37_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Dum Dum Drrum!' When activated, increases resistance penetration of the ally with the greatest attack power by 50% for 3 seconds if there is an enemy immune to stun.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_CHA_6_37_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Dum Dum Drrum!' When activated, increases resistance penetration of the ally with the greatest attack power by 100% for 3 seconds if there is an enemy immune to stun. (Passive Added) Summons ‘Thunderous Sound’ that follows for 8 seconds when another ally activates a 3-chain skill. 'Thunderous Sound’ chooses the ally with the greatest attack power every second to raise their morale, increasing critical chance by 30% and magical damage by 50% for 3 seconds. If 'Thunderous Sound' is cast again while it is still active, its duration is reset.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_TRADE_LACRIMOSO_4_DES.text: (Passive Added) Activates 'Grace of Water Dragon' for 5 seconds upon activating 'Water Serpent' 8 times.  Grace of Water Dragon: Increases the ally leader's magical damage by 50%, critical chance by 25%, and resistance and resistance penetration by 800.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_TRADE_LACRIMOSO_5_DES.text: (Passive Added) Activates 'Grace of Water Dragon' for 5 seconds upon activating 'Water Serpent' 8 times.  Grace of Water Dragon: Increases the ally leader's magical damage by 50%, critical chance by 25%, and resistance and resistance penetration by 800.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_OR_TRADE_LACRIMOSO_6_DES.text: (Passive Added) Activates 'Grace of Water Dragon' for 5 seconds upon activating 'Water Serpent' 3 times.  Grace of Water Dragon: Increases the ally leader's magical damage by 80%, critical chance by 50%, and resistance and resistance penetration by 2000. Additionally generates a leader block per second.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_4_37_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Increases Winston's Resistance Penetration by 1500 for 3 seconds as 'Manifestation' is triggered.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_5_37_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Increases Winston's Resistance Penetration by 1500 for 3 seconds as 'Manifestation' is triggered.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_CHA_6_37_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Sets Winston's Critical Chance boost effect to 40% and increases his Resistance Penetration by 1500 for 3 seconds as 'Manifestation' is triggered. (Passive Enhanced) Upon chain-3 combo, the Hero generates 1 block for themselves.  (Passive Added) Winston triggers 'Determination of Nosgard' at the start of combat. This effect lasts throughout the combat. - Determination of Nosgard: Changes Winston's appearance, turning his basic attack into melee attack and his block skill into 'Cleave.' - Cleave: Winston charges at the target inflicting physical damage equal to [1/1/1]% of his Attack Power, and knocks the target back inflicting magical damage equal to [200/300/4000]% of his Attack Power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_TRADE_LIVEA_4_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating 'Dragon Ribs', increases the Hero's resistance by 150% and resistance penetration by 100% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_TRADE_LIVEA_5_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating 'Dragon Ribs', increases the Hero's resistance by 150% and resistance penetration by 100% for 3 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_TRADE_LIVEA_6_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating 'Dragon Ribs', increases the Hero's resistance by 150% and resistance penetration by 100% for 3 seconds.  (Passive Added) Upon activating 'Dragon Ribs', if there is an enemy in the 'Gap in the Subspace', activates 'Rising Dragon Bone’ to the frontmost enemy to deal magical damage equal to 1100% of the resistance per hit and knocks it into the air. (Cooldown: 3 seconds) The movement speed of the enemy hit by 'Rising Dragon Bone' decreases by 50% for 1 second.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_UNIQUE_4_YAMA_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Summons 'Hand of Judge’ at the location of front-most enemy when self block skill is activated. (Cooldown 0.8 seconds) Hand of Judge: Inflicts magical damage equal to 800% of attack power, and knocks the target into the air.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_UNIQUE_5_YAMA_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Summons 'Hand of Judge’ at the location of front-most enemy when self block skill is activated. (Cooldown 0.8 seconds) Hand of Judge: Inflicts magical damage equal to 800% of attack power, and knocks the target into the air.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_ST_UNIQUE_6_YAMA_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Summons 'Hand of Judge’ at the location of front-most enemy when self block skill is activated, and increases the hero's SP by 5. (Cooldown 0.8 seconds) Hand of Judge: Inflicts magical damage equal to 1200% of attack power, and knocks the target into the air. (Passive Added) Uses ‘Ultimatum’ which inflicts magical damage equal to 500% of attack power on the enemy in mid-air. (Passive Added) When ‘Moment of Justice’ is activated, the hero’s attack power increases by 50% for 7 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_4_36_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon successfully evading an enemy attack, the Hero enters 'Dempsey Roll' mode for 15 seconds. 'Dempsey Roll' cannot be blocked or dispelled. (Cooltime after the end of the effect: 10 seconds)  Dempsey Roll: The Hero weaves their upper body in a figure-eight motion increasing their evasion by 50. During 'Dempsey Roll,' the Hero's block skill is switched to 'Dempsey Roll - Hook.' Dispelled when Dempsey is stunned. Dempsey Roll - Hook: Throws hooks to deal neutral damage equal to 250% of the Hero's attack power twice.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_5_36_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon successfully evading an enemy attack, the Hero enters 'Dempsey Roll' mode for 15 seconds. 'Dempsey Roll' cannot be blocked or dispelled. (Cooltime after the end of the effect: 10 seconds)  Dempsey Roll: The Hero weaves their upper body in a figure-eight motion increasing their evasion by 50. During 'Dempsey Roll,' the Hero's block skill is switched to 'Dempsey Roll - Hook.' Dispelled when Dempsey is stunned. Dempsey Roll - Hook: Throws hooks to deal neutral damage equal to 250% of the Hero's attack power twice.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_CHA_6_36_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon successfully evading an enemy attack, the Hero enters 'Dempsey Roll' mode for 15 seconds. 'Dempsey Roll' cannot be blocked or dispelled. (Cooltime after the end of the effect: 10 seconds)  Dempsey Roll: The Hero weaves their upper body in a figure-eight motion increasing their evasion by 100 and attack power by 100%. During 'Dempsey Roll,' the Hero's block skill is switched to 'Dempsey Roll - Hook.' Dispelled when Dempsey is stunned. Dempsey Roll - Hook: Throws hooks to deal neutral damage equal to 500% of the Hero's attack power twice, and stuns the closest enemy within the range for 1 second. Stunning ignores the effects of receiving all damage directed at the target.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_TRADE_ASMODEUS_4_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The range of 'Aura of Charms' increases by 100%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_TRADE_ASMODEUS_5_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The range of 'Aura of Charms' increases by 100%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_TRADE_ASMODEUS_6_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The range of 'Aura of Charms' increases by 100%. (Block Skill Enhanced) The block skill deals 300% damage, and [Lovely Hearts/Magical Blessings/Bright Stars] is enhanced as below:  Lovely Hearts: Generates 30 SP for the entire ally.  Magical Blessings: Cancels all debuffs affecting the entire ally and grants a 50% chance to become immune to debuffs for 3 seconds. (Cooldown: 3 seconds)  Bright Stars: Generates a block for all allies. (Cooldown: 3 seconds) (Passive Added) Uses Star 'Light-Slash' to deal magical damage equal to 3000% of the attack power to all enemies within range over 5 hits when using the Hero's Special Skills while 'Aura of Charms’ is activated. 'Exhausted' enemies take double damage.

TEXT_COMPLETE_SUB_QUEST_SISDESERT_SKILL_.text: Yeah! This is what I'm talking about!
Gotta move your body now and then!

TEXT_COMPLETE_SUB_QUEST_SISDOG_SKILL_000.text: I'll train hard to protect you, {PLAYER_NAME}!

TEXT_COMPLETE_SUB_QUEST_SISDRAGON_SKILL_.text: I guess you don't need my help after all.
Hmm, I'm starting to like you more...
...? Why are you looking at me like that?

TEXT_COMPLETE_SUB_QUEST_SISFOREST_SKILL_.text: Sigh... This feels like it will never end. But we can't give up!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_BIGRESULT_1.text: Wow! Seems like you achieved a higher level than what the secret book mentions!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_BIGRESULT_CELINE_1.text: Great accomplishment! I wonder what led to this result. It is worth the research!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_LEVELUP_1.text: The skill has leveled up! How much stronger did it get? Please tell me after trying it out!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_LEVELUP_2.text: The skill of the scroll has evolved! You can now learn a higher level of the skill.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_LEVELUP_CELINE_1.text: Development...! What a wonderful term. Interesting, experience the strengthened skill.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_LEVELUP_CELINE_2.text: Upgraded skill has been recorded in the spell book. How about learning it?

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_MAXLEVEL_1.text: You maxed out the skill. Try getting an even better level with great success.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_MAXLEVEL_2.text: You can only get to this level with the scroll. But... what if you have a great success...?

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_MAXLEVEL_CELINE_1.text: Skill upgrade had been fully developed! But still, you must work on great success of skills.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_MAXLEVEL_CELINE_2.text: This is the final skill level recorded in the spell book. But you can develop further through great success!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_RESULT_2.text: Congratulations on obtaining a new skill! Why don't you test it out right away?

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_RESULT_CELINE_1.text: You've acquired a new skill. Perfect! No point criticizing, theoretically.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_RESULT_CELINE_2.text: Yes, the transfer is compete. It's ordinary. Hmm... ordinary is not bad at all!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_UNLOCK_1.text: A new skill has been unlocked. I would like to test it out.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_UNLOCK_2.text: You found a new skill scroll. What kind of skill does it have?

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_UNLOCK_CELINE_1.text: New knowledge develops human beings, so does new skills.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_UNLOCK_CELINE_2.text: Aha! New spell book. It inspires so much academically.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_WAR_1.text: Oh, {PLAYER_NAME}! Hello there. Long time no see since the Manacar affair.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_WAR_2.text: The magician in charge of this village is vacant for some reason.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_WAR_3.text: So I will be filling the position for a while as a temporary magician.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_WAR_4.text: I am not sure how long I'll be here, but my service is open to you!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SUB_QUEST_SISDESERT_SKILL.text: It's boring at home, I'm aching for a fight!
Hey, {PLAYER_NAME}! Let's get out of here!
Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SUB_QUEST_SISDOG_SKILL_00.text: When you're in trouble, I'll protect you with my power, {PLAYER_NAME}!
But I can only block attacks for a short time, so you must call upon me at the right time!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SUB_QUEST_SISDRAGON_SKILL.text: I've been watching the way you fight... It's really frustrating!
What's bothering me? Everything, it's all wrong!
Sigh... never mind. Let me show you how it's done.
What are you waiting for? Let's go.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SUB_QUEST_SISFOREST_SKILL.text: There are still a lot of corrupted monsters for us to face.
We must move before they do.
Let us cleanse the world of their corruption.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SUB_QUEST_SISKRAKEN_SKILL.text: ... I want to get some air.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_1.text: Hellad is in charge of the Skill Lab. Why don't you go visit her?

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_10.text: Hmm... Oh yeah! One more important thing!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_11.text: In order to raise or unlock skill levels, you need to meet its #conditions#.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_12.text: And if there's a #Great Success# when learning a skill, a skill of a #higher level# is learned.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_13.text: I guess that's about it! I'll be going back to my research then! Busy, busy!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_14.text: How was it? Please remember that skills obtained can be checked in the hero's #detailed info#.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_15.text: Heroes equipped with special skills will be a great help in battle.  You will not be disappointed.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_3.text: I'm chief magician Hellad de Newa, sent from  the Central Empire, 13th Bureau.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_4.text: I am a noble woman of the empire, but you can just call me Hellad.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_5.text: Then, shall we learn some skills? Each hero can only learn #skills# for their #class#.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_8.text: Great! Now this hero can use a new skill.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_9.text: Oh, even if you don't like the skill, you can change it anytime you want, so don't worry.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SP_SKILL_2.text: By the way, {PLAYER_NAME}. Did you know?

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SP_SKILL_3.text: When heroes of rank 3 or higher use skill blocks, the #SP gauge# fills up.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SP_SKILL_4.text: When the SP gauge is fully filled, #special skill blocks# can be created!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SP_SKILL_5.text: Special blocks! With strong, varying abilities, do not stack on each other like normal blocks.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SP_SKILL_7.text: Good job! Note that the SP gauge of heroes only increase when #their# skills are used!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SP_SKILL_8.text: According to rumors, some heroes can learn special skills.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SP_SKILL_9.text: I'm sure the time to meet them will come soon, right?

TEXT_SUB_QUEST_SISKRAKEN_SKILL_TITLE_000.text: I Want to Get Some Air.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_SKILL_RESULT_1.text: It feels like… Success! Superb! This Hero can now use a new Special Skill.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SIS_SKILL_1.text: Oh! Thanks to you, {PLAYER_NAME}, I can use my powers!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SIS_SKILL_2.text: How is it? Doesn't hurt, right?

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SIS_SKILL_3.text: Use my power the instant monsters attack to minimize damage.

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SIS_SKILL_5.text: Now's the time! #Touch# the button of my face!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTORIAL_SKILL_EQUIP_6.text: Transferring skills does cost some resources... But as this is your first time, it's on me, sweetie!

TEXT_DIALOGUES_TUTO_CHAMPION_LINK_SKILL_.text: Magnificent. You have formed a #Bond# with a Champion. The Champion can now use their #Bond Skill#.
Bond Skills can be #equipped# or #unequipped# anytime.
I also hear that you can obtain more powerful #Bond Skills# as you form stronger Bonds with Champions.
Use them wisely, and Bond Skills will greatly help you in battle.
{PLAYER_NAME}. May your stronger #Bond# with Champions help you protect Hasla together, side by side.
